30a2(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor zhing / de dang de dag tu rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pa ston pa la rgyun chad med pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na rtag pa zhes bstan to// rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / 
30a3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po sngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na mi rtag pa zhes bstan to// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma med pa'i dus
30a4(rgyud): nas rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas thams cad kye ma 'dres pa'i chos rnams yong su sdud cing 'dzin pa'i phyir dang // sems can zad pa med pa bzhin du mdzad pa la
30a5(rgyud): yang zad pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir rtag pa zhes pa/ stan to// rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po mngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa
30a6(rgyud): zhes bstan to// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i chos kyang ma yin la/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid mi mnga' zhing rtsa ba yin par gyur pa'i phyir dang / na mkha'
30a7(rgyud): dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir/ rtag pa zhes bstan to// rigs kyi bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na/ mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes med la/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las
30a8(rgyud): gud na yang mchog tu gyur pa'i spyod yul med pas/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dang / shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa gnyis po gang yin pa
30b1(rgyud): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gog pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir/ gnyis
30b2(rgyud): rnam par dag par gyur pa yin pas/ des na chos kyi sku ni rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sku gsum po dag tu rnam par dbyen/ tha dad
30b3(rgyud): pa rnam pa bzhir gyur te/ sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa yang yod/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa yang yod / sprul pa'i sku yi
30b4(rgyud): la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa yang yod/ sprul pa'i sku yang ma yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa yang yod// sprul pa'i sku yin la longs spyod
30b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las// 'das pa'i 'og tu smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i
30b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/ sa'i mdun rol
30b7(rgyud): gyi sku gang yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku yang yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das 'das pa la gnas pa'i
30b8(rgyud): sku gang yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku yang ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang ma yin pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sku gang yin pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni/ 
31a1(rgyud): gnyi su med pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro// gnyi su med pa zhes bya ba yang gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku de la mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba gnyis med pas yod pa yang
31a2(rgyud): ma yin med pa yang ma yin/ gcig pa yang ma yon tha dad pa yang ma yin// grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma yin pa yang ma yin/ snang ba yang ma yin/ mun pa yang ma yin te/ de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid
31a3(rgyud): kyi ye shes des ni mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi gnas kyang ma gzigs/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa yang mi gzigs/ gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa yang mi
31a4(rgyud): gzigs/ grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma yin pa yang mi gzigs/ snang ba yang ma yin/ mun pa yang ma yin pa yang mi gzigs pas/ de'i phyir spyod yul rnam par dag pa dang / shes
31a5(rgyud): rab rnam par dag pa la/ rnam par brtag tu yang mi rung la/ bar zhes bya ba med kyang 'gog pa dang lam gyi gzhi byed ba'i phyir/ chos kyi sku 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad
31a6(rgyud): pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sku 'di'i rgyu dang rkyen dang / spyod yul dang / gnas dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dpag par dka' ba'i phyir gang gis khong du
31a7(rgyud): chung par gyur na/ sku de ni theg pa chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o// sku 'di nyid la brten nas/ dang po bskyed pa'i sems kyang thob par 'gyuraro// rnal
31a8(rgyud): 'byor sgom pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyuraro// rtse gcig gis thogs pa'i sems dang / rdo rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems
31b1(rgyud): kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyuraro// chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas bsam gyis mi
31b2(rgyud): khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyuraro// chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas/ ye shes chen po thams cad rab tu snang bar 'gyur bas// de'i phyir sku gnyis po ting nge
31b3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / shes rab la brten nas mngon du snang bar 'gyuraro// chos kyi sku 'di lta bu 'di ni rang gi ngo nyid la gnas pas/ brtag pa zhes kyang bstan to// nga zhes kyang bstan to// ting nge 'dzin chen
31b4(rgyud): po la gnas pa'i phyir skyid pa zhes kyang bstan to// ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i phyir yongasu gtsang ba zhes kyang bstan te/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par
31b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa dang / mnga' dbang brnyes pa dang / bde skyid pa dang / yongasu gtsang bar gyur pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten nas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
31b6(rgyud): sogs pa ting 'dzin thams cad dang / chos dran pa chen po la sogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thams cad dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / gzungs thams cad dang / 
31b7(rgyud): mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / dbang thams cad dang / chos mnyam pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing / de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
31b8(rgyud): ye shes chen po 'di la brten nas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya brgyad cu dang / ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba'i
32a1(rgyud): chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la brten nas/ rin po che tshad med cing mtha' med pa rnam pa
32a2(rgyud): sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i rin po che dang / shes rab chen po'i rin po la brten nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa sna tshogs
32a3(rgyud): mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i chos kyi sku'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing / mtshan ma la
32a4(rgyud): mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur bas/ rnam par brtag tu mi rung la/ rtag pa yang ma yin la/ chad pa yang ma yin bas/ dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// rnam par rtog pa mnga' yang / 
32a5(rgyud): ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'o// gsum du bgrang ba yod kyang ngo bo nyid la gsum du 'gyur ba med pas 'phel ba yang med/ 'grib pa yang med de/ rmi lam dang sgyu ma
32a6(rgyud): bur gzung ba med/ 'dzin pa yang med pas/ chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas 'chi bdag gi rgyal po'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ skye shi mun pa las mngon par 'phags
32a7(rgyud): pa sems can thams cad kyis sgrub par mi nus shing / bgrod par mi nus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gan su gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
32a8(rgyud): dper na/ mi zhig gser 'dod pa de dag tu gser gyi rdo yongasu btsal ba las/ gser gyi rdo de rnyed nas zhib mor btags te/ snying po gang yin pa blangs nas/ so mal du bzhus btul nas/ 
32b1(rgyud): gser yongasu dag pa rnyed par gyur na/ yid bzhin du bsgyur te/ gdu bu la sogs pa rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshog su byas nas/ spyod pa mang po dang ldan par gyur kyang gser gyi rang bzhin la ni 'gyur
32b2(rgyud): ba ci yang med// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i mchog yongasu gnyer ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba mngon par bsgrubs pas/ de bzhin
32b3(rgyud): gshegs pa 'am/ de'i slob ma'i 'khor mthong nas nye bar bsten te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba ni gang lags/ mi dge ba ni gang lags/ yang dag pa'i
32b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor bsgoms pas/ rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags zhes gsol pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa dang / slob ma'i 'khor rnams de skad du zhu ba
32b5(rgyud): gsol ba gzigs par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di ni rnam par dag pa yongasu gnyer ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i chos yongasu
32b6(rgyud): nyan par 'dod pa yin no// snyam du dgongs nas/ de la rnam par phye ste bstan pa nyid kyis go bar mdzad par 'gyur bas/ des thos nas kyang yang dag pa'i dran pas mi brjed par bzung ste/ 
32b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i sems bskyed nas/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs thob nas/ le lo'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal te/ sgrib pa thams cad yongasu sbyong bar byed pas/ bslab pa'i gnas rnams
32b8(rgyud): la ma gus pa spangs nas/ rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar bya ste/ sa dang po la 'jug par 'gyur bas/ sa dang po'i sems la brten nas/ sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i
33a1(rgyud): sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa gnyis par 'jug pa thob par 'gyu ro// sa der yang rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nags gsum par 'jug par 'gyuro// 
33a2(rgyud): sa der yang sems mnyen zhing rnam par byang ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa bzhi par 'jug par 'gyu ro// sa der yang thabs mkhas pa'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa lnga par 'jug par
33a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sa der yang don dam pa dang / kun rdzob tu mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa drug par 'jug par 'gyuraro// sa der yang mtshan ma la spyod pa'i mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs
33a4(rgyud): su bsal nags bdun par 'jug par 'gyuro// sa der yang mtshan mnye bar zhi bar mi mthong ba'i sgrib yongasu bsas nam/ sa brtad par 'jug par 'gyu'o/ sa
33a5(rgyud): yang skye ba'i mtshan mar mi mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa dgu par 'jug par 'gyu ro// sa der yang mngon par shes drug gi sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa
33a6(rgyud): bcu par 'jug par 'gyuro// sa der yang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang rtsa ba'i sems yongasu bsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la
33a7(rgyud): 'jug pa gang yin pa da ni rnam pa gsum yongasu dag par gyur pa'i phyir/ shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sdug bsngal rnam
33a8(rgyud): par dag pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o// 'di lta ste/ gser yang dag par gzhus sbyangs brdungs te/ dri ma med par bya ba yang gser gyi rang bzhin bzod ma nyid nas/ 
33b1(rgyud): rnam par dag pa gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ gser gyi ngo bo nyid yongasu dag pa'i dbang gis gser med par 'gyuraro zhes bya bar mi rung // 'di lta ste dper na/ chu rnyog ma
33b2(rgyud): can yongasu dngas te/ dri ma med par bya ba yang chu'i rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas yongasu dag pa gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ chu med par 'gyuraro zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du
33b3(rgyud): chos kyi sku yang nyon mongs pa dang 'dres par gyur pas/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba yongasu bsal nas/ bag chags lhag ma med par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ra
33b4(rgyud): bzhin gzod ma nyid nas/ rnam par dag par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid med par 'gyu ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la du ba dang / 
33b5(rgyud): sprin dang / rdul dang / khug rna rnams kyis ba sgribs pa las gal te yongasu dang bar gyur na/ namakha'i khams yongasu dag par 'gyur bas/ namakha' med par
33b6(rgyud): 'gyu ro zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi sku yang sdug bsngal mang po thams cad yongasasu zad pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang / ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhe bya 'i rung// 'a lha
33b7(rgyud): ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na/ chu chen pos khyer ba las rkang lag bskyod de/ lus dang sems le lo ma byas pa'i phyir/ chu bo thad kar bcad de pha rol gyi 'gram du
33b8(rgyud): phyin par mthong ba las/ rmi lam sang nas chu bo dang chu rol dang / pha rol gyi 'gram tha dad par 'gyur ba mi mthong yang / sems med do zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ 
34a1(rgyud): pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongasu zad nas/ blo rnam par dag par gyur kyang / blo medo zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang yang dag pa ma
34a2(rgyud): yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang / sangs rgyas rnams kyang yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // gzhan yang rigs kyi
34a3(rgyud): bu chos kyi sku gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni long spyod rdo bI sku ston par mdzad do// las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ sprul pa'i sku ston
34a4(rgyud): par mdzad do// shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag paragyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do// 'di lta ste dper na/ mamakha' la brten nas ni glog 'byung / glog la brten
34a5(rgyud): nas ni 'od 'byung ba de bzhin du/ chos mi sku la rten pa'i phyir ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas ni/ sprul pa
34a6(rgyud): sku ston par mdzad// rang bzhin yongasu dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku ston par mdzad// shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pas ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad// 
34a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin rnam par dag par gyur pas ni sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad// de gsum rnam par dag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang tha mi dad do// de bzhin nyid dang ro
34a8(rgyud): gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / mthar thug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pas/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku la tha dad par gyur pa med do// rigs
34b1(rgyud): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no// zhes de ltar de pe mngon par yid ches pa'i gang zag des ni/ shin tu
34b2(rgyud): dang ba'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa mi mnga' bar khong du chud par gyur pas/ rigs kyi bu de na de'i phyir spyod yul rnams la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yid la byed
34b3(rgyud): pa rnams yongasu bsal bar gyur na/ chos de dag la mtshan nyid gnyis med par khong du chud cing / rnam par rtog pa yang med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa la/ de bzhin
34b4(rgyud): nyid nge mtshan nyid gnyisu gyur pa med cing / yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom pa'i phyir/ 'di ltar de bzhin du/ sgrib pa thams cad yongasu bsal bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
34b5(rgyud): nyid sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pas/ 'di ltar de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ma chog tu rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyuro// de bzhin nyid dang
34b6(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par gyur pas 'di ltar de bzhin du rang dbang du phun sum chags pa thams cad kyang yongasu sdud par 'gyur/ sgrib pa
34b7(rgyud): thams cad nye bar zhi bar yang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrub pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / yang
34b8(rgyud): dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lta ba zhes bya bas/ de ni yang dag par nyid du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
35a1(rgyud): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus
35a2(rgyud): bar gzigs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas khams gsum las nges par byung nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod yul yong su tshol bas kyang / khong du mi nud cing
35a3(rgyud): mthong bar mi nus paso// de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gang gis kyang mi rig cing mi mthong bas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad the tsom dang / som nyi bskyed nas phyin ci log tu rnam par
35a4(rgyud): rtog par byed pas yongasu 'da' bar mi 'gyu ro// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri bong rgya mtsho la rgyal bar byed kyang / gdon mi za bar pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyuro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
35a5(rgyud): nyam stobs shin tu chung ba'i phyir ro// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang / de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par ma rtog so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog
35a6(rgyud): dgongs pa mi mnga' bar chos thams cad la mnga' chen brnyes shing / shes rab shin tu zab cing rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / rang gi spyod yul du gyur cig/ 
35a7(rgyud): gzhan dang yang thun mong du ma gyur pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa tshad med dpag tu med pa nas/ nyid kyi sku srog la phangs mi mnga' bar dka' ba spyad pas/ dpe zla
35a8(rgyud): med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rab tu dben pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba'i sku mchog dam pa 'di brnyes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar
35b1(rgyud): chos kyi de bzhin nyid rig cing mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa/ tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med/ gnyid kyang med/ bkres pa dang skom pa yang med de/ rtag par ting 'dzin la gnas
35b2(rgyud): pa sems rnam par g.yeng zhing g.yo ba medo// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang
35b3(rgyud): ci gsung yang rung ste/ thams cad la phan 'dogs par 'gyur bas/ gang gis mnyan cing thos pa de dag rnam par mi grol ba yang medo// gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / mi ma rungs pa dang / 'dre srin
35b4(rgyud): ma rungs pa dag dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang zad par mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lung du ma bstan pa'i
35b5(rgyud): dngos po mi mnga' yang spyod yul thams cad la mkhyen par bya'o// snyam pa'i dgongs pa yang mi mnga'/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad pa'i 'du shes
35b6(rgyud): kyang mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang ci gsung yang rung ste/ ma nges pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni spyod lam bzhi po thams cad du/ ye shes kyis yongasu ma
35b7(rgyud): bzung ba mi mnga'o// chos thams cad la byams pa dang / thugs rjes yongasu ma zin pa mi mnga' bas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bas phan mi 'dogs pa gang yang medo// 
35b8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas/ mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i
36a1(rgyud): skye gnas dang / mi ma yin gyi 'gro ba dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing // rtag par lha dang mi'i nang du skye bar 'gyur bas/ ma rabs dag tu skye bar yang mi 'gyur
36a2(rgyud): yang rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byas nas yang dag pa'i chos nyan cing len par 'gyur rtag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa rnams
36a3(rgyud): skye bar 'gyu'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos zab mo 'di thos par gyur pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing lung bsam
36a4(rgyud): 'gyur bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shin tu zang
36a5(rgyud): pa'i chos gya nom pa 'di/ lan cig rna bas/ thos par gyur na/ gang zag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos lami
36a6(rgyud): pa dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs la mi brnyes pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'phel zhing yangs pa dang
36a7(rgyud): yongasu smin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sems can ji snyed pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams mngon par sgrub par bskul bar 'gyur bar rig
36a8(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam kha'i snying po dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen bzhi dang / lha'i 'khor mang po rnams 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/ tha
36b1(rgyud): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang
36b2(rgyud): yang rung ba dag tu/ 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ yul der phan yon rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur lagaso// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
36b3(rgyud): dang po ni rgyal po'i dmag tshogs rnams brtsan zhing ngar bas/ phas kyi rgod pa'i ngagra rnams ma mchis pa dang / blo nang dang bral zhing tshe rang ba rang / bkra shis dang ldan zhing bde skyid pa dang / ngas
36b4(rgyud): pa'i chos ngar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang / slas dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams 'dum zhing rtsod pa ma mchis g.yo sgyu dang phra ma spang
36b5(rgyud): pasad rgyal pos gnang zhing bkur bar 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul gyi min mas yang dag pa'i chos spyod pas/ blo nad ma mchis shing
36b6(rgyud): bde skyid pa dang / glo bur du 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang / bsod nams mang po mngon par sgrub pa'o// bzhi pa ni dus gsum po dag tu 'byung ba chen po dag 'phrod cing rtag par lha
36b7(rgyud): rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ yongasu srung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje mnyam par gyur pas/ gnod pa mi bgyid cing / rnam par 'tshe ba'i ngasam pa ma mchis
36b8(rgyud): pa dang / skye bo rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyab su mchi zhing / thams cad kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba te/ 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes
37a1(rgyud): bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag par mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel ba'i slad du/ 'di ltar mdo sde yongasu 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i slad du rjesu
37a2(rgyud): 'brang zhing gang na gnas pa'i gnas der sman pa dag bgyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu leg po leg po/ de ba do/ de bzhin te/ khyed kyis rab tu brtson pa'i
37a3(rgyud): sems kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po shin tu gya nom pa 'di spel ba nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos yun ring du 'jig rten na gnas par 'gyuraro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i
37a4(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po las sku gsum rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog/ bcom ldan 'das
37a5(rgyud): gyi spyan sngar mngon sum du gya nom pa'i chos thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu yid la bsams nas/ rang gi gan du phyin pa dang / 
37a6(rgyud): mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga bo che 'od zer shin tu 'bar gnyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa zhig mthong ste/ 'od zer de las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa
37a7(rgyud): rnam rin po che'i shing drung na be DUR+Ya'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor ba las chos 'chad pa yang mthong ngo // bram ze zhig gser gyi rnga brdungs pa/ 
37a8(rgyud): las sgra chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshogasu bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa yang / mdzes pa'i tog gis thos pas thams cad ma lus
37b1(rgyud): bar yid ya bzung ste/ dz+nyAn pa rtse gcig tu yid la gnas par gyur to// ma langs pa dang / 'khor nga rgya stong tshad med pa mang pos yongasu bskor te/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams thogs
37b2(rgyud): nas nga rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas phyir byung ste khya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
37b3(rgyud): byas nas/ me tog dang spos dag bkram ste/ g.yas phyogasu lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar te/ gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du
37b4(rgyud): bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/ to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi g.yar lam na/ bram ze zhig gser gyi rnga shin tu gya nom pa brdungs pa las sgra
37b5(rgyud): chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshig su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa bdag gis thams cad yongasu bzung ste/ dran la
37b6(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang bar mdzad gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cha gisu bcad de gsol pa// bdag gis mngangs
37b7(rgyud): gsum g.yar lam na// gser gyi rnga bo chen po dag/ dbyings ni shin tu khyad par 'phags// kun nas gsere 'od khyad par ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa na// snang bas
37b8(rgyud): kun tu khyab par bgyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang bar mthong // sangs rgyas mang po thams cad kun/ 'ani na sngon shing drung dag tu// bai DUR+Ya'i gdan bzhugs te// 'khor/ 
38a1(rgyud): / ni brgya stong tshad med snyed// gus pas yongasu bskor bar mthong // de nas bram ze zhig gis ni// gser gyi rnga chen brdungs pas ni// rnga chen de yi sgra las ni// tshigs bcang
38a2(rgyud): nom 'di skad smras// gser 'ong rnga las gya nom sgra byung bas// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten kun khyab nas// ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzang dang // mi yi sdug bsngal mang
38a3(rgyud): po gang yin pa// gser gyi rnga sgra mthu stobs dbang gis ni// nyon mongs sgrib pa thams cad gtan zhi nas// dper na thub dbang bcom ldan ji bzhin du// 'jigs pa bsal nas
38a4(rgyud): bde ba nyid du shog/ bcom ldan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni// spyod bsags thams cad mkhyen ni bsgrubs pas na// sems can byang chub yan lag ldan mdzad nas/ mthar ni
38a5(rgyud): sngon tan rgya mtsho phyogs par mdzad// gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'di yis ni// thos pa kun ni tshangs dbyangs 'thob par na ga/ bla med byang chub 'bras bu thong gyur nas// chos
38a6(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo gya nom rtag bskor shog/ tshe ni bskal bsam mi khyab gnas na// ji bzhin thos bshang skye dgu phan byed shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal mang po rgyun bcang
38a7(rgyud): nas 'dod chags gti mug la sogs zhi bar shog/ sems can gang zhig ngan 'gro gnas gyur nas// mi chen raba'i bar lus kun khyab pa dag/ ji dam pa 'din thos gyur nas/ 
38a8(rgyud): sdug bsngal bral nas sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro shog/ thams cad sngon gnas shes pa grub gyur nas// 'das pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong dran par shog/ thub pa'i gtso bo yang ngag dran/ 
38b1(rgyud): gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs bstan zab mo thob par shog/ gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thob pa'i dbang / rtag par sangs rgyas rnams ni nyer bsten nas// thams cad sdig pa'i
38b2(rgyud): las ni yongs spangs te// rnam dag dge phyogs 'ba' shig spyod par shog/ lha dang mi yi srog chags thams cad kun// gus pas smon lam rtse gcig 'debs pa dag/ gser
38b3(rgyud): gyi rnga sgra dam pa thos gyur nas// bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par gyur// sems can gang zhig mnar med lhung gyur nas// dmyal ba'i 'bar mes lus ni nyon mongs te/ 
38b4(rgyud): mgon skyabs med cing 'khor bar gang gnas pa/ thos par gyur na sdug bsngal zhig gyur// lha mi yi dgas dung 'gro'i skye gan su// sdug bsngal bgegs mang mngon
38b5(rgyud): du myong gyur pa// gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thos gyur na// sdug bsngal spangs nas thar pa thob par gyur// da ltar phyog bcu'i 'jig rten nas// rtag tu bzhugs pa rkang
38b6(rgyud): gnyis gtso// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni// brtse bas bdag la dgongasu gsol// sems can gang zhig skyabs ma mchis// mgon ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa// de lta bu yi rnam pa la// 
38b7(rgyud): skyabs chen dag ni bgyid par shog/ bdag gis sngon ni bgyis pa'i sdig/ las ngan shin tu lji pa rnams// deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar ni// thams cad rtse gcig rab tu bshags// 
38b8(rgyud): bdag gis sangs rgyas yid ma che// bla ma nye ba shes ma gus dang // dge ba mang po ma spyad pas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// bdag gis mtho btsun rus rigs dang // longs spyod
39a1(rgyud): ngag gi snyems pa dang // dar la bab pas dregs gyur nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// rtag tu log pa'i bsam bskyed nas// ngag gis tshig ngan smras
39a2(rgyud): pa dang // kha na ma tho ma mthong nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// rtag tu byis pa'i blo spyad pas// ma rig mun pa'i sems g.yogs dang // mi dge'i grogs po'i rjes 'brangs nas
39a3(rgyud): rtag tu las ngan dgyis pa 'am// rtsed mo dga' ba rnams kyi rgyus// mya ngan dag dang ldan 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang dkris pas na// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa 'amag mi dge
39a4(rgyud): grogs po brten pa dang // phrag dog ser sna bsams pa dang // dbul phongs gya gyu spyang bas na// de spang sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// sdig mang ngag la mi mes kyang // 'jigs
39a5(rgyud): skrag dag dang bcas pa 'am// rang dbang dag ni ma ma/ pas// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// rnam par g.yeng ba'i bsam pa dang // khong khro khor du 'dzin pa dang / 
39a6(rgyud): bkres skom dag gis gdungs pa'i rgyus// de slang sdig rnam bgyis pa 'am// gza' dang btung dang gos dag dang // bud med dag la chags sred pa'i// nyon mongs mes ni bsregs
39a7(rgyud): bas na// de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// gus pa'i sems ni ma skyes pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// 
39a8(rgyud): rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' la// gus pa'i sems ni ma mchis pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// mi shes ngam chos skur ba dang ka pa
39b1(rgyud): ma gri num bgyis pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// gti mug dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang mthu yis ni// de 'dra'i/ 
39b2(rgyud): sdig mang gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad so sor bshags// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas grangs med gang dag mchod// sems can rnams
39b3(rgyud): ni rab drangs nas// sdug bsngal bgegs rnams bral bgyid shog/ sems can dag ni thams cad kun// sa bcu la ni gnas gyur te// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs nas/ 
39b4(rgyud): mngon sangs skye dgu 'dren par shog/ bdag gis sems can kun gyi slad// bskal pa brgya stong dka' spyad nas// shes rangab chen po'i stobs kyis ni/ sdug
39b5(rgyud): bsngal rgya mtsho mthar bgyid shog/ bdag gis srog chags kun gyi smad// gser 'od mchog tu rnam par rgyal// zang mo'i mdo sde bshad nas ni// las ngan
39b6(rgyud): rnams ni bsal bar shog/ gang zhig bskal pa brgya stong du// sdig lci dag ni bgyis pa rnams// skad cig gcig tsam mthol bshags ma// sdig pa mang po ma lus 'byung // 
39b7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa 'di bzhin du// de ltar bshags pa gyis 'gyur na// sdug bsngal las mang thams cad kun// 'di yis dbang gis myur du 'byung // ting 'dzin mchog ni brgya
39b8(rgyud): stong dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs rnams dang // dbang mchog byang chub lam yan lag/ rtag tu sgom yang skyo mo 'gyur// bdag gis rin chen phun tshogs gnas/ sa bcu la ni phyin/ 
40a1(rgyud): gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs rdzogs te// 'khor bar 'bab pa sgrol bar shog/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mtsho las ni// shin tu zab mo yon tan brjod/ 
40a2(rgyud): gya nom ye shes bsam dka' ba// phun sum tshogs pa thob par shog/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun// bdag la so sor gzigs dgongs nas// thugs rje chen po'i thugs
40a3(rgyud): gyis ni// bdag gi bshags pa bzhesu gsol// bdag gis bskal pa mang por ni// las ngan mang po bgyis pas na// de yi dbang gis sdug bsngal myong // thugs rjes byang bar
40a4(rgyud): mdzad par smon// bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis pas// rtag tu mya ngan 'jigs sems skyes// spyod lam bzhi po kun tu yang // dga' ba'i 'du shes yong ma mchis// 
40a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po ldan// sems can 'jig pa sel mdzad na// bdag gi bshags pa zhes nas ni// mya ngan sdug bsngal 'bral bar smon// bdag la
40a6(rgyud): nyon mongs sgrub pa dang // rnam smin las ni ci mchis pa// thugs rje chen po'i chab kyis ni// rab bkrus byang bar mdzad par smon// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa dang // da ltar las ngan
40a7(rgyud): bgyis pa rnams// rtse gcig sems kyis mthol bshags na// thams cad rab tu byung bar shog// ma 'ongs pa yi las ngan rnams// bsdams te spong bar yong mi bgyid// gal te 'gal
40a8(rgyud): ba mchis na yang // nams kyang 'chab par yongs mi bgyid// lus gsum ngag gi rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi las ni rnam pa gsum// sems can rnams ni 'ching bgyid pas// thog ma med nas
40b1(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chang // spyod pa 'di gsum dbang gis na// mi dge las bcu bgyid gyur pas// de 'dra'i nongs pa mang po rnams// de dag thams cad so sor bshags// bdag gis las par
40b2(rgyud): mang bgyis pas// sdug bsngal rnam smin rang nyid myong // sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// bsam pa thag pas so sor bshags// 'dzam+bu gling ni 'di dag dang // 'jig rten khams
40b3(rgyud): ni gzhan dag na// dge ba'i las mang ci bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad yi rang ngo // mi dge las bcu rab spangs nas// dge bcu lam ni sngon bsgrubs te// sa bcu dag la rab tu gnas
40b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag mthong smom// bdag gi lus dang ngag yid kyis// bsod nams ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus// bla med ye
40b5(rgyud): shes myur grub shog/ deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mngon sum du// sdug bsngal bgegs mang sna tshogs mthil shing bshags// byis pa srid gsum rmongs pa'i
40b6(rgyud): bgegs dag dang // rtag par las ngan lci ba bgyis pa'i bgegs// bdag gis log pa'i 'dod pa bsags pa'i bgegs// rtag tu sred skyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i bgegs// 'jig
40b7(rgyud): rten 'di la mngon zhen chags pa'i bgegs// byis pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs bgegs// sems myong rnams g.yeng phyin ci log pa'i bgegs// mi dge grogs po dag la rten pa'i bgegs/ 
40b8(rgyud): 'khor ba dag la 'dod chags zhen pa'i bgegs// zhe sdang tig mug glen pas sdig bgyis bgegs/ mi khom brgyad skye mi dge'i grogs po'i dgegs/ kha sod rams yon ma sags pa yi 'gegs/ 
41a1(rgyud): deng bdag rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar ni// sdig pa'i las ni mtha' yas bgyis pa bshags// deng bdag bde gshegs kun la skyabasu ma chi// bla med yon mtshe la bdag
41a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// gser gyi ri ltar phyogs bcur gsal mdzad pa// byams dang thugs rjes bdag ni gzung du gsol// sku ni gser mdog rnam dag dri mi mnga'// spyan ni rnam dag bai
41a3(rgyud): DUR+Ya dang 'dra// dpal dang gzi brjid grags dang ldan pa'i gtso// thugs rje shes rab nyi mas mun sel ba// sangs rgyas nyi mas 'od kyis kun gsal mdzad// shin tu rnam ngag dri
41a4(rgyud): med rdul dang bral// thub pa'i zla bas gsal mdzad rab rabasil ba// sems can nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar mdzad// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis rab brgyan
41a5(rgyud): cing / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongasu rdzogs// ston/ bsam dka' mtshungs pa ma mchis pas// nyi 'od lta bur 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad// kha dog bai DUR+Ya
41a6(rgyud): 'dri dri ni mnga'// zla ba nya ltar na mkha' dag la bzhugs// shel mchog dam pa'i dra bas gser sku bsgribs// 'od zer sna tshogs dag gis rab tu rgyan// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
41a7(rgyud): chu bo'i nang dag tu// rga dang mya ngan chu yis ded pas na// de 'dra'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzod dka' ba// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis gtan du bskams// deng bdag stong gsum 'jig
41a8(rgyud): rten rmang byung gtso// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyi btung phyag 'tshalo// 'od zer rab gsal gser mdog 'dra ba'i sku// dpe byad dam pa sna tshogs ngag gis rgyan// ji ltar rgya mtsho chu tshang/ 
41b1(rgyud): shes dka' zhing kas chen rdul ni bgrang du ma mchis dang // ji ltar ri rab srang grangs gzhal dka' zhing // na mkha' dag la mu mtha' ma mchis ltar// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan
41b2(rgyud): de bzhin te// sems can thams cad kun gyis rig mi 'gyur// bskal pa tshad med snyed du rab bsams kyang // yon tan rgya mtsho ba mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur// sa chen 'di 'dra'i ri brag
41b3(rgyud): ji snyed pa// rdul phran bzhin du gses kyang bcir rung gi/ rgya mtsho'i chab ni spu rtses gzhal rung yang // sangs rgyas ston bgrang bar rngo mi thogs// sems can thams cad lhan cig 'dus
41b4(rgyud): nas ni// bcom ldan grags pa'i ston thams cad da// mtshan bzang rnam dag dkon mchog bsngags brjod kyang // de yi pha mtha' dpag par yong mi 'gyur// khang ga
41b5(rgyud): gis dge ba'i las mang ci mchis pas// myur du bla na ma mchis gtso grub nas// yang dag chos bshang skye dgu pha na btags te// thams cad sdug bsngal mang
41b6(rgyud): las thar bgyid shog/ bdud kyi dmag tshogs stobs chen rab btul nas// bla med dam chos 'khor lo bskor bar shog/ bskal pa grangs med bsam mi khyab gnas nas// bdud
41b7(rgyud): rtsa ro yis sems can tshim bgyid shog/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba rnams ni ji lta bzhin// pha rol phyin drug yongasu rdzogs bgyid shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur nas// 
41b8(rgyud): nyon mongs btul te sdug bsdug bsal bar sho// bdag gis rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur nas// 'das pa'i skye ba brgya stong dran pa dang // rtag par thub pa'i gtso ni dran gyur te// sangs/ 
42a1(rgyud): rgyas zangab mo'i chos ni thos par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i las ni 'di rnams kyis// rgyal ba tshad med dag la bsnyen bkur nas// mi dge ba yi rgyu kun
42a2(rgyud): yongs spangs te// yang dag dam chos rtag tu sgrub par shog/ 'jig rten thams cad son ji snyed pa// sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par shog/ dbang po mtshang ji snyed
42a3(rgyud): mchis pa dag/ de dag lus kyi mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs shog/ seMn gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis// lus ni nyam chung skyabs bgyid ma mchis pa// thams cad nang
42a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal rab zhi nas// dbang po kha dog mthu ni rgyas par shog/ gang gis rgyal chos 'gal bgyis pa/ sad la thug/ sdug bsngal mang gtses mya ngan rab
42a5(rgyud): skyes nas// de yi sdug bsngal mi bzang myong ba'i tshe// / mgon skyabs dag ni bgyid pa ma mchis dang // gang dag gzhu rdeg mtshon chas bcings pa dang // gnod byed
42a6(rgyud): yo byad sna tshogs lus nyon mongs// mya ngan brgya stong ched mang myong ba na// lus sems rab gzer bde ba cung zad med// de dag thams cad bcings shing brdegs pa dang // sdug
42a7(rgyud): bsngal nyon mongs dag las thar bar shog/ bsang la thug pa dag ni srog thob nas// sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gtan zad shog/ sems can gang gis bkres skom
42a8(rgyud): gdungs gyur pa// ro mchog dam pa sna tshogs thob par shog/ long bas gzugs mthang 'on pas thos pa dang // theng pos 'gro nus skugs pas sgra nus shog/ dbul 'phongs
42b1(rgyud): sems can rin chen gter thob nas// bang mdzod rab rgyas rgud pa ma mchis te// thams cad bde mchog dam pa rab rnyed nas// sems can sdug bsngal myong ba ma mchis shog/ 
42b2(rgyud): mi thams cad mthong bar mos pa yi// byangad bzhin dam pa rab mdzes thob gyur nas// bde ba tshad med mngon sum myong gyur te// longs spyod 'byor rgyas bsod nams ldan par shog/ 
42b3(rgyud): sems can de dag rol mo bsams pa bzhin// sgra mchog mang ba mngon du 'byung bar shog/ chu 'dod gser gyi me tog steng 'phyo ba/ rab bsil rdzing bu mngon du snang bar
42b4(rgyud): shog/ sems can de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// bza' btung gis dang khri dang stan rnams dang // gser dngul dang ni rin chen bai DUR+Ya// rgyan phreng thams cad
42b5(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par shog/ sems can mi snyan thos par mi 'gyur zhing // mi sdug phan tshun mthong ba ram gyur cig/ lus kyi byang bzhin thams cad
42b6(rgyud): rab mdzes shing // so sor byams pa'i yid kyis rtse bgyid shog/ 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad longs spyod rnams// yid la bsams te thams cad 'byor par shog nor rnams
42b7(rgyud): rnyes pa phongs pa ma mchis pa// bgo ba shar bgyis te sen gtong bar shog/ bdug spos phye ma dang ni byug spos dang // me tog sna tshogs kha dog gcig min la// nyin re dus
42b8(rgyud): gsum shing las ltung gyur nas// yid bzhin longs spyod dga' ba skye bar shog/ sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i rgyal gtso dang // theg gsum rnam dag gya nom chos kyi sgo
43a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang ni rang rgyal dang // nyan thos dge 'dun mchod pa bgyid par shog/ rtag tu ma rab dag tu mi skye zhing // mi khom brgyad po dag tu
43a2(rgyud): mi ltung dang // dal 'byor mi yi gtso bor skyes gyur te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rim gro bgyid par shog/ rtag par phyug po dag gi khyim skyes te// nor dang rin hUM bang mcho
43a3(rgyud): rgyas pa dang // byang bzhin grags pa dpe zla ma mchis te// tshe ring bskal pa grangs med gnas par shog/ bud med thams cad kun ni phor gyur nas// dpa' zhing sems rje
43a4(rgyud): gros shin tu che// thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyad nas// pha rol phyin drug sgrub la brtson par shog/ rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med snyed/ 
43a5(rgyud): rin chen shing rgyal drung du gshegs nas mi/ bai d+h+ya yi gdan la rab bzhugs te// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar shog/ gal te 'das pa dang ni nga lcar
43a6(rgyud): tshe/ srid gsum 'khor nas las rnams bgyis pas ni// yid du mi mchi ngan 'gro thob gyur pa// thams cad ma lus gtan du byang bar shog/ sems can thams cad
43a7(rgyud): srid pa'i rgya mtshor ni/ 'khor ba'i zhags pas ngam du bcings pas na// shes rab ral gri ngag gis bcad stsal to// sdug bsngal spangs nas byang chub myur thob shog/ seMn
43a8(rgyud): gang gis 'jam gring 'di dag dang // yang na 'jig rten gzhan dag tu yang rung / bso nams rgyun mchos sna chags ci bsgrubs pa// de dag thang kun la yi rang / so'o/ 
43b1(rgyud): nams dngos po dag la yi rang nas// lus dang ngag yid dge ba mang bgyis nges// las mchog dam pa 'di dag rtag 'phel nas// bla med byang chub chen po myur thob smon// phyag
43b2(rgyud): bgyis sangs rgyas ston bsngags pa dang // bsam pa drang zhing rnyog sa mchis pas// bsngo zhing smon lam btab pa'i bsod nams des// bskal pa drug cu'i ngan 'gro 'das
43b3(rgyud): par smon// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang // bram ze la sogs rigs mchog dam pa rnams// thal sbyar rtse gcig sangs rgyas bsngags brjod dang // skye ba rtag par
43b4(rgyud): kun tu tshe rabs dran// dbang po tshang zhing lus ni yod rdzogs te// yon tan dam pa thams cad phun tshogs gyur// ma 'ongs pa yi skye ba thams cad du// rtag par lha mo rnams kyis
43b5(rgyud): lta bar shog/ sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas bcu dag las// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs nas thos pa min// sangs rgyas brgya stong dge rtsa bskyed pas na// 'gyod tshangs chos
43b6(rgyud): 'di thos par gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la leg so leg so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rig+sas
43b7(rgyud): gyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar rmi lam du// gser gyi rnga bo che las byung ba'i sgras// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang // 'gyod tshangs bya ba'i chos bstan pa/ gang la la
43b8(rgyud): zhig gis thos par gyur na// bsod nams shin tu mang po thob par 'gyur zhing / sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa yongasu byang bar 'gyuro// khyod kyi las 'chog
44a1(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad ni/ 'das pa'i dusu bsngags pa brjod cing // smon lam btab pa'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rkyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin
44a2(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'i mthus// rgyu rkyen 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o// de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' zhing
44a3(rgyud): mngon par yid ches nas/ dga' bzhin du spyod par gyur to// // gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mchog gi rgyal po las/ rmi lam na 'gyod tshangs byed pa mthong
44a4(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag
44a5(rgyud): pa'i rnam par rtog pas zhugs te/ shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs pa dang / sku'i spu'i bu ga nas kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong
44a6(rgyud): tshad med pa snyed dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur bkye bas/ phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi tshad dang / dpe byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi nang du snang
44a7(rgyud): bar gyur to// snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten dag tu 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pas/ sems can gang dag mi dge ba bcu'i las dang 'amatshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba dang / dkon mchog
44a8(rgyud): gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / bla ma dang nye ba dag la sri zhum byas pa dang / mngon po dang bram ze dag la brnyas shing nga rgyal byas pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gan su lhung ba
44b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba de dag so so nas/ 'od zer gyi snang ba de dag mi'i gnasu phyin par gyur pas/ sems can de dag 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer gyi mthus thams cad kyis bde ba dang ga/ shin tu
44b2(rgyud): sdug cing mdzes pa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyis rgyan nas/ sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe brgya byin dang lha'i 'khor thams cad
44b3(rgyud): dang gang ga'i lha mo dang / 'khor mang po rnams 'od zer rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang / thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ g.yas phyogasu lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 
44b4(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla dgos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus
44b5(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'aM/ 
44b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyer zhing theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pas/ ji ltar phyin ci log tu sems can thams cad yos
44b7(rgyud): su gzung bar bgyi ba lags/ mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba ji ltar bshags na/ yongasu 'byang bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i
44b8(rgyud): dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu deng khyod kyis tshad dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams rnal 'byor bsgoms nas/ rnam par dag pa'i rnam par gro ba'i bde ba thob par bya ba dang / 
45a1(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod pa leg so// sems can gang la la zhig las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis/ sdig pa rnams mngon par 'dus byas
45a2(rgyud): pa gang yin pa des nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed de/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ 
45a3(rgyud): sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar bsdus nas/ ngag gi sgo nas bdag nyid kyis 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag pa
45a4(rgyud): byang chub brnyes nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin cing gsal bar mdzad pa/ dachos kyi char chen po phab pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po
45a5(rgyud): brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung chen po bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal ma tshan chen po gtsugs pa/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa/ tham sa cad sems can rnams la smin cing bde bar
45a6(rgyud): mdzad pa'i slad du/ rtag par chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba skye dgu rnams drangs nas 'bras bu chen po thob pa la bkod de/ rtag tu bde ba mngon sum du mdzad par bzhed pa/ de lta bu'i
45a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabasu mchis te mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang
45a8(rgyud): dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pas sen gyi dge sdig gi las mkhyen cing gzigs pa thams cad la lus dang phas yid kyis sems rtse gcig tu spyi bos btu de/ gus par/ 
45b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// bdag gis thog ma mchis pa'i dus na/ sdig pa'i rje su 'brangs te/ sems can rnams dang lhan cig tu las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba bgyis pa dang / 'dod chags
45b2(rgyud): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris shing bcings pas/ sangs rgyas ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / chos ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / dge 'dun ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang // dge sdig
45b3(rgyud): ma 'tshal ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas/ mtshams ma mchis pa ngan sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshal phyung ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos la skur pa
45b4(rgyud): btab pa dang / dge 'dun 'thun pa'i dbyen bgyis pa dang / dgra bcom pa bkum pa dang / pha ma bkum pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang / yid kyi
45b5(rgyud): spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis/ mi dge ba bcu'i las bdag nyid kyis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rje su yi rang ba
45b6(rgyud): dang / dge ba'i gang zag rnams la nan gyis skur pa bta ba pa dang / bre srang gis bslus pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa la yang dag par gzung ba dang / mi btsang ba'i bza'
45b7(rgyud): ba dang / btung ba gzhan dag la stsal pa dang / 'gro ba drug po de dag tu mchis pa'i pha ma ji snyed pa dag la phan tshun gnod pa bgyis pa dang / mchod rten gyi dkor brkus pa dang / 
45b8(rgyud): phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor dang / mngon sum gyi dge 'dun gyi dkor rang dbang bgyis te/ yongasu spyad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos dang / 'dul ba la
46a1(rgyud): / bslab par ma mos pa dang / mkhan po dang bla ma'i gdams ngag gi rjesu mi 'brang ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa mngon
46a2(rgyud): par bsgrubs pa dag la smad par dga' bas rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gang zag rnams 'gyod pa skyed pa dang / bdag pas khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mthong na/ phrag dog
46a3(rgyud): skyed pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa dag la rtag par ser sna dang / phangs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma rig pas bsgribs shing / log par lta bas
46a4(rgyud): sems rmongs par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i sgyu ma skyed pas sdig pas sdig pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa rnams smod pa'i bsam pa
46a5(rgyud): skyed pa dang / chos la chos ma lags par bshad pa dang // chos ma lags pa la cho su bshad pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sdig pa mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'ang
46a6(rgyud): yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pa'i mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen cing / thams cad gzigs pa
46a7(rgyud): ngag la deng bdag srog phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol shing bshag so// thams cad mngon du phyung nas/ 'chab cing sbeng par mi bgyid// sngar ma bgyis
46a8(rgyud): pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams slan mad mi bgyi'o// sder bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams deng thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// ngan 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
46b1(rgyud): gnas dang / yi dgas kyi 'gro ba dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khor dang mi khom pa brgyang po dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa dang / bdag gis tshe 'di la bgyis pa'i
46b2(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zhu byung nas/ sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ci mchis pa ma 'ongs pa na mi myong ba smon to// de ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
46b3(rgyud): rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du bdag gis las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa yang mthol zhing bshag so// thang
46b4(rgyud): mngon du phyung ste/ 'chab cing sbeng par mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'od pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgyid pa'i thugs
46b5(rgyud): mi thub bo// ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa ma lus par mthol
46b6(rgyud): zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa yang deng mthol zhing bshag so// thams cad mngon du phyung nas/ 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyida'o// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnam
46b7(rgyud): zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgyi ba'i thugs mi thub bo// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ 
46b8(rgyud): byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa yang de dag las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa yang mthol zhing bshag so// thams cad
47a1(rgyud): / mngon du byung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do// sgrar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byung bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgying ba'i thus
47a2(rgyud): mi thub bo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyer de'i phyir gang gis sdig pa byas pa zhig yong ma skad cig tsam du yang 'chab cing sngar mi rung ma/ nyin gcig gam mtshan
47a3(rgyud): gcig nas/ dus ring po'i bar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang la la zhig gis sdig pa byas nas rnam par dag pa yongasu tshogs par 'dod cing sems la ngo tsha dang bcas pas ma 'ong
47a4(rgyud): pa na gdon mi za bar sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yod do zhes mngon par yid ches nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po skyes pa des 'di ltar bshags par bya'o// 
47a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig mes mgo thod smai gas sam/ gos bsregs par gyur ma myur ba kho na me gas dpar byed// gal te zhi bar ma gyur na/ sems kyis
47a6(rgyud): bde ba thob par mi 'gyuraro// gang gis sdig pa byas na yang de bzhin du mthol zhing bshags nas/ myur ba kho nar yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// gang la la zhig phyug po'i khyim du skyes nas/ no
47a7(rgyud): dang rin po che mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang sems bskyed nas theg pa chen po skom par 'dod na yang 'gyod tshangs byas nas/ las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// 
47a8(rgyud): rigs btsun pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i khyim ngag tu skye bar 'dod na yang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi
47b1(rgyud): sgrib pa yongasu byang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i
47b2(rgyud): lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar 'dod na yang / 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// gal te tshangs ris dang tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / 
47b3(rgyud): tshangs chen gyi lha dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal gyi lha dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 
47b4(rgyud): 'bras bu me dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong dang 'og min gyi lhar skye bar 'dod na yang / 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi
47b5(rgyud): sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// gal te rgyun tu zhu/ gas pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
47b6(rgyud): bcom pa'i 'bras bu yongasu gnyer bar 'dod na yang / 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// gal te rig pa gsum pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / 
47b7(rgyud): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang dbang thob pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer ba dang / mthar thug pa'i sar phyin nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yong su dag pa'i ye shes
47b8(rgyud): dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / mi g.yo ba'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mkhyen pa yong su gnyer bar 'dod na yang / 'gyod tsham
48a1(rgyud): byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen las skye ga de bzhin gabye bas kyang tha dad pa'i mtshan
48a2(rgyud): nyid 'gag par 'gyu ro zhes gsungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen tha dad pa'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa'i chos rnams 'gag cing zad par 'gyur bas/ las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed ma lus par 'gyur
48a3(rgyud): ba yang 'du byed kyi chos rnams mngon du mi skyes pa gang yin pa de dag deng gdong skye bar 'gyur bas// ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang ldang bar mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
48a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu chos thams cad stong zhing / de bzhin gshe/ gas pas kyang bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can dang / srog med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag/ 
48a5(rgyud): pa med pa dang / 'du byed kyi chos kyang mdo zhes gsungs pa so// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi la brten pas brjod du yang medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
48a6(rgyud): mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyiraro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don shin tu gya nom pa la zhugs nas/ 
48a7(rgyud): mngon par yid ches pas gus pa'i sems skyes par gyur par gang yin pa de ni/ sems can med cing ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi yod pa zhes bya ste/ don de'i phyir 'gyod tshangs kyis las kyi
48a8(rgyud): sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gang gis chos rnam pa bzhi par gyur na/ las kyi sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ gtan du yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// 
48b1(rgyud): bzhi gang zhe na/ log pa'i bsam pa mi skye zhing yang dag pa'i dran pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / shin tu zab pa'i don dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / spyod pa dang po pa'i
48b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad mkhyen pa yin snyam pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams la byams pa tshad med pa bskyed pa ste/ 'di dag ni rnam pa bzhi zhes
48b3(rgyud): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig sems kyis theg gsum srung // zab mo'i chos la skur mi 'debs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du
48b4(rgyud): shes bskyed// byams sems las kyi sgrib pa sbyong // rigs kyi bu shin tu bsal bar dka' ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni rnam ba bzhi yod de// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub
48b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i sdom pa las shin tu lci ba'i kha na mtho ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sems kyi skur pa btab pa dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel
48b6(rgyud): bar mi byed pa dang / srid pa gsum la mngon par zhen nas/ nges par 'byung ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang las kyi sgrib pa'i gnyen por 'gyur ba rnam pa bzhi
48b7(rgyud): yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsam pa thag pa nas/ nye bar bsnyen nas kha na ma tho ba thaMd bshags par byed pa dang / 
48b8(rgyud): son thams cad kyi ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos zab mo bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa dang / son thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la rje su yi rang ba
49a1(rgyud): dang bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba gang yin pa'o// de nas bac+doMs
49a2(rgyud): la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na skyes pa dang / bud med ji snyed mchis pa dag las theg pa chen po spyod pa spyod rngo thog pa
49a3(rgyud): yang mchis/ spyod rngo mi thogs pa yang mchis na/ ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rje su yi rang bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das
49a4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po sgom par mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyin mtshan dus drug tu/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
49a5(rgyud): la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/  su yi ring bar byed na/ 
49a6(rgyud): bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas/ 'di skad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag da ltar sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / sems
49a7(rgyud): kyi shes rab mngon par sgrub pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la deng bdag shin tu dang bas rje su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par gyur na/ de ltar rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang gi
49a8(rgyud): gdon mi za bar shin tu btsun zhing khyad par du 'phags pa/ bla na med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mchog tu gya nom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
49b1(rgyud): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad la yang rje su yi rang bar bya'o// gzhan yang da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po pas/ byang chub tu
49b2(rgyud): sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ji snyed pa dag dang / bskal pa chen po brgya 'das nas / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams chen
49b3(rgyud): po gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa nas/ phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshe gcig gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i ngag las byung ba'i// bsod nams kyi phung po
49b4(rgyud): gang yin pa de dag thams cad la yang 'di ltar ba sam pa thag pa nas rje su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
49b5(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nam ji snyed pa dag la yang rje su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// gzhan yang da ltar phyogs bcu'i
49b6(rgyud): 'jig rten yang dag pa'i tha~Md mkhyen pa byang chub gya nom pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad se ni mtha' yas pa rnams yongasu bzla ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa'i
49b7(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ga/ thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba/ chos kyi rnga brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa/ chos kyi char phab pa dag
49b8(rgyud): gis thugs brtse bas/ seMn thams cad bskul zhing yongasu btul bas/ thams cad mngon par yid ches par gyur nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa'i dbang gis/ zad mi she
50a1(rgyud): pa'i bde ba 'thob pa la bkod pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams bsags pa las
50a2(rgyud): byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / sems can gang gis de 'dra ba'i bsod nams nga dung phun sum tshogs par ma gyur pa dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin
50a3(rgyud): pa de dag la bdag rje su yi ra // de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa thad
50a4(rgyud): la yang bsam pa thag pa nas/ rje su yi rang zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rje su yi rang ba gang yin pa des/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa sed 'thob pa
50a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i stong gsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa spangs te/ 
50a6(rgyud): dgra bcom pa mngon par grub par gyur la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du/ rtag par gos dang / gza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gsos
50a7(rgyud): sman mchog dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rim gro byas pas/ 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa des/ ji ltar snga ma lta bu rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams de dang skrun na/ stong gi cha gcig
50a8(rgyud): tsam du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni grangs dang bcas shing tshang dang bcas pas/ bsod nams thams cad yong su sdud par mi 'gyur la
50b1(rgyud): rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de la ni/ tshad med grangs med pas dus gsum gyi bsod nams thams cad yongasu sdud par byed pas/ de'i phyir gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa
50b2(rgyud): ba khyad par can 'phel bar 'dod pas/ 'di ltar rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus yongasu sgyur nas/ skyes pa'i
50b3(rgyud): lus yongasu 'grub par 'dod na yang / rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par sgrub par byed na/ gdon mi za bar yid la bsam pa bzhin du tshe 'di nyid la skyes pa'i lus
50b4(rgyud): mngon par 'grub par 'gyuro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das rje su yi rang ba'i
50b5(rgyud): bsod nams gang lags pa ni 'tshal bar gyur na/ slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad chos kyi 'a khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi byang
50b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur bar bgyid pa'i slad du bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa bshad du gsol/ btso
50b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer ba gang yin pa des/ 
50b8(rgyud): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i lam sgom par 'dod na/ gang zag des nyin mtshan dus drug tu/ snga ma lta bu'i spyod lam gyis/ sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar
51a1(rgyud): gzhag nas/ 'di skad du deng bdag phyogs bcu na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes par gyur kyang / bla na
51a2(rgyud): med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo da dung ma bskor ba dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku spangs nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la/ bdag
51a3(rgyud): bsam pa thag pa nas/ spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas/ sems can thams cad yongasu bsgral zhing / bde bar bgyi ba dang / sngar gong du bstan pa ltar bas pa ma mchis pa'i bde
51a4(rgyud): ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongasu bskor ba dang / chos kyi char chen po dbab pa dang mchos kyi sgron ma chen po spang ba dang / don gyi tshul gsal
51a5(rgyud): bar mdzad pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang nas/ yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing / 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs par bskul zhing
51a6(rgyud): gsol ba 'tshalo// deng bdag gis bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar
51a7(rgyud): bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das pa dang // nga ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams de dag la byang chub tu yongasu bsngos
51a8(rgyud): pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o// 
51b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa bas/ gang la
51b2(rgyud): la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol ba btab pas// 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de/ snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags te/ de ci'i
51b3(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa yin la/ 'di chos kyi sbyin pa yin pas so// rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sbyin pa btang
51b4(rgyud): ba lta re shig zhog gi/ gal te gang la la zhig gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad
51b5(rgyud): la mchod pa byas pa bas/ bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa 'i bsod nams gang yin pa de de bas kyang ches khyad par 'phagaso// chos kyi sbyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan
51b6(rgyud): yon rnam pa lnga dang ldan te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin paso// gnyis pa chos kyi
51b7(rgyud): sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems can khams gsum nas 'byin par byed pa yin la zang zing gi sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da' ba so// gsum pa
51b8(rgyud): chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku yongasu dag par byed pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin pas ni gzugs 'ba' zhig 'phel bar byed paso// bzhi pa chos kyi sbyir pa gang yin pa de ni mthar
52a1(rgyud): thug pa med pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur ba so// lnga pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa yongasu gcod par byed la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa de ni 'a
52a2(rgyud): pa'i sred pa tsam thul bar 'gyur bso// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams ni tshang med dpag tu med pas dpe byar sla ba ma yin no// nga sngon byang chub
52a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa mde bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongasu bskor bar bskul bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis de lta bas na deng brgya byin dang / tshangs
52a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas nga la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor bar bskul ba ni sems can rnams yongasu sgrol
52a5(rgyud): zhing bde bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// nga sngon byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs shing / yongasu mya ngan las
52a6(rgyud): mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de la brten nas/ ngas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / sa so yang dag dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs
52a7(rgyud): rje chen po dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos grangs med pa snyed brnyes par gyur pa yin te/ nga lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur yang / nga'i yang dag pa'i
52a8(rgyud): chos 'jig rten na yun ring bar gnas par 'gyur ba yin no// nga'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni rnam par dag cing dpe zla med pas/ mtshan mchog dam pa sna tshogs dang / mkhyen pa tshad med pa dang / 
52b1(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang / yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med pa dang ldan zhing / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas/ skal pa bye ba brgya stong snyed du brjod kyang mthar
52b2(rgyud): thug par mi 'gyuraro// chos kyi skus ni chos thams cad yong su sdug par mdzad la/ chos thams cad kyis ni chos kyi sku yong su sdud par mi byed do// chos kyi sku rtag par gnas kyang rtag pa'i lha
52b3(rgyud): bar ltung bar mi 'gyuraro// 'gag par 'gyur yang chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas/ sems can gyi tha dad pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bshig nas/ sems can gyi yang dag pa'i
52b4(rgyud): lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzad do// sem+ba can thams cad 'ching ba dgrol bar mdzad kyang / dgrol bar bya ba ci'ang mi mnga'o// sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed
52b5(rgyud): pas/ yongasu ma smin pa yin pa de ni yongasu smi na bar mdzad la/ yong su smin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par grol bar mdzad kyang // mngon par 'du mdzad pa yang mi mnga'
52b6(rgyud): g.yo ba yang mi mnga' bas/ 'du 'dzi las thag ring du gyur pas/ rab tu dben zhing mdzad pa mi mdzad pa mi mnga' bas/ rang dbang du gyur cing bde bar gyur la/ dus gsum las yang
52b7(rgyud): dag par 'das kyang / dus gsum ston par mdzad pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las nges par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / 
52b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dang / sku tha dad par gyur pa med par yin te/ 'di dag thams cad kyang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di lta/ 
53a1(rgyud): bu'i chos sku ngas deng brnyes pa yin te/ de lta bas na gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer bar 'dod pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig
53a2(rgyud): gam tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam gzhan dag la ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa gang yin pa de yang tshad med par gyur pa yin na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yod
53a3(rgyud): su bskor bar bskul zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs nas/ yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang
53a4(rgyud): pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer zhing / 
53a5(rgyud): theg pa gsum gyi lam sgom 'tshal bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye na su bsngo bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po
53a6(rgyud): brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub yongasu gnyer zhing / theg pa gsum gyi lam sgom pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa yongasu bsngo bar 'dod pa des/ nyin
53a7(rgyud): mtshan dus drug tu gus pas sems rtse gcig tu 'di skad ces bdag gis thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas/ dkon mchog gsum po dag gi thad du rnal 'byor bsgoms nas yongasu rdzogs pa
53a8(rgyud): gyur pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi srog chags dag la kha zas tshangs gcig tsam byin pa dang / dge ba'i tshogs gis rtsod pa dag gi ldums byas pa dang
53b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la skyangasu song nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams yang dag par blangs pa dang // 'gyod tshangs byas pa dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang // rje su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i
53b2(rgyud): rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag dang bdag gis thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ 'gyod cing phangs pa med par sems can thams cad la yongasu btang ngo // rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyis yod
53b3(rgyud): su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par dag pas/ 
53b4(rgyud): 'di ltar bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ste dad pa de dag thams cad mtshan ma'i sems la mi gnas shing // mtshan ma'i sems kyang mi spyod par sems can thams cad la
53b5(rgyud): yongasu btang ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis bsod/ nams las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag tham sa cad kyang sems can thams cad la yongasu gtong ste/ thang
53b6(rgyud): kyis yid bzhin gyi lag pa thob nas/ na mkha' las rin po che byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongasu bskang bar gyur cig/ longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang / shes rab mthar
53b7(rgyud): thug pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob nas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
53b8(rgyud): rgyas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rgyus dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa'i byang chub
54a1(rgyud): tu yong su bsngo'o// gzhan yang 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
54a2(rgyud): nyid yong su bsngos pa dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa dag gis ji ltar yong su bsngo ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang
54a3(rgyud): chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gi dbang gis/ sems can thams cad dang dus gcig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
54a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la gnas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thogs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang / zang
54a5(rgyud): mi shes pa'i chos kyi gzungs dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ bdud sdig can gyi dang ga tshogs tshad med pa dag pham par byas te/ mkhyen pa dang gcis
54a6(rgyud): pa mngon par rtogs nas/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad skad cig ma gcig la gsal bar rtogs te/ nam gyi smad la bdud rtsi'i chos thob nas/ zil mngar gyi don mngon sum du gyur te/ bdag
54a7(rgyud): dang sems can thams cad tshe dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa'i
54a8(rgyud): 'od dang / sangs rgyas seng ge'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas 'od brgya pa dang / sangs rgyas dran pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan dang / sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i
54b1(rgyud): 'od dang / sangs rgyas rgyas par 'bar ba'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas bkra shis bla ma'i rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas bkod pa'i mchog dang / sangs rgyas chos
54b2(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / sangs rgyas bla ma 'phags pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas mngon par dga' ba'i gzugs sku dang / sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu snang mdzad dang / sangs rgyas
54b3(rgyud): tshangs pa rnam dag rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas bla ma'i rang bzhin la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
54b4(rgyud): pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de dag 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
54b5(rgyud): chub brnyes nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor te/ sems can yongasu bzlas pa bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces rgya cher gong du bstan
54b6(rgyud): pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu shin tu dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal
54b7(rgyud): po las las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton tu 'don pa dang / dran pas mi brjed par byas te/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag
54b8(rgyud): par ston par byed na/ bsod nams kyi phung po ched med dpag tu med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can
55a1(rgyud): ji snyed yod pa thams cad dus gcig tu ma'i lus mngon pa drub par gyur la/ ma'i lus thob nas kyang thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon par 'grub par gyur
55a2(rgyud): te skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti dang / bla mar byas te/ yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bzhi po dag gi mchod pa byas te/ rang sangs rgyas re re la yang so so
55a3(rgyud): nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ rang sangs rgyas de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang rin po che las mchod rten brtsigs
55a4(rgyud): nas mchod pa byas te/ mchod rten de dag kyang dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du mtho zhing me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / kha ngan dang / gdugs
55a5(rgyud): mang po dag gis rtag par mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang zag de dag gis thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni ci mang ba yin snyam ma/ 
55a6(rgyud): lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu yang mang lagaso// rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las
55a7(rgyud): la kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / dran pas mi brjed par byas/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pas/ 'thob
55a8(rgyud): pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga bstan pa'i mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dang skrun na/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// brgya stong dang / bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro banas
55b1(rgyud): tshad dang / dpe dang / rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom
55b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams la/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par byed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rab tu dgyes nas/ bsngags pa brjod par
55b3(rgyud): 'gyur bso// rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa
55b4(rgyud): byas pas kyang dper byar mi nu so// gsum la skyab su 'gro zhing bslabs pa thams cad srung ba bskul zhing / nyams par ma byas pa dang / las gsum stongs par ma gyur pas kyang
55b5(rgyud): dpe byar mi nuso// 'jig rten thams cad kyi ma thu dang / nus pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du thegs pa gsum po dag tu byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bskul bas
55b6(rgyud): kyang dpe byar mi nuso// dus gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na se ni ji snyed yod pa thams cad thogs ba med pa thob nas/ bsod nams tshad med par myur du yongasu
55b7(rgyud): rdzogs par gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nuso// dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad thogs pa med par byang chub gsum po dag thob par byas pas kyang dab byar ma
55b8(rgyud): nus// dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i son thams cad myur du ngan 'gro bzhi po'i sdug bsngal las 'byung bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nu so// dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i samathang
56a1(rgyud): mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa shin tu lci ba dag yongasu sbyang bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nuso// sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bya bar bskul bas kyang
56a2(rgyud): byar mi nuso// 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing / nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar byas kyang dpe byar mi nuso// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan
56a3(rgyud): sngar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams nam ji snyed dag la rjesu yi rang bar bskul nas/ byang chub kyi smon lam btab pas kyang dpe byar mi nuso// sdig pa'i spyod pa dang / gshe zhing
56a4(rgyud): spro ba'i las yongasu bsal bar bskul ba dang / yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs par smon pa dang / skye ba thams cad du dkon mchog gsum po thams cad la mchod pa dang / 
56a5(rgyud): tha mar bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod par bsku/ la ba dang / sems can rnams bsod nams kyi spyod pa yod su dag pa mngon par sgrub par bskul nas/ byang chub yongasu
56a6(rgyud): rdzogs par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nuso// de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang // pha rol tu phyin pa
56a7(rgyud): drug yongasu rdzogs par bya bar bskul ba dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor bar bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / bskal pa tshad med pa snyed du 'jig rten na
56a8(rgyud): bzhugs nas/ chos mchog dam pa zab mo bshad par bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu zab pas gang gis dpe byar mi nus par rig par bya'o// 
56b1(rgyud): de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / gang ga'i lha mo dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha tshad med pa rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ 
56b2(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang gser
