56b3(rgyud): 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pas/ thams cad yongasu bzung ste/ klog pa dang / g.yar ston du 'don pa dang / kun nub par bgyis te/ gzhan dag
56b4(rgyud): la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas chos 'di dal brten te rab tu gnas par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par
56b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer bar 'a tshal bas// don 'di mtshan nyid khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjesu 'brangs nas/ chos bzhin du spyod pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshangs
56b6(rgyud): pa dang brgya byin la sogs pas/ chos bshad pa'i gnas de nyid du/ me tog man da ra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor bas/ stong gsum gyi stong
56b7(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to// lha'i rnga bo che dang / rol mo thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar rang sgra byung ste/ gser gyi kha dog gi
56b8(rgyud): 'od zer bkye nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu khyab par bkang ste/ sgra dbyangs dam pa byung bar gyur pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces
57a1(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu lags pas/ byams pa dang // thugs rjes
57a2(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongasu skyobs cing phan 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu
57a3(rgyud): sbyong bar mdzad lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon pa
57a4(rgyud): dran te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed pas pa de che de'i dus ma/ de bzhin gash+ye pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin pa
57a5(rgyud): che'i rgyal po 'ang chen snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du zung skye/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'jig rten na bzhug so// de'i tshe de bzhin gartse
57a6(rgyud): pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad kyis lha dang / mi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang // sems can thams cad yongasu bzlas nas bde bar
57a7(rgyud): mdzad pa'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ba na/ 'dus pa dang po la chos bstan pas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong snyed yongasu bzlas nas/ thams cad kyis
57a8(rgyud): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to// 'dus pa
57b1(rgyud): gnyis pa'i tshe yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ zag pa rnams
57b2(rgyud): zad nas/ rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to// 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe na yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'dum phrag
57b3(rgyud): brgya stong dgu bcu yongasu bzlas nas/ thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa zhes bya ba yang rgyas par gong ma bzhino// rigs kyi bu nga ngo'i tshe bud med kyi lus su gyur te/ ming mi
57b4(rgyud): bsod nams rin po che'i 'od ces bya'o// 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la nye bar bsnyen na sa/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yongasu bzung ste/ bklags
57b5(rgyud): kha tor du bton nas/ gzhan la rgya cher yang ga par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub yong su gnyer ba'i phyir// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nges pa
57b6(rgyud): la bu mo bsod nams rin po che'i 'od 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhang su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
57b7(rgyud): par 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes lung bstan te/ bud med kyi lus
57b8(rgyud): spangs nas/ de tshun chang ngan 'gro bzhi las yang dag par 'das te/ lha dang mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// tshe rabs stong phrag bzhi brgya brgyadang cu'i bar du 'khor los
58a1(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byas te/ deng yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang grags pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang zhing / rgyas par gyur
58a2(rgyud): pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor nas/ 
58a3(rgyud): mchog dam pa bshad pa mthong bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas/ shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed 'das nas/ 'jig
58a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzadad ces bya ba da ltar de na bzhugs te/ yongasu mya ngan las
58a5(rgyud): 'das pas/ chos mchog dam pa bshad nas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas/ khyod kyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas de yin// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
58a6(rgyud): gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad do'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yongasu mya ngan las 'das
58a7(rgyud): pa chen po thob par 'gyuraro// bud med gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thad du gshegs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
58a8(rgyud): gshegs pa mthong ba'i dbang gis rnams kyang bud kyis lus len par mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gser 'ongad dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan 'dogs shing / rnam pa sna
58b1(rgyud): tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu sbyong bar byeda'o// rigs kyi bu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la
58b2(rgyud): zhig gang na gnas pa'i gnas der/ gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed na/ yul de ni bsod nams kyi phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par
58b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul de'i rgyal po nad med de bgegs rnams dang bral ba dang // tshe ring zhing thogs pa med par gyur pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra med cing / dmag tshogs dpa' bar 'gyur
58b4(rgyud): ba dang / bde ba'i longs spyod rgyas shing yang dag pa'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po
58b5(rgyud): bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis rtag par lhan cig srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs
58b6(rgyud): kyi bu dag dngos po 'di dag bden nam/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis skad 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
58b7(rgyud): gsol to// de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ yul gang dag na mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yang dag par bshad pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par bgyid na/ yul gyi bdag po de dag la bdag
58b8(rgyud): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rtag par mchis nas/ yongasu srung bar bgyid par mchi ba dang / gnas pa na yang lhan cig gnas par bgyi'o// rgyal po de la gdon dgegs dang / rgol ba'i
59a1(rgyud): dgra zhig mchis na yang / de dag thams cad bdag cag rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar bgyid// mya ngan dang khrims nad la sogs pa yang bsal zhing sos par
59a2(rgyud): bgyid nas/ tshe 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtags 'byung ba dang / smon pa rnams bsams pa bzhin 'grub pa dang / rtag tu dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis yul de na dmag
59a3(rgyud): tshogs ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dpa' zhing brtsan par bgyi 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag leg so// khyod kyis ji sad smras pa de bzhin du khyed kyis/ 
59a4(rgyud): mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul gyi bdag po de dag chos bzhin du spyod pa'i dus na/ 'bangs thams cad kyang rgyal po'i rje su mngon par sgrub cing chos bzhin du skyong
59a5(rgyud): par byed pas/ khyed la sogs pa yang gzugs dang / stobs dang / phan yon mchog thob par 'gyur zhing gzha la med khang 'od dang ldan pa dang / 'khor rnams kyang brtsan
59a6(rgyud): zhing rgyas par gyur paso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhi no zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas
59a7(rgyud): gang du mdo sde dam pa yang dag par ston cing klog pa dang / spel ba'i yul de'i blon po chen po dang / nang blon rnams phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zho mdang po ni phan
59a8(rgyud): tshun 'dus zhing nye bar sems dpa' dang / bla mar byed cing sdug par sems dpa'o// gnyis pa ni rtag par mi'i rgyam po'i snying du sdug cing bkur ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul chen po/ 
59b1(rgyud): yul chung ngu'i mi rnams kyis btsun par byed pa'o// gsum pa ni nor la yang dam par 'dzin cing // chos la btsun par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i khe mi tshol bas snyan pa'i sgra kun tu grags
59b2(rgyud): nas mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni tshe ring bde skyid par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// gal te yul gyi bdag po gang la la zhig gis
59b3(rgyud): mdo sde yang dag par ston par byed na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyuraro// bzhi gang zhe na/ dang po ni gos dang / gza' ba dang // btung
59b4(rgyud): ba dang / mal cha dang / na pa'i gsos sman rnams kyis 'phongs pa med pa gang yin pa'o// gnyis pa ni thams cad sems bde bar yid la sems shing klog pa dang / kha ton
59b5(rgyud): 'don par 'gyuro// gsum pa ni ri dang nags cha la dag na gnas pa na/ bde bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur// bzhi pa ni sems kyis ji ltar smon pa bzhin thams cad
59b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// gal te yul la lar mdo sde 'di yang dag par ston par byed na/ mi thams
59b7(rgyud): cang dar zhing skyid pa dang / rims nad rnams med pa dang / tshong ba dang / 'dron po phan tshun 'gro ba nor dang / rin po che mang du thob pa dang / bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par
59b8(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor mang po rnams kyis
60a1(rgyud): / 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde dor zab mo 'di lta bu mngon du gnas par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi phyogs sum/ 
60a2(rgyud): cu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten na gnas shing / nub par mi 'gyur la/ nam mdo sde 'di lta bu nub par gyur pa na yang dag pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lag so// bcom ldan
60a3(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ de lta bas na khyed kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig gam/ sde gcig kyang rung ste/ thams cad
60a4(rgyud): sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bklag par bya// yang dag par kha ton du gdon par bya'o// yang dag par mnyan par bya/ yang dag par gzung bar bya/ yang dag par yid
60a5(rgyud): la bsam par bya zhing / yang dag par bsgoms nas/ sems can mang po'i cheng du rma cher yang dag par bstan te/ yongasu spel bar byed na/ yun ring por bde skyid cing / 
60a6(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phan yon mtha' mdo// de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad pan yon khyad par du 'phags pa thob par
60a7(rgyud): gyur pas/ rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas yang dag par bzung bar gyur to// // gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ las kyis sgrib pa rnam par sbyong / 
60a8(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// bam po bzhi pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ga'i mtshan thogs
60b1(rgyud): pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'khor bye ba phrag tshad med pa snyed dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gus
60b2(rgyud): pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang kha dan dang / gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa
60b3(rgyud): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen du zhig gis ni/ byang chub kyi sems 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gang byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi lags
60b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub gang lags pa de la ming ltar gyi sems kyang dam gsu ma mchis/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmigasu ma mchis/ 'das pa'i sems kyang dmi gsum
60b5(rgyud): mchis lag so// byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems dmigasu ma mchis lag so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni tshig gis brjod du ma mchis pas/ sems
60b6(rgyud): kyang gzugs ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dngos po dang las ma mchis pa/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma lag/ sa pa/ sems can yang dmig su ma mchis shing / khong du
60b7(rgyud): chud par yang mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos zab mo'i don gang lags par rig par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhino// de de bzhin
60b8(rgyud): te byang chub kyi dngos po dang / las ni shin tu gya nom pas/ mngon par 'du bya ba yang dmigs par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems dmigs par mi 'gyur bas/ 
61a1(rgyud): byang chub ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa/ sems kyang brjod du med pa/ gzugs dang mtshan ma med pa dang / dngos po dang las med pa/ sems can thams cad kyang
61a2(rgyud): dmig su med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub dang sems gnyis ka yang de bzhin du mtshungs pa'i phyir dang / mngon du byed pa dang / mngon du bya ba mnyam par gyur pa'i phyir te/ 
61a3(rgyud): 'on kyang chos rnams shes par bya ba med par ni ma yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis de ltar shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos rnams mngon
61a4(rgyud): par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems legs par bshad pa zhes bya'o// byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ 
61a5(rgyud): da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhi no// seMn kyang de bzhin te/ 'di la mtshan nyid gnyis yang dag par dmig su medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad
61a6(rgyud): la skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyang dmig su med/ byang chub kyi ming yang ngamigasu med/ seM na dang sems can gyi ming dmig su med nyan thos dang / nyan thos kyi ming yang
61a7(rgyud): dmig su med / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang dmig su med/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang dmig su med/ sangs rgyas dang / sangs
61a8(rgyud): rgyas kyi mtshan yang dmig su med/ spyod pa dang / spyod pa ma yin pa yang dmigasu med/ spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'i ming yang dmig su med de/ 'di ltar dmig su med pa'i phyir/ 
61b1(rgyud): rab tu dben pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ 'di yang bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che'i
61b2(rgyud): rgyal po ri rab thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi sems 'di yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
61b3(rgyud): rgyu zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po bzhin du dngos po mang po yongasu 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu
61b4(rgyud): zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa gcig pu 'gro ba la 'ji gas pa med pa de bzhin du/ sgrub cing sdang ba dang bral bar
61b5(rgyud): gyur pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na rlung gi dkyi la 'khor stobs po che shugs drag cing myur ba bzhin du/ 
61b6(rgyud): sems la nur ba med pa'i phyir 'di ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rtseg ma them skas bzhi
61b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ sgo bzhi nas shin tu bsil ba'i rlung gis bus shin tu bde ba myong ba bzhin du/ bsam gtan gyi chos kyi gter yongasu btsal nas/ gang zhig rgyas par byed pa'i phyir/ 
61b8(rgyud): 'di ni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rgyas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang myur ba kho nar 'khor
62a1(rgyud): ba'i ma rig pa'i mun nag 'joms par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon gyis thams
62a2(rgyud): cad kyi sems la smon pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang 'khor ba'i lam nyam nga ba las yongasu 'das nas/ yon tan gyi rin po che thob pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bdun pa
62a3(rgyud): thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yongasu dag cing / shin tu rgyas pa la rab ring med pa bzhin du/ sems
62a4(rgyud): 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad las rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni brgyad pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ 
62a5(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dmag la dbang ba blon po chen po yid bzhin du dbang byed pa bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa
62a6(rgyud): shin tu rgyan pa dang / yon chad med pas skye dgu rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni dgu pa stongs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dpelam/ 
62a7(rgyud): namamakha' la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad la thogs pa med cing gnas thams cad du rang dbang thob nas/ dbang bskur ba'i sar
62a8(rgyud): byin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya ste/ 'di lta bu'i rgyu bcu la khyed kyis rab tu brtson pas bslab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub songal/ 
62b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed// lnga gang zhe na/ ngang pa'i dbang po dang / snying rje dang / 'dod pa yongasu
62b2(rgyud): tshol ba med pa'i sems dang // sems can thams cad yong su sdud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu tshol ba gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
62b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos
62b4(rgyud): rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bye'o// lnga gang zhe na/ las rnam pa gsum yongasu dag par gyur pa dang // sems
62b5(rgyud): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang rgya na mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo rnams gaHda cing / bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa dang / nyan thos dang
62b6(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa dang / bsod nams thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
62b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la
62b8(rgyud): brten nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bye'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nus pa dang / lus dang srog la phangs pa med par
63a1(rgyud): bde ba yongasu tshol zhing / 'du shes nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / sngon gyi las la bsams nas/ sdug bsngal dang phrad par 'gyur na yang dang du len par nus pa dang
63a2(rgyud): byams pa dang / snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed nas/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu smin par byed pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa zab mo thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste rigs
63a3(rgyud): gyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
63a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig
63a5(rgyud): gnas par mi mos pa dang / bsod nams yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bde ba nyam su len par mi byed pa dang / dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la yongasu skyo ba'i
63a6(rgyud): bsam pa mi skyed pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos yongasu bsdus nas/ phan 'dog pI thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa dang / phyir mi
63a7(rgyud): ldog pa'i sa yongasu gnyer bar smon pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
63a8(rgyud): rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
63b1(rgyud): rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams yongasu bsdus nas/ rnam par 'thor bar mi byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par rnam par grol bar smon cing / mtha' gnyis la
63b2(rgyud): mngon par zhon par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par byed pa smon pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings
63b3(rgyud): yongasu sbyangs nas/ sems kyi dri ma sel bar byed pa'i phyir dang // sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba yongasu gcod par byed pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
63b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
63b5(rgyud): ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed// lnga gang zhe na/ rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
63b6(rgyud): dang / gsal zhing thabs mkhas pa thams cad la mchod cing // nye bar brten nas yongasu skyo ba mi bskyed cing / rgyab kyis phyogs par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
63b7(rgyud): pa rnams kyis chos zab mo bshad pa de dag sems kyis rtag tu thos par mos shing / yongasu mi skyo ba dang / chog pa'i bsam pa med pa dang // don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi shes
63b8(rgyud): rab dam pas rab tu rnam par 'byed par mos pa dang / sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myur du spong ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i mkhyung dpyad dang / rig pa'i gnas lnga'i
64a1(rgyud): chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
64a2(rgyud): phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu
64a3(rgyud): phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bye'o// lnga gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa
64a4(rgyud): dang chos tshad med pa rnams kyi gnyen po'i sgo thams cad sems kyis gsal bar rtogs pa dang / byam sa pa dang / snying rje chen ba'i ting 'dzin las 'byung
64a5(rgyud): zhing 'jug pa dag la rang dbang thob pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgoms nas/ yongasu smin cing phun sum tshogs par bya bar mos pa dang / sangs
64a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma lus par yongasu bsdud nas mngon par rtogs par smon pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
64a7(rgyud): kyi thabs mkhas pa ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos
64a8(rgyud): rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed// lnga gang zho na// chos thams cad gzang ma nas mi skye mi 'gag yod pa ma yin med pa yang ma yin
64b1(rgyud): ngag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad kyi don gyi tshul mchog dam pa dag la dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag par so sor brtags nas/ sems bde bar gnas pa dang / 
64b2(rgyud): mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems kyi// de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa tha dad ma yin/ mi g.yo ba dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang // sems can
64b3(rgyud): rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dus gcig tu mnyam par spyod pa dag la/ sems
64b4(rgyud): bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// 
64b5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bye'o// lnga gang
64b6(rgyud): zhe na/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / legs nyes rab tu shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi shin tu zab cing
64b7(rgyud): gya nom pa'i chos la gzung bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor bdag gis las kyi rkyen rnams yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang
64b8(rgyud): po dang / rang bzhin rnam pa gsum yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par 'byed cing khong du chud par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du yang dag par bstan nas/ dge ba'iH/ 
65a1(rgyud): pa bskyed de/ yongasu smin par byas nas/ ye shes kyi stobs kyis yongasu sgrol ba gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
65a2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos rnam pa lnga la brten nag/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
65a3(rgyud): pa yong su rdzogs par bye'o// lnga gang zhe na/ chos rnams kyi legs nyes rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / nag po dang / dkar po'i chos yongasu mi spong zhing yang dag par sdud par byed pa dang / 
65a4(rgyud): 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la yongasu mi skyo zhing / mngon pa mi dga' ba dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas/ mthar thug pa'i gan su phyin par gyur pa
65a5(rgyud): dang dadabang bskur ba mchog thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs
65a6(rgyud): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ gas kyi phu pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 
65a7(rgyud): phan 'dogs pa'i mchog tu mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// shin tu zab pa'i ye shes chen po tshad med pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin
65a8(rgyud): pa'i don to// spyod pa dang / spyod pa ma yin pa'i chos dag la sems kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang / mya ngan las 'das
65b1(rgyud): pa'i yon tan yang dag par rig cing / yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag dang / shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang
65b2(rgyud): zag thams cad yongasu sdud par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi rin po che gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin
65b3(rgyud): pa'i don to// thogs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi khams dang / sems can
65b4(rgyud): khams yang dag par rnam par phye nas/ shes bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ye shes kyi bar dag phyir mi ldog pa'i ye
65b5(rgyud): shes kyi bar dag phyir mi ldog pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yong su rdzon par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 
65b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mngon par byang chub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa
65b7(rgyud): pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i chos la sogs pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa las mtshan nyid gnyis
65b8(rgyud): med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// thams cad la phan 'dogs shing yongasu zlos pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mu stegs can thams cad/ 
66a1(rgyud): nye bar 'ongs nas gal te dri ba dag la legs par rnam par bshad nas 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu/ 
66a2(rgyud): gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongasu bskor ba gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mngon par zhen pa med cing mthong ba med pa dang skyon dang 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
66a3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag tu
66a4(rgyud): med pa rnams rin po che'i gter rnam pa sna tshog kun tu gang bdag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyuro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis
66a5(rgyud): pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa bzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa kha dog shin tu gya nom pa
66a6(rgyud): tshad med pa dpag tu med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / yong su dag pa rin po che'i rgyan gyi rnam pa dag/ byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi
66a7(rgyud): bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyi lus shin tu dpa' ba go chas rab tu rgyan pas/ phyir rgod pa thams cad pham par byas pa
66a8(rgyud): ngag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor
66b1(rgyud): gyis/ me tog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor bas/ sa bzhi kun tu khyab par bkram pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub
66b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyis lus kun tu khyab par brgyan pa/ mgo me tog gi cod pan gyis rgyan pa dag/ 
66b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la/ snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog
66b4(rgyud): gi rdzing bu them skas kyi lam bzhi dang ldan pa/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu bdal ba/ yongasu dang zhing dri ma med pa/ yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ga/ me tog
66b5(rgyud): ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pud+d+ha ri kas kun tu bkral pa/ me tog gi rdzing bu'i nang na rnam par rtsen pa ngag shin tu bde skyid pa dang / yongasu dag cing dpe bla ma
66b6(rgyud): med pa dag/ byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ byang chub
66b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i mdun du sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthus ltung bar mi 'gyur la/ smras pa yang med/ 'jigs shing skrag pa
66b8(rgyud): yang med par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba'ang lta ste/ 
67a1(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi lus kyi g.yas g.yon na/ seng+ge'i rgyal pos yongasu bsrungs pas/ gcan zan mang po thams cad skrag cing 'jigs par gyur pa dag/ byang chub sems
67a2(rgyud): dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyuraro// rig kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag tshang
67a3(rgyud): med pas yongasu bskor nas/ mchod pa byed pa dang / spyi bo'i gdugs dkar po rin po che snachog tshad med pa ngag gis rab tu rgyan pa dag/ byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong
67a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu 'phro ga 'od zer
67a5(rgyud): yongasu dag pa tshad med pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'bumaphrag tshad med pa dag gis/ sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu
67a6(rgyud): 'phro ba/ yongasu bskor nas/ bkur sti dang mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa yongasu bskor ba dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mtho
67a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu sa dang po la ci'i phyir rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe ma 'di ltar thogs ma kho nar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon ma thob pa deng gdod thob nas/ sgrub pa
67a8(rgyud): chen po dag ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par grub par gyur pas/ rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dang po ni rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// dri ma shin tu phra mo dang / 'chal pa'i/ 
67b1(rgyud): tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad yongasu dag par gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// shes rab dang ting 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang ba sgrub par mi
67b2(rgyud): nus shing / thul bar mi 'gyur ba dang / thos pas 'dzin pa'i gzungs tsam par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa'i sa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs
67b3(rgyud): pa rnams bsregs nas/ 'od kyi snang ba 'phel bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs sgom par byed pas/ de'i phyir sa bzhi pa ni 'od 'phro ba'i sa zhes bya'o// thabs mkhas pas
67b4(rgyud): bsgoms pa'i ye shes mchog rang dbang du gyur pa shin tu 'thob par dka' ba'i phyir dang / mthong ba dang / sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gdul bar
67b5(rgyud): dka' ba thul bar gyur pa'i phyir/ sa lnga pa ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' zhes bya'o// spyod pa'i chos rgyur chad med par gsal bar mngon sum du gyur pa dang / 
67b6(rgyud): mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa drug pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya'o// zag pa med pa bar chad med pa dang // mtshan ma med
67b7(rgyud): ba'i yid la byed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ting 'dzin yun ring po nas bsgoms pa'i phyir dang / sa de rnam par dag cing thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir/ sa bdun pa ni
67b8(rgyud): ring du song ba zhes bya'o// mtshan ma med pa yid la bsgoms pas/ rang dbang du gyur nas/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis skul bar mi nus pas// de'i phyir sa brgyad pa ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o// 
68a1(rgyud): tha dad par gyur pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad bstan pa la rang dbang thob nas/ nyes pa med cing 'brel pa med par shes rab 'phel bar byed pa dang // dang
68a2(rgyud): du gyur cing thogs pa med par gyur pas/ ro'i phyir sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku rnamapa' dang 'dra ba dang / shes rab sprir chen po lta bur gyur nas/ 
68a3(rgyud): thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs par byed pa'i phyir/ de lta bas na sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag dang chos la mtshan ma yod par mngon par zhen pa'i
68a4(rgyud): ma rig pa dang / 'gro ba'i ngan 'gro la skrag cing 'jigs pa'i ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dang po la sgrib par byed do// bslab pa'i gnas phra mo dag la shes bzhin med
68a5(rgyud): bas nyams par byas pa'i ma rig pa dang / las kyi 'du byed rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa'i ma rig ba ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gnyis pa la sgrib
68a6(rgyud): bar byed do// ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa la sred cing / mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang / gzungs khyad par du 'phags pa dag la sgrib par byed pa'i marig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di ba
68a7(rgyud): kyis ni/ sa gsum pa la sgrib par bye'o// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa dang / shin tu gya nom pa'i chos rnam par dag pa sred cing mos pa'i
68a8(rgyud): ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bzhi pa la sgrib par bye'o// 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i ma rig pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par gzhol ba'i
68b1(rgyud): ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa lnga pa la sgrib par bye'o// rnal 'byor mngon du rgyu ba'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma rags pa mngon du snang ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa
68b2(rgyud): 'di gnyis kyis ni sa drug pa la sgrib par bye'o// mtshan ma shin tu phra mo rnams la mngon sum du spyod pa'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa la mngon par dga'
68b3(rgyud): ba'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bdun pa la sgrib par bye'o// mtshan ma med par sgom par mngon par rtsol ba'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma la dbang thob pa la mngon
68b4(rgyud): par zhen pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa brgyad pa la sgrib par bye'o// bstan par bya ba'i don tshad med pa dang / ming dang tshig dang yi ge tshad med pa
68b5(rgyud): gnyis po 'di dag la mi mkhas bI ma rig pa dang / tshig gi spobs pa yid bzhin du ma gyur pa'i ma ri ga pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dgu pa la sgrib
68b6(rgyud): par byed do// rdzu 'phrul chen po stong pa la rang dbang ma thob pa'i ma rig pa dang / shin tu phra ba'i gsang ba'i las kyi dngos po khong du ma chud pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis
68b7(rgyud): kyis na sa bcu pa la sgrib par bye'o// spyod yul thams cad la shes bya phra mos bsgribs pa'i ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas ngan len gyi ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa
68b8(rgyud): 'di gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib par bye'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa dang po la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bye'o// 
69a1(rgyud): sa gnyi pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byeda'o// sa gsum pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bye'o// sa bzhi pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha
69a2(rgyud): rang byer pa la spyod bar dpos lnga pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bye'o/  drug pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bye'o/ sa bdud pa la batham zla pa'i yis mchog gi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa khyod/ sa gyun pa la smod 'phyi lo
69a3(rgyud): / byin pa la spyod pa khyod/  'gu ba la stob kyi los phyi pa la spyod pa byed/  'acub la les gyi 'og tu phyin pa spyod/ y-i kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems bskyed pa dang pos rin chen mchog gi ti
69a4(rgyud): 'dzin yong su sdud cing skyed par bye'o// sem sa bskyed pa gnyis pas yid du 'ong ba'i ting 'dzin yongasu bsdud cing skyed par byedado// sems bskyed pa gsum pas shin tu
69a5(rgyud): bskul bar dka' ba'i ting 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par byed// sems bskyed pa bzhi pas/ phyir mi ldog/ ba'i ting 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par bye'o// seMs bskyed
69a6(rgyud): pa lnga pas/ rin po che'i me tog gi ting 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par bye'o// sems bskyed pa drug pas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par bye'o// 
69a7(rgyud): sems bskyed pa bdun pas/ smon lam thams cad yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i ting 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par bye'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pas/ mngon sum du gnas par
69a8(rgyud): byed pa'i ting 'dzin yong su sdud cing bskyed par bye'o// sems bskyed pa dgu pas/ ye shes kyi snying po'i ting 'dzin yong su sdud cing skyed par byed// sems bskyed pa bcu pas/ dpa' bar
69b1(rgyud): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin sdud cing skyed par bye'o// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o// 
69b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa dang po las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de mi yon tan bslabs pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de nas
69b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ pUr+N+Na ma no ra te do ha do ho/ yA pad sU/ a ba b+hA sa te/ yA bad tsan+de / dau dAn+te pad tra rakA mA ma dAn+te pa ri hA ra~M ku ru swA hA/ 
69b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yongasu srung ba'i
69b5(rgyud): phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang li la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ 'di lta ste/ stag dang / spyang kau dang / seng
69b6(rgyud): ge dang / gcan zan ma rungs pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa dang / yi dgas dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i
69b7(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa dang po mi brjed cing rje su dran par 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
69b8(rgyud): dpa' chen pos/ sa gnyis pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu bde ba'i gnas shes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ut+to lo tsi ri tsi ri/ Ad+hor/ tor d+ha ma/ shAn+do shAn+do/ u d+ho li/ 
70a1(rgyud): hu ru hu ru swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa gnyis pa'i byang chub sems
70a2(rgyud): dpa' yongasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis/ gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs/ 
70a3(rgyud): pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga
70a4(rgyud): las rnam par grol nas/ sa gnyis pa ni mi brjed cing rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa gsum pa las
70a5(rgyud): thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba'i stobs zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ngan // ban Ni ke/ ka ra thi/ ko'u ra bri/ ke yU re/ dAn+ti ri swAhA/ 
70a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs
70a7(rgyud): pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rus pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la so/ 
70a8(rgyud): pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur zhing // sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa gsum pa mi brjed
70b1(rgyud): cing rjesu dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa bzhi pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ rgya cher phan 'dogs pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ 
70b2(rgyud): shi ri shi ri/ d+ha mi ni/ d+ha mi ni/ d+ha ri d+ha ri ni/ shi ra shi ri Ni/ bi shA la/ bi shA la/ pA sha pa shA ni/ dan+ta mi te swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las
70b3(rgyud): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing / yong su 'dzin par byed na/ 
70b4(rgyud): gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang // sdug bsngal gyi 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa
70b5(rgyud): rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing // sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bzhi pa mi brjed cing rjesu dran para'agyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
70b6(rgyud): posangs lnga pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ yon tan sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ri ha'i Ni/ tsi ri tsi ri Ni/ ka ri ma No/ saM ka ri ma Ni/ sa ma shan+thi/ dzam+b+ha ni Am+b+ha ni
70b7(rgyud): mo ha ni/ sa yaM b+hu ke swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa lnga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
70b8(rgyud): chen po rnams yongasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma
71a1(rgyud): rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga
71a2(rgyud): las rnam par grol nas/ sa lnga pa mi brjed cing rje su dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// sa drug pa la thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ yongs su
71a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi to ri bi to ri/ ma ri Ni/ ma ri Ni/ ki ri ka ro/ bi to han+tu/ ru ru ru ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ du ru ba du ru ba/ sha sha shats+tsha/ pa ri sha sid+d+hi/ 
71a4(rgyud): sarba satwA nAm/ sid d+h+waM tu ma ma/ man+ta pa dA ni swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa drug
71a5(rgyud): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ngasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing
71a6(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba dang / gdor bgegs dang // sdug bsngal gyis 'tsho ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las
71a7(rgyud): thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa drug pa mi brjed cing rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ sa dadan
71a8(rgyud): ba las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi spyod pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ dza ha dza ha ru dza ha ru / khai du ke be du ke/ a mr-i ta gA ne/ pu ru Sha \u0f7f/ She du Sha Ni/ bai duH/ 
71b1(rgyud): ke ba ru bat+te khi d+hi ti ke/ b+hin+da pa ri ni/ a me ti ke/ ba hu dzu yu swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ 
71b2(rgyud): bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gos gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan
71b3(rgyud): zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar pa
71b4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bdun pa mi brjed cing rje su dran par 'gyu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa brkyang ba
71b5(rgyud): las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa'i gta ra zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ shi r-i shi ri/ shi ri No/ mi te mi ta/ ka ra ka ri he ru he ru he ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ban+d+ha ni swA hA/ 
71b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongasu gzung ba'i phyir
71b7(rgyud): gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zar ma tshungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi nga mi ma yin pa la sogs
71b8(rgyud): pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing // sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa brgyad pa mi brjed cing rjes
72a1(rgyud): dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa dgu pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ tshad med pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// 
72a2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ ha ri tsaN+Da li ke/ ku la mA b+ha te/ to ra si/ pa ta pa ta sa~M/ shi ri shi ri/ ka sho ri/ ka bi shi ri/ sid+d+hi/ sarba satwA nAn swAhA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi
72a3(rgyud): grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs
72a4(rgyud): su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang sdug bsngal gyis
72a5(rgyud): 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa dgu pa mi brjed cing rjes dran par 'gyu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
72a6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa bcu pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ sid+d+hi su sid+d+ha mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha ni bi muk+ke/ a ma le/ 
72a7(rgyud): mi le/ nim le/ mA da? l+ye/ hir t+ya gar+b+he/ rat+na gar+b+he/ sa mad+ha/ sarba anA sA d+ha ni/ ma na si/ ma hA ma na si/ ad b+hu te/ a t+yad b+hu te/ mats+tsha te/ a mr-i ta/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ prah+me/ brah+ma sA re pU rA
72a8(rgyud): pUr ni/ ma nor the swA hA// rigs kyi bu dbang bskur ba'i bkrar shis tshig gi gzungs 'di ni/ gang ga'i klung bcu pa'i grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa bcu pa'i
72b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'ding kha ton du 'don cing / yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma
72b2(rgyud): rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rko ba dang / gdon bgegs kyi 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / gdug pa'i
72b3(rgyud): gdon thams cad yongasu bsal nas/ rab tu zhi ba dang / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bcu pa mi brjed cing rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng
72b4(rgyud): ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs 'di dag bkas bshad pa thos pa dang / 
72b5(rgyud): stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzaranas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gus pa sa thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
72b6(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// zab mo mtshan ma med pa'i chos// dpe med de la phyag kyang 'tshal/ 
72b7(rgyud): sems can yang dag shes ston la// bcom ldan nyag cig sgrol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen gsal sbyar// chos gcig mtshan nyid mi gzigs kyang // yang dag chos kyi sbyar
72b8(rgyud): gyis ni// thams cad kun gzigs bsam mi khyab// chos gcig bskyed par mi mdzad la// chos gcig 'gog par mi mdzad pas// mnyam gzigs 'di yi dbang gis na bla med
73a1(rgyud): gan su byon pa lags// 'khor ba dag kyang mi 'jig la// mya ngan 'das la mi gnas shing // mtha' gnyis dag la ma chags pas// de slad mya ngan 'das pa brnyes/ 
73a2(rgyud): ngag dang ma dag pa yi phyogs// bcom ldan ro gcig nyid mkhyen nas// rnam par rtog par mi mdzad slad// mchog tu rnam par dag pa brnyes// bcom ldan mtha' yas sku dag gis// 
73a3(rgyud): ge 'bru gcig ma gsungs kyang // slob ma mang po kun la ni// chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad// bcom ldan sems can thams cad la// mtshan nyid rnam pa med gzigs kyang // sdug
73a4(rgyud): bsngal dag gis gzir ba la// rtag par yongasu skyob par mdzad// sdug bsngal bde dang rtag mi rtag/ bdag dang bad ga med la sogs dang // gcig min tha dad
73a5(rgyud): min pa dang // skye med 'gag pa med pa yi// de 'dra'i don na mang po rnams// bshad phyir bye brag mchis kyang ni// dper na lung stong brag cha ltar// bcom ldan nyag gcig
73a6(rgyud): rab tu mkhyen// chos dbyings rtog pa ma mchis pas// theg pa dad ma mchis kyang // sems can yongasu bsgral ba'i spang // rnam par phye nas gsum du gsungs// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang
73a7(rgyud): phyug chen po// bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom
73a8(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni/ shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba thog mar dge/ 
73b1(rgyud): bar du dge ga tha mar dge ba tshig 'bru dang don yong su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid pa lags pas/ gang gis yongasu 'dzin par bgyid pa'i
73b2(rgyud): gang zag de ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dran bsab par bgyid pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de
73b3(rgyud): bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gang gis mdo sde 'di nyan par byed pa de dag mi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyuro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
73b4(rgyud): bu 'dis mi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par byed cing / chos kyi phyag rgya mchog dang / mdo sde
73b5(rgyud): mang po'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir/ mnyan par bya/ yongasu ga/ zung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kha ton du 'don par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dge
73b6(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa de dag thams cad kyis ni/ shin tu gya nom pa'i chos 'di mnyan
73b7(rgyud): par mi nuso// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mnyan nas yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang nas/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob
73b8(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas mthong zhing / sangs rgyas dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams dang / yongasu 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ rtag
74a1(rgyud): par chos gya nom pa thos shing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo mchog dam pazang pa med cing 'grib pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho'i
74a2(rgyud): phyag yon tan mchog 'byung ba'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang // sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa dang / tshig mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib
74a3(rgyud): pa med pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing / 'grib pa med pa dang / zla ba yongasu rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs
74a4(rgyud): zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / rmongs pa rnams yongasu brtul nas/ yon tan gyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / rdo rje'i ri rnams
74a5(rgyud): par 'joms pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i don gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi mdzod yang dag par stor pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing
74a6(rgyud): 'grib pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi cho ga'i sgra dbyangs mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / na mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i
74a7(rgyud): sems kyi spyod pa'i phyag rgya'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' med pa rnams yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib
74a8(rgyud): pa med pa de lta bu thams cad kyang rab tu 'thob par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de lta bu la sogs pa zang ba med cing 'grib pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir/ 
74b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du// sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas/ yang dag pa'i chos bla na med pa rnam pa sna tshog
74b2(rgyud): ston par byed kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid las g.yo ba yang med/ gnas pa yang med/ 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang medo// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsab legs par yongasu smon par
74b3(rgyud): byas kyang / yongasasu smin par byas pa'i sems can gcig tsam yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang / tshig las g.yos pa yang med
74b4(rgyud): gnas pa yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang med cing skye 'gag med cing mngon du byed par 'gyu ro// rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir/ 'du byed kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba dang / 
74b5(rgyud): 'ong ba med par bstan ce mchos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad med pa'i phyir ro// chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag sum khri
74b6(rgyud): ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi byang chub kyi sa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong dang dge slong ma tshang med dpag tu med
74b7(rgyud): pasnyed ni/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// srog chags tshad med pa snyed ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka'
74b8(rgyud): stsal pa/ mos mchog 'khor ba'i rgyun las bzlog mdzad pa// shin tu zab cing gya nom mthong bar dka'// sems can dmus long 'dod pas rab g.yogs nas// ma mthong phyir ni sdug bsngal
75a1(rgyud): sna tshogs myong // de nas 'khor mang po rnams cig char stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
75a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gang du gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di/ klog cing 'don pa'i gnas der bdag cag 'khor
75a3(rgyud): mang po rnams der mchis te/ nyan pa'i 'khor bgyis nas/ 'di ston pa'i mkhan po de la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis shing lus dang sems bag yang su 'gyur ba
75a4(rgyud): 'thob par bgyid do// bdag cag bsam pa thag pa nas ma chod cing rim gro bgyido// nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu bde zhing skyid par bgyid do// de dag gnas pa'i
75a5(rgyud): yul der yang phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams ma mchis par bgyis nas/ mi rnams rab
75a6(rgyud): tu ngar zhing rgyas par bgyid// chos 'di ston pa'i dkyil 'khor der lha dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis rtsog par mi bgyid cing / mi gtsang
75a7(rgyud): bas skrag par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos bshad pa'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchod rten lags pas/ rtag par me tog dang / spos dang / lnga lding dang / ba dan dang / gdugs
75a8(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag cag rnams kyang rtag par yongasu srung zhing / rgud pa rnams yongasu spong bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la
75b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di la yongasu sgom par byed na/ de nyid yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas par gyur
75b2(rgyud): pa yin no// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / 
75b3(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// / bam po lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di
75b4(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ mdzes pa'i tog go mtshan mo rmi lam na// gser gyi rnga dam pa las de bzhin gshegs
75b5(rgyud): pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs kyi chos bstan pa'i sgra chen po byung ba'i rtswa dang rkyen gang yi na ba de dag ngas khyed la rgya cher yang dag/ 
75b6(rgyud): par bshad kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu legs par yid la zung shig/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po gser gyi klu'i bdag po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rtag par pad+ma'i dpes phyogs
75b7(rgyud): bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par bstod cing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas 'khor mang po rnams la des mngon par bstod pa'i tshig su bcad pa gang
75b8(rgyud): yin pa bka' stsal pa/ 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs sangs rgyas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na bzhugs pa la// deng bdag rtse gcig spyi bdud phyag bgyis te// rgyal
76a1(rgyud): pa rnams la rtse gcig bsngags par bgyi// tha med rnam par dag par thub pa'i gtso// sku yi 'od kyis gsal mdzad gser mdog 'dra// sgra kun rang na mchog tu gyur
76a2(rgyud): pas na// tshangs chen dbyangs ltar 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dbu skra bung ba'i rgyab ltar rab gnag cing // g.yasu 'khyil ba'i ri mo sngon por gnas// tshems dkar gtams pa kha
76a3(rgyud): dog dung 'dra zhing // rab mnyam kun gsal 'od zer dag dang ldan// rnam dag dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i spyan// ud pal sngon po mang ba ma yangs pa 'dra// ljags kyi mtshan ni yangs shing
76a4(rgyud): shin tu mnyen// dper na pad+ma leb rgan chab chung 'dra// smin mtshams rtag par 'od ni dkar po mnga'// g.yasu 'khyil ba chu shel kha dog mtshungs// shangs kyi dbyib
76a5(rgyud): mtho gser gyi gar bu 'dra// 'od gnyen rnam dag mtshan nyid nyams mi mnga'// 'jig rten dri mchog dam pa thams cad kum sngon tshe gar gang thams cad rab tu
76a6(rgyud): mkhyen// bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// spu rtse re re mtshan ni rab mtshungs shing // sngo la rab mnyen g.ya su 'khyil bas na// kha dog rab gnyen dpe bgyir shin tu
76a7(rgyud): dka'// lhams ma thag tu 'od mchog mnga' bas na// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad gsal mdzad cing // srid gsum sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pas// de dag thams cad
76a8(rgyud): bde ba 'thob par mdzad// sems can dud 'gro yi dgas 'gro ba dang // lha ma yin dang mi yi 'gro ba kun// de dag sdug bsngal mang po zhi mdzad pas// rtag tu rang byung bde ba myong bar 'gyur
76b1(rgyud): sru yi 'od kyis rtag tu gsal mdzad pas// kha sbyangs gser 'dra gya nom bla ma mchis// zhal mdog rgyas gsal zla ba nya ba 'dra// sgros dmar mdog mdzes bim pa'i 'bras bu mtshungs// 
76b2(rgyud): gshegs stobs spyod lam seng ge rgyal po bzhin// sku mdog rab gsal gdugs ni 'char ba 'dra// phyag ngar ring ba dbus mo 'das pA ni// dbyibs ni sa la'i lcug ma 'phyang dang
76b3(rgyud): mtshungs// 'od ni 'dom gang mtha' yas gsal mdzad pas// rab gsal gdugs ni brgya stong ji lta bzhin// sangs rgyas zhing ni kun tu khyab pas na// rkyen ni ji bzhin skye dgu
76b4(rgyud): sad par mdzad// rnam dag 'od zer dra bas bla ma mchis// 'od kyi 'jig rten brgya stong rgyas mdzad pas// phyogs bcu kun gsal mdzad la thogs mi mnga'// mun
76b5(rgyud): nag thams cad rab tu sel mdzad pa/ bde gshegs byams 'od bde ba rab stsol bas// kha dog/ gya nom gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'od kyi zhing ni brgya stong khyab
76b6(rgyud): mdzad pas// sems can gang reg thams cad nges par 'byung // bcom ldan sku ni bsod nams tshad med ldan// yon tan thams cad kun gyis rab tu rgyan// khams gsum ldan pas
76b7(rgyud): nyag cig gtsor gsungs pas// 'jig rten khyad 'phags dpe zla yod ma mchis// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ji snyed pa// grangs ni sa chen rdul phran dag dang mtshungs// 
76b8(rgyud): ma byon da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i gtso// sa chen rdul phran ji bzhin mang po la// bdag ni rtse gcig lus dang ngag yid kyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas spyi btud skyab su ma mi/ 
77a1(rgyud): / yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas rab bsngags nas// spos dang me tog sna tshogs kun gyis mchod// bdag ni lce ni brgya stong mchis 'gyur te// bskal pa tshad med
77a2(rgyud): tu bsngags brjod kyang // bcom ldan yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing // mchog tu zab pas shin tu brjod par dka'// bdag gi lce ni brgya stong mchis pa yis// sangs
77a3(rgyud): rgyas cig gi yon tan kun bsngags kyang // de la ma shas tsam yang rtogs dka' na// sangs rgyas mtha' dag yon tan smos ci 'tshal ka gal te sa chen dang ni lha rnams nas// 
77a4(rgyud): srid rtse'i bar dag rgya mtsho'i chab gyur kyang // spu yis rtse mos grangs ni rtogs rung gi/ sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad gzhal bar dka'// bdag gis lus
77a5(rgyud): dang ngag yid rtse gcig tu// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas bsngags brjod pa'i// song nams 'bras bu bsam dka' ci mchis pa// sems
77a6(rgyud): can yongs bsngo sangs rgyas myur 'grub smon// rgyal po de yis sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// gzhan yang rang sems smon lam cher btab pa// bdag ni ma 'ongs pa
77a7(rgyud): yi dus kyi tshe// tshe rabs bskal pa tshad med grangs med snyed// rmi lam rtag par gser rnga cher mthong nas// 'gyod tshangs bstan pa'i sgra ni thos par shog/ sangs rgyas
77a8(rgyud): yon tan pad+ma'i dpes sngags pas// skye med rtogs nas yang dag sangs rgyas shog/ sangs rgyas brgya lam lan cig 'jig rten 'byung // bskal pa brgya stong shin tu/ 
77b1(rgyud): phrad par dka'// rmi lam rtag par gser rnga sgra mchog thob// nyin mtshan ci rigs 'gyod tshangs bgyid par shog/ bdag gis pha rol phyin drug tshogs bsgoms nas// 
77b2(rgyud): sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las rab drangs te// de 'og bla med mngon par sangs rgyas nas// zhing ni rnam dag bsam gyis mi khyab shog/ gser gyi rnga mchog sangs rgyas phul
77b3(rgyud): ba dang // sangs rgyas yang ngag yon tan bsngags pa'i rgyus// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas// bdag la mi mchog 'gyur bar lung bstan shog/ bdag gi bu ni gser klu
77b4(rgyud): gser gyi 'ong // 'das pa'i dus che dge bshwe bgyis pas na tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi khyim skyes te/ lhan ci ga bla med byang chub lung nod shog/ sems can gang zhig mgan
77b5(rgyud): dang skyabs ma mchis// yun ring 'khor ba sdug bsngal mang myong ba / bdag gis ma 'ongs mgon dang sgrub sa bgyis nas// de dag rtag tu bde ba thob par shog/ sring gsum
77b6(rgyud): sdug bsngal mang po nyer zhi nas// thams cad yid bzhin bde gnas thob gyur te// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ji lta bzhin/ ma 'ongs byang chub mngon par sgrub par shog/ gser 'ong 'gyod
77b7(rgyud): tshangs bgyis pa'i bsod nams 'dis// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gtan bsams sdig bral nas// las kyi snying dang nyon mongs nyer zhi ste/ bdag gis rnam dag 'bras bu myur thob shes bsod nams ye rje
77b8(rgyud): rgya mtsho tshad med cing // rnam dag dri bral zab pas gting ma mchis// bdag gis yon rgya mtsho 'di thob nas// bla med byang chub chen po myur 'grub shes/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa 'di yi mthus
78a1(rgyud): bsod nams rnam dag 'od zer 'thob par shog/ rnam ngag 'od zer dam pa thob nas kyang // shes rab 'od kyis thams cad gsal bgying shog/ bdag gi lus 'od sangs
78a2(rgyud): rgyas mtshungs 'gyur zhing bsod nams ye shes dag kyang de bzhin shog/ 'jig rten kun tu gcig pu gtsor brjod cing // gzi brjing mthu stobs rang dbang zla med shog/ zag bcas sdug
78a3(rgyud): bsngal rgya mtsho 'das par shog/ 'dus ma byas kyi bde mtsho rtag bgrod shog/ da ltar bsod nams mtsho ni rtag 'phel shog ma 'ongs ye shes rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shog/ bdag gi zhing
78a4(rgyud): na khams gsuM 'dra 'das nas// khyad 'phags yon tan tshad med mtha' med shog/ rkyen dang ldan rnams lhan cig skyes gyur nas// thams cad rnam dag ye shes myur grub
78a5(rgyud): shog mdzes pa'i tog khyod shes par byos/ rgyal po gser klu bdag po yis// smon lam de 'dra gang btab pa/ de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no// gser klu gser 'ong zhes bya ba
78a6(rgyud): sngon gyi khye'u gnyis po ni// dngul tog dngul mtshan nyid yin te// nga las lung bstan thob pa yin// 'khor mang de skad thos pa na// thams cad byang chub sems bskyed de kangad ltar ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ 
78a7(rgyud): 'gyod tshangs 'ang spyod smon lam btab// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ pad+ma lta bu'i dpes bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
78a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gser rgyal zhes bya ba'i gzungs
78b1(rgyud): yod de// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du mthong zhing / bkur sti dang / mchod pa byed
78b2(rgyud): 'dod pas/ gzungs 'di yongasu gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum+bI paso// de lta bas na gzungs
78b3(rgyud): 'ang yongasu 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsod nams chen po ldan zhing / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams las// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas/ deng yongasu 'dzin pa
78b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin no// tshul khrims yongasu dag pa mi zhig mi nyams shing thogs pa med pa dang / gdon mi za bar chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// btso
78b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa/ sngar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas
78b6(rgyud): phyag byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sngags gdon par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshalo// nyan thos dang
78b7(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tsha'o// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
78b8(rgyud): rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// steng phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs
79a1(rgyud): pa'i yon tan mang po la phyag 'tshalo// 'og phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yon tan snang ba la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas kun tu 'ong la
79a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas spos brtsegs rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i pad+ma la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas mnyam par
79a3(rgyud): gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug bud la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dri ma med
79a4(rgyud): ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas spobs rab dgongs la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rnam dag zla ba'i 'od zer mtshan grags rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas me tog bkod
79a5(rgyud): pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas snang ba'i rgyal po la phya ga 'tshalo// sangs rgyas legs 'od dri med grags pa'i rgyal po/ la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rtog pa 'jigs
79a6(rgyud): med dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i grags pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
79a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
79a8(rgyud): chen po rnamakha'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tsha'o// 
79b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub meng song 'a chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu
79b2(rgyud): chen thob pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub seMng 'aseng 'a chen po dge ba'i bla gros la phyag 'ama'o// gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ 
79b3(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ kun+te kun+te/ ku tsa ku tsa le/ in+d+ri mi tre swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ri dus gsum gyi sangs
79b4(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med
79b5(rgyud): ba rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas grangs med pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / gus pas bla mar byed pa dang / bsngags pa brjod par byed pa yin pas/ 
79b6(rgyud): 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang po rnams kyis kyang gang zag de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyuraro// rab gnas gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yong su 'dzin
79b7(rgyud): bar byed ma ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gos dang / zas dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / mang du thos pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / nad med cing tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams mang bathob par 'gyur ba gajos pa
79b8(rgyud): mos pa rnams yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyuraro// rab gnas gzungs 'di yong su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni / bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du rtag par byang chub
80a1(rgyud): sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer gyi ringang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
80a2(rgyud): phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma hA ping ga la la sogs pa dang / lhan cig gnas par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yod
80a3(rgyud): su srung zhing yongasu srung bar 'gyur ro// rab gnas 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sngags 'di yongasu 'dzin pa'i tshe/ cho ga 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o// sngags lan khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ 
80a4(rgyud): bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyan nas/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig la khrus yongs su dag par byas te/ gos sar pa bgos nas
80a5(rgyud): spos bsregs me tog gtor te/ bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te/ thog ma kho nar sngar gong du bstan
80a6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas/ phyag byas nas sngar byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
80a7(rgyud): sa la btsugs nas/ sngar bstan pa'i gzungs sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lus drang por bsrang nas/ yid la bya zhing smon lam rjesu dran par bya'o// nyi ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du
80a8(rgyud): zas gtsang ma nag po bza' bar bya zhing / nyin gcig la zas gcig gza' bar bya'o// zhag bco lnga tshang nas dkyil 'khor nas 'byung bar byed na/ gang zag de bsod nams dang / gzi byin mthu
80b1(rgyud): stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur bas ci dang ci smon pa mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyuraro// gal te yid bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur na/ yang dkyil 'khor gyi
80b2(rgyud): nang du 'jug par bya zhing / bsam pa bzhin du 'grub nas kyang rtag par yid la bya zhing brjed par mo bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las gser
80b3(rgyud): rgyal gyi gzungs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags de bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
80b4(rgyud): rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / 'khor mang po rnams la phan gang gas shing / de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa shin tu zab pa khong du chung par mdzad par bzhed pa'i phyir/ stong pa
80b5(rgyud): nyid kyi rang bzhin yang bstan pa'i ched du tshigasu bcad de/ bka' stsal pa/ nga yis mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las// yang dag stong pa nyid dam chos bshad
80b6(rgyud): kyang / deng 'dir mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las kyang // stong nyid bsam gyis mi khyab mdo tsam bshad// zab mo'i chos ni rgya cher mang po la// sems cam shes med rig par mi nus pas// de'i
80b7(rgyud): phyir ngas 'dir bzlas te bstan pas na// stong pa'i chos ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos sems can brtse ba'i phyir// shin tu thabs mkhas rgyu rkyer mchog dag gis// ngas deng
80b8(rgyud): 'khor 'dus chen po 'di nang du// bstan pas de dag stong ngon gsal rtogs 'gyur// lus 'di grong stong 'dra bar shes byas te// rkun po drug gnas phan tshun yod mi shes// yul drug nur po tha
81a1(rgyud): dang dbang po gnas// so sor phan tshur mi shes de bzhin no// mig gi dbang po rtag par gzugs la lta// rna ba'i dbang po sgra nyan rgyun mi 'chang // sna yi dbang pos rgyun tu dri
81a2(rgyud): yul snom// lce yi dbang pos rtag par ro zhim myong // lus kyi dbang pos yang 'jam reg bya len// yid kyi dbang pos chos rig skyon mi shes// dbang po 'di drug dngos po'i rjes 'brang
81a3(rgyud): bas/  so so'i rang yul dag la rtog pa skyed// rnam shes sgyu sprul 'dra bas yang dag min// dbang pos gnas nas mi dben 'dod pas tshol// dper na mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa ltar// rnam
81a4(rgyud): shes drug po dbang gnas de bzhin no// sems ni kun tshol gnas kyi rjesu 'jug/ dbang rten yul dmigs dngos pos rnam rig pa// rtag par gzugs sgra dri ro rog la sred// 
81a5(rgyud): chos la spyod pas skad cig tsam mi gnas// rkyen ni ji bzhin dang drug kun rgyug pas// mkha' la bya 'bur thogs pa med pa 'dra// dbang po rten byed de la bltos nas ni// 
81a6(rgyud): phyi rol yul ni rnam par rig par nus// lus 'di shes med byed pa po yang med// rang bzhin mi rten rkyen la ltos nas grub// yang dag ma yin rnam rtog las skyes pas// 'phrul 'khor bzhin du
81a7(rgyud): las kyi dbang gis 'jugs chu me rlung lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas// rgyu rkyen ji bzhin tha dang 'bras bu 'thob/ lhan cig gnas kyang phan tshun gnod byed pas// sbrul gdug bzhi po gzeb gcig
81a8(rgyud): gnas pa 'dra// 'byung cher sprul ba'i rang bzhin tha dad pas// lhan cig gnas kyang mtho dang dma' ba yong// steng 'og 'gro zhing lus ni kun tu khyab/ 'di dag mthar ni zad pa'i chosu 'gro sbrul gdug
81b1(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi po de dag las// sa chu sbrul gnyis phan cher thur du 'bying // me rlung sbrul gnyis rang bzhin yang bas ma// mi mthun 'di dngang nang mang skye bar 'gyur// sems dang rnam shes lus 'di
81b2(rgyud): gnas nas ni// dge sdig las ni sna tshogs byed pas na// lha mi ngan 'gro gsum du song nas ni// lus stobs ji bzhin lus ni len par byed// nang dang phrad nas lus ni shi ba'i 'og/ bshad
81b3(rgyud): gci mi gtsang thams cad kun tu snang // rul myags 'bus brtsegs blta bar yong mi mos// dur khrod bor nas shing rul 'dra bar 'gyur// khyod kyis chos rnams de ltar blta bar byos// 
81b4(rgyud): ci phyir bdag dang sems can yod par 'dzin// chos rnams thams cang zad par mi rtag ste// thams cad ma rig rkyen gyi mthu las byung // / 'byung chen de dag yang dag min pas ma/ 
81b5(rgyud): yang dag yod min rang bzhin skye med pas// de phyir 'byung chen ngo bo stong par bshad// 'di dag skyong zhing yang dag min rig byos// ma rig rang bzhin bzod pa nyid kyis
81b6(rgyud): med/ rkyen mang mthu ltos tshogs las yod pa min// dus rnams kun tu yang dag blos stong pas// de phyir nga yis ma rig yin par bshad// 'du byed rnams shes rkyen byas ming gzugs yod// skye
81b7(rgyud): mched drug dang reg tshor rjesu skye// sred len sring skye rga shi bskyed pas na/ mya ngan smre sngags 'khrug pa rjesu 'brang // sdug bsngal sna tshogs las ngan rtag dkris gzir// 'khor bar 'khor ba
81b8(rgyud): ngag la chad dus med/ rang bzhin yod min ngo bo nyid stong yang // tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par rtog pa bskyed// nga yis nyon mongs thams cad rab spangs nas// rtag par yang dag ye shes mngon
82a1(rgyud): rgyu bas// lnga phung khang khyim thams cad stong rtogs nas// byang chub yang dag gnas ni btsal ba yin// nga yis bdud rtsi grong chen sgo phye nas// gya nom bdud rtsi snong ni
82a2(rgyud): bstan pa yin// yang dag bdud rtsi ro ni brnyes nas kyang // rtag par bdud rtsi skye dgu sbyin pa btang // ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung chen mchog kyang bus// ngas ni
82a3(rgyud): chos kyi sgron chen rab kyang spar// ngas ni chos kyis char chen dam pa phab// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu pham byas te// bla med chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sbreng // 'khor ba'i mtsho las skye dgu
82a4(rgyud): rmongs pazlas// nga yis ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo yang bcad// nyon mongs 'bar mes sems can rab bsregs te// mgon dang skyabs byed med pa dag la ni// rab bsil
82a5(rgyud): bdud rtsis de dag tshim byas nas// lus dang sems kyi gdung bzhi bar byas// de nas ngas ni bskal pa tshang med snyed// de ba zhin gshegs pa rnams la gus mchod
82a6(rgyud): byas/ tshul khrims rab bsrungs byang chub gzhol nas ni// chos sku bde ba'i gnas ni btsal ba yin// gzhan la mig dang rga lag rna ba dang // bu dang chung ma bran btang phangs pa med// nor dang
82a7(rgyud): rin chen bdun gyi rgyan phreng dge/ slong bdag la thams cad yongasu btang // bzod sogs pha rol phyin pa kun bsgoms pas// sa bcu yongs rdzogs yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// de phyir nga ni
82a8(rgyud): thams cad ma khyer brjod kyang // sems can gang yang gzhal bar nus pa med/ gal te stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams/ sa chen 'di las skyes pa'i dngos rnams dang / nags tshal ldon/ 
82b1(rgyud): shing sa lu til rnams dang // 'od ma la sogs yal ga ji snyed pa// 'di la sogs pa'i dngos po bcad btubs te// thams cad rdul phran phye mar byas pa dang // gang nas bsdus spungs tshang
82b2(rgyud): mi shes dka' dang // de bzhin na mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ngag ni thams cad ni// stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten ji snyed pa'i// sa rnams rdul gyi phye ma
82b3(rgyud): byas gyur na// rdul 'di tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus pas// sems can thams cad shes pa ci yod pa// shes pa de kun mo gcig rab byin nas// 'di ltar de yi shes pa tshad med pas// rdul phran
82b4(rgyud): de yi grangs ni shes rung yang // bcom ldan thub pas skad cig gang mkhyen pa// shes ldan de dag lhan cig gzhal ba cug nas// bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs snyed
82b5(rgyud): du cung zad tsam yang brtse zhing shes mi nus// de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zab mo 'di lta bu bkas bshad pa thos nas/ 
82b6(rgyud): sems can tshad med pa snyed 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / phung po lnga po dag rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa dang / dbang po drug dang / yul drug po yang dag pa ma yin pas/ 'ching ba bskyed par
82b7(rgyud): mngon par rtogs par gyur pas/ 'ang dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mang snga'i rgyal ba las stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i la'u 'khor ba yongasu spangs te/ nges par
