108b7(rgyud): lha ni mang po rnams// de yi grangs ni tshad med bsam mi khyab// thams cad mdo sde'i dbang po 'di mnyan pas// rab dga' srung byed nur ba ci yang med// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na// 
108b8(rgyud): mthu che rab dpa' rtag par dbang dang ldan// mi yi 'khor mang thams cad phan 'dogs pas// gnod pa rab spong snang ba 'phel bar byed// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis tshigs su
109a1(rgyud): bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ sngon chang nas yang mdo sde
109a2(rgyud): zab mo shin tu gya nom pa 'di lta bu ma thos so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma blags te ngus nas/ lus kyi yan lag 'dar zhing g.yo bar gyur te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos
109a3(rgyud): po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur pas/ lha yi me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa byas
109a4(rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la so so nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis pas/ rtag
109a5(rgyud): ngar gnas de dang de dag tu mdo sde 'di dang / chos smra ba de da/ ga yongasu bsrung zhing yongasu skyob par byed pas/ ye shes kyi sna nga bas yongasu skyob par dgyida'o// gal te mdo sde
109a6(rgyud): 'di'i tshig dang don bskyung ba zhig mchis na yang bdag cag gi/ sa de dag rje su dran zhing mi bskyad par bgyid pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa stsal nas/ yongasu
109a7(rgyud): rtogs par bgyid// gzhan yang mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di gang du gnas pa der sems can rnams la rgya cher 'phel zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid lag so// de'i tshe bcom ldan
109a8(rgyud): 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du chos 'di bstan pa na/ sems can tshad sa snyed shes rab chen po'i spobs pa thob nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed yongasu bsdus te/ mya ngan gyi gnod pa
109b1(rgyud): dang bral nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems thob par gyur pas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs la rab tu mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam thob nas/ phyir mi ldog par gyur pas/ myur du byang
109b2(rgyud): chub mngon par rtogs par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
109b3(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// / bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ 
109b4(rgyud): shA ri'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'das pa'i bya
109b5(rgyud): chu sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu gzung ba byang chub sem dpa' rnams kyi mar gyur pa yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
109b6(rgyud): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig dang don gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba ni/ phyogs dang gnas ma legs
109b7(rgyud): pang phyogs dang gnas ma lags pa yang ma lag so// zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod theg pa chen po la yang
109b8(rgyud): dag par gzhol zhing / theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches nas/ theg pa chen po la bla mar byas pa leg so leg so// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzungs zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang
110a1(rgyud): gnas yod pa yang ma yin/ phyogs dang gnas med pa yang ma yin/ chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ 
110a2(rgyud): ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin rkyen yang ma yin/ rkyen ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'du byed kyang ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa yang ma yin/ chos
110a3(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ba yang med/ chos 'gag par 'gyur ba yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdags pa'i phyir/ de skad du bstan pa yin te/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi
110a4(rgyud): nus pa dang / yang dag par lam gyi tshul dang / mthu stobs rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de mi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang // sangs
110a5(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir/ mngon par zhen pa med
110a6(rgyud): pa'i gzungs mchog gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
110a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas bdag la gzungs 'di'i cho ga gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di la gnas par gyur na/ bla
110a8(rgyud): nas mchis pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag pa'i smon lam yong su rdzogs nas/ gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin gyis spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngo mtshar
110b1(rgyud): rmang du byung ba'i dngos po thob nas/ 'phags pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di dag thams cad kyang gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i slang du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
110b2(rgyud): shA ri'i bu legaso leg so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis gzungs 'di thob par gyur na/ gang zag de mi
110b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang tha dad pa med par rig par bya'o// gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod cing / bkur sti byed pa dang / bla mar byed cing yo byad sbyin par byed na/ de ni sangs
110b4(rgyud): rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas pa yin par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos nas/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa
110b5(rgyud): dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / mngon par yid ches par bgyid pa de la 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang / tha dad pa med par bkur sti byas nas/ mchod cing rim gro byas nas/ rgyu
110b6(rgyud): dang rkyen des bla na med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ san d+hA ra Ni/ a ba d+hA ra Ni/ su saM pra tiSh+Tha te/ su nam/ 
110b7(rgyud): su pra tiSh+Tha ta/ bi dza ya ba la/ sa t+ya pra ti dz+nyA pa ri ti tsany+dza/ su a ro ha/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ u pa d+ha ne/ a ba nA ma ni/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi bA ha ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ su ni shr-i tA ba hU/ guM b+ha/ a b+hi pA da sISh+Ta
110b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab tu gnas nas/ yang dag par 'dzin par byed/ 
111a1(rgyud): / gang zag de ni bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du yang dag pa'i smon lam bskyed pa mthar thug pa med cing / ral gri/ 
111a2(rgyud): dang / dbyig dang / dug dang / chu dang / me dang / gcan zan ma rungs pa rnams kyis de'i lus la gnod pa byed mi nus par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
111a3(rgyud): gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang // da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin paso// shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsum
111a4(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul nas// bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du na bza' dang / 
111a5(rgyud): zhal zas mchog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pangs/ geng la la zhig gis gzungs 'di la ni tha ma tshig gci gtsam yang dag par gzung ba las byung ba'i
111a6(rgyud): bsod nams gang yin pa de ches mang du mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin tu zab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
111a7(rgyud): kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ thams cad kyis yongasu
111a8(rgyud): 'dzin par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas
111b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i gzungs
111b2(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad ring du spong ba/ 'brug dang / glog ma rungs pa thams cad 'gog cing / 'jil bar byed pa yod de/ de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
111b3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin pas/ ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'dir lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongs su
111b4(rgyud): bsrungs nas/ bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor mang po khyed la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas 'khor mang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis
111b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / so so nas sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ rig sngags mnyan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
111b6(rgyud): stsal pa/ khyed cag legs par nyon cig/ 'di nas shar phyogs nas/ glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po a ga ta zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po sha te ru zhes
111b7(rgyud): bya ba dang / nub phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po tsu ta kAng zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po su ta mi ni zhes bya ba so so nas yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
111b8(rgyud): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming thos shing phyogs shes par gyur na/ gang zag de 'jigs shing skrag pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / 
112a1(rgyud): glo bur gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te gang du gnas pa'i gnas der phyogs bzhi'i glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming yi ger bris par
112a2(rgyud): gyur na/ gang du gnas pa'i gnas de dag tu 'brug dang / glog gis 'jigs pa med cing / gdon bgegs dang / gnod pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par glo bur du 'chi ba
112a3(rgyud): thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi ni mi/ ni mi wen dra trai lo kya/ lo ki sha ni ro sha la ni/ ha kA ha rak+Sha/ 
112a4(rgyud): bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing / skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba dang / 'brug dang / glog dang / thog 'bab pa dang / glo bur 'chi
112a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig swA hA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i
112a6(rgyud): nang du 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ dbus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
112a7(rgyud): cag kyang deng lha dang / mi rnams la sman par bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongasu bsrungs nas/ bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang / mthu chen po'i stobs dang / ldan pa'i smon pa
112a8(rgyud): rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs gang lags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan par bgyi'o// de nas gzungs sngags
112b1(rgyud): smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra t+yar+b+hi ke/ pra ti maM ti/ shud d+he nukle bi ma le/ pra b+hA sa re/ aN+DA ri/ paThA ri/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra/ bA si ni/ ha ri/ kaN+Da ri/ ka pi ri/ ping ga la a kAM/ da d+hi mu gi yA kA/ 
112b2(rgyud): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'tshe ba nas/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad bral bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sdig
112b3(rgyud): pa'i dngos po ngan pa thams cad mi mthong zhing // rtag par byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/ thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs kyis dgongs shing
112b4(rgyud): yongasu bsrungs par gyur cig swA hA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po stan las langs / gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
112b5(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang deng lha dang mi rnams la sman pa cher bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongasu bsrungs nas/ gzi byin chen
112b6(rgyud): po'i mthu dang ldan pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin 'gru ba par bgyi ba'i slad du mi 'pham pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par bgyi'o// de ni gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ 
112b7(rgyud): mu ni mu ni mu ni na/ d+ha re/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ha/ ma g+han ti/ ti pA pa/ badz+ra pA Ni/ a haM tsa'i tsa sAhA// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs sngags 'di ni/ mi 'pham
112b8(rgyud): par srung ba zhes bgyi ste/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par gzung ste/ yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mi bskyud cing
113a1(rgyud): rje su dran par bgyid ma bdag gdugs mtshan du de la yongasu srung bar bgyid pas// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad nas/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chang thams cad
113a2(rgyud): thag ring du spong bar 'gyur lag so// de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
113a3(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yang shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzugs lha dang / mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa 'jig rten la rab tu rtseg thams cad yongasu srung
113a4(rgyud): bar bgyid pa dang / gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ d+hi li swA hA/ 
113a5(rgyud): brah+ma pu re swA hA/ prah+ma sA re swA hA/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa sad sid d+ha re swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag gzungs sngags 'di ni tshangs pa'i chad pas bcad pa zhes bgyi ste/ gzus
113a6(rgyud): 'di 'dzin pa dag la yongasu srung bar bgyid pas/ mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang / sdig pa'i las rnams thag ring du spong zhing / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad kyang yongasu spong bar bgyid do// de nas
113a7(rgyud): brgya byin lha'i dbang po stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yang badz+ra sha ni zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs rig sngag
113a8(rgyud): chen mo 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / glo dur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ sdug bsngal dang bral nas/ bde ba stsol ba dang mi rnams
113b1(rgyud): la sman par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs de bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra Ni ban d+ha ma dan De/ ma ni ne ti ni gau ri/ gan d+ha raM/ tsaN+Da li/ ma tang gi/ puk+ka si/ sa ra pra b+he/ hi na ma t+yota ta ma/ uH
113b2(rgyud): ra Ni/ mo ha ra Ni/ d+hA ra Ni ke/ tsakra bA ke/ sha ba ri/ sha ba ri swA hA/ de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor dang / lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / lha'i rgyal po mig maM
113b3(rgyud): bzang gcig car stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la yang / sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa
113b4(rgyud): sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa las rtag par yongasu bskyabs nas/ bde ba thob par bgyid pa/ tshe 'phel bar bgyid cing / nad kyi sdug bsngal ma mchis par bgyid pa
113b5(rgyud): glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ du ma/ pa ri ha re/ Ar+ya ba ri sha sing
113b6(rgyud): d+he/ shAn+te/ nir muk+te/ maM ge l+ye/ hir N+ya gar+b+he/ su ru te/ sid d+ha bi ti swA hA// de nas yang klu'i rgyal po chen po mang po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po nA ga si dang / klu'i rgyal po klog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po
113b7(rgyud): ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po gya nom 'od la sogs pa stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
113b8(rgyud): bdag cag la yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ glog ma rungs pa 'gog par bgyid pa/ 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams rab tu sel ba/ lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan
114a1(rgyud): / 'dogs pa/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba thams cad yongasu skyob pa/ ga'i byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa rnams yad bzhin du 'grub pa/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad
114a2(rgyud): thag ring du spong gdug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ byad sems dang sngags dang / bkra mi shes pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu sel bar bgyid pa mchis te/ bdag cag gzungs sngags 'di/ bcom
114a3(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'bul na/ thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag cag klu'i 'gro ba 'di dang bral nas/ ser sna'i 'dod pa gtan du spang ba'i slad du bzhi su gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ser sna'i
114a4(rgyud): 'dod pa 'di'i dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur pas/ bdag cag ser sna'i 'dod pa'i sa bon yod su bcad par 'tshal lag so// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ 
114a5(rgyud): cha thA/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ a mr-i te/ a k+Sha ye/ a b+ha ye/ pu N+ye bi d+ya ba te/ sarba pA ga pra sha ma na ye swA hA/ a li ye/ ban du sun+d+hi ye swA hA// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
114a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di g.yar kha nas brjod par bgyid ngam/ yi ger bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas/ 'chang zhing 'dzin par bgyid dam/ klog cing 'don par bgyid dam/ gus par
114a7(rgyud): mchod par bgyid na/ 'brug dang / glog dang / thog thog mi 'bab cing / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa dang / mya ngan dang / nad dang / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams
114a8(rgyud): cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur/ byad stems dang / mi la gnod bgyid pa'i stag dang / seng ge dang / sbyang ki dang / sbrul gdug pa rnams dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang ma mchu rings la sogs pas kyang gnod pa
114b1(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ legaso leg so// gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi mos pa
114b2(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du sems la bsams pa'i dngos po rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed/ rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed do// sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma gtogs te/ khyed cag the tsom ma za cig/ de nas
114b3(rgyud): 'khor mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas mngon par yid ches par gyur nas/ bka' yang dag par gzung bar gyur to// gser 'ong dam pa
114b4(rgyud): mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo 'khor mang po stan las
114b5(rgyud): langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma'o/ bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di mad kyis gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das cho smra ba'i mkhan po gang la la zhig// gser 'ong
114b6(rgyud): dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ bdag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas/ rgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa
114b7(rgyud): bgyid do// gal te chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mdo sde 'di las/ tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / tshig gi don bsrung ba bzhin mchis na yang / thams cad drang bzhin legs pa khong du chud par bgyis nas/ 
114b8(rgyud): gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs pa ma mchis pa stsal bar bgyid do// gzhan yang gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'ang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya
115a1(rgyud): stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas/ yongasu 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gis 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher spel nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad ma
115a2(rgyud): mchis pa snyed mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang gis thams cad shin tu myur ba'i spobs pa dang / bsam pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs sgyu
115a3(rgyud): rtsal rnams la rab tu mkhas pa dang / 'khor ba las myur du nges par byung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do// tshe 'di nyid la
115a4(rgyud): yang tshe 'phel zhing 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang / sems can gzhan yang
115a5(rgyud): mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa de dag gi ched du sman na sngags kyis btab nas khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga bshad para' tshal te/ des de dag la gza' ma rungs pa lces ngan ston pa ci
115a6(rgyud): mchis pa dang / dang po btsas pa'i sar ma dang / phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gdon
115a7(rgyud): bgegs dang / byad stems dang / dug dang / ngan du bgyis pa dang / sngags dang / ro langs dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang / bgegs bgyid pa thams cad yongs su
115a8(rgyud): bsal nas/ rab tu zhi bar bgyid pas blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ste/ des sman spos kyi ro dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ shu dag gi bang dang ni s+thi ka spos/ 
115b1(rgyud): / grwartsib zla dag dang shi ri sha in+d+ra ha ta sha ma ka sha mi// thang chu dang ni shing tshagla sgang dang // a ga ru dang tsan dan ta ka ra// sa la ki dang gur gum ha la las/ na tra smig bcud su ki me lha dang // thang shing
115b2(rgyud): pa tra dang ni on shi la// sa la kye dang pra ba shu kul dang // yungs kar go snyong na ga ge sa ra/ sa ra tsa ra sa ru ta cha mnyam bgyi// skar ma rgyal la gcig tu btags nas ni// spos kyi phye ma de dag rab blangs te/ 
115b3(rgyud): sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdab par bgyi/ sngags 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ su tri tre/ kr-i ke kA mA ta le/ dza na ka ra te/ u kar te an+di dza li ni/ shaM ka ran te/ pA sha tsi li/ a bar+d+ha ka/ ka si ke na/ ku du ku du
115b4(rgyud): kha ka bIr+ye/ kha ka pi le/ ka pa le/ ka pi la ma te/ shI la ma ti san d+hi du ra ma tre/ ba bad ka/ b+haM tsi li/ shi ri shi le sa t+ya s+thi te swA hA// gal te chos bzhin khrus ni bgying 'tshal na// dkyil
115b5(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi khru brgyad pa bgyis nas// rab tu dben zhing bde ba'i gnas ngag tu// don gang sgrub pa sems la dran par bgyi// ba lang lcibs dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni// steng du me tog phun
115b6(rgyud): tu dgram par bgyid// gser dngul snod ni shin tu gtsang ma dag/ ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis dgang bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor de yi sgo bzhi dag tu yang // skyes bu bzhi zhig chos bzhin srung du stsal// gzhor
115b7(rgyud): bzhi zhig lus ni rab rgyan nas// so sor grwa rer chab kyi bum pa thogs// der ni rtag par gu gul bsregs nas ni// dbyangs lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi// dkyil 'khor de yi ngos bzhi dag tu yang / 
115b8(rgyud): ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldi mdzes par bgyi// dkyil 'khor nang du me long gsal ba dang // ral gri rnon po mnga' bzhi bzhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhong kung che stsal nas// 'dzeg pa'i
116a1(rgyud): shing leg 'di yi steng du bzhag/ snga ma'i phye mchab dang sbyar nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du bzhag par bgyi// de ltar bkram zhing rnam pa' bzhag nas ni// de nas sngags
116a2(rgyud): bzlas dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad bgyi// mtshams bcad pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a na ra ke na ya ni/ hi li mi li/ khe le/ khi khi le swA hA// de ltar mtshams ni rab bcad nas// dkyil
116a3(rgyud): 'khor nang du zhugs nas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig cha ba sngags te// phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi// de nas spos chab dag la ni// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang sngags btab ste// ngos bzhir yol bas bskor
116a4(rgyud): nas ni// de 'og lus ni bkrus par bgyi// cha ba dang spos chab la gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa gci bi ga tsi/ bi ga tsa/ ba de swA hA// khrus bgyis lags nas// khrus bgyis
116a5(rgyud): ba'i chab dang // dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod pa bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang // btung ba ci mchis pa rtsang po 'am// rdzing gi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing // gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o// 
116a6(rgyud): de ltar khrus bgyis lags nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dkyil 'khor nas phyir byung nas/ khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs te/ sngags mkhan gyis de dag yi dam rgya chen po spang du stsal nas/ 
116a7(rgyud): sdig pa sna tshogs gtan du bcad cing / dge ba sna tshogs rtag par spyad nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par bgyi ste/ rgyu dang rkyen des na yid bzhin gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa
116a8(rgyud): tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par 'gyur lag so// yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ sems can gang zhig nang gyi sdug bsngal nyen// sman spyad sna tshogs gsos kyang mi sos pa// khrus kyi cho ga 'di bzhin
116b1(rgyud): khrus bgyis te// gzhan yang mdo sde 'di ni klog bton nas// gdugs mtshan rtag par sems ni mi g.yeng bar// rtse gcig gus pas dang sems bskyed bgyis nas// nad kyi sdug bsngal bas par
116b2(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur// dbul 'phongs nor dang ldan par 'gyur// phyogs bzhi'i gza' skar nyi zla'i lha// mthu yis rab bsrungs tshe ni ring bar 'gyur// bkra shis rab bde bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// 
116b3(rgyud): ltas ngan gdon bgegs thams cad sel ba bgyi// de'i 'og tu lus bsrungs pa'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa me/ bi sa me swA hA/ sa pa
116b4(rgyud): te bi ga te swA hA/ bi ga tsa ba te swA hA// sA ga ra/ saM bud drA ya swA hA/ skran d+ha mA tA ya swA hA/ nI la kar+N+Na ya swA hA/ a pa ri dza ta/ bir+yA ya swA hA/ hi ma ban d+hA ya swAhA/ a
116b5(rgyud): ni mi la bA ka thA ya swA hA// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma Ne/ swA hA/ na ma sa ra swa s+yai/ ma hA de bye swA hA/ sid d+h+yan+tu mAM/ man+ta pA ra swA hA/ d+ha ra to/ bi tsi taM/ prah+ma nu ma no ra khi to swA hA/ de nas
116b6(rgyud): lha mo spobs pa chen mo khrus kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
116b7(rgyud): ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig/ mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ge
116b8(rgyud): bris nas spel ba dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par bgyid na/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 'brog dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'i gnas
117a1(rgyud): gang yang rung ba dag tu gnas kyang rung ste/ bdag de'i cheng du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig lha'i rol mo bgyis nas/ de'i thad du mchis te yongasu skyob pa dang / srung bar ba
117a2(rgyud): nas/ nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / skar mnga' ltung ba dang / ltas ngan dang / rims nang dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa rnams sel bar bgyis/ rgyal po'i khrims kyis bzung ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 
117a3(rgyud): 'dre srin ma rungs pas gnod pa dang / byang stem thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor dang / nyan pa'i 'khor rnams myur du 'khor ba'i
117a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po las yongasu bzlas nas/ byang chub las bzlog par mi 'gyur bar phan 'dogs par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / lha mo spobs
117a5(rgyud): pachen mo la/  mo khyod kyis sems can chang med cing ma' med pa ngas la phan pa dang / bde ba bya ba'i phyi ched du 'og saH/ de dag dang / blos nus khrus bya ba dang / 
117a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yang dag par bshad pa legaso leg so// zhes sngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di
117a7(rgyud): bsrungs nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par rgya cher gnas par 'gyur bar byos shig/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to// 
117a8(rgyud): de nas bram ze ke'u nga n+ya chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus/ 'khor mang po'i mdun du lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod pa// shes gsal
117b1(rgyud): rab dpa' spobs pa'i lha mo khyod// lha mo'i mchod pa dag gis mchod par 'os// grags pas 'jig rten kun tu rgyas pas na// sems can thams cad re ba rdzogs par byed// ri rtse mthon po gnas
117b2(rgyud): mchog dag tu ni// rtsa bsdus khyim byas de na rab tu gnas// rgyun tu rtsa 'jam 'dud nas gos byas te// rtag par rkang pa la cig bkun ste 'greng // lha 'khor mang po thams cad 'dus lhags nas/ 
117b3(rgyud): thams cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la bsngags// shes rab spobs pa ldan pa'i lha mo khyod// tshig snyan gya nom thams cad sbyin par gyis// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen po des gsol ba btang
117b4(rgyud): mnyan nas/ gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ mi rI ts+yai re/ ma ba dze/ a badz+ra ba ti/ hing gu le/ ming gu le/ ping ga la ba ta~M/ ang gu she/ mA ri ts+yai/ saMm na/  sha ma ti/ a gra
117b5(rgyud): gri ta ra tsi/ ta ra tsa pa ti/ tsi ra tsi ri/ shi r-i mi ri/ ma man d+hi/ dam gi mA rI ts+yai/ pra NA b+hir+ye/ lo ka r+Nol+le/ lo ka shoSh+To/ lo kA bI re sing d+ha ba ra te/ b+hI ma mu khi shu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te/ 
117b6(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta bud d+hi wa mu tsi ma hA na mu tsi/ ma hA de b+he/ pra ti gri ha na ma skA raM/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bung d+hi/ dra shi hi bud d+hi/ a pra ti ha ta/ b+ha ba tu/ si b+ha me bi shud+d+ha tsi to/ shash+na sh+le ka ma na tA/ 
117b7(rgyud): d+yA ka ka pi ya di sho/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha ge hi li mi li hi ma hi/ bi tsa to/ bi bud d+hi/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bung d+hi ri shud d+hi/ b+ha ga ba rkye ma/ de be yam/ sa ra sa sI/ ka ra ti/ kai yu ra ma ga hi mi li mi li/ a
117b8(rgyud): b+ha ya mi/ ma hA de ge bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+hams t+ye na/ sang g+ha sa t+ye na/ in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ ba ru Na sa t+ye na/ ye lo kye/ sa t+ya sa t+ye na/ de shaM sa t+ye na/ sad d+he bA di tsi na na/ a b+ha ha ma mI hISh+Ti mi li bi tsa ra to// bdag gi ming
118a1(rgyud): brjod/ ma ma bud d+he/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA de ge sa ra sA t+ya/ sid d+han+ya/ man+t+ra pa daM swA hA// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas/ bram ze de la
118a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces kye skyes bu chen po sems can rnams kyi ched du spobs pa gya nom pa dang / rin po che dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / shes rab yongasu gnyer nas/ thams cad la rgya che phan btags te/ 
118a3(rgyud): myur du byang chub mngon du byed par 'dod pa le gso leg so// de ltar shes par byas nas/ cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ yang tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ thog ma kho nar bzungs 'di kha tor du
118a4(rgyud): byang zhing nor ba med par bklags nas ni// byin gyis rlob cing smon pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// dkon mchog gsum dang lha rnams skyabs 'gro zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 
118a5(rgyud): rang rgyal nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag bya// de 'og tshangs dang brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po chen po bzhi// rtag par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la// rtse gcig
118a6(rgyud): gus pas gus par phyag byas nas// dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga 'don// sangs rgyas sku gzugs lha klu'i mdun dag tu/ ji tsam 'byor pas
118a7(rgyud): mchod pa bslab par bya// sems can rnams de dag thams cad la// byams dang snying rjes brtse ba'i sems kyang bskyed// bcom ldan gser sku shin tu gya nom mtshan// g.yeng ba med sems
118a8(rgyud): rtse gcig dran par bya// bcom ldan yang dag chos don dgongs mdzad pas// dbang po ji bzhin ting 'dzin sgom la 'god// de yi tshig gi don ni legs soms la// stong pa nyid bstan rab tu sgom
118b1(rgyud): bar gyi// bcom ldan sku gzugs ngag gi spyan sngar ni// rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na// gya nom ye shes ting nge 'dzin dag dang // gzungs mchog dam pa dag kyang 'thob par
118b2(rgyud): 'gyur// bcom ldan gser zhal yang dag chos bstam nas// gya nom dbyangs kyis lha mi 'dul bar mdzad// ljags mtshan rkyen bzhin ngo mtshar rab ston pas// yangs ring stong gsum 'jig
118b3(rgyud): rten khyab par mdzad// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom de 'dra ba// rtse gcig dran na sems la 'jigs med 'thob// bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen gtab pa'i dbang // ljags mtshan bsam
118b4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas// chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsungs mdzad pas// dper na na mkha' chags pa med pa 'dra// bcom ldan gsungs dbyangs dag dang ljags
118b5(rgyud): mtshan rnams// dran pa nyer gzhag gzhan med smon rdzogs 'gyur// gal te lha mo spobs chen mchod mthong ngam// slob mas slob dpon rjes slob mthong nas ni// gsang ba'i
118b6(rgyud): ga 'di blangs sgom byed dam// bla mar byed na sems la bsam pa 'grub// gang zhig ye shes dam pa mchog 'dod na// rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung bar bya// bsong nams ye shes yon
118b7(rgyud): na 'phel byed pas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma sbed// nor tshal dag ni nor mang rnyed par 'gyur// grags pa gnyer ba grags chen thob par 'gyur// des 'byung tshol ba rnam par
118b8(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur bas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed// yon tan tshad med mtha' yas ji snyed pa// sems la bsams bzhin yongasu sdud par byed// gal te de ltar chos bzhin spyod
119a1(rgyud): nus na/ nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma bskyed// gtsang ma'i gan su gos gsar bgos nas ni// dkyil 'khor che chung ji tsam nus par bya// bum pa gtsang ma bzhir ni
119a2(rgyud): ro zhim dgang bar bya// me tog pog spos ci 'byor mchod par bya// lnga ldi pa dan dag dang gdugs bres te// byug spos phye ma kun tu khyab rgyan nas// sangs rgyas lha mo spobs chen mchod byed na/ 
119a3(rgyud): lha lus mthong bar 'dod na smon bzhin 'grub// lha mo spongs chen mdun du snga ma'i sngags// zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya// gal te lha de mthong bar ma gyur na// rtse gcig sems
119a4(rgyud): kyis zhag dgu dran par bya// nam gyi cha byad 'on kyang ma mthong na// gnas gtsang dam pa gzhan dag btsal nas ni// lha mo spobs chen gzugs ni rab bris te// mchod gnas bzlas
119a5(rgyud): brjod sems kyis mi btang zhing // nyin mtshan le lo sems ni mi skyed ma// bdag gzhan la phan 'dogs mthar thug med// rnam smin gang thob skye dgu sbyin byed na// smon pa
119a6(rgyud): thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur// gal te yid bzhin ma grub zla ba gsum// yang na drug dang dgu dang lo gcig par// rab brtson gsol 'debs sems ni mi g.yo na// lha yi mig dang
119a7(rgyud): gzhan sems shes thob 'gyur// de nas bram ze ke'u di rgyas de skad ces bstan pa thos pa dang // dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces kye khyed cag lha dang
119a8(rgyud): mi yi 'khor mang po thams cad shes par byos la// sems rtse gcig tu deng bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la brten nas/ lha mo spobs pa mchog dam pa de dag la bsngags pa brjod pa nyon cig/ 
119b1(rgyud): ces smras nas tshigasu bcad de smras pa// 'jig rten dag la dbang phyug thob gyur pa// lha mo mthu chen thob la gus phyag 'tshal// deng bdag gtso mo de la bsngags pa yang // sngon gyi drang srong ji skad bstan pa
119b2(rgyud): bzhin/ bkra shis yongs rdzogs sems ni bde bar gnas// sems gsal ngo tsha khrel yong grags dang ldan// ma ma byas te 'jig rten rab tu bskyed// rab dpa' rtag par brtson 'grus chen po spyod// 'thab
119b3(rgyud): mo'i g.yul du rtag par rgyun tu rgyal// rab dul byams sems bzod pa gsol bar byed// de ltar gshin rje'i sring mo chen mor gyur// gos su rtag par dar tshon sngon po gyon// sdug dang mi sdug byang bzhin kun
119b4(rgyud): dang ldan// mig ni mthong ba thams cad rab tu sdang // spyod mchog da ma pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// phyogs shing mngon dang mi kun yod su sdud// res 'ga' ri brag zab mo dag na gnas// res
119b5(rgyud): 'ga' brag phug rtsang po'i 'gram na gnas// res 'ga' ljon shing nags tshal chen por gnas// lha mo phal cher 'di dag kun tu gnas// ri dang nags tshal mi rgod ji snyed pa// rtag par lha
119b6(rgyud): mo la ni mchod par byed// rma bya'i sgros ni rgyal mtshan pa dan byed// dus su mchog tu rtag par 'jig rten skyong // rtag dang seng ge spyang gis rgyun tu bskor// gnag lug bya la sogs pas rten yang 'cha'// dril
119b7(rgyud): chen bsgrags nas sgra ni phyung bas na// byi ta'i ri la sgra ni kun tu bsgrags// res 'ga' rtse gsum tri shUl thogs byed cing // g.yas g.yon rgyun tu zhi zla ru mtshon 'dzin// zla ba nag po'i tshes dgu bcu gcig la/ 
119b8(rgyud): de yi dusu rtag par mchod par bya// re dga' ba su lha chen sring mor ston// g.yul 'gyed mthong na rtag par snying yang brtse// sems can thams cad rnam par lta ba la// lha mo mchog tu gyur pas bzlas pa
120a1(rgyud): / med// res 'ga' ba rdzi bu mo dga' mor ston// lha dang 'thab tshe rtag par rgyal ba 'thob// 'jig rten dag na yun ring gnas par byed// rab dul bzod dang khro gtum ston par byed/ 
120a2(rgyud): bram ze chen po rig pa'i chos bzhi dang // sgyu 'phrul sngags sogs thams cad rab tu rtogs// drang srong nang na rang dbang dag dang ldan// sa bon dang ni sa chen byed par nus// lha yi bu mo la sogs 'dus
120a3(rgyud): ba'i tshe// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar nges par der yang 'du// klu dang gnod sbyin mang po'i tshogs kun gyi// gtso bor gyur pas rab tu dul bar byed// bud med nang na tshangs spyod mchog dang ldan// tshig byung dper na
120a4(rgyud): 'jig rten bdag po 'dra// rgyal po'i gnas na pad+ma dang yang mtshungs// chu bo'i 'gram nas gnas tshe gru zas bzhin// byang bzhin sdug mdzes zla ba nya ba 'dra// mang thos phun tshogs gnas dang
120a5(rgyud): sten yang byed// spobs pa mchog byung ri rtse mthon po 'dra// dran pa thams cad kun gyi gling yang byed// lha ma yin la sogs te lha tshog rnams// thams cad 'di yi yon tan bsngags
120a6(rgyud): par byed// mig stong brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang // gus pa'i sems kyis lta zhing rab tu rtog/ sems can gang zhig re zhing tshol ba yod// de dag thams cad myur du 'grub par byed// yid myur spobs
120a7(rgyud): dang chos 'dzin ldan byed pas// sa chen steng na mchog tu gyur pa yin/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu// mar me che ltar rtag par kun gsal byed// tha na lha 'dre gcan zan dag la yang // de
120a8(rgyud): bas bsams bzhin thams cad rdzogs byed 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi nang na'i rtse 'dra// sngon gyi drang srong ji bzhin yun ring gnas// lha mo gzhon nu ji bzhin 'dod chags spangs// 'jig rten
120b1(rgyud): bdag po che bzhin bden tshig smra// 'jig rten yum gyi khyad par rgyan rnams dang // 'dod khams lha yi khang pa kun bltas nas// lha mo 'ba' zhig gtso mor grags pas na// sems can mchog tu gyur pa yongs
120b2(rgyud): mi snang // gal te g.yul 'gyed 'jigs pa gnas ngag dang // me dong lhung ba dag ni mthong gyur tam// chu bo nyam nga chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe// 'jigs pa de dag thams cad sel bar nus// gal te rgyal
120b3(rgyud): po'i khrims kyis bcings sgrogs sam// gal te sha chags gsod par byed pa'i tshe// sems ni rtse gcig mi g.yo gnas gyur na// nges par mya ngan sdug bsngal kun las thar// dge sdig mi kun yongasu sbyor
120b4(rgyud): pa ma khyams dang snying rje'i brtse ba rtag sngon snang // de phyir bdag ni bsam pa rtse gcig tu// lha mo che la phyag 'tshal skyabasu mchi// de nas bram ze des sngags dang // bsngags pa brjod pa'i
120b5(rgyud): rig gis lha mo de la mngon par bstod pa// 'jig rten gcol gus phyag 'tshal// mi rnam sna nang na kun gyi mchog gyur pas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la mchod/ 
120b6(rgyud): byang bzhin rab mthos kun gyis lta bar mos// yon tam dam pa sna tshogs lus rab rgyan// mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/ bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i grags pas rgyas// dper na rin thang med
120b7(rgyud): pa'i nor bu mtshungs// deng bdag dam pa khyod la bsngags pas na// sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yang dag yon tan bkra shis gya nom pa// pad+ma lta bur shin tu rnam par dag/ lus
120b8(rgyud): mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos// mtshan mar ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dri med ye shes 'od ze rab 'gyed pas// dran pa kun gyi mang mchog tu gyur// ji ltar seng ge gcan zad mchog
121a1(rgyud): gyur lngar// rtag par lag brgyad kyis bdag nyid rgyan// so sor mda' gzhu ral gri sta ri dang // tho rangs lcags kyi 'khor lo zhag pa thogs// rab mdzes lha mo tsA ba nya ba'ang/ 
121a2(rgyud): tshig la thogs med dbyangs snyan 'byin par byed// sems can gang zhig sems la smon yod na/ skyes bu dam pas bsams bzhin rdzogs par byed// brgya byin lha mang kur gyis khyod mchod nas// 
121a3(rgyud): thams cad bsngags brjod skyabasu 'gro bar byed// bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan skyed byed pas// dus rnams kun tu gus pas bskyed par byed/ swA hA/ gal te spobs chen lha mo gsol 'dong na// sngags
121a4(rgyud): bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba bzhin// nang par rnam ngag sems kyis rtse gcig 'don// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad bsam bzhin 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze la/ 
121a5(rgyud): khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing bde ba sbyin ba'i ched du/ lha mo de la sngags pa brjod nas/ byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab pas/ bsod nams dpag tu
121a6(rgyud): med pa thob par 'gyur ba legaso zhes bka' stsal to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// bam po brgyad pa// de nas bram ze koH
121a7(rgyud): de n+yas gong du bstan pa lta bu'i mngon par bstod pa'i tshig dang / sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smraso// khyed cag lha mo
121a8(rgyud): spobs pa chen mo la gsol / btab nas/ snying brtse ba'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe 'di nyid la thogs pa med pa'i sems myur ba dang / ye shes chen po dang / tshig la shin tu mkhas pa dang / shes pa
121b1(rgyud): rgya chen po 'thob pa dang / 'bel ba'i gtam gyi phan tshun lan 'debs pa dang / tshig 'bru'i rgyan yid bzhin du grub nas thogs pa med par 'dod na/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas 'di ltar gsol pa
121b2(rgyud): gdab par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha'o// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'phags pa thad
121b3(rgyud): ngag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i bden tshig mngon par grub pa/ dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung ga mi slu ba'i tshig gsung
121b4(rgyud): ba bskal pa chen po byeb tshad med pa snyed du rtag par yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung zhing yang dag pa'i bden tshig dang ldan pa thams cad la rje su yi rang nas phyag 'tshalo// 
121b5(rgyud): mi bden pa'i tshig ma gsungs pa'i phyir/ yangs shing ring bani ljags phyung nyid kyi zhal dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling dang / gling bzhi dang / stong dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi
121b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs nas/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu sel bar
121b7(rgyud): mdzad pa la gus pas phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas ljags kyi mtshan de lta bu dang ldan pa thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba shin tu gya nom pa'i spobs pa dang
121b8(rgyud): ldan par smon nas/ sems rtse gcig tu srog phyog so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rang rgyal 'phags pa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / 
122a1(rgyud): // zhugs bzhi'i 'bras pazhi'i spongs pa dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshig gis spongs pa mchog dang / drang srong lnga'i spongs pa dam pa dang / tshangs 'khor drang srong spongs pa dang / lha chen dbu ma'i spongs pa dang
122a2(rgyud): pa dang / skal ldan lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal po mi na sa'i spobs pa mchog dang / yid bzhin lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rab gnas lha'i bu'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rdo rje'i gsang ba'i
122a3(rgyud): bdag po'i spobs pa mchog dang / khyab 'jug lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo b+hi ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang / biSh+Ta lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo bzang mo'i spobs pa dam pa dang / shi ri ma ti'i spobs pa dam pa dang / he ri tshig
122a4(rgyud): gi spobs pa dam pa dang / ma dang ma chen spobs pa dam pa dang / ha ri ta'i spobs pa dam pa dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi spobs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spobs pa gus phyag 'tshal// las mchog ci mnga'
122a5(rgyud): thaMd bdag stangs nas// spobs mchog dam pa mtha' med thob par shog/ sgrub med la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam par grol la gus phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags spangs la gus phyag 'tshal// 'ching sgrib spangs
122a6(rgyud): la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam dag sems la gus phyag 'tshal// 'od dang ldan la gus phyag 'tshal// bden tshig smra la gus phyag 'tshal// rdul chags med la gus phyag 'tshal// don mchog gnas la gus phyag 'tshal// 'khor mang
122a7(rgyud): bdag la gus phyag 'tshal// spobs pa'i lha la gus phyag 'tshal// bdag ni tshig la thogs med shog/ bdag gis smos cing gnyer ba'i dngos/ thaMd myur du grub par shog/ nad med rtag tu 'ab bde zhing // tshe ring lo nung 'thob par shog sa
122a8(rgyud): sngags kun la rab mkhas shing // nan tan byang chub lam bsgoms nas// skye dgu rgya cher phan btags te// bsam pa myur du 'grub par smon// bdag gis bden tshig smras pa dang // bdag gis slu ba med smras pa// lha mo'i spobs pa gang yin pa// 
122b1(rgyud): bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// lha mo khyod ni 'dir gshegs te// tshig thogs ma mchis bgyi slad du// bdag lus khar ni myur zhugs nas// yid myur spobs dang ldan par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po yis// 
122b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs thob pas// tshig de'i mthu stobs dbang gis ni// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar shog/ bdag ni tshig dag smras pa'i tshe// don ni ci bzhin grub gyur cing // thos pa dag ni gus
122b3(rgyud): bskyed nas// byas pa chung gsom ma gyur cig/ bdag gis spobs pa gnyer ba yi// dngos po gal te ma grub na// lha mo'i bden tshig gang yin pa// thams cad rdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// bdag gis mtshams
122b4(rgyud): med sdig byas pa// sangs rgyas gdung gis 'dul bar 'gyur// de bzhin dgra bcom gang yin dang // drin bzo'i tshig ni ji snyed dang // sha ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal bu// bcom ldan 'khor mang mchog
122b5(rgyud): gyur pa// 'di la sogs pa'i bde ma tshig rnams// thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog/ deng bdag sangs rgyas nyan thos 'pho // thams cad 'dir ni spyan 'dren na// thams cad
122b6(rgyud): myur du 'dir gshegs te// bdag gi smon pa rdzogs mdzad smon// yang dag bden tshig gang gnyer ba// thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog/ gong du 'og min lha man chad// gnas
122b7(rgyud): gtsang rigs kyi lha dag dang // tshangs chen tshangs lha nye phan dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'khor rnams dang // stong gsum 'jig rten kun khyab dang // mi mjed 'jig rten bdag po dang
122b8(rgyud): 'khor ni mang po thams cad kun// deng bdag thams cad spyan 'dren na/ byams dang thugs rje rab bskyed de/ thams cad brtse bas gzung du gsol/ 
123a1(rgyud): / gzhan 'drul dbang byed lha rnams dang // 'phrul dga'i lha mi dag dang / dga' ldan pa la tshogs dang / byams pa mngon par tshugs 'gyur dang // 'thab bral pa yi lha
123a2(rgyud): dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha dag dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha tshogs dang // lha mang 'khor ni thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha rnams dang // ri rab brten nas gnas pa dang // mamo bdun ri yi lha tshogs
123a3(rgyud): rnams// 'khor ni mang po bcas pa dang // nor rgyas dang ni mgo lnga dang // nyi zla gza' skar lha dag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po// 'jig rten bde bar byed pas ma// 'di las sogs pa'i lha
123a4(rgyud): mang po// sdig pa'i las ni byed mi mos// sangs rgyas gus pa 'phrog ma dang // de yi bu sdug tha chungs dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang ni lha ma yin// mi 'am ci'i 'khor rnams dang // lho
123a5(rgyud): phye chen po la sogs pa// bdag ni bcom ldan mthu stobs kyis / de dag thams cad smyen 'dren na// byams dang snying rje'i sems pa skyed nas// bdag la thogs med spobs pa stsol// 
123a6(rgyud): lha dang mi'i 'khor rnams las// gzhan gyi sems ni rig gyur pa// thams cad byin gyis brlabs pas ni// bdag la dam pa dam pa stsol// na mkha'i khams ni mthar thug dang // chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
123a7(rgyud): pa nad/ sems can rnam pa ji snyed pas// bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos de skad gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang // bram ze de la 'di skad ces smraso// kye skyes bu chen po
123a8(rgyud): leg so// skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig sngags de dang / sngags kyi mngon par bstod pa de dag la brten nas/ sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du chos yang dag par blangs te/ dkon mchog gsum la gus
123b1(rgyud): pas skyabasu 'gro zhing // sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed na// ci dang ci bsgrubs pa thams cad chung za bar mi 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gser 'ong dam pa'i shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di yang dag
123b2(rgyud): bar bzung ste/ klog cing 'don par byed ma smon pa thams cad 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa de ma gtog so// de'i tshe bram ze de shin tu
123b3(rgyud): dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ thal mo sbyar spyi bos yang dag par blangs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod
123b4(rgyud): kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di rgya cher spel nas/ mdo sde yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu srung bar byas pa dang / sems can thams cad la
123b5(rgyud): phan gdags shing bde ba 'thob par bya ba'i ched du chos de lta bu bstan na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa byin te/ bsod na mas tshad med pa thob par gyur pa dang / sems
123b6(rgyud): bskyed pa rnams myur du byang chub las gzhol bar byas pa leg so leg so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// 
123b7(rgyud): de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te dge
123b8(rgyud): slong ngam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la yang
124a1(rgyud): / dag par ston par bgyid pa zhig mthong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas bkur sti dang / mchod par bgyida'o// chos smra ba de dag la 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 
124a2(rgyud): gos dang / mal cha dang / gsos sman dang / g.yo byad ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te/ brel zhing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyi 'o// gdugs mtshan du mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i tshig gi
124a3(rgyud): don ji snyed pa dag la so sor brtags te/ yid la bsams shing yongasu btsal nas/ bde bar gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
124a4(rgyud): de dag tu thos par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed du lha dang mi'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar
124a5(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// rtag par lo legs shing mu ge'i rgud pa gtan du sel bar gyur pas/ skye bo rnams gtan du bde ba myong ba ra 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
124a6(rgyud): 'jal bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe myur du byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur bas/ ngan 'gro gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bgegs gtan du gcod par 'gyur lag so// 6
124a7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag sngon dran lags te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi
124a8(rgyud): yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bgyi gamatshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ bdag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des byams pa dang / thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyi mthus brtse bar dgos/ 
124b1(rgyud): par gyur pa'i slad du deng bdag gang du bsams pa'i gnas de dang / gang du ltas pa'i phyogs de dang / gang du mchis pa'i yul de dang / de dag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma
124b2(rgyud): mchis pa snyed shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong zhing / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / 
124b3(rgyud): byi ru dang / 'gron bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa rin po che ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur lag so// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu gser 'od dam pa mchog tu
124b4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'don pa 'dis gdugs re bzhin du spos sna tshogs bsregs nas/ me tog dam pa rnams kyis bdag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
124b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang // gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho de la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gdugs
124b6(rgyud): cig bzhin du dus gsum du bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rje su dran par bgyis nas/ logs shig tu spos dang / me tog dang / zas mchog rnams kyis bdag mchod cing // rtag par mdo sde'i
124b7(rgyud): rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid na/ bsod nams 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur lag so// de nas tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// 'di ltar mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa'i slad du// bdag dang 'khor rnams
124b8(rgyud): gnod pa kun dang bral// gos zas ci 'tshal 'phongs pa ma mchis 'gyur// gzi byin ldan zhing tshe yang dpag par dka'// sa yi ro yang rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// lha rnams dus bzhin mar ni rang
125a1(rgyud): tu 'bebs// lha 'khor de dag rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// skyed mos tshal dang 'bru yi lha rnams kyis// nags tshal ljon shing 'bras bu rab 'phel zhing // 'bru rnams thams cad
125a2(rgyud): yongasu smin par bgyid// rin chen nor tshol bsam pa rdzogs 'gyur zhing // ci dang ci smon bsam bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di lta
125a3(rgyud): mngon gyi rgyud rje su dran nas/ drin rje su gsab ba'i phyir/ mchod pa byas pa dang / mtha' yas sems can rnams la phan gdags shing / bde bar bya ba'i ched du mdo sde 'di yongasu spel nas/ yon tan zad mi
125a4(rgyud): shes par byas pa leg so leg so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// 
125a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la dpal gyi lha mo chen mos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs ma lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i grong khyer nor ldan zhes bgyi ba
125a6(rgyud): mchis te/ grong khyer de las mi ring ba na/ me tog dam pa'i bsod nams kyi 'od ces bgyi ba'i kun dga' ra ba mchis pa de na/ gzhal med khang mchog dam pa rim che sna bdun las mngon par 'grub pa zhig
125a7(rgyud): mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rtag par de na gnas lags pas/ gang la la zhig 'bru rnam pa lnga gdugs gcig bzhin du 'phel ba dang / bang mdzod rnams rgyas shing 'tshal bas/ gus pas dang
125a8(rgyud): ba'i sems bskyed de/ khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis nas/ ba lang gaM lci bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te/ bdag gi gzugs rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa ri mor bris nas/ khrus legs
125b1(rgyud): par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ byug pa dam pas byugs te/ khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs nas/ bdag gi ched du gdugs re dus gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang mdo sde 'di'i mtshan
125b2(rgyud): brjod par sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri bo chen po che tog snang ba dpal gyi ri yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshalo zhes brjod nas me tog dang spos rnams thogs te/ zhal
125b3(rgyud): zas bda' ba sna tshogs sems rtse gcig tu dbul bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang spos dang / me tog dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang
125b4(rgyud): bza' ba dang / btung ba dag thogs te/ phyogs gzhan du gtor nas/ 'dre srin rnams la stsal bar bgyi/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i bden tshig gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab
125b5(rgyud): nas ci dang ci gnyer ba'i smon lam gdab par bgyi'o// gal te rdza skad smras pa bzhin du brdzun ma lags ma gsol ba btab pa don dang ldan par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de'i
125b6(rgyud): tshe dpal gyi lha mos dngos po de rig nas/ brtse ba'i bsam pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i khyim du nor dang 'bru rnams rab tu 'phel bar bgyi // de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g.yar drang bar dgyis te/ sngar
125b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas rin chen
125b8(rgyud): gtsug phud can la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas gser tog 'od la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas gser brgya'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag/ 
126a1(rgyud): / 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gdugs rin po che brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas sgron ma chen po'i 'od
126a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin po che chen po'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen tog la phyag 'tshalo// nub
126a3(rgyud): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gser
126a4(rgyud): 'od la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gser mdzod la/ phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa shums la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag
126a5(rgyud): 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshalo// de ltar sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pas phyag bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sngags
126a6(rgyud): bzlas te/ dpal gyi lha mo ma chen mo bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid nas/ sngags 'di'i mthus yongasu gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la phyag
126a7(rgyud): 'tshalo// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ pra ti puR+YA tsa re/ sa man+ta/ daR+sha ni/ ma hA bi hA ra ga ti/ sa man+te/ pi ta ma ma ni/ ma hA kA ra yaM pa ti/ bi sh+na pa ni/ sarba ar+d+ha sa man+ta nu/ pra pA re/ a yan d+haR+Ya ta/ ma hA b+ho ge na maH
126a8(rgyud): me tri/ u pa sing ha te/ ma hA kle sha/ su sang gri hi ha~M/ sa mAR+Sha/ a nu pA la ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing yongasu bzung nas/ bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ 
126b1(rgyud): bdag g.yar 'dren pa thos nas de'i thad du mchis te/ smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid do/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i tshig ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshig yang dag pa'i tsho
126b2(rgyud): bslu ba ma mchis pa'i tshig/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pas/ gang la la zhig sngags 'di yang dag par 'dzin cing / klog pa dang / 'don pa des
126b3(rgyud): gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sngar so shing bcas te/ dag par bkrus nas/ slang snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ spos dang / me
126b4(rgyud): tog dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bgyis te/ bdag nyid kyi dngos sdig bshags nas bdag dang sems can rnams smon pa myur du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yongasu
126b5(rgyud): bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par bya'o// khang pa cig gtsang mar bgyis pa 'am/ yang na dben pa'i gnas sam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis
126b6(rgyud): nas tsan ngan bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o// stan mchog gcig bting ste khe dan dang gdugs brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog dam pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang bkram ste/ sems rtse gcig tu sngags snga
126b7(rgyud): ma bzlas nas/ bdag der mchi bar re bar bgyi'o// bdag de'i tshe de la rje su sems shing lta bar bgyis pas// de'i khang par zhugs te stan la mchis nas/ de'i mchod la len par bgyis te/ de slan chad mi nges
126b8(rgyud): g.yar lam bdag mthong bar 'gyur bas/ ci dang ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gi sgo nas go bar bgyid do// grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ 'brog dgon pa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang
127a1(rgyud): yang rung ste/ ci dang ci smon pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid pas/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / ba glang dang / lug dang / 'bru rnams dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba/ 
127a2(rgyud): dang dgos rnams yid bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur zhing / bde ba'i longs spyod mchog la yongasu longs spyod par 'gyur lag so// de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchog dam pa thob nas kyang / skal
127a3(rgyud): ba mchog gang lags pa des dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing bdag la yang stsal bar bgyi'o// chos kyi 'dus pa rgya cher bshams nas/ bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams sbyar te/ spos dang / me tog gcal
127a4(rgyud): du bkram nas mchod par bgyi'o// mchod par bgyis nas/ mchod par bgyis pa'i zas lhag ma ci mchis pa btsongs te/ rin blangs nas yang mchod par bgyis na/ bdag nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu nge
127a5(rgyud): gnas nas/ gang zag de la bsrungs zhing skyob pa dang / phongs shing brel ba ma mchis pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi do// dus du su dbul phongs pa rnams la
127a6(rgyud): yang stsal bar bgyi zhing bdag gcig pu'i ched du ser snas phangs par mi bgyi'o// rtag par mdo sde'i 'di lhags nas rgyun chad pa ma mchis par mchod par bgyi ste/ bsod nams ci mchis pa de yang thams
127a7(rgyud): cad la yang btang zhing / byang chub tu yongasu bsngos nas/ 'khor ba la nges par 'byung zhing / myur du rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur bar smon par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo
127a8(rgyud): khyod kyis de ltar mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel nas/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka la phan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas pa leg so leg so// zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par
127b1(rgyud): rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ dpal gyi lha mos nor 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas sa'i lha mo bstan ma 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ 
127b2(rgyud): gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di nga ltar ram/ slang ma'i dus kyi tshe/ 
127b3(rgyud): gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ ri'am phug gam/ nags tshal dag na yang rung ste/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di spel bar bgyid na/ bcom
127b4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag der mchis nas mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / yongasu srung ba dang / yongasu sgrub par bgyis te/ rgya cher spel ba bgyid do// sa phyogs gang yang rung ba dag tu chos
127b5(rgyud): smra ba'i mkhan po'i ched du khri mthon po btsugs te/ mdo sde 'di 'chad par byed na/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas/ de ma mchis te de'i rkang pa nas
127b6(rgyud): spyi bos 'dengs par bgyid/ bdag chos thos par gyur nas kyang shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o// chos kyi ro thob pa'i dbang gis gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ mgu ba tshang
127b7(rgyud): ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur te/ bdag de lta bu'i phan yon thob pa nyid kyis/ sa chen po 'di yang dpag tshad brgya phrag brgya brgyad cu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la thug pa tshun chad sa'i bcud bams
127b8(rgyud): cad rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do// rgya mtsho bzhi tshun chad kyi sa chen po ji snyed pa de dag sa'i bcud rgyas shing rab tu gshin pas sngon kyang lhag pa dang / ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyid do// 
128a1(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na chu bo dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / ljon shing dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lo ma
128a2(rgyud): dang 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs ci mchis pa de dag kyang dbyibs mdzes shing yid du mchi ba dang / mang po kun gyis lta bar mos pa dang / kha dog dang / dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod du
128a3(rgyud): rung bar bgyid de/ sems can gang gis bza' ba dang / btung ba mchog de lta bu de dag la longs spyod pa rnams kyang tshe ring zhing kha dog dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing gzi byin
128a4(rgyud): 'phel ba dang / khro nang rnams mchis pa dang / sems kyi shes rab dpa' zhing ci yang rtsol rngo thogs par 'gyur lagaso// gzhan yang chen po 'di las ji tsam du yong su spyad par bgyi ba'i dngos
128a5(rgyud): po brgya stong ji snyed pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'dzam+bu'i gling rnams rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang / 
128a6(rgyud): mi rnams ngar zhing rgyas pa dang / gnod pa rnams ma mchis pas sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bde ba myong bar 'gyur lag so// de ltar lus dang sems kyi bde ba myong bar gyur nas kyang / 
128a7(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu gus pa bskyed nas/ gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyi zhing sngags brjod par smon par bgyi'o// 
128a8(rgyud): ca' slad du zhan/ bcom ldan 'das mang snga'ang bshad pa'i dbang gas bdag cag 'khar dang bcas pa thams cad la sman par 'gyur zhing / 'ad dang // kha ngag dang / mthu stabs dang / dpa' zhang gam byas dang / 
128b1(rgyud): gzhan yang chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po chen po de dag gang du chos 'chang pa'i gnas der yang mchis te/ sems can rnams kyi ched du mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di'i 'chad par gsol ba gdab
128b2(rgyud): par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di bshad pa'i dbang gis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la sman par 'gyur zhing / 'od dang / kha dog dang / mthu stobs dang / 
128b3(rgyud): dpa' zhing gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing sngon pas ches khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ba so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sa'i lha mo btan ma yang chos kyi ros tshim par
128b4(rgyud): gyur pa'i dbang gis 'dzam+bu'i gling dpag tshad bdun stong tshun chad sa thams cad bcud dang ldan pa dang / sngags bzhin du sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bde ba myong bar
128b5(rgyud): bgyid lag so// de lta bas na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sems can de dag gis kyang bdag gi drin gsab pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gdon mi za bar mdo sde 'di mnyan nas/ bkur sti
128b6(rgyud): dang rim gro dang / mchod pa dang / bla mar bgyis nas/ sngags pa brjod par bgyi'o snyam du bsam par bgyi'o// de ltar bsams nas kyang gnas nas byung ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
128b7(rgyud): khang khyim dang // dgon pa'i gnas gang du chos bshad pa'i 'dus pa der mchis te/ chos bshad pa'i mkhan po la spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// mdo sde 'di
128b8(rgyud): mnyan nas kyang so so nas rang gi gan su mchis te/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bdag cag deng shin tu zab cing bla na ma mchis pa'i chos gya nom pa thos nas/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi
129a1(rgyud): phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed yongasu bsdus par gyur to// mdo sde'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis bdag cag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang ma mchis shing
129a2(rgyud): mtha' ma mchis pa'i snyeng la mchod cing rim gro bgyis pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang bral bar gyur to// ma 'ongs pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong gi bar du yang rtag par mtho
129a3(rgyud): ris dang / mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar 'gyuraro zhes brjod par 'gyur// de'i tshe mi mang po de dag so so nas slar rang gi gan su mchis nas skye bo mang po rnams la mdo sde'i rgyal
129a4(rgyud): po 'di las gsungs pa'i dpe cig tsam mam/ le'u cig tsam mam/ sngon gyi gtam rgyud gcig tsam mam/ de bzhin gshegs pa cig/ gi mtshan tsam byang chub sems dpa' cig gi ming
129a5(rgyud): tsam tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam/ yang na tshig tsam zhig sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par ba gying dam tha na mdo sde 'di'i mtshan tsam zhig
129a6(rgyud): brjod par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de dag thams cad bcud dang ldan zhing / gzhan pas lhag par 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po las skye bar
129a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang rgya cher rab tu 'phel zhing rab tu rgyas par 'gyur bas/ seMn rnams shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyuro// rin po che dang nor mang bar 'gyur// sbyin pa legs
129a8(rgyud): par gtong bar 'gyur/ rtag par sems brtan zhing dkon mchog gsum la shin tu mngon par yid ches par 'gyur lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo
129b1(rgyud): brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can gang la la zhig gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam zhig thos par gyur na yang tshe 'phos
129b2(rgyud): pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang / lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyuro// sems can gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// khang khyim dag rab tu rgyan nas bla re gcig
129b3(rgyud): 'dre bar byed dam/ ba ngan rim gcig tsam sbyor bar byed na// rgyu de dang rkyen nges lha'i ris drug po dag tu ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur bas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog
129b4(rgyud): dam pa dag la yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur/ so so nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong dang phan tshun lhan cig rtse zhing nyin mtshan rtag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba bsam gyis
129b5(rgyud): mi khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la so'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya
129b6(rgyud): dang rkyen des na 'khor bzhi pa las gang la la zhig chos kyi stan la mchis nas/ chos 'di yang dag par ston pa na/ bdag gdugs mtshan du gang zag de la yongasu srung zhing bskyab par bgyid na/ ra
129b7(rgyud): gi lus mi ganga' bar bgyis nas/ chos kyi stan drung du mchis te/ de'i rkang pa nas 'degs par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di ni/ sen de dag gis sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma
129b8(rgyud): las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pas ma 'ja m+bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher 'phel zhing nub par mi 'gyur ba lagaso// sems can gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa de dag spang ma'i dus kyi tshe/ bskal pa bye ba/ 
130a1(rgyud): / khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du lha dang mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba cho ga la longs spyod par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang
130a2(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan
130a3(rgyud): mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang mi rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams cad la bde bar bgyid pa mchis te/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / 'khor bzhi
130a4(rgyud): po dag las gang la la zhig bdag gi lus yang dag par ma don sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des/ sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di yong su 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar smon pa thams
130a5(rgyud): cad yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do// nor dang rin po na 'i gter dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring ba'i sman dam pa gnyer ba dang / sems can gyi nang mang po gso
130a6(rgyud): ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra pham par bgyi ba dang / tha dad par smra ba rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// lus bkrus te/ gos sar pa
130a7(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos nas/ rtsa bting ba'i steng du mchis te/ ring bsrel dang / sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ yang na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'dug pa bsregs te/ me tog gto
130a8(rgyud): nas bza' ba dang / btung ba dag gis mchod pa bgyis te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la skar ma rgyal rdzogs pa na/ g.yar 'dren pa'i sngags 'di bzla bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru
130b1(rgyud): ku ru/ ku Tu ku ku to Tu to Tu/ khA ha bA ha/ sha ba 'i sha'i swAhA// bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'di 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag gsar
130b2(rgyud): 'dren par bgyis na/ bdag gis de'i ched du g.yar 'dren pa der mchi bar 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dngos po mngon sum du mngon
130b3(rgyud): par mthong zhing lhan cig gtam bgyi bar 'tshal na yang snga ma bzhin du cho ga bshams nas/ gzungs 'di bzlas par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ne/ kr-i lig k+Shan ti/ shi ra shi d+ha ri ha ha hi hi/ 
130b4(rgyud): ku ru bya swAhA// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig sngags 'di 'don pa na/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad babyas nas sngags snga ma yang 'dod bar bgyid na dag gdin mi 'tshal ngar lus mngon du
130b5(rgyud): bstan nas/ des ji ltar smon pa thams cad/ yongasu rdzogs par bgyid pas/ nams kyang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid do// gal te sngags 'di 'don par 'tshal na/ sngar lus srung
130b6(rgyud): ba'i sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ni shi ri/ ma sha ka min ti ku ti/ bud d+hi bud d+hi ri/ bi ti bi ti/ ku ku ti/ ba tsi ri swA hA// bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe/ tshon sna lnga'i
130b7(rgyud): skud ba blangs nas/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la bcings nas/ slan chang lus srung bar bgyis pas/ 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyuraro// gang la la zhig sems rtse
130b8(rgyud): gcig tu sngags 'di zlos par byed na khasams pa rnams yid bzhin du 'dub par 'gyur te/ bdag sho bo mi mchi ste bdag gi dang du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dgan mchog bzhugs pa nyid rab tu
131a1(rgyud): mkhyen par 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod yang dag pa'i bden tshig gi sngags kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dang / chos smra ba dag la
131a2(rgyud): yongasu srung bar byas pa legaso leg so// rgyu dang rkyen 'dis khyod bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyuraro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po
131a3(rgyud): las sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu
131a4(rgyud): 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo
131a5(rgyud): sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ga mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram/ slang ma'i dus
131a6(rgyud): gyi tshe grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ nags tshal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dge 'dun gnas pa'i gnas dag tu yang rung ste/ yang dag par
131a7(rgyud): bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis nas/ so so nas rang
131a8(rgyud): gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ ci rigs par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor de dag la yongasu bsrungs nas/ gnod pa rnams spangs te/ rtag par bde ba myong bar bgyid do// 
131b1(rgyud): skyes pa 'am khud med dam/ khye'u 'am bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid par bgyid dam/ tshig gcig tsam
131b2(rgyud): yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par bgyid dam/ mdo sde 'di las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam khyang
131b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' cig ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed nas/ gus par rim gro dang / mchod par bgyid na/ bdag gis yongasu srung zhing byin gyis brlabs nas/ gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis
131b4(rgyud): te sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par ba gyid do// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag gi ming yang dag she sa zhes bgyi ba'i rgyu dang rkyer gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan
131b5(rgyud): 'das nyid kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lags te/ bdag gi chos rig pa dang / bdag gi chos thams cad kyi ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad
131b6(rgyud): rnam pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / bye brag ji snyed pa thams cad gsal bar rtogs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa dang / 
131b7(rgyud): bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang / 
131b8(rgyud): bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes spyod yul rnams mngon par rtogs par gyur pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar chos thams cad yang dag par rig/ yang dag par gsal bar
132a1(rgyud): rtogs yang dag par khong du chud/ yang dag par so sor rtogs par bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang cen de'i slad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes
132a2(rgyud): bgyi ba lags te/ don de'i slad du bdag gis chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi spobs pa gsal zhing rgyan dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang mdangs spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug dang / lus kyi mthu stobs dang
132a3(rgyud): ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag par dran pa thob nas dpa' gong ma mchis pa dang // de'i lus la
132a4(rgyud): phan 'dogs shing / nyams pa ma mchis pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing rtag par dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma
132a5(rgyud): las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas/ bsod nams kyi las mngon par sgrub pa dag gi ched du 'jam+bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyural bar bgyid pas/ sems can
132a6(rgyud): de dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur zhing / slang ma'i dus kyi tshe/ yang bskal pa bye ba khrag
132a7(rgyud): khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i lha dang / mi'i bde ba myong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
132a8(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas// gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzang pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
132b1(rgyud): / yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs mchis te/ sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse ba'i slad du/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar snga bdag nyid kyis bshad
132b2(rgyud): par 'gyi'o// de nas sngags smras pa/ na mo bud d+hA ya na mo d+harmA ya na ma saM g+hA ya na mo brad+d+hA ya/ na ma sh+tsa turma hA rA dzA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ go ri ma hA gau bi ban+d+ha ma hA gan+d+ha ri/ dri 'i
132b3(rgyud): snang mo pa rje du ma kyi la rjeg su seman cas du myed sa la la pra shrI thA shA dam pa yin pa ldan/ ngas pa
132b4(rgyud): 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag gis 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rin po che ngo mtshar ba dag gi rim gro bgyi'o// gal te skyes pa dang
132b5(rgyud): bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan phreng gi rnam pa rnams yongasu gnyer bar bgyi nga na yang / bdag gi thams cad sbyar nas/ ji ltar smod pa bzhin du
132b6(rgyud): rgud cing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid// rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan pas sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ bdag myur du de'i thang du mchis nas/ thogs pa ma mchis par/ yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi'o// sngags 'ang
132b7(rgyud): 'don pa'i tshe/ cho ga rig par bgyis nas/ thog ma kho nar gnod sbyin yang dag shes kyi gzugs 'phang du chag bzhi lnga tsam mchis pasug par dgra snga thogs par mor bri bar bya'o// gzugs parnyam de'i mdung
132b8(rgyud): du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ bum pa bzhi sbrang rtsi'i chab bam bu ram gyi chab kyis dkang ste bzhag nas/ byug spos dang / phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba rnams kyang bkram par dgyi'o// 
133a1(rgyud): gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du thab gcig bgyis te/ de'i nang du sol ba'i zhugs stsal nas/ ma' dang yungs kar bsregs te/ snga ma'i sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyang bzlas nas/ 
133a2(rgyud): sngags lan re zhing lan cig bsregs na/ bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dngon chen po rang nyid drung du mchis nas/ lus mngon du bstan te/ sngags 'don pa'i mi de la khyod ci dang ci dgos pa dang / yid la ci 'dod pa'i
133a3(rgyud): dngos po gang yin pa smros shig ces 'dri bar bgyid do// bdag gis ji skad mchi ba bzhin yongasu gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi do// gal te gser dang / dngul dang / gter
133a4(rgyud): 'tshal bar gyur tam/ yang na lha'i drang srong du gyur pas// mamakha' la mchi bar 'tshal lam/ pa'i mig gis mngon par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / sems
133a5(rgyud): can thams cad la yid bzhin du rang dbang theb na gnyon mongs pa bcad de/ myur du rnam par grol ba thob pa la dgod par 'tshal na yang / thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// 
133a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ rig sngags 'di bshad de/ yang dag
133a7(rgyud): ba'i chos yongasu bsrungs nas/ bsod nams kyis mtha' yas pa rnams la phan btags pa legaso leg so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
