157a1(rgyud): / rab tu dka'// rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni// rnams kyang bdag 'dor byas pa'i drin mi shes// gzhan yang lus 'di ni mi brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa/ 
157a2(rgyud): 'jig su rung bas dgra dang 'dra ba// mi gtsang bas lung dang mtshungs pa yin pas// deng bdag gi lus 'dis yangs shing rgya che ba'i las mngon par bsgrubs nas skye shi'i rgya mtshor gru gzings
157a3(rgyud): chen po byas te/ 'khor ba yongasu spangs nas/ nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snya mo// gzhan yang 'di snyam du/ gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur ma/ 'di nyid 'bras dang / nang ma rungs pa tshad med pa dang / 
157a4(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin no// lus 'di ni bshang gci 'ba' shig dang ldan pa/ chu bur lta bur mi brtan pa/ srin bu mang po 'dus pa rtsa rgyus rus pa
157a5(rgyud): phan tshun 'brel pa/ shin tu yongasu skyo bar bya ba'i nyes dmig dang bcas pa yin pas/ de'i phyir deng bdag gis lus yongasu spang sa nas bla na med pa mthar phyin pa mya ngan las 'das
157a6(rgyud): pa yongasu btsal te/ mya ngan gyi nyes pa dang / mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'khrug pa gtan du spangs nas/ 'khor ba rgyun bcad de/ nyes pa rnams spangs nas/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis
157a7(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas/ bsod nams brgya stong mang pos rgyan pa/ thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi sku shin tu gya nom pa thob par bya'o// thob par
157a8(rgyud): gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi sman tshangad med pa btang bar bya'o snyas+ho// de'i tshe rgyal bu de shin tu brtul ba'i dpa' sran dang / smon lam chen po btab nas/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pas/ sems rtag shing
157b1(rgyud): 'phel bar gyur kyang phu po gnyis skrag cing spangs pas bar chad kyi bgegs byas nas/ smon pa mi 'grub par dogs pas/ phu bo gnyis la gcen gnyis slar gshegs shig bang ga re shig skar mchis
157b2(rgyud): so zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slar tshal gyi nang du zhugs nas/ stag mo'i drung du phyin te/ gos phung nas 'od ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ smon lam 'di skad btab bo// bdag ni chos mkhas
157b3(rgyud): sems can kun gyi phyir// bla med byang chub gnas ni gnyer bas na// snying rje chen po'i sems bskyang g.yo ba med// skye bos phangs pa'i lus ni gtong bar byed// byang chub nang med gdung ba med pas ma/ 
157b4(rgyud): blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu mos// khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun// deng bdag drangs nas bde la 'god par shog/ de nas rgyal bus tshig de skad smras nas stag
157b5(rgyud): mo rtogs pa'i mdun du lus dor te nyal ba dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' do'i byams pa dang / snying rje'i gzi byin gyi mthus su/ chos ci yang byed ma nu'o/ byang chub sems dpa'
157b6(rgyud): lta bu mthong ba dang / ri mthon po'i steng du 'dzegs te lus bor nas 'di snyam du stag mo 'di ni/ nyam chung zhing rmya bas bdag la bza' bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nas langs te/ mtshon btsal
157b7(rgyud): yang ma rnyed pas/ 'od ma skam po'i tshal bas lkog mar khrag phyung ste/ mthar gyis stag mo'i drung du nye bar bsnyen pa dang / de'i tshe 'di ltar rlung gis chu bskyod pa bzhin du sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu
157b8(rgyud): g.yor bar gyur/ nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis bsgribs pa bzhin du 'od dang mi ldan pas/ phyogs bcu kun tu mun nag tu gyur nas/ lha rnams kyis kyang me tog dam pa dang / spos mchog dam pa'i char yang / 
158a1(rgyud): mngon par phab pas/ tshal gyi nang du kun tu khyab cing gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams kyis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang / rje su yi rang ba'i
158a2(rgyud): sems bskyed nas/ sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo // zhes bsngags pa brjod do// thams cad kyis skyes bu chen po leg so legaso zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ tshig su bcad de smras pa// skyes bu chen
158a3(rgyud): po yongasu skyob pa snying rje'i sems bskyed nas// bu gcig bzhin du sems can mnyam par lta// rab dpa' dga' chen sems la 'jungs med pas// lus spangs phongs skyob bsod nams dpag par dgal
158a4(rgyud): nges par rtag bde gya nom gnas phyin nas// 'khor ba 'ching ba mang po gtan du spong // ring por mi thogs byang chub 'bras thob nas// nyer zhi bde ba skye mched mngon rtogs 'gyur// de'i tshe stag
158a5(rgyud): mo ltogs pa des byang chub sems dpa'i lkog ma nas khrag zag pa mthong ba dang / khrag bldags te/ sha ma lus pa zos pas rus pa 'ang 'a zhig lus par bya'o// de nas rgyal bu chen pos sa
158a6(rgyud): g.yos pa mthong ba dang / nu bo la smras pa/ sa chen ri klung kun kyang rab tu g.yos// phyogs kun mun nag nyi ma'i 'od mi ldan// lha yi me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab nas// 'di ni nu bos nges par lus spangs
158a7(rgyud): rtags/ rgyal bu 'bring pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang // tshigasu bcad de smras pa// stag mo lus ltogs shin tu zham chung ba// bkres gzer bu phrug bza' ngogs mthong nas ni// sems can chen po skye
158a8(rgyud): ba bdag thos nas// nu bos lus btang deng bdag the tshom 'tshal// de nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas/ smre sngags bton te ngus nas/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu slar stag mo'i drung du
158b1(rgyud): khyim te/ nu bo'i gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal rus pa dang sgra ni kun tu 'phor khrag babs pas ni rdzab tu gyur nas/ sa bzhi kun tu khyab par gyur pa mthong ba dang / brgyal nas rang gi lus kyang
158b2(rgyud): gzungs ma rus pas/ rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te/ ring zhig lon nas dran pa slar thob pa dang / langs nas lag pa teg ste rab tu ngus nas smre sngags bton pa/ bdag cag nu bo byang sdug
158b3(rgyud): mdzes// pa ma gnyis ka lhab par byams// ci phyir lhan cig phyir byung nas// lus spangs slar ni ldog ma gyur// gal te pha mas dris gyur na// bdag cag lan ni ji skad gdab// lhan cig srog ni btang bla ra// rang gi lus
158b4(rgyud): ni ci phyir bzhag// de nas rgyal bu gnyis smre sngags bton te ngus nas/ yid la gcags bzhin du mngar gyis spangs te dong ngo // de'i tshe rgyal du tha chungs kyis khrid pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams phan tshun cig la cig
158b5(rgyud): 'di skad du/ rgyal bu gang na yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rogs zhes smras par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal bu'i btsun mo yang tog mthon po'i steng du nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ lhas ngan pa'i mtshan mthong
158b6(rgyud): ba 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis gzhan gyis bcang ba dang / so ltung ba dang / phug ron gyi phru gu gsum thob pa lasacig ni khras khyer// gnyis ni sngangs shing skra ga par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur to// sa g.yos
158b7(rgyud): nga'i tshe/ btsun mo sad de/ sems la mya ngan chen po skyes nas// 'di skad du smra so// ci'i phyir dang nis chen rab tu g.yos// chu klung nags tshal ljon shing kun kyang 'gul// nyi ma 'od med g.yos shong bsgrings pa 'dra/ 
158b8(rgyud): mig 'gul nu g.yo sngon chad yong mi 'dra// snying la mangs pog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir// lus kun rab tu g.yo zhing bde ba ci yang med// bdag gis rmi lam lhas ngan mthong bas ma/ nges par sngon med
159a1(rgyud): lhas ngan dngos po yod// btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis las nu zho zags pa dang / 'di snyam du 'di ni gdon mi za bar lhas ngan gyi dngos po ston pa yin no snya mo// de'i tshe nang 'khor ma zhig phyi rol gyi
159a2(rgyud): mi rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed do// zhes zer ba thos pa dang / sems la shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa skyes nas/ pho brang gi nang du song ste/ btsun mo la 'di skad ces smraso// lha mo mkhyen lags pa/ slang rol
159a3(rgyud): byi mi rnams las kun tu so sor btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed ces mchi ba thos lags so// de nas btsun mo des tshig de skad smras pa thos pa dang / mya ngan chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin
159a4(rgyud): du rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to// lha chen po bdag gis slad rol gyi mi rnams la 'di skad du/ bdag gis bu sdug tha chung stor ces mchi ba thos leg so// rgyal pos tshig de thos pa
159a5(rgyud): dang / shin tu skrag par gyur pas/ bsnangs bzhin du smre tshig 'di skad du kye chung sdug bsnga'o// deng nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba skor bar gyur to zhes smras nas/ mchim phyis te btsun mo la spro ba bskyed nas
159a6(rgyud): 'di skad du bzhin bzangs khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ da deng lhan cig phyir byung ste bu sdug btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po btsun mo dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/ so sor
159a7(rgyud): gyes te phyogs kun tu btsal ba las/ ring po ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nye bar 'ongs te/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha rgyal bu bzhugs zhes thos pas/ thugs ngan mi mdzad du gsol// rgyal bu tha chungs/ 
159a8(rgyud): ning dung mi ganga' lag so// rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang / smre sngags bton ras/ 'di skad du kyi hud nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to// zhes smras par gyur to// dang po bu yod pa na dga' ba chung // phyis ni bu stor rje
159b1(rgyud): na sdug bsngal che// gal te nga du srog ni srar thod na// nga yi lus shi sdug bsngal ci yang med// btsun mos de skad thos pa dang // dper na mangs phog bzhin du mya ngan gyi kun tu dkris par gyur pas/ smre tshig 'di
159b2(rgyud): skad ces smra so// bdag gi bu gsum 'khor dang bcas par ni// nags tshal dong ste lhan cig rtse ba las// bu sdug tha chus gcig pu ma 'ongs pas// nges par bral ba'i ltas ngan dngos po yod 'gyur ba// de'i
159b3(rgyud): 'og tu yang blon po 'bring po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa las rgyal pos blon po de la du sdug gang na 'dug ces pa smras pa las/ blon po 'bring pos de yid la bcags te ngus pas/ lkog ma dang phye yang
159b4(rgyud): bskams nas tshig 'byin cing lan 'debs kyang ma nus pa dang / btsun mos 'di skad ces dris so// bu chung da ltar gang na myur du smos// bdag gi lus gdung kun tu bsregs par gyur// myos
159b5(rgyud): 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi sems nyid stor// bdag gi brang ni di ring gas snyam byed// de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongasu btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol
159b6(rgyud): shes par byas pa dang / rgyal po dang btsun mos gtam de thos nas/ smre zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du lus yongasu btang ba'i sa phyogasu myur zhing rings par dong ste/ 'od ma'i tshal byang chub sems dpa' lus
159b7(rgyud): yongasu btang ba'i gan su phyin nas/ nus pa rnams kun tu 'thor ba mthong ba dang / cig char sa la 'gyel te/ shi ba dang 'dra bar rgyal bar gyur pas/ de dper na ljang drag pos ljon shing chen po 'grel pa bzhin du sems
159b8(rgyud): rmongs shing dran pa stor bas/ shes pa ci yang med par gyur to// de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun tu gtor ba dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mo ring zhig lon nas/ gdod dran pa thob par gyur to// de nas lag pa
160a1(rgyud): // bteg ste/ 'dug nas smre tshig gi smras pa// kye chung bu sdug mdzes pa'i mtshan ldan pa// ci'i phyir 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal sngar 'ongs gtses// gal te khyod kyi mdun du bdag shi ma/ 'i 'dra'i sdug
160a2(rgyud): bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur// de nas btsun mo myos shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas kyang skra long long por gyur te/ lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs nas// nya skams la 'gyel ba bzhin du sa la 'gre ste/ 
160a3(rgyud): bcu stor ba bzhin du dus nas smre tshig smras pa/ bdag gi bu ni mus btubs na// nus pa lhag ma sa la gtor// mya ngan sme ba rang mi theg kyi hud du ni sus bsad na// mya ngan dngos po 'di 'dra mthong // bdag snying rje
160a4(rgyud): ni ma yin nam// ci yi phyir na gas ma gyur// bdag gi rmi lam nu ma gnyis// / gzhan dag gis ni bcad pa dang // so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na// deng ni sdug bsngal chen po myong // phug ron phrug gu gsum
160a5(rgyud): las ni/ cig ni khras khyer mthong bas na// deng ni bu sdug sbyor gyur pas// lhas ngan ston la mi bden med// de nas rgyal po chen po de sa rkun mo dang / bu gnyis dang bcas par brtse bar btugs
160a6(rgyud): te dus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i bzhag pa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bsdus te/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag go// kun dga' bo khyod
160a7(rgyud): kyis 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de'i ring bsrel yin par rig par bya'o// yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang
160a8(rgyud): ldan pa'i tshe na yang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu yang rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu bskyabs nas phan btags te/ nges par 'byung ba thob par byas
160b1(rgyud): nas nga ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad zad nas bag chags kyi lhag med de/ lha dang mi yi ston par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas/ sems can re ro'i phyir yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du/ sems cad
160b2(rgyud): dmyal ba dang / gzhan dag tu gnas te/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang du blangs nas skye shi dang / nyom mongs pa'i 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba 'thob par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de nas bcom
160b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal gang sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// bskal pa grangs med tshad med snyed// nges 'ga' yul gyi rgyal po byas// rtag par sbyin pa che ba
160b4(rgyud): btang dang shin tu 'phangs pa'i lus btang bas// 'khor ba las ni nges byung ste// byang chub dam pa phyin par snom// sngon byung yul chen zhig tu ni// yul bdag shing rta che zhes bya// rgyal bu
160b5(rgyud): dpa' bo zhes bya ba// rtag par sbyin gtong ser sna med// de la phu ngo gnyis yod de/ sgra chen lha chen zhes bya ba// gsum po lhan cig phyir byung ste// mthar gyis ri dang nag tshal phyir// stab mo
160b6(rgyud): bkres pas nyen mthong nas// 'di 'dra'i sems ni bskyed par gyur// stag mo bkres mes rab bsregs kyang // gzhan bzar rung ba ci yang med/ skyes chen 'di 'dra mthong nas ni// de yis bu ni zos ngogs phyir// 
160b7(rgyud): chags med lus ni rab btang nas// bu skyabs rmas pa med par byas// sa chen dang ni ri rnams kyang // dus gcig thams cad rab tu g.yos// chu klung rgya mtsho shin tu 'khrug/ rlabs chu dag ni gyed du 'bab// gnas
160b8(rgyud): sa 'od ni stor bas na/ mun nag ci yang mthong ba med/ nags tshal dgon pa'i gcan par rnams// 'bung rgyu ba rnams ni yong du spangs// bu gnyis ci'i phyir ma log ces/ mya ngan rtse ba'i sdug bsngal skyes/ 
161a1(rgyud): / g.yog 'khor mang po rnams dang ni// nags tshal kun tu yongasu btsal// spun gnyis lhan cig rab 'grogs te// ri zab na ga su phyin nas ni// phyogs bzhir bltas kyang mi ma mthong // 
161a2(rgyud): stag mo mthong ba'i gnas stong du// ma dang bu bdun bcas par ni// thams cad khrag gis kha bskus dang // rus pa stag mo sgra yi rnams// sa la kun tu 'thor ba mthong // gzhan yang khrag ni zags pa rnams// 
161a3(rgyud): 'od ma'i tshal kun 'gags pa dag/ phu bo gnyis kyis mthong nas ni// sems la 'jigs skrag chen po skyes// gnyis ka nga rgyal nas sa la 'gyel// 'khrugs myos ci yang mi dran pas// sa rdul dag gis lus
161a4(rgyud): kun gos// rnam shes drug ni dran pa nyams// rgyal bu g.yog ni mang po rnams// de tshe sems la mya ngan skyes// chu gtor dran pa thob nas kyang // lag bteg skad ces byung ste dus// byang chub sems dpa'i lus
161a5(rgyud): btang ste// byams pa'i ma ni pho brang nang // bud med lnga brgya rnams dang ni// lhan cig longs spyod myong ba las// btsun mo dam pa'i ru ma gnyis// rang gi ru zho zags gyur pas// lus kun
161a6(rgyud): khab kyis phug pa bzhin// shin tu sdug bsngal rab tu byed// bu sgor 'du shes skyes pas na// mya ngan zug rngu sems la zug/ rgyal po chen po zhes byas nas// sdug bsngal dngos po de dag bshad// cho nges sme ba
161a7(rgyud): mi bzod pas// brtse ba'i skad kyis rgyal po la// rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod// deng bdag sdug bsngal chen po skyes// nu bo gnyis ni rang byung bas// bkab kyang bsam pa bzhin ma grub// khab kyis lus kun phug
161a8(rgyud): pa bzhin// mya ngan brang ni gas la thug/ bdag ni g.yar lam snga ltas ngan// nges par bu sdug gtong bar gyur// lhas ni bdag gi srog skyobs la// bu ni gum gson mkhyen par mdzod// g.yar lam phug ron
161b1(rgyud): gsum mthong ba// chung ngu de ni bu sdug lags// khras ni phrogs te 'tshal bas na// mya ngan rdzogs par gsol ba dka'// deng bdag mya ngan mtshor bying bas// 'chi bar 'gyur ba ring mi thogs// bu srog mi gson
161b2(rgyud): glo ba chung // myur ba nyid du btsal bar gsol// gzhan yang sdang rol ma rnams las/ bu chung ma rnyed thos pas na// deng bdag sems ni rab mi bde// lhas ni bdag la brtse bar mdzod // btsun mos de skad smras
161b3(rgyud): nas ni// lus btags sa la rab tu brtabs// rab tu brtse bas sems brgyal myos// rab rmongs shes pa ci yang med// nang 'khor bud med btsun mo de// brgyang te sa la 'gyel mthong nas// skang cher phyung
161b4(rgyud): ste rab tu dus// mya ngan sngangs skrag gnas kyang stor// rgyal pos pa tshig de thos pasam// mya ngan rang nyid gzung ma nus// blon po thams/ cang bkug nas ni// bu sdum tshol ba yongasu bkye
161b5(rgyud): thams cad grong khyer phyir byung ste// de dag de dag kun tu btsal// du nas mi mi mang po la// rgyal bu gang na yod ces smras// da ltar gson nam 'on te shi/ gang du song ba su yis shes// ji ltar byas
161b6(rgyud): na mthong gyur nas// bdag cag mya ngan bsal bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po thams cad kun// rgyal bu de ni shi zer bas// thos pa thams cad rab tu gdung // smre sngags sdug bsngal brjod par dga'// de tshe rgyal po
161b7(rgyud): shing ca che/ tshangs skyes nas stan las langs// btsun mo'i drung du nyer song ste// de yi lus la chus kyang gtol// btsun mo chus ni gtor bas na// ring zhig lon nas dran pa thob/ rab stes rgyal po la zhus pa/ 
161b8(rgyud): bdag bu ltar gang na mchis// rgyal pos btsun mo la bsgo ba// ngas ni pho nya mang bkye ste// phyogs bzhir rgyal bu tshol bcug ma da dung gtam skyel yongs ma 'ongs// rgyal pos btsun mo yang bsgo ba/ 
162a1(rgyud): khyod ni mya ngan ma byed par// re shig rang nyid bde bar byos// lhan cig phyir byung btsal bar bya// de nas rgyal po btsun mo bcas// bzhon pa zhon nas mdun du chas// smra ba'i skad kyis
162a2(rgyud): cho nges btab// gdung sems me ni 'bar ba 'dra// ya rabs ma rabs brgya stong rnams// rgyal po'i rjesu grong khyer byung // brtse ba'i du sgra mi chad par// so sor rgyal bu yongasu btsal// rgyal pos bu sdug
162a3(rgyud): btsal ba'i phyir// mig gis phyogs bzhir bltas pa las// skra bshig khrag gis lus bskas te// lus kun rdul gyis gos pa dang // dus nas mdun bcad 'ong ba yi// mi zhig kyang ni mthong bar gyur// 
162a4(rgyud): rgyal pos ltas ngan de mthong nas// lhag par mya ngan skyes par gyur// rgyal pos lag pa gnyis bteg nas// brtse bas ngus te bkag ma nus// blon mar blon po chen po zhig rings brtabs rgyal
162a5(rgyud): bo drung 'ongs nas// rgyal po de la 'di skad smras// lha mi thA gas ngan mi mdzad gsol// lha yi thugs brtse sras bu de//  du rnyed par ma gyur kyang / ring por mi thogs phyin par mchi/ 
162a6(rgyud): lha ni thugs ngan mi mdzad gsol// rgyal po yang ni song ba las// blon po 'bring po 'ongs pa mthong // blon po rgyal po drung 'ongs nas// dus te rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal bu gnyis ni bzhugs pa yang
162a7(rgyud): mya ngan zhugs kyis yongasu gdungs// rgyal bu tha chungs gang lags pa// de ni mi rtag pa yis med// bu btsas stag mo lhogs pa zhig bu 'tshal snyam pa gzigs nas ni// rgyal bu sems can chen po
162a8(rgyud): yis dathugs rje chen po'i sems bskyed de// bla med lam ni gnyer ba dang // mang po thams cad bzla ba'i sngab/ byang chub mchog la 'du shes bcings/ shin tu za ba yangs rgya mtsho bzhin 'i mtho rtse
162b1(rgyud): la 'dzegs nas ni// stag mo lhogs mdun skur yang bor// nyam chung 'tshal rngo ma thogs nas// 'od mas mgur du khrag phyung bas// rgyal bu'i sku ni 'tshal bas na// sku mdung lhag ma tsam zhig lus
162b2(rgyud): de tshe rgyal po btsun mor bcas// de skad thos nas brgyal bar gyur// sems mi mya ngan mtshor bying ste// nyon mongs me yis rab tu bsregs// blon pos tsan ngam chu dag gis// rgyal po btsun mo gtor
162b3(rgyud): bas ma/ cig char langs nas rab tu ngus// lag bteg brang dag la yang brdungs// blon po chung ngu 'ongs nas ni// rgyal po de la 'di skad smras// bdag gis rgyal bu gnyis po ni// tshal na brgyal bar gyur
162b4(rgyud): pa mthong // bdag gis chab grang gtor bas na// dran pa cung zad thob par gyur// phyogs bzhi dag ni gzigs pas na// rab tu 'bar me kun khyab 'dra// skad cig bzhengs kyang slar yang
162b5(rgyud): 'gyel// cho nges bdag nyid 'dzin mi byed// phyag ba ga brtse ba'i tshig dag gis// gcung gi ya mtshan bsngags par mdzad// rgyal pos de skad thos nas kyang // mya ngan me yis lhag par
162b6(rgyud): bcos// btsun mos rab tu ngus nas ni// skad cher phyung ste 'di skad smras// bdag gi bu sdug lhag par byams pa de// mi rtag srin po dag gis ming par gyur/  ltar bu gnyis lus par gyur pa yang // mya
162b7(rgyud): ngam me yis rab bsregs ston yang rmongs// bdag deng ri drung dag tu myur song la// sgo bskyed srog gi lhag ma bsrung bar bya// de nas bzhon zhon lam du myur zhugs nas// rtse gcig sems kyis lus spangs brag
162b8(rgyud): drang song // bu gnyis yid bcags drang brdungs spyod tshul nyams// 'gro bzhin du ba dag dang lam du phrad// pha mas pang blangs mya ngan smre sngags pa ton// cig char lus btang ri dang nags su dong // byang chub
163a1(rgyud): / sems dpas lus spangs nas phyin nas// lhan cig 'dus nas rab dus sdug bsngal che// rgyan phreng bkrol te sring tshim dus nas mi/ byang chub sems dpa'i rus bu lhag ma bsdus// skye bo lang
163a2(rgyud): pos lhan cig mchod pa byas// rin chen sna bdun mchod rten brtsigs nas ni// ring bsrel de ni sbrel gyi nang du bzhag/ mya ngan bcas bzhin slar ni grong khyer dong // kun dga' la ni bka' stsal pa// sngon byung
163a3(rgyud): sems can chen po ni// shAkya thub pa nga yin pas// gzhan yin snyam du bsam mi bya// rgyal po zas gtsang yab yin te// btsun mo nga yum sgyu 'phrul yin// rgyal bu chen po byams pa yin// rgyal bu 'bring po
163a4(rgyud): 'jam dpal yin// stag mo skye dgu'i bdag mo yin// bu lnga dge/ sdong lnga po yin// cig ni mo 'gal chen po'i bu// cig ni shA ri'i bu yin/ ngas ni khyed cag thams cad la// sngon gzhan par btags pa
163a5(rgyud): yi gtam// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bshad// sangs rgyas 'grub rgyu 'di slob byos// byang chub sems dpas lus btang che// smon lam rgya chen 'di skad btang // bdag lus rdul pa
163a6(rgyud): lhag ma yis// ma 'ongs sems can phan 'dogs shog/ 'di ni lus btang gnas yin te// rin cher sna bdun mchod rten de// lo ni tshad med bar du gams// de nas sa 'og bying bar 'gyur// sngon gyi smon lam
163a7(rgyud): mthu stobs kyis// rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can zlos// lha mi kun la phan gdags phyir// sa las 'phags te byung ba yin// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon rgyud 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye bo'i tshogs
163a8(rgyud): tshad med grangs med pa snyed yongasu gdung ba dang / dga' ba chen po skyes te// sngon mang nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo // zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
163b1(rgyud): tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la yang bka' stsal pa/ nga ni drin lan glan pa'i phyir// gus pas phyag byas pa yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par bsdus
163b2(rgyud): ba dang / mchod chen de yang slar sa'i 'og tu bying bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lus yongasu btang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / 
163b3(rgyud): de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med
163b4(rgyud): pa snyeng so so nas rang gi zhing khams nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/ yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la
163b5(rgyud): phyag byas nas/ sems rtse gcig tu thal mo sbyar te/ mgrin gci ga tu tshogasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog ldan// 'od zer kun
163b6(rgyud): gsal gser gyi ri bo 'dra// rnam dag rab mnyen pad+ma dag dang mtshungs// mtshan mchog dam pa tshad med kun tu bkod// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis rang rgyan te// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongasu rdzogs/ 
163b7(rgyud): dam pa rnam brgyang dbang pa 'thun mdzad pas// ka la bang ka' sgra spags ku 'od zer rab gsal dpe zla yod ma mchis/ dri bral dper ra rnam dag rdza la 'dra// gsung dbyangs rab dang shin tu gya nor pas
163b8(rgyud): seng ge bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dam pa rnam brgyad dbang po 'thun mdzad pas// ka la bing ka'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mtshan mchog sku rgyan pas// 'od zer
164a1(rgyud): / yur tshogs dri ma yongs mi mnga' mkhyen blo rab gsal dper na rgya mtsho 'dra// yon tan rgya chen na mkha' dag dang mtshungs// yongs rdzogs 'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dkang / 
164a2(rgyud): rkyen ni ji bzhin seM ni sgrol bar mdzad// nyon mongs srid pa'i bag chags kun bsal nas// chos kyi sgron ma rtag par rgyun mi 'chad// thugs brtses seni dag la phan 'dogs pas// da ltar slad ma'i dus tshe bde
164a3(rgyud): ba stsol/ rtag par ngon mchog dam pa rab bshad nas// yang dag rab dben mya ngan 'das la 'god// bcom ldan bdud rtsi chos mchog rab bstan nas/ bdud brtsi'i gya nom don ni stsal mdzad pas// bdud rtsi'i
164a4(rgyud): grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas// bdud rtsi'i 'dus ma byas kyi bde la 'god// rtag par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po nas// sdug bsngal sems can thams cad thar bar mdzad// de dag bde ba shul du rab
164a5(rgyud): bcud de// de bzhin bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab stsol// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho zab la yangs// dpe ni mang po dag gis rig mi 'gyur// rtag par kun la thugs rje cher gzigs pas
164a6(rgyud): thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus dag ni rgyan mi 'char// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar du ni// lha mi thams cad lhan cig dpag bsams kyang // cha shas tsam yang rig
164a7(rgyud): par yong mi 'gyur// bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las// thigs pa 'ga' zhig bsngags pa brjod pa yi// bsod nams de dag skye dgu yongs bsngos nas// thams cad byang chub 'dras bu myur thob
164a8(rgyud): smon/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ legaso leg so// khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis/ 
164b1(rgyud): sems can la phan 'dogs shing // sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher byed par 'gyur bas sdig pa rnams yongasu byang nas/ bsod nams tshad med pa snyed skye bar 'gyuraro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par
164b2(rgyud): rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i rtog
164b3(rgyud): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dpus mo g.yas pa'i lha pa sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis
164b4(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa// thub pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan rdzog sa shing // yon tshad ma mchis pas su rab rgyan/ rnam dag rgya che ser blta mos pas// nyi ma stong bzhin 'od kyis snang
164b5(rgyud): bar mdzad// kha dog mtha' yas 'od ni rab tu rgyas// rin chen bang ma'i phung bzhin mtshan rnams mdzes// dper rang dugs shar rnam mkha' snang bzhin bgyid// kha dog dkar gsal gas
164b6(rgyud): gyi mdog kyang gnon// gser gyi ri bzhin 'od kyis gsal mdzad pas// zhing ni brgya stong mang po kun tu khyab// seM ni sdug bsngal tshad med zhi mdzad nas// bde ba dam pa mtha' yas stsal bar mdzang // mtshan rnam
164b7(rgyud): phun tshogs rnam dag rab mdzes pas// sen blta mos skyo ba yongs ma mchis// dbu ska rab mnyen kha rog me tog bsdus pa 'dra// dges dang btang snyoms chen po dag pas brgyan// byams dang thugs rje dag
164b8(rgyud): ni pur sum tshogs// mtshan dang dpe byad dam pa'ab mdzes pa// byang chub yan lag chos la grub pa lags// bcom ldan bsod nams par yon mang btang bas// de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob// yon dam
165a1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs rab rgyas pa / 'od kyis ning ni brgya stong snang la mdzad/ bcom ldan po me shin tu rdzogs pas ma/ per na gdurgyas kyis rnam pa kum byab 'dra/ bcom ldan rab
165a2(rgyud): bzhin du yon tan ldan// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gser zhal dam pa rab tu mdzes// tshems dkar btams pa'i dung gi kha dog 'dra// bcom ldan zhal mdzes dper zla yod ma mchis
165a3(rgyud): smin mtshams pa spu rtag par g.yasu 'khyil// 'od mnyen dkar gsal chu shes ngag dang mtshungs// dper na zla ba na mkha'i khams gnas 'dra// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog
165a4(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas/ thams cad la phan 'dogs par 'gyur zhing / gang dag khong du ma chud pa de dag
165a5(rgyud): kyang rjes su 'thun par rnal 'byor sgom pa la slob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bsngag
165a6(rgyud): pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / de nas byang chub shing gi lha mos kyang tshigasu bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// bcom lngan rnal dag blo la gus
165a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// yang dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal// chos sbyin spong ba'i blo la gus phyag 'tshal// khye ma ngo mtshar bcom ldan mtha' yas spyod// kye ma mthong dka' u dum par 'dra// kye mngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i
165a8(rgyud): ri rgyal 'dra/ kye mngo mtshar bde gshegs 'ang tshang med/ kye ma ngo mtshar kha sbyar smon lam me/ khyem ngo ma char shA'i ma nyi ma 'das// 'di 'dra'i ringo sde son mchog bkas bshad nas/ brtse bas skye dgu rnams la
165b1(rgyud): pan 'dogs par mdzad / thub par ba ben dbang po ma'am 'jog pas/ Sha bani mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshegs/ rab den gzungs kyi sgo la rab zhugs pas/ 'ang dben spyong yul zang mo dag kyang mkhyen dang gnyis
165b2(rgyud): gtso bo rang dben bzhugs pas na// 'am thos slob ma lus kyang de bzhin stong / chos rnams thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pas// sems can thams cad kyang mi stong zhing dben/ bdag mi rtag tu bcom ldan dran par bgyid// 
165b3(rgyud): bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan mthong bar mos// bdag ni rtag tu gus sems bskyed pas na// rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs dang 'jam// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis ras// rtag par zhal balnga
165b4(rgyud): sems kyis mi spong smon// rab gdung du sems par chad ma mchis pas// rtag par rim gro bgyid kyang skyo mi bgyid// bcom ldan thugs rje'i thugs ni rab bskyed nas mngangs ldan 'al ni bdag gis
165b5(rgyud): rtag mthong mdzad// bcom ldan tan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas/ chag par lha mi dag ni bsgral bar bgyi// U ni rang bzhin rna ngag rnamakha' 'dra/ sgyu ma sdig rgya rab kyi rdzab mdungs// bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das
165b6(rgyud): pa'i chos bshad nas/ yon tan phung po thams cad bskyed par smon// bcom ldan rnam ngag spyod yul byams pa dang / bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul bsam mi khyab// nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal ba mi 'gyur zhing gdang srong
165b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i dpog mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la thugs brtsems// thugs rje chen po'i sku ni chab mthong sngon/ las gsum ngal med byams gtso mchod nas ni// myur du nges 'byung yang dag
165b8(rgyud): mtha' phyogs sngon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa brjod nas tshangs pa'i dngangs kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis nga'i yang dag pa'i mi btsun pa'i chos kyi
166a1(rgyud): sku rnam par dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ bdag gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir// mtshan mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsgrags pa leg so leg so// bsod nams 'dis khyod myur
166a2(rgyud): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing // se thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur la// gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i
166a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyuraro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// 
166a4(rgyud): de ras lha mo spobs pa chen po stan las langs te// gus pas thal mo sbyar nas yang dag pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
166a5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa// sku yang dag par gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/ mgur rung gi dbyings dang zhal zla ba nyab lta bu spyan pad+ma sngon po dang mtshungs pa/ spros dmar zhing bzang ga/ chu shes
166a6(rgyud): gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ shangs kyi dbyibs mtho zhing drang bas/ gser gyi gar bu bcad pa lta bur gyur/ dkar zhing thags bzang bas/ me tog ku mu daM dang mtshungs/ 'od kyis kun tu snang bar mdzad pas/ nyi ma brgya stong lta
166a7(rgyud): bur gyur pa/ 'od kyi kha dog kun tu khyab pa/ 'dzam bu gser 'dra ba'i tshigs gsung la mo cing 'khrul pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang dag par bstan nas/ byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par
166a8(rgyud): 'byed gzugs rtag tu rnam par dag cing thugs kyi mos pa yang de bzhin du gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang spyod yul rnams dag par gyur pa/ spyod lam ma lags pa spangs pas/ gshegs shing
166b1(rgyud): bzhugs pa dag la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba// lo drug dka' ba mdzang nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum bskor ba/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongasasu bzlas nas/ pha rol gyi 'gran du phyin par mdzad pa/ sku'i
166b2(rgyud): mtshan yongasu rdzogs pa/ n+ya gro d+ha'i ljon shing lta bur gyur pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu bsgoms pas/ phrin las rnam pa gsum la sbyor mi mnga' ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas/ bdag dang gzhan gyi
166b3(rgyud): don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa gang ci gsung yang rung ste/ rtag par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar mdzad pa/ don ma mchis par mi gsung ba/ shAkya'i rigs kyi nang nas seng ge chen por gyur pas rab tu brtan cing
166b4(rgyud): dpa' ga/ rnam par thar pa brgyad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la phyag 'tsha'o// deng bdag gi nyams kyis ci tsam lcogs pa'i rje su de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs las cung zad
166b5(rgyud): tsam zhig bsngags pa brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na snang bus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal ba dang 'dra yang / bsod nams do/ dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan du spangs nas/ bla
166b6(rgyud): mamed pa'i lam mngon par grub par smon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis yun ring po nas bsgoms pa las spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur nas/ deng pa'i
166b7(rgyud): yon tan rgya cher bsnga ba rje pa la gso leg so// 'di'i dbang gis khyod myur du bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo mngon par rtogs nas/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ thams cad la rgya cher ban
166b8(rgyud): 'dogs par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las lha mo spobs pa cheran mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// 
167a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshang med sbed rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ngas
167a2(rgyud): bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad de/ thob pa'i chos shin tu zab pa/ byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa gang yin pa de mi khyed la yang dag par bstan zin na/ 
167a3(rgyud): khyed cag la su zhig rab tu brtul ba'i sems bskyed nas/ nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gus pas/ yongasu bsrungs nas/ rgya cher yang dag par spel te/ yang dag pa'i
167a4(rgyud): chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par byed de/  nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu dang / lha'i 'khor bal mang po bye ba phrag drug cu ma grin bcig
167a5(rgyud): tu 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag tsang la yang mos pa'i sems mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa tshang ma mchis pa nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka'
167a6(rgyud): ba mdzad de brnyes pa'i chos shin tu thab pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag par gang ba lags pa de la gus pas yongasasu bsrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na yang lus dang
167a7(rgyud): srog la phangs pa ma mchis pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher spel te/ yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bgyid ngo zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis/ 
167a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan yang dag bde na cig gsung /  yang dag chos la rab tu zhugs/ yang dag bden pa de dbang gis mdo sde 'din srung 'dzin dgyid / thugs rje
167b1(rgyud): chen po go banabs nas// thugs rje che la rab tu bzhugs// nga dung thugs rje de stobs kyis// mdo sde 'dini srung 'dzin bgyid// bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs nas// ye shes tshogs ni rab tu bskyed/ chogs
167b2(rgyud): rnams yong su rdzogs pa'i slang // mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// bdud rnams thams cad rab brtul te// log smras thams cad rnam par bshig/ ngan lha thams cad bsal ba'i sdang// mdo sde 'di mi srung 'dzin
167b3(rgyud): bgyid// 'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang ni lha ma yin// klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// sa yi steng dang mkha' gnas pa// yun ring 'dir ni gnas pa rnams
167b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'dzin bgyid pas/ mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// tshangs pa'i bzhugs pa mtshungs ldan zhing // 'phags bden bzhi yis rab rgyam nas// bdud rnams dang
167b5(rgyud): ni pham mdzad slad// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin dbya da// na mkha' thogs bcas 'gyur yang srid// thogs bcas rnam kha 'gyur srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung brdung ba// sus kyang bskul
167b6(rgyud): zhing bskyod mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos 'di srung ba bkas bshad pa thos pa dang / sa so nas rje su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas/ yang dag pa'i chos yongasu su
167b7(rgyud): ba'i sems kyis cig char mgrin gcig tu tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag cag mdo sde 'di la ni// mu dang bu mo 'khor dang bcas// thams cad rtse gcig rab bsrungs nas/ rgya cher yang dag spel bar bgyid/ 
167b8(rgyud): gang zhig mdo 'di rab bzung nas// byang chub rgyu ni sgrub bgying na// bdag cag rtag par phyogs bzhi nas// srung skyob rim gro dag kyang 'gyid// de nas lha'i dbang pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas// tshigs su
168a1(rgyud): / bcad de gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos ni thug su chud// drin ni bsab par bzhed pa na// byang chub sems dpa' phan gang gas spang // 'jig rten 'das kyang mdo sde gsungs// bdag kyang sangs rgyas
168a2(rgyud): de dag la// drin bas pa slad du rtag mchod nas// 'di 'dra'i mdo sde 'di dang ni// mdo sde 'di la srung bar bgyid// de nas dga' ldan pa'i lha'i bu rnams gus pas thal mo sbyar nas// tshig su bcang de gsol pa/ 
168a3(rgyud): bcom ldan gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang zhig 'dzin par bgyid pa ni// byang chub gnas skabs gnas pas na// dga' ldan lhar ni skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan bdag cag rab tu gnas// lha yi rnam smin mchog
168a4(rgyud): spangs nas// 'dzam gling dag tu gnas pas na// mdo sde 'di ni sgrogs par bgyid// de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ tshangs pa lha'i rgyal po gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ 
168a5(rgyud): tshig su bcad de gsol pa// bsam gtan rnams dang theg rnams dang // rnam thar tshad med thams cad kyang // mdo sde 'di las byung bas na// de slang mdo sde 'di rab gsungs// mdo sde 'di ni ston
168a6(rgyud): pa'i gnas// tshangs pa'i bde ba bdag spangs nas// mdo sde 'di ni mnyan pa'i slang // rtag par yongasu srung skyob bgyid// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po'i bu tshong dpon zhes bya ba yang gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su
168a7(rgyud): bcang de gsol pa// gang zhig mdo sde 'di bzung nas// nyon mongs rnams ni pham bgyid pa// de 'dra'i sems can de dag la// srung skyob ba de la 'god par 'gyid// mdo sde 'di ni gang 'chang pa// bdud rnams kyis ni
168a8(rgyud): glags mi rnyed// bcom ldan byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus// bdag gis de la srung bar bgyid// de nas lha'i bu bkra shis dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig su bcad de gsol pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub
168a9(rgyud): yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i mdo 'dun cid lu mi 'phra shing / rung kyilas da sno ci dag 'i ni shini 'dzin gyi na/ ga sha rad lnga di ni yon pa da'i sa yu dag khyo chu cin bImi mu /  bya ma the bcwa yi na dub rgya breb ma byu / mi su me gsol pa/ 
168b1(rgyud): mchog/ mdo sde 'di las ston pas ma/ gang zhig mdo sde 'dzim bgyid na// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur// bdag gis mdo sde 'di bzung nas bye ba'i lha la rab bshang nas// gus par nyan par
168b2(rgyud): bgying pa dag byang chub gan su bskul bar bgyid/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gus par thal mo sbyar nas tshig su bcad de gsol pa// byang chub la ni rab gnas nas// gsol ba ma btang
168b3(rgyud): grogs mthong na// lus srog dag kyang rab spangs nas// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di srung bgyid// 'di 'dra'i chos ni bdag thos nas// dga' ldan lha gnas mchis nas kyang // bcom ldan byin rlabs dbang gis na// lnga
168b4(rgyud): mi rgya chen ston par bgyid// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshig su bcad de gsol pa// bcom ldan nyan thos theg par ni// bdag ni shes rab chung bar
168b5(rgyud): gsungs// deng bdag rang gi stobs kyis mthus// mad sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin bgyid na// bdag gi de ni rab bzung ste// tshig dang spobs pa'i mthu stsal nas/ 
168b6(rgyud): rjes 'breng rtag par legs zhes brjod// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas/ tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan mngon sum du// mdo sde tshad med thos gyur kyang // chos
168b7(rgyud): mchog rgyal po 'di 'dra ba// rnams kyang thos par yong ma gyur// deng bdag mdo 'di bcom ldan las/ mngon thos yongasu bzung bas na// gang dag byang chub mos pa la/ rgya chen rab tu spel bar bgying // 
168b8(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po de dag so so nas/ mdo sde rgya cher spel zhing rgyas pa dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu srung bar sems bskyed nas byang chub
169a1(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par bskul te/ sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs par gzigs pa dang / leg so leg so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyed kyis 'di ltar mdo
169a2(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di sems rtse gcig tu rgya cher spel nas/ nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang 'thor zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar byed pa de ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa
169a3(rgyud): yin pas/ bsod nams 'di snyed cig 'thob par 'gyur ba ni/ bskal pa gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
169a4(rgyud): ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa/ gang la la zhig mchod pa dang / bkur bsti byas nas/ yi ger dris te rgya cher spel ba dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par ston
169a5(rgyud): par byed pas/ thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de yang de bzhi no// de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang yang dag pa'i brtson pas rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// 
169a6(rgyud): de nas tshad med mtha' med pa'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'khor mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ 
169a7(rgyud): shin tu dang ba'i dad pas yang dag par blangs nas/ bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las yongasu btang ba'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// 
169a8(rgyud): 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// 
169b1(rgyud): zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lo ts+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa/ bar d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe la bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
169b2(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar+Na pra b+hA sa ut+ta ma sU tra oMn+dar dzA nA ma ma hA yA ra sU tra/ bong skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
169b3(rgyud): mdo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
169b4(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bag bya rgong phung po'i ri'i zom shin tu/ rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyizang mo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul dasam pa mang ge
169b5(rgyud): slong gi dge 'dun chen po/ dge slong dgu khri brkyang stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa thams cad kyang / ngag/ bcom pa chen po/ glang po'i rgyal po ltar shin tu dul ba/ zag pa
169b6(rgyud): zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bya ba byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongasu bcad pa/ dbang phyug dam
169b7(rgyud): pa'i mchog thob pa/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyis yongasu bkod pa/ rnam par grol ba brgyad mngon du gyur cing / pha rol gyi mthar phyin par gyur pa la 'di lta rtse/ 
169b8(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u ngi n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
170a1(rgyud): steng rgyas 'od srung dang tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu bo 'od srung dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / 'di dag la sogs
170a2(rgyud): pa nyan thos chen po rnams phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ so so nas nang du yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum
170a3(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong dang yang thangs gcig ste/ de dag kyang klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar dpal dang gzi brjid
170a4(rgyud): chen por ldan pas kun tu grags pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa/ rtag tu srung ba mos pa dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa/ bsam gtan kun las 'das pa'i
170a5(rgyud): dran pa mngon du gyur pa/ shes rab kyi sgo rnam par bya bababs mkhas pa shin tu bsgrubs pa/ dbang dam pas rnam par rol cing / mngon par shes pa dam pa brnyes pa/ gzungs chen
170a6(rgyud): thob pa/ spobs pa mi zad gnyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob cing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba'i dadung 'joms pa/ chos kyi rnga chen
170a7(rgyud): po rdung las/ mu stegs can thams cad 'dul zhing sems rnam par dang ba bskyed par byed pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ lha dang mi rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
170a8(rgyud): rgyan par byed ga 'gro ba drug na gnas pa rnams la phanang pa 'dogs pa/ ye shes chen po phur sum tshogs pa/ bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems la gnas pa/ mthu chen po brtan
170b1(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing ma 'ongs pa'i mtha' klas pas gnas par yi dam chen po 'chang gsangs rgyas mang po la rgyu rnam par dag pa
170b2(rgyud): sted pa dus gsum gyi chos mi skye bar bzod pa thob gnyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las shin tu 'das pa/ thabs mkhas pa chen pos 'jig rten 'dren pa ston pa chen pos bstan pa'i chos zab
170b3(rgyud): mo dgongs pa 'grel pa la mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid mngon du gyur pa/ the tsom yongasu chad par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems
170b4(rgyud): dpa' rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par tu brtson pa dang / khyang chub sems dpa' mi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
170b5(rgyud): byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang // byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khyad chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub
170b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rin po che'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
170b7(rgyud): 'od bkod dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od chen pos bkod dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims rnam dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam
170b8(rgyud): ngag blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' namakha' bzhin dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam chen po mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
171a1(rgyud): sman sbyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs nad sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas mthong ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub
171a2(rgyud): sems dpa' lung bstan mchog thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen chos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags dga' dang / byang chub
171a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sprin chen grags pa mtha' med ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chem seng ge'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen khyu mchog sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen bkra shis dang
171a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rin dngal dang byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
171a5(rgyud): sprin chen skar ma'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen me'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen glog gi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen 'brug sgra dang / byang chub sems
171a6(rgyud): dpa' sprin chen shes rab kun tu 'char ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag char ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprim chen me tog shing rgyal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen
171a7(rgyud): ud pa la'i dri dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rin po che tsan dan dri bsil sku dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen mun sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rab rib sel ba la sogs pa/ 
171a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das
171b1(rgyud): kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // de nas yang li tsa byi gzhon nu rnams la 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu seng ge'i 'od dang / gzhor nu seng ge'i blo gros
171b2(rgyud): dang / gzhon nu chos sbyin dang / gzhon nu dbang po sbyin dang / gzhon nu 'od chen dang // gzhon nu dpal chen dang / gzhon nu sangs rgyas skyong dang / gzhon nu chos skyong dang / gzhon nu dge 'dun skyong dang / 
171b3(rgyud): gzhon nu rdo rje skyong dang / gzhon nu na mkha' skyong dang / gzhon nu namakha' sgrogs dang / rin chen snying po gzhon nu dang / bkra shis mchog gi snying po gzhon nu la sogs pa lnga 'bum brgyad stong de dag kyang
171b4(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bde bar gnas pa theg pa chen po la rab tu mos pa de dag so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
171b5(rgyud): kyi zhangs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lam gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang lha'i sras po la 'di lha ste/ lha'i sras po dga' ba mthong ba dang / 
171b6(rgyud): lha'i sras po rab dga' dang / lha'i sras po nyi 'od dang / lha'i sras po zla ba'i gtsug phung dang / lha'i sras po shes rab gsal dang / lha'i sras po mamakha' rnam dag shes rang dang / lha'i sras
171b7(rgyud): nyon mongs sel dang / lha'i sras po bkra shis dang / de dag la sogs pa lha'i sras po bzhi khri nyis stong yang / theg pa chen po srung ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos rje su 'dzin cing / rgyun mi 'chang par sdon
171b8(rgyud): lam chen po btab pa de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lhags na ga bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs
172a1(rgyud): gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po pad+mo dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs chen dang / klu'i rgyal po sgra chen
172a2(rgyud): dang 'akru'i rgyal po rba rlabs chung dang / klu'i rgyal po krung 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po gser gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po nyi khri brgyad stong po de dag kyang theg pa chen
172a3(rgyud): po'i chos 'chang zhing 'dzin par mos pa dang / yongasu rgyas pa dang / srung bar sems bskyed pa sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad kyang so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas
172a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa
172a5(rgyud): sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin a mra dang gnod sbyin oM mra 'chang dang // gnod sbyin pad+mo 'od kyi snying po dang / gnod sbyin pad+mor gdong dang / gnod sbyin khro gnyer can dang
172a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'jigs pa chen po ston dang / gnod sbyin sa g.yo byed dang / gnod sbyin zas 'phrog la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos yang dag pa la rang cing / srung ba la brtson pa
172a7(rgyud): sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
172a8(rgyud): gzhan yang na mkha' lding gi rgyal po spos kyi glang po che mthu stobs rgyal po la sogs pa bzhi khri dgu stong dang / gzhan yang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa dang / ri dang nags tshal
172b1(rgyud): dang chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i lha'i drang srong rnams dang / rgyal po chen po dang / de'i 'khor dang / btsun mo dang / sras dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa de thams cad bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di
172b2(rgyud): thog cing 'don pa dang / 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rgyas par byed pa dang / srung zhing skyob par smon lam yong su 'debs pa de dag zad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan
172b3(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de ltar nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding la sogs pa sde brgyad
172b4(rgyud): po de dag sprin bzhin du 'dus pa sems rtse gcig tu byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te mig mi 'dzums pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal tu blta zhing / dam pa'i chos bstar par mos pas gsol ba 'deng so// 
172b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'khor 'dus pa mang po la gzigs nas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// mdo sde'i rgyal po'i dbang po ste// mnyan na
172b6(rgyud): shin tu thab pa dang / yongasu btags nas zab pa nyid// gser 'od ngam pa'i 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs kyis byin rlangs pa// ma~M 'khrugs pas ni shar phyog su// rin chen rtog
172b7(rgyud): gis lho phyogasu// 'od dpag med kyis nub phyogasu// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyog su// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zang byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyir byed pa/ 
172b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni legs pa brgyan/ byir gyis brlabs te brjod par bya/ sems can gang dag dbang po nyams/ tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / 
173a1(rgyud): phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bram ze la sogs gces pa dang // phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin dang // nor 'gribs pas
173a2(rgyud): ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byang snye ma dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // de
173a3(rgyud): ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde'i dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams kyis rab rgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo 'di nyan par byed na ni// mdo sde 'di
173a4(rgyud): yi ge'i brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag/ shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // blon po'i tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod spyir bye ba
173a5(rgyud): du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // ne rany+dza rar gnas pa dang // 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha
173a6(rgyud): dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang mi/ mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin namakha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dag der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi
173a7(rgyud): g.yel bar// de dag la ni srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye ba rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag
173a8(rgyud): gzhan la thos byed dang // gang dag rje su yi rang dang // grang dag mchod par byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am cingag dang // lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// sdod
173b1(rgyud): chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa
173b2(rgyud): yid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzung bar 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas// g.yel ba med
173b3(rgyud): par mchod par byas// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis// mdo sde ngas pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mdo 'di 'am pa ni// de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs// 
173b4(rgyud): mi yi srid pa legs par thob// 'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i b+ha gar yang // bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang pos
173b5(rgyud): rab tu bsngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang pa'o// / de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub
173b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gror byas pa
173b7(rgyud): zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan
173b8(rgyud): 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / khabs rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shA
174a1(rgyud): / thub pa ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa na gang ge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs gnas par gyur zas cakyang
174a2(rgyud): phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongasu btang ste/ cher na rang gi lus kyi sha dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad mthas gzhan gyis lta ci smos su so// de nas skyes bu
174a3(rgyud): dam pa des/ sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che ba bai DUR+Ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin
174a4(rgyud): gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas/ lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i
174a5(rgyud): phrugs rnams gting ba dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom
174a6(rgyud): ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur to// shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ming bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung
174a7(rgyud): byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khri de dag lnga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// 
174a8(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur lha'i me tog gi char yang bag lha'i sil snyam ngag gi
174b1(rgyud): sgra yang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sen thams cad lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ 
174b2(rgyud): sems canang rus long dag ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos// sems can spyod pa rnams ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ son sems rnam par g.yengs pa dag ni/ sems rnam par
174b3(rgyud): mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ son bkres pa dag ni lto 'drangs par gyur sems can som pa ga ni som pa dang bral bar gyur sems cad rad kyis btab pa dag ni nang dang bral
174b4(rgyud): bar gyur/ sems can lus kyi dbang po 'ams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
174b5(rgyud): mdzes pa'i tog gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ngag mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs
174b6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams las rje su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yor tan rje su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shA
174b7(rgyud): thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshang la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ sku tshe thung ba 'ang ji lta bu/ 'di ji zhig snyam du bsams pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de ras sangs
174b8(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku che thung
175a1(rgyud): snyam du ma sems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe ma rigs kyi bu po bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs
175a2(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i
175a3(rgyud): mu'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi
175a4(rgyud): mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang ma mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub
175a5(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim de lcags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang
175a6(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigasu bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa// rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi// thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku
175a7(rgyud): tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nuso// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rab rdul glags bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshang // sus kyang bgrang bar mi nuso// sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu phra
175a8(rgyud): rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te la las namakha' la// sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nuso// 
175b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dgaces// grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo // gang phyir de yi byed rgyu gnyis// rgyu yang rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// gzhan la 'a
175b2(rgyud): bslangs pa dang / khabs mang po byin pa ste/ de phyir bangag nyid me ba dol/ sku tsho'i tshang mi mi rnyed de/ bskal pa'ang med cig ce'am/ grangs med pa yang de bzhin te/ de bas the tsom med par 'gyur/ tho com cung zang ma tha
175b3(rgyud): zhig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha ma yi// grangs ni gang du yang mi dmig so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa de thos ma gsangs rgyas bcom ldan
175b4(rgyud): 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar sku tshe'i tshang thung bstan par gyur ces de skad gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas
175b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das shAthub pa de bzhin gshegs pa de ni snyigs ma rnam pa lnga yi 'jig rten
175b6(rgyud): du skye dgu'i tshe'i rang lo brgya thub pa'i dus su bltams nas/ sems can mos pa dman pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dad pa chung ba'i sems can de dag bdag tu lta ba dang / sems cad du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / 
175b7(rgyud): gso bar lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / log par lta ba dang / bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dag dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta ba la sogs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la phar 'dogs pa dang / gzhan yang
175b8(rgyud): mu stegs can rnams la yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pas/ myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sku che tshang thung ba bstan to// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de bzhir gshegs
176a1(rgyud): pa de mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pas/ sems can rnams de dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes dang / mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes la sogs pa bskyed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
176a2(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i mdo 'di dag myur du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la bskur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur bas/ ngol
176a3(rgyud): phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sku tshe thung bar bstan to// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bzhugs shing mya ngan las mi 'da' na/ sems can rnams gus pa med pa dang / phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shed mi bskyed
176a4(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo zab mo dag 'dzin cing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par mi byed do//  ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das
176a5(rgyud): rtag tu 'jig rten na bzhugs par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dper na gang la la zhig pa ma la nor bu rin po che rgyas pa mang du yod pa mthong nas/ nor de la dkon pa dang / ngo mtshar gyi
176a6(rgyud): 'du shes mi bskyed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha ma'i nor rdzas de la rtag tu yod pa'i 'du shes skye ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rtag tu mya ngan las mi 'da' ma/ de la dkon pa dang / phrad par dka'
176a7(rgyud): ba'i 'du shes mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na la la zhig pha ma dbul zhing nor dang mi ldan pa zhig de rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po zhig gi gnasu phyin te/ de dag gi bang mdzod dang nor dang / 
176a8(rgyud): rin po che la sogs pa mang po rgyas pa mthong na de dkon pa dang / rnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shes skyes te/ dbul po de nor brtsal ba'i thabs sgrub pa la brtson par bye'o// de ni dbul ba dang 'phongs pa spangs te/ bde ba
176b1(rgyud): rang 'byor pa sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong mde dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba dang / mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang bskyed
176b2(rgyud): cing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ba dang / bskal pa grangs med pa na lan 'ga' zhig byung ste/ ji ltar u dum ba ra'i me tog brgya lam na yang 'ga' zhig 'byung ba bzhin pas
176b3(rgyud): sems can rnams de la dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed cing / bcom ldan 'das de la gus pa skye bar 'gyur/ zhal nas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams la yang bden pa'i 'du shes dang / yongasu bzung
176b4(rgyud): ba'i 'du shes bskyed cing bskur ba 'debs par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir 'jig rten na yun ring du mi bzhugs shing myur du mya ngan
176b5(rgyud): las 'da' bar mdzad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bug sems can rnams yongasu smin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi pa de ngas
176b6(rgyud): kyang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad med pa dang / gzhan yang srog chags bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa dang / thabs
176b7(rgyud): gcig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba phele ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i rtog
176b8(rgyud): gis ji lta bur gyur pa de dag gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhi yang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs par byon nas/ phyogs so so'i gang gyi steng ra bzhugs tete 'khor gyi byang chub/ 
177a1(rgyud): sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa dang nyam nga ba chung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol cig/ 
177a2(rgyud): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po shin tu zab pa 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / mu ge'i yang ba yongasu bsal te/ thams
177a3(rgyud): cad bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir 'di ston pa legs te/ rje su dgyes pa mdzad zhes kyang gsol cig de nas so so'i zhe 'bring nas mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
177a4(rgyud): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bac+doMs kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag gis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin
177a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legaso zhes bka' srul te/ legaso leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis kyang
177a6(rgyud): son thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du dam pa'i chos 'di bshad par nga la bskul ba mdzad pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// bya rgod phung po'i
177a7(rgyud): ri la nga bzhugs te// mdo sde rin chen 'di ni 'chad mdzad kyang // skye bo mang po de dag bsgral ba'i phyir// yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba'ang ston pa mdzad// byis pa lta ba log par gyur pa rnams// nga yi bstan la mos par
177a8(rgyud): mi byed pa// de dag kun tu bsgral bu'i phyir// yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba'ang ston mdzad// de nas de'i tshe/ 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze koru daM n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
177b1(rgyud): pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i sgra thos nas/ 'phral du ngus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan
177b2(rgyud): 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse gzugs rje chen po dang ldan pa phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bu snang ba mdzad pa/ shes rab dang
177b3(rgyud): ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs ma/ bdag la dam pa gcig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar
177b4(rgyud): gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rer li tsa byai gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyi mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba re spo pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung rtson pa bram ze ko'u ri rgya la 'di skad
177b5(rgyud): ces smras so// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cag gsol lam/ dag gis khyod la dam pa sbyin no// bram zes sgra sa pa/ li tsa byi gnon nu bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
177b6(rgyud): pa dang / ring bsrel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la brten par 'dong ngo // ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de ma brjed par mchod ma sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
177b7(rgyud): bdag po 'ba' zhig thob ces grag go/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon tan
177b8(rgyud): dang ldan pa gser 'ongad dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces khrag gis nyon cig kye li tsa byi gnon nu gser 'ong dam pa'i mngoni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na kho bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi sdong
178a1(rgyud): bram ze rnams ni gang bcangs ma sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ba'i 'ong bsrel yungs 'bru tsam tha ma chog gi chang du bcug la bcangs kya
178a2(rgyud): rung ngo // kye li tsa byi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa la ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste/ bcangs pas sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
178a3(rgyud): bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byi gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u nga n+ya la
178a4(rgyud): tshig su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa// nam zhig gang ga'i chu rgyun la/ me tog rnams ni skye ba dang // bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang // khu byug dung mdog 'dra 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta li'i 'bru
178a5(rgyud): chags dang // 'dra gor a mra'i dog pa chags/ de yi tshen yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur/ nam zhig rdul sbal spu rnams las// go su legs par
178a6(rgyud): btags gyur te// dgun gyi drang ba sel byed pa de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las// yang thog legs par byas gyur te// brtan zhing rab tu mi
178a7(rgyud): g.yon// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad pa kun// so ni dkar por skyes gyur te/ rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho risu ni 'dzeg pa'i
178a8(rgyud): phyin nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams la// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mam zhig skas de 'ab 'dzegs te// byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod
178b1(rgyud): byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu
178b2(rgyud): bde 'gyur la// mchu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing // glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya 'og rnams// dben par song nas rtse ba dang // phan tshun
178b3(rgyud): 'thun par 'gyur ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// chal 'bab skyabasu nam 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// 
178b4(rgyud): nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che// 'phrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring ba srel yod par 'gyur nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa rnams// 
178b5(rgyud): bo spos kyi ngang ldan pa// mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di rgya tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ li tsa byi gcan
178b6(rgyud): nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ le ga so legaso gzhon nu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung
178b7(rgyud): bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig chem masam po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyi mi khyab go rims bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis/ sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi
178b8(rgyud): khyab de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'odadi ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/ 
179a1(rgyud): bcom ldan de ni bcos ma min// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yung 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// 
179a2(rgyud): sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
179a3(rgyud): dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gis 'dis thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol bar bya// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis bya// de nas lha
179a4(rgyud): bu sul khri nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshangad bstan pazang mo 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// de dag
179a5(rgyud): yid kyis kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas/ sgra srad 'thun par tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// sems can yong su smir mdzad phyir// yongasu
179a6(rgyud): mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
179a7(rgyud): mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang // skyes bu dam pa des gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar bar btud nas 'di skad ces
179a8(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mya ngan las mi 'da' la/ ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag pa yang ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du mdo sde dag las/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' zhing / 
179b1(rgyud): ring bsrel 'jig chen du bzhag pa la lnga dang mis gus pa dang bcas/ bkur sti dang bcas pas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag pa lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
179b2(rgyud): mchod pa byas ma bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob bo zhes kyang gsungs la/  'dir ni de dag mdo zhes kyang gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bas rnam par dbye zhing bshad par gsol/ de ras
179b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das te/ ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag ces gsungs pa yang dgongs
179b4(rgyud): pa'i don du bstan par shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di bcus/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa dang bden pa'i
179b5(rgyud): tshul du mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yod par gsungs par shes par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam sa kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa yongasu spangs pas
179b6(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gang bag la bdag med pa dang / chos la bdag med par mngon du mkhyen pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa nyid mngar du gyur pas yang nyir
179b7(rgyud): tha dad pa med pas/ chos kyi skur mjam pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gnyi su med par mngon du gzigs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / chos bams
179b8(rgyud): cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pas/ rnam par dag pa mngon du gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i sgrub pa la mkhas pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin
180a1(rgyud): nyid dang chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i de bzhin
180a2(rgyud): nyid la bye brag med par mkhyen pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di bcus ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
