226a7(rgyud): thu chen thob pa la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tsha'o// de dag la phyag 'tshal
226a8(rgyud): nas gzungs 'di gdon par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti ni oM mir to/ ko sha Ni/ i mi ri Ni/ i rI swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas pa la
226b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ gzungs 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na bsod nams kyi
226b2(rgyud): tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'phel bar 'gyuraro// grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsngags par byas par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas de rnams
226b3(rgyud): kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de la lung ston par 'gyuraro// bde bar gnas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba des gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / rin po che dang
226b4(rgyud): mang du thos shing mkhas pa dang / nad med cing tshe ring ba la sogs pa yid bzhin du 'thob ste/ bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phe'o// ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang / de dag thams cad grub par 'gyuraro// bde bar
226b5(rgyud): gnas/ sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mthob kyi bar du// rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer ri bo dang / byang
226b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyung dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / 
226b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ping ga la chen po la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis srung bar byed do// bde bar gnas/ gzungs 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni 'di
226b8(rgyud): yin par shes par rig par bya'o// thog mar dazlas brjod khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas pas bsnyen par bya'o// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor byas te/ tshes bcu drug gi nyin par
227a1(rgyud): khrus byas te/ gos sar pa gyon te 'dug pa dang me tog dang / zhal zas snga mang po la sogs pas mchod par bya zhing dkyil 'khor gyi mang du zhugs nas/ thog mar
227a2(rgyud): sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ gus par phyag 'tshal zhing sdig pa bshags nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 
227a3(rgyud): sngags de stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzla'o// de nas lus bsrang te 'dug nas/ ci 'dod pa de bsam par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za gcig tu
227a4(rgyud): bza' bar bya'o// de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang / bzod dkyil 'khor de nas 'byung bar byas te/ mi de ni bsod nams dang / gzi brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
227a5(rgyud): ldan zhing / bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// gal te bsams pa ma grub na yang dkyil 'khor rer zhugs nas/ bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de phyin
227a6(rgyud): chad kyang rtag par rjesu dran par bya'o// // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po las/ gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te le'u brgyad pa'o// / 
227a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzungs de gsungs nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan pa dang bde ba'i
227a8(rgyud): phyir/ don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad/ 
227b1(rgyud): de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya/ sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir
227b2(rgyud): stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad/ sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung ba'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis mi// mdo mchog dam pa
227b3(rgyud): dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni ngar ga dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi sheso// mig gi
227b4(rgyud): dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug rna ba'i dbang po sgral rnam par dpyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog// lce yi dbang po rtag tu rol rgyu ga/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ 
227b5(rgyud): yid kyi dbang pos cho tsas rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po 'di dgaphan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug na
227b6(rgyud): yul la rnam dpyod de// ji ltar mi zhib grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shong // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa/ 
227b7(rgyud): de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po
227b8(rgyud): thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed/ lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing
228a1(rgyud): rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongasu rtog las byung // grong sdong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs
228a2(rgyud): dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs
228a3(rgyud): dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin/ e yi sbrul dang rlung
228a4(rgyud): gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi namakhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song
228a5(rgyud): gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bang kan rlung dang khris pas zad gyur na// lus ni gcan dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/ du
228a6(rgyud): khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ 
228a7(rgyud): ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad de// 'du shes rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sreng dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga
228a8(rgyud): shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dbyang
228b1(rgyud): dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa bcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo rtol// phung po'i gnas la lhong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong
228b2(rgyud): khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu kha ga tshom byas// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung
228b3(rgyud): gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// ngas ni nyon mongs dgra tshogs rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa sgreng // srid pa'i mtsho
228b4(rgyud): las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes
228b5(rgyud): gdungs zhi byas nas/ bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas/ gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su
228b6(rgyud): tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mag dang nang pa dang / yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUR+Ya dang rin
228b7(rgyud): chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shin ljon thams cad dang // rdza dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'drungs pa thams cad gtugs te// de dag thams cad phyer blags nas/ 
228b8(rgyud): rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// namakha'i dkyil 'khor ci tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams
229a1(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gar gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// bye ma dgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'ang ga
229a2(rgyud): ba/  ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nuso// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig cig la 'jug pa yang ka/ bskal pa bye ba du ma ra ni// gang du'ang
229a3(rgyud): bgrang bar mi nuso// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / de nas lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa shin tu zab mo
229a4(rgyud): de thos nas/ dga' ba dang rangs pa dang skyes te 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dngus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcol
229a5(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'ang sa la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// rgyal ba rkang gnyis
229a6(rgyud): gtso lags te// 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// byang chub spyod pa yang dag tshul// bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol// rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod la the tsom ci yod pa// dri ba'i don de zhus
229a7(rgyud): shig dang // rnam par bya ste bshad par bya// de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das
229a8(rgyud): bral ba'i// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo chos kyi dbyings la gnas te// byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas ni// mnyam pa nyid la/ 
229b1(rgyud): nan tan du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyad
229b2(rgyud): pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyingasu 'dogs te/ chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do// phung po lnga yang brjod du med pa/ phung po
229b3(rgyud): lA ma yin pa yang brjod du med pa ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni/ chad par 'gyuraro// gal te phung po lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma gnyis dang bral bar
229b4(rgyud): mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa/ bltar med pa blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do// rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga las chos kyi dbyingasu ji ltar
229b5(rgyud): gdags zhe na/ phung po lnga de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa ste/ de yang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba zhig yin na mi/ skyes zin pa skye 'am/ mi skye ba skye zhes bya/ gal te skyes zin pa skyen ma
229b6(rgyud): rgyu dang rkyen kyang mi dgos pa'i rig so// gal te ma skyes pa skyen ni// skye ba dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas ming med pa/ mtshan ma med
229b7(rgyud): pa gzhan pa dang dpag pa dang / dper bya ba mi brjod pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis skyed par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi lha mo dper na snga'i sgra ni/ shing dang / ko ba dang / lag pa la brten te/ sgra 'byung mod kyi/ rnga'i sgra de
229b8(rgyud): ni 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang stong // da ltar byung ba'ang stong ste/ rnga'i sgra de ni shing las kyang ma byung // ko ba dang lag pa las kyang ma byung / dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba
230a1(rgyud): don mi 'gog pa'o// gang mi 'gog pa de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o// gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du yang mi 'gro ba'o// gang du yang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa ma yin
230a2(rgyud): pas/ gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gcig pa yin na/ chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pas// 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang // dor dam pa'i bden
230a3(rgyud): pa mngon du gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de lta ma yin pas de gcig pa ma yin no// gal te tha dad pa yin na ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
230a4(rgyud): kyi spyod pa yang / mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
230a5(rgyud): tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no// de bas na phung po lnga de ni
230a6(rgyud): yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa yang ma yin rgyu dang rkyen med pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa/ tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen med pa/ 
230a7(rgyud): dpes bstan du med pa/ thog ma dang tha mar dben pa rang gi ngang gis stong pa ste/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan du spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o// de bas na phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su
230a8(rgyud): ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi lha mo gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam pa dang / kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par
230b1(rgyud): 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste/ 'phags pa dang / ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spangs/ don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa
230b2(rgyud): de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba
230b3(rgyud): skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
230b4(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab bar 'tsha'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
230b5(rgyud): chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pas/ rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris// lha mo byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa shin tu sgrub par dka' ba 'di khyed ji ltar
230b6(rgyud): spyod pas de la dbang thob par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smra so// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don de shin tu zab pas/ so so'i
230b7(rgyud): skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don mi shes te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul bas/ mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o// bdag ni chos 'di la brten te/ bde bar gnas pa thob bo// gal te tshig de bden pa bldan
230b8(rgyud): snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa / skyes pa yang ma yin/ khung
231a1(rgyud): med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshang med pa la longs spyod pa dang / lha'i me tog mchog gi char 'bab cing / lha'i sim snyan dang / rol mo ma
231a2(rgyud): krol bar rang byung ba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par shog shig/ ces smras ma thag tu snyibs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can
231a3(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshang med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i
231a4(rgyud): gzhal med khang pa mngan 'gro thams cad med cing rin po che'i sngon shing sna tshogs bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa rin po che sna bdun dang / 
231a5(rgyud): lha'i me tog gi char babs pa/ lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa bzhin du gyur to// de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros yang bud med kyi lus las/ tshangs pa'i
231a6(rgyud): lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal
231a7(rgyud): po chen po chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa
231a8(rgyud): spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen por thos nas byang chub sems
231b1(rgyud): dpa' la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa khyod don gang la gnas te/ tshig de skad ces smras/ lha mos smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing / rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas
231b2(rgyud): grub pa'i phyir ro// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar
231b3(rgyud): rigaso// smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir/ de skad ces smra// byis pa yang gzhan mkhas pa yang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang chub ma yin pa yang gzhan rnam par grol ba yang gzhan/ rnam par
231b4(rgyud): grol ba ma yin pa'ang gzhan ma yin mod kyi tshangs pa chen po chos de dag thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyingasu mnyam pa nyid de/ so so ma yin pa yang dag par dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med
231b5(rgyud): pa 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan dang / de'i slob ma sgyu ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyur pa
231b6(rgyud): zhig gis/ lam gyi bzhi mdor// sa dang bye ma dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / lo ma la sogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu ma sprul pa 'di lta ste/ rta dang glang po che'i tshogs dang dmag dang shing rta la sogs
231b7(rgyud): pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / bang ba dang mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun la ston to// de la sems can byis pa blun po mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong nas/ sgyu ma
231b8(rgyud): sprul par mi shes te/ ta dang glang po che la sogs pa mthong ba dang / thos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/ gzhan ni brdzun pa snyam du sems shing / byis kyang del zhing tu rtog par mi bye// de la mkhas
232a1(rgyud): pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ sgyu ma sprul pa yin par shes nas/ thos pa dang mthong ba de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/  dang glang po che la sogs pa
232a2(rgyud): bdag gis mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang glang po che dang / bang mdzod la sogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de/ bdag gis mthong
232a3(rgyud): ba dang / thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la/ phyis zhib tu brtags na yang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos su shes// de lta bas na/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag
232a4(rgyud): pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa yang kun rdzob tsam du de dag gi don mtshon pa dang tshig gi tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag pa'i don shes
232a5(rgyud): par bya ba tsam du zad kyi don dam pa ni de lta ma yin no// skar mo// yang rmanges pa chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa
232a6(rgyud): rnams kyis ni chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang mi shes la/ gang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar btags pa ltar
232a7(rgyud): bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes par mi nuso// de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gang gzigs shing gsan pa dang / 'du byed
232a8(rgyud): dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi mthu dang / las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o// zhes mngon par mi zhen te/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/ 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang mi bden pa/ 
232b1(rgyud): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du// 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du ma grub par 'phags pa rnams kyis/ 
232b2(rgyud): kun rdzob kyi tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag pa bden pa'i don de ston par bye'o// de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po gang 'phags pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i gzi
232b3(rgyud): pas chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa bzhin/ 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste/ kun rdzob tu ming dang mtshan ma sna tshogs la rten nas gzhan
232b4(rgyud): la ston par byed do// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'o/ da 'phro la tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smraso// sems can ji snyed gcig gis chos zab mo 'di lta
232b5(rgyud): bu rtogs shing shes par nus/ smras pa/ tshangs pa chen po gang sprul pa mang po'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa
232b6(rgyud): de snyed kyis sheso// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ sprul pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na/ de dag gi sems dang // sems las byung ba gang nas skye bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ 
232b7(rgyud): gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin par yang dag par shes pa de dag gis/ zab mo de'i don shes par nu'o// de nas tshangs pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la
232b8(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
233a1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ tshangs pa chen po de ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyod la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du
233a2(rgyud): bsgrubs shig dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang / gzhan yang tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus
233a3(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smraso// deng skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad cing
233a4(rgyud): bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos par gyur pa ngo mtshar che lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsa la pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro
233a5(rgyud): 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rin po che'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 
233a6(rgyud): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ga lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasu 'gyuraro// zhes bka' stsal to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
233a7(rgyud): khri phrag sum stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i bu khri phrag brgyad stong dang / rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa/ tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis/ rdul
233a8(rgyud): med cing rdul dang bral ba'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi
233b1(rgyud): ldog par sems pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'bros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing brtan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa'i smon lam yong su
233b2(rgyud): rdzogs nas yang byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ so so nas rang rang gi gos gyon pas phud de/ byang chub sems dpa' la gsol nas/ bla na med pa'i mchog dam pa'i sems bskyed de smon lam 'di skad ces
233b3(rgyud): gsol to// bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo'o// zhes smon lam btab bo// tshangs pa chen po dge slong de dag gis
233b4(rgyud): bsod nams de la brten nas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas/ bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das pa ma 'khor ba las yongasu 'das pa'i shes pa skyes par gyur to// de nas brtsa
233b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das pa'i 'og tu / bla na med pa'i sangs rgya su gyur te/ brgal pa'i ming ni
233b6(rgyud): rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yul gyi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus cig tu kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag kun
233b7(rgyud): kyang mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya g.yon tan gyi mtshan bcu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// zhes lung bstan to// gzhan yang tshangs pa chen po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
233b8(rgyud): po gang nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na gang la la zhig gis/ thabs dang mi ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du
234a1(rgyud): spyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo// gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam tu bris te zla ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse
234a2(rgyud): gcig tu byas te/ klog cing 'don na/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod pa nas/ grangasu bgrang ba dang / dper skrun par yang mi bzod do// tshangs
234a3(rgyud): pa chen pos de lta bas ma khyed kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing / nan tan du sgrub pa dang / gzung zhing gzhan la yang dag par rgya cher bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems
234a4(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa'i tshe// ji ltar skyes bu dpa' bo g.yul ngor lus dang srog mi mi lta ba bzhin du ngas kyang mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bzung zhing 'dzin pa dang / klog cing 'don pa dang / gzhan
234a5(rgyud): la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la thogs pa med par gyur to// tshad sa pa chen po dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar rin po che sna bdun yang
234a6(rgyud): med par yang mi 'gyuro// gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na/ rin po che sna bdun yang mod la med par 'gyuraro// tshangs pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig
234a7(rgyud): rten na gnas kyi bar du/ bla na med pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par mi 'gyuraro// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nam med pa na/ gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyuraro// de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse
234a8(rgyud): gcig tu byas te/ mnyan pa dang gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bas ngal ba dang / dub pa byang du gsod cing brtson 'grus
234b1(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bya ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bslab cing nan tan du bya'o//  nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te/ tshangs
234b2(rgyud): pa'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
234b3(rgyud): tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
234b4(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di srung ba dang / yongasu rgyas par bgyi'o// chos 'di ston pa'i tshe bgegs dang / bar chad kun bas la te/ dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang mthu yong su rdzogs
234b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang / gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de
234b6(rgyud): yang mu ge dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pas 'tshe ba zhig mchis na yang / bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongasu bsrungs pas de dag bde zhing skyid pa dang / gnod pa rnams mi 'byung bar gyur na/ de
234b7(rgyud): ngag kyang bdag cag lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gro bgyid na de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim
234b8(rgyud): gro bgyid ngo do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa rnams la legs so
235a1(rgyud): / zhes bka' stsal to// leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di yang thos/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang 'di 'dzin pa dang / srung ba dang / bskyab pa'i sems bskyed
235a2(rgyud): pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 
235a3(rgyud): tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las stong pa nyid la brten nas bsam pa
235a4(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
235a5(rgyud): bo dang / rgyal po chen po tshig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag ba gcig tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar
235a6(rgyud): ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin
235a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yong su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag dgyis pa/ 
235a8(rgyud): lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par brjod ga 'jig rter skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu bkur ga sgra'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyis pa sems can tha
235b1(rgyud): mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyur gcod pa/ 
235b2(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid gnad kyi yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza'i gnod pa thams cad sel ba mchog tu ni
235b3(rgyud): bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// gnod pa 'bum rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
235b4(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos mnyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas
235b5(rgyud): ba bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang mthu yang bskyed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dang / phun sum
235b6(rgyud): tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ pa' chag
235b7(rgyud): ma bzad pa/ snying rdza ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi gza byan 'phrag pa rnams bzlog par bgyu'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha'
235b8(rgyud): rdzing dang / dri za dang yi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// byung ba'i tshogs mi bzang gasnying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom
236a1(rgyud): / ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin 'du phrag dum dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par
236a2(rgyud): dag ga mi'i las 'das pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi / srung bar brgya/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten
236a3(rgyud): skyong ba zhes ming du chagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir/ pha rol gyi dalag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i yang ba 'am / gnod pa sna tshogs brgya nga
236a4(rgyud): gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa 'bum dag gis gtses par gyur ma tsun babacom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
236a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgya ba rtse ba zhis rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag
236a6(rgyud): la bskul ba na/ yul gang du mchi bar// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong
236a7(rgyud): yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gis yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de ngas mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yu
236a8(rgyud): de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mo'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ de thos
236b1(rgyud): nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / yongasu skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
236b2(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu srung bar bgyi/ yong su bskyab pa dang / yongasu dazung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhing dang
236b3(rgyud): bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad
236b4(rgyud): kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang
236b5(rgyud): yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'ang
236b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / sti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gro bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal ba chen po de la rgyal po thams cad pas ches kyi stang
236b7(rgyud): du bgyid/ ches bla mar bgyi// ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// gser 'od ngam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rgyal po chen ba rnaMs
236b8(rgyud): lha dang mri la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po ngag legs so
237a1(rgyud): legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang leg so leg so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
237a2(rgyud): 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos sgra gachos kyi rgyal po chos kyi lha dang / mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la
237a3(rgyud): phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ ma phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can
237a4(rgyud): thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa
237a5(rgyud): dang / rim gro byeng par brtson pa de dag la kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ 
237a6(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa byed bzhis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu
237a7(rgyud): srung bar 'gyuraro// yongasu bskyang ba dang / yongasu bzung bar yang 'gyuraro// des nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa
237a8(rgyud): na rgyal bar 'gyuraro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
237b1(rgyud): ma 'am dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis
237b2(rgyud): shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos
237b3(rgyud): nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus
237b4(rgyud): nad gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam// ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang
237b5(rgyud): dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid
237b6(rgyud): tsang rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid ngam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am mdo sde'i
237b7(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyid/ btsun par bgyid rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan ma/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i
237b8(rgyud): chus chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung rang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhis dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuro/ bangs
238a1(rgyud): cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par yang 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// 
238a2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus ltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ de ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gong ngam/ 
238a3(rgyud): grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa
238a4(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu srung bar brgya'o// yong su bskyad pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongs
238a5(rgyud): bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang // zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de ngag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// 
238a6(rgyud): yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'brug pa thams
238a7(rgyud): cad las yongasu thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror
238a8(rgyud): dgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi chogs yan/ 
238b1(rgyud): lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe ngo'i dus ma/ gser 'ong ngam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
238b2(rgyud): bo 'di'i gzi brjid gyi mthus dgra zla 'dab che ba'i rgyal po de/ rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul bgyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'jug pa mi bzad
238b3(rgyud): pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang / nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul du brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyu ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang
238b4(rgyud): gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang khrel pa sna tshogs pa'adi lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ 
238b5(rgyud): rol gyi dngag tshog su mchi ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang // gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo
238b6(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dadung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum
238b7(rgyud): phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul tu zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye
238b8(rgyud): sdu par babya'o/  rigs kyang 'gyi'o// 'di sa ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus ma yul gzhig par bamyod pa sta ga la 'gyur sa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pachen po
239a1(rgyud): bzhi po de dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legaso leg so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang leg so// khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du rar
239a2(rgyud): yang dag par bsgrungs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ldan pa dang / rim gro gyed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag
239a3(rgyud): la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer
239a4(rgyud): de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yong su bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur
239a5(rgyud): bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshog sa rnams kyang bzlog par gyis shig/ 'dzam+bu'i gling
239a6(rgyud): thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang tshangs mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig rgyal po chen po dngu'ab yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhig 'dzum+bu'i gling 'dir
239a7(rgyud): nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na rgyal po brgyad khri ba ni stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam
239a8(rgyud): pa 'i 'chi ba dang / ngan tshunarnam par 'tshob ma skyed pa dang / rang gis ji lha byor gyilas ngasags pas rgyal ba thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi bang phyug gi dga' ba dang / phan tshun du mul 'jog par ma byed pa dang / 
239b1(rgyud): yul gzhig pa'i phyir/ pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir/ grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag nang phan tshun du byams pa'i sen su 'gyur byams pa'i
239b2(rgyud): sems dang / phan pa'i sis su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ 'chang mi 'dru/ mi cod mi 'gyed par snang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas byed bzhis
239b3(rgyud): 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang byin can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud 'khor thad
239b4(rgyud): kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rdzun kyang sa dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling
239b5(rgyud): thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang / nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur// gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'o las
239b6(rgyud): kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal po
239b7(rgyud): gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bser ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang ste
239b8(rgyud): stang du byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'dum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir// rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'ang
240a1(rgyud): nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdud brtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyu'o// khyed kyi lha'i bum 'di dag gi ga'i byin chen po yang rnam par 'phelo// khyed kyi brtson
240a2(rgyud): 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskye 'o// khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyu po mi'i rgyal po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
240a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyuraro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
240a4(rgyud): ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// des na mi'i rgyal po chen po de la srung ba
240a5(rgyud): chen po byas par 'gyuraro// de nas mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar byas par
240a6(rgyud): 'bru'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor bams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khom thams cad kyang srung ba chen po byas par 'gyuraro// yong su bskyab pa dang / yong su brdung ba dang / yongasu
240a7(rgyud): bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba byas par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba
240a8(rgyud): dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur/ yongasu basbyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ 
240b1(rgyud): dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos
240b2(rgyud): kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang
240b3(rgyud): la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang mnyan 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag nyid las yang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal
240b4(rgyud): po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang / srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i pho drang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba chen po bsam
240b5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur tshe 'di nyid la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug che na po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar
240b6(rgyud): bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yang yongasu 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams kyang kun
240b7(rgyud): tu srung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongasu bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nang mgo ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma
240b8(rgyud): mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nges g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / rim gro dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
241a1(rgyud): rgyal po 'di sti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho drang khyad par du
241a2(rgyud): 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang / rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chag sna tshogs kyis chag chag
241a3(rgyud): btab pa der/ chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan par
241a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba/ gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gis stan rab tu dma' ba
241a5(rgyud): gding bar bgyis te// stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par
241a6(rgyud): spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
241a7(rgyud): btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang / phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal
241a8(rgyud): bo'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du stsal bar bgyi'o// 
241b1(rgyud): dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas/ bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid chen po thob par
241b2(rgyud): bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi
241b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dag lo sar pa mdzes par bgo bar bya'o// spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan
241b4(rgyud): par bgyi'o// gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba de
241b5(rgyud): bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal po/ sa der gom pa ji snyed bor ba/ de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gis 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur
241b6(rgyud): de snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa de snyed bor ba de snyed du/ tshe 'ang la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
241b7(rgyud): pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ga lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs dang lha'i
241b8(rgyud): rgya che zhing rgya che ba 'bum phrag du ma thob par 'gyur / skye bar thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur// yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spongs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig
242a1(rgyud): gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya cher bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
242a2(rgyud): 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ 
242a3(rgyud): mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog tu ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par
242a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dang ba
242a5(rgyud): tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa
242a6(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
242a7(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig
242a8(rgyud): rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan par 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye
242b1(rgyud): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyuro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
242b2(rgyud): pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyu ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyuraro// 
242b3(rgyud): deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba brag
242b4(rgyud): khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i
242b5(rgyud): rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongasu thar par byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po
242b6(rgyud): dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la srung ba chen po byas par 'gyuraro// nga bdag
242b7(rgyud): gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis yul 'di dag thams cad
242b8(rgyud): kun tu srung bar 'gyuraro// yongasu bskyad pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'gro ba med pa dang / 'jug pa med par 'gyur snyam du
243a1(rgyud): sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag
243a2(rgyud): la/ mi'i rgyal po dri dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / lha'i tsho gas de dag dang
243a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag laM shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsong nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po
243a4(rgyud): bsan gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// tshe 'di la rgya la po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi
243a5(rgyud): brjid kyis kyang rgyan par 'gyuro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra tham sa cad chos dang 'thun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
243a6(rgyud): chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la de chos la gus pa de lta bus// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge
243a7(rgyud): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ 
243a8(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag nyan cing / 
243b1(rgyud): bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad gcig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des/ 
243b2(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du/ bdug pas
243b3(rgyud): bdugs ma thag tu/ spos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang
243b4(rgyud): rang gi bang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur ro// spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang
243b5(rgyud): ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing
243b6(rgyud): ngag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo che lo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
243b7(rgyud): dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
243b8(rgyud): chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ 
244a1(rgyud): spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du
244a2(rgyud): snang bar 'byung bar 'gyur zhing // snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka'
244a3(rgyud): stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i
244a4(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag/ mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu/ lag na pog snod
244a5(rgyud): gcig thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
244a6(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bya
244a7(rgyud): ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min du nye bar
244a8(rgyud): song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
244b1(rgyud): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam para' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i chobs rnams kyis rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs
244b2(rgyud): rnam su gnas par 'gyur// spos kyi dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnam su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par
244b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnam su gnas
244b4(rgyud): bde bzhin du gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtha
244b5(rgyud): brjid kyi mthus spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag tshi lung tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dum/ gang ba'i klung gi
244b6(rgyud): bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnam su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag gi bar snang la spos dang bdug
244b7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnam su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che ba marnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar
244b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin
245a1(rgyud): gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa leg so leg so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser
245a2(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/ zang mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
245a3(rgyud): 'chad par 'dod pa/ khyod yang leg so leg so// zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyuraro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang // dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan
245a4(rgyud): ba mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa/ dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher ya nga dag par rab tu ston pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos te/ 
245a5(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par
245a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
245a7(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig 'thun pa dang / ngag 'thun pa dang / sgra skad 'thun pas dge slong chos sgra gachos kyi khri
245a8(rgyud): stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi/ 
245b1(rgyud): rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyong pa'i stobs bskyed pa
245b2(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po la legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong
245b3(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs
245b4(rgyud): 'jigs sngar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi sdong po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
245b5(rgyud): pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhig/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug
245b6(rgyud): ste chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa
245b7(rgyud): brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar
245b8(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba
246a1(rgyud): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ shin tu 'jig su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du
246a2(rgyud): ma dag/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongasu thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyu ro zhes gsung bar 'gyuro// de
246a3(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i
246a4(rgyud): yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa/ yong su 'dzin pa mthong
246a5(rgyud): nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na
246a6(rgyud): mchis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu/ lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma
246a7(rgyud): mchis pa/ legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi
246a8(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen po dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen po dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
246b1(rgyud): yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 
246b2(rgyud): 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du nu dag lus mi ganga' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho drang rgyan
246b3(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de gal ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sal ba shams par gyur pa ga la ba der / chos mnyan pa'i slad
246b4(rgyud): du mchi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad 'thun par bgyis
246b5(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid ga/ bla na med pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos kyi bdud ci'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal
246b6(rgyud): po de la kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yong su bskyab pa dang /  su lung u stsang sazhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// 
246b7(rgyud): yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyad pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul der yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'go ba dang / 
246b8(rgyud): 'brug pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang le la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ 
247a1(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyed ma gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la/ sti stang
247a2(rgyud): du mi bgyid/ bla mar mi dgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba
247a3(rgyud): 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi
247a4(rgyud): brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas
247a5(rgyud): pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i
247a6(rgyud): lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang / yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor ma yul der yul rnam par 'jug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal
247a7(rgyud): po'i 'khrug pa mi bzang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / 'tshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / cod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / 
247a8(rgyud): gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par ganga' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na ni
247b1(rgyud): ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba namakha' la gnas pa yang / rtag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su
247b2(rgyud): namakha' la 'anga'i kha dog lta bu 'byil bar 'gyuras yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin pa grag par 'gyur/ yul du drung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab
247b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// yul du mu ge'i yang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur// yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mong pa mang bar 'gyur// yul
247b4(rgyud): de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang yul na gnas pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyis
247b5(rgyud): yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal
247b6(rgyud): por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun rang por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstangs pa'i sems kyis
247b7(rgyud): rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur// yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul
247b8(rgyud): thams cad yun ring du yongasu skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu
248a1(rgyud): thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam
248a2(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu
248a3(rgyud): bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lnga'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar
248a4(rgyud): dgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs
248a5(rgyud): nga'i dbang pos 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa ngag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna
248a6(rgyud): tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos
248a7(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de
248a8(rgyud): dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs
248b1(rgyud): pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lag so// ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis// rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas
248b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongasu bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par
248b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing / 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul
248b4(rgyud): thams cad chos kyis 'jug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis/ rang rang gi yul rnam su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing / 
248b5(rgyud): snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyi ma thams cad lha ngag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po bzhi bdu dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / 
248b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshigs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par
248b7(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / pun bum tshogs pa
248b8(rgyud): rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam du'i gling thams cad na gnas
249a1(rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang
249a2(rgyud): mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
249a3(rgyud): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad da lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba
249a4(rgyud): khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag pas/ ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pas/ byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gis lha'i shes pa ngas/ ches 'phag
249a5(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na me da pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches
249a6(rgyud): 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi don du/ gser 'od dam pa
249a7(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ba shado// mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam+bu'i gling
249a8(rgyud): thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
249b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar bstan/ yong su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des/ ro'i rgyal
249b2(rgyud): po des/ gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyis/ gus pas rim gror bgyi gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
249b3(rgyud): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/ gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
249b4(rgyud): rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu srung ba'i phyir sngo ba rgya cher gyis shig rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
249b5(rgyud): namang dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug shig dang / de dag b+ha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi
249b6(rgyud): mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge
249b7(rgyud): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma srung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gro zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
