249b8(rgyud): rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu
250a1(rgyud): gzung ba dang / yong su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las 'das te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
250a2(rgyud): cag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis pa 'di/ sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa/ de la bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis srung
250a3(rgyud): zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/ bde bar gnas par bgyi'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus srung ba'i
250a4(rgyud): phyir/ sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o// na mo bai shra da NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no ku no// khu no bu no// ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ bi kA raM/ ma hA bi kA raM/ ma hA ka la/ ma hA rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu nAM/ 
250a5(rgyud): sarba satwA nAny+tsa swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la/ sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te// de ltar lan bdun byas nas/ dpung pa la btags na don de nges
250a6(rgyud): bar 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du/ khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang / tsAn ngan dang / ga pur dang / du ru swa dang / a ga ru dang / 'og dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha
250a7(rgyud): mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o// na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA d+ha na dA ya/ tsaN+De shwa rA ya/ a kaR+Sha/ a par mi ta/ tsaN+De shwa ra rdza par ma
250a8(rgyud): kA ru Ni ka/ sa \u0f7fsa twa/ Ni ta tsin+ta/ ma ma d+hA na bad+ho/ h+ye sha swa yaM/ A kaR+Sha ya sAH// sngags 'di lan bdun 'azlas pa'i 'og tu/ rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags 'di 'don pa'i dus su dkon mchog/ 
250b1(rgyud): gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing / nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad
250b2(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na/ sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor
250b3(rgyud): bu zhes dgyi ba'i sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya ma hA rA dA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa~M mo so ni/ su mu su ru/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsar sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki l-i ki li/ ku ru ku ru u ru mu ru/ 
250b4(rgyud): tsu ru tsu ru/ sa~M dA ya/ at+ma naM/ ni t+yan/ an+d+rar+thA tAswA hA/ na mo be shrA ba NA ya swA hA/ d+hA na dA ya swA hA/ na mor tha pa ri drA ra ya swA hA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu// khang pa
250b5(rgyud): dben pa'i nang du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te/ bshos ci dang ci 'byor par mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa bas gas pa'i ngu ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing / nyin mtshan du sems
250b6(rgyud): rtse gcig pas/ sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i sras/ dzi na/ sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis/ de'i gan du mchis te
250b7(rgyud): nga'i yang la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar bya'o// de nas bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol gyis stsol cig ces smos shig/ de nas sras dza nar sha b+has yab la gsol pa/ skyes bu
250b8(rgyud): dam zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang / yab kyis khyod myur du mang la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha da ni brgya rgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas
251a1(rgyud): sngags sgrub pa des/ lhas de lta bu mthong nas don de grub par shes te/ gnas dben par bdag gcig pu spos bsregs la/ nyal khar sngas su dri'i za ma tog gcig bzhag ste/ chal ba
251a2(rgyud): bya'o// de phyin chang nang gcig bzhini du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor 'byung ba las/ nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me tog dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs pa sbyar ba dang / 
251a3(rgyud): brel cing phongs pa rnams la yang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo// khro ba dang 'tshe ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye bar rtag tu
251a4(rgyud): srung bar bgyi'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gzhan yang sras dang / sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la rtag par bsam zhing / bstong pa dang
251a5(rgyud): bsngags pa bya'o// rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang / bsod rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang / 
251a6(rgyud): bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyuraro// lha de ngag gis de ltar byed pa de mthong nas/ kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pa se 'ong zhing de la srung ba dang / skyo par bye'o// sngags mkhan de nyid kyang / 
251a7(rgyud): tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongasu spong ba dang / bgegs dang bar chad thams cad kyang med par 'gyuraro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dag dang / gter gzhan dag kyang thob par
251a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsams pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyuraro// gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na yang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang gcan zan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes
251b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na ches brgyad ngam/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par/ ras dkar po la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang sbyar ba'i
251b2(rgyud): mtshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogasu ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogasu ni
251b3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag bu srang dang / 'khor du bcas par bris te/ gnas der bkram nas/ me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas bda' ba sna
251b4(rgyud): tshogs kyis/ nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chang par mchod par bya'o// sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di
251b5(rgyud): 'bras par bya'o// na maHshrI kaN+DA ya/ bung+ka la/ na mo pa shA baNA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ a ti rA dzA ya/ na ma/ shrI ma hA de byai tad+ya thAH ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru kha ra ba ra/ su shud+ha su shud+d+ho/ 
251b6(rgyud): na Na na/ ma ni ka na/ badz+re bai DUr+yaM/ nuk+ti ka/ a lo kri ta/ sha rI rA ya/ sarba satwA/ tsi ta kA ma/ bai shra ba NA/ shrI ya de bi pra b+ha yaT e hi e gai/ nA bi lar+thag+hAr+Na g+hAr+Na/ pa ra s+ya pa ra s+yad dA hi ma ma/ daR+sha ra/ kA ma s+ya dad naM/ mam
251b7(rgyud): man dra la dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang / mchod pa rgya chen po mthong na/ bdag byams pa dang / dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzho nu'i gzugs
251b8(rgyud): mayang yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzug su byas te/ bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snong dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyis gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas
252a1(rgyud): kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod ni ci dang tse spong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa'am/ nor bu
252a2(rgyud): rin po che 'dod pa 'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa 'am/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa 'am/ sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang / 
252a3(rgyud): tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyis/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig
252a4(rgyud): 'dod pa na yang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongasu grub par bya ste/ rin po che'i gter mi bzad pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dper na nyi zla 'dis la ltung bar 'gyur ba
252a5(rgyud): dang / sa chen po 'di bzhin du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/ bden pa'i tshig 'di ni nams kyang slu bar mi 'gyur bas/ rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du spyod pa longs spyod
252a6(rgyud): pa thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa yang rung / sngags 'di sgrub pa yang rung ste/ tshegs chung ngus myur du
252a7(rgyud): grub par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas/ des phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa che
252a8(rgyud): gcig tu 'byor par 'gyuraro//  dag gis kyang de yongasu srung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjesu 'brang zhing gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
252b1(rgyud): po 'dzin cing rgyas par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyi snang bar byas te/ bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong rnams kyis kyang / rtag tu de'i g.yog tu sgo zhing
252b2(rgyud): mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di sru bamed par yang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgong su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis dus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang / 
252b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis leg sa legaso// zhes dka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
252b4(rgyud): sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yang mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongasu rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di bshad pa ni leg so leg so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te/ 
252b5(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gabar nas/ dus mo gas sa pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul
252b6(rgyud): dang 'thun pa'i tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/ rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog
252b7(rgyud): pad rtsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i
252b8(rgyud): zhabs ni 'khor los bris 'dra ste// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri
253a1(rgyud): med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal// yon tan thams cad ri dbang 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla nga chu zla 'dra// na mkha' dang yang
253a2(rgyud): mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu
253a3(rgyud): ngag gis gser 'od pa yi// mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab
253a4(rgyud): mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// / sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni
253a5(rgyud): stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal ba'i son rnams kyi ni// sdug bsnga la thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin// 'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling
253a6(rgyud): gnas pa yi// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang // shin tu lo
253a7(rgyud): legs nyan kyang dga' 'gyur zhing // 'dzam+bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang // sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde
253a8(rgyud): dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// mdo sde'i dbang po mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshogs
253b1(rgyud): da skyes/ ga 'gas sa ma ma ba gyis man man tshang tshu pa ma /  sa nga phyin mal mas mas
253b2(rgyud): mad sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta// dper na chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tsha de nyam thag tshe ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag gis sgom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di
253b3(rgyud): bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi chogs mchod mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po ngag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs
253b4(rgyud): rgyam rnams kyis kyang / mdo sde'i dbang po 'din rtag tu dgos/ mang rje'i dbang po 'dzin bshad pa na/ ngas rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin/ gnod sbyin bye ba stong dras
253b5(rgyud): brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yus yang drung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// ma rje'i dbang po 'dzi ni nyan par byed/ 'a cu'i gling nam
253b6(rgyud): gyur ba yi// lha ma tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi byad pa// sna tshogs de dag kun kyang rang dga' ngas//  sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'ang yis ni// gzi brjid pan
253b7(rgyud): stongs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'ang lta
253b8(rgyud): 'di dgu thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyum dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis rung tsam zhig dus nas mchim byas te/ de dag sus 'phar yan lagasun 'dar 'ong
254a1(rgyud): pa dang / ying bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man ngar bdag gis gtor// mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas
254a2(rgyud): kyang / stan rnams las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu dgos nas/ dus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sa
254a3(rgyud): ce gsol to// bdun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po pa mi rgyal po chen po'i ri la yang gnod sbyin lnga brgya/ lnga brgya dag/ chos smra ba de la chung ba dag / yong su brgyang ba'i gling du rtag tu / 
254a4(rgyud): slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na yang // bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / mi brjed pa'i mchog gis
254a5(rgyud): gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de ngag gi sems can rnams kyis yongasu rgyas par byed pas/ 
254a6(rgyud): nam yang rung par mi 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag gis ye shes dang / rmongs pa dang / bsod nams kyi chogs
254a7(rgyud): tshang med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ spyan bcos thams cad la mangs shing 'khor ba yong su spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
254a8(rgyud): pamyur du thob par 'gyuraro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongasu skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
254b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i du la bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos
254b2(rgyud): thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yong su 'dzin pa yin no// de sad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
254b3(rgyud): la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i
254b4(rgyud): gzungs kyi tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA rangadwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa
254b5(rgyud): ti'i bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par byang byas pa yin na/ shA radwa ti'i bu ji lngar khyod gzungs
254b6(rgyud): ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas shing / chos kyang ma yin// chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ dngos po can yang
254b7(rgyud): ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/ khyen med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ chos
254b8(rgyud): gang gi skye ba yang ma yin 'gog pa yang ma yin par chos ston mong kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul drim
255a1(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos mi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rig
255a2(rgyud): ba dang / stobs kyi gnas 'dri ba leg so legaso// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thong pas
255a3(rgyud): gang gan na byang chub ses dpa' blan med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten me dang chos kyi rang bzhin gyi
255a4(rgyud): spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de skad ces
255a5(rgyud): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA radwa ti'i bu leg so// legs so// shA rAd+ya ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob
255a6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid du brjod par bya ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod
255a7(rgyud): par byed pa deg/ sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas par 'gyuraro// shA radwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par byed pa de rnams la
255a8(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// shA radwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'odi yin te/ tad+ya thA/ san+d+ha ra Ni/ ud+hA ra Ni/ su sa~M pra tiSh+Tha te/ su nA ma/ su pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza
255b1(rgyud): ya ba la sad+h+ya pra ti dz+nyA/ su a ro hA/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ ut+pA da ni/ a ba nA ba ni/ a d+hi Shi nA ni/ a d+hi bya ta ra/ shu b+ha bsti/ su ni shrI tA/ bcu gum+b+ha/ a b+hi pA da swA hA// shA radwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs
255b2(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang / legs par gzung ba byas nas 'chang bar byed pa de la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam bskal pa brgya
255b3(rgyud): stong du yang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chags pa med pa'i
255b4(rgyud): gdungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya
255b5(rgyud): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// shA rangadwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grang mamed pa phrag bcu rin po che sna dun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgya
255b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang / zhal zas gya nom par bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med
255b7(rgyud): pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tshig cig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
255b8(rgyud): la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
256a1(rgyud): bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad bzlog pa/ so sor 'drang
256a2(rgyud): ba'i sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pang yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig// kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lto phyogs na
256a3(rgyud): skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod// kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod// kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo gang la la
256a4(rgyud): klog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam bar gnas pa shes pa de la/ glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byu nga bar shes par bya'o// glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ 
256a5(rgyud): gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu/ glog thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i che/ drA di ba'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ 
256a6(rgyud): ni min mo ni min d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad bdag la bsrung shig/ bsrungs shig/ swAhA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
256a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos
256a8(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di la/ drA bi Da'i sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka Te bi ka Te/ ni kiTe/ pra t+ya mi tre/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sa re/ aN+Da re/ baN+Da re/ shwe te/ pat+tA ra/ dA si ni/ Na
256b1(rgyud): kaN+Da ri/ ka pi li piM ga la/ a kI da d+hi mu khi dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la bsrungs shig bsrungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ bdag
256b2(rgyud): dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
256b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu nin d+ha re/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti ma hA ma ti/ 
256b4(rgyud): ha ha ha ha/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis drA bi ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di/ su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ 
256b5(rgyud): gor bris pa de dag gis rtag par rgyun tu 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar bgyi'o// sa ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po
256b6(rgyud): tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ 
256b7(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ti li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma pu re swA hA/ prah+ma swa re swAhA/ brah+ma bi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung
256b8(rgyud): ba tshangs pa chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu spyod pa/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lag so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom
257a1(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ gzungs kyi
257a2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra ni/ ban+d+ha/ ma dar+N+Ne/ ma ni ne ti/ ti ni go ra/ gan+ta ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ puk+ka se/ sa la pra b+he/ he na ma t+yo taM/ ut+tA ra ni/ ma ho ra ni d+ha ra Ni ge/ 
257a3(rgyud): tsakra bA ke/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ bdag gi rigs sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par
257a4(rgyud): 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa lag so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom
257a5(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang / skye bo mang po la sang dag skye ma tsho
257a6(rgyud): / rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ du ma pa ri hA re/ Ar+ya pu sha ste/ shan+ta ni muk+She aM ga l+ya/ hi raN+Da
257a7(rgyud): gar+b+he stu ste/ sta bi te swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe
257a8(rgyud): skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa lag so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ 
257b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad
257b2(rgyud): bzlog par dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byang snyems dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa
257b3(rgyud): mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i sladadu// thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
257b4(rgyud): cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te/ sems ser snas bskor ba lag so// tad+ya thA sa tshigasas / a mri te/ ak+Sha ye/ a b+hi ye pu N+ye/ bar+ya ba te/ sarba pA paM/ pra sha ma nA ye swA hA/ 
257b5(rgyud): Ar+ya ban+d+ha/ su bar nI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don dam/ yi ger bris pa de la/ glog
257b6(rgyud): gi 'jig pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus
257b7(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyuraro/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po
257b8(rgyud): de dag la leg so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhin bzang dag/ khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang // skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rje su gzung ba'i phyir/ dra bi Da'i gsang sngags/ 
258a1(rgyud): kyi tshig rnams bshang leg so leg so// phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyuro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
258a2(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ 
258a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 
258a4(rgyud): de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung de/ 
258a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig rgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar sgrub
258a6(rgyud): bar dgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu bzhag par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la
258a7(rgyud): tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yong su nyams par gyur tam bsgyud na/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad rtsub par bgyi'o// ci nas sangs rgyas
258a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba sbun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du
258b1(rgyud): nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis
258b2(rgyud): mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis par rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur
258b3(rgyud): ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mangs par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyang
258b4(rgyud): ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gis don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan
258b5(rgyud): pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang sngags
258b6(rgyud): ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi'u wang spri ka dang / sha mya sha myi shi ri sha in+d+ra hasta skal pa che/ dza ma shing tsa a ga ru/ sha ri be sta sra rtsi'i pog/ gu gul ra sa sha la ga~M/ rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang // tsan ngan da
258b7(rgyud): ni ldong ros dang // gi'u wang dang bcas ru rta dang // gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug spel na la dang / na ga ge sar u shi ra/ 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas/ skar ma rgyal la btags par
258b8(rgyud): bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdag par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri te ka ma ta li/ na li dza na ka ra te/ he kar te/ in+d+ra dzA li ni/ shaM ka ra dre/ ba shad dre/ a brta ka/ si ke na ku tra ku
259a1(rgyud): ka ba le/ ka be la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ ban+de/ d+ha d+ha ma pa i shwa ri shi ri/ sa t+ya s+thi She swA hA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi// gser gyi sdong
259a2(rgyud): dang dngul snod du// mngar ba'i khu ba bzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/ bzhi zhig der yang bzhag par bgyi// rab tu rgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi/ bum pa thogs pa bzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par
259a3(rgyud): bgyid/ sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan gyis// lha mo de ni legs par rgyan// khar bar dag tu me long bzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtse sna sbrang bzhag/ de nas 'tshams kyang bcang bar bgyi/ 
259a4(rgyud): de yi 'og tu bgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams bcang ba yang brtsam par bgyi// smad ya the dan/ a ra ke/ na ya ne/ hi le mi lI/ ki le/ khi khi le swahA// de nas bcom
259a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi snam log su khrus bgyis nas// sngags 'di bzlas brjod dgyis na// khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De/ bi ga ta ba ti swAhA/ phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas
259a6(rgyud): pa'i// rgyu skar dag gis tshe bsrungs shig/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzang zhi gyur cig/ 
259a7(rgyud): d+ya thA/ sha me bi sha me swAhA/ sa ga De/ bi ga re swA hA/ bi ga De ba te swA hA/ sA ga ra/ sa~M bud+d+hA ya sA hA/ rban+t+ra mA tA ya swA hA/ nI la kar+N+Na ya swA hA/ a pa ra dzi ta/ birI ya swA hA/ hI ma ban+d+ha/ saM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ a ni mi la
259a8(rgyud): bak+tA ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ prah+ma Ne/ na ma swa ra sA t+ye/ ma hA de bye sid+d+hAn+t+ra nAM/ man+ta pa dA/ ta re tu bi tsi ti/ drad+d+hA nu ma nu t+ya swA hA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la srung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger bris pa de
259b1(rgyud): dag gi don gyi slad du// khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nang thams cad rab tu
259b2(rgyud): zhi bar bgyi'o// ci nas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par
259b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
259b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / lon nga 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang / ro langs thams cad
259b5(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod// skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod
259b6(rgyud): kyis sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
259b7(rgyud): tu 'dug/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u de n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkugo/ lha mo chen po dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog skyon yon tan ma/ 
259b8(rgyud): cer gnas mdzes mdur brtsa yis gos bsdus pa// dur ba'i rtsa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas/ lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te/ sems can rnams la dge ba'i
260a1(rgyud): tshig shod skye khrol mdzod// s+yA ya the dan/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a ba dz+ra ba ti/ maM gu le/ ma~M gu le/ bing+ga la ba ti/ ming+ku She/ mA ri ts+yai/ sa ma ti/ da shra ma ti/ a g+ni
260a2(rgyud): ta ma gr-i/ tar tsi/ ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi tsi ri/ shi ri mi ri mA ra ts+yai/ pra na bri le/ lo ka h+ye l+le tso rgya ma ma n+ti pre d+he/ d+hi ma mu khi/ shu tsi tsi ri/ a pra ti ha ta~M/ a pra ti ta ta bud+d+hi/ na mu ni ma hA/ na mu / 
260a3(rgyud): ma hA de b+hi/ pra ti gri hA/ nam skuran// bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang / tshigasu bcid pa'i rgyu dang sde snod dang snyan dag la sogs pa la/ dag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu
260a4(rgyud): gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha be he li he li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mjug bdag rnam pa ngar rgyal bar gyur cig/ kAr te ke yU re/ ke yU ra ma ti/ hi li mi li/ 
260a5(rgyud): hi li mi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi/ bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten
260a6(rgyud): na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ti li mi yi rjem na tsha di ming ka rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo
260a7(rgyud): chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/ yang bram ze ko'u di n+ya
260a8(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa dam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon d+haR+Ya shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / nor dang / dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan
260b1(rgyud): bdogs shing myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa leg so leg so// mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// gzungs 'di dang por su 'don pas// dkon
260b2(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te// 'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang dam chos dang // byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang // tshangs pa dang ni
260b3(rgyud): brgya byin dang // rgyal chen bani la phyag 'tshal zhing // rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang // rim gro gus par bsam byas te// zhi la dben pa'i gnas su ni// sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod// ji snyed sangs
260b4(rgyud): rgyas lha klu sa// mchod pa rgya chen bshams par bya// skye bo'i rigs ni mang po la// snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya// bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can/ rtse gcig sems kyis
260b5(rgyud): bsam bya zhing // bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyis// dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i// de yi tshig don legs bsams te// stong nyid sgrub pa'ang gnas par byos// bcom ldan thang
260b6(rgyud): mngon sum du// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na// ting 'dzin dang ye shes dang // gzungs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan dpa la mgur gsung chos kyis// dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor
260b7(rgyud): rnams 'dul// ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing // so sor ci rigs ya mtshan ston// de lha'i gsung mchog dam pa la// rtag par bsam zhing 'jigs pa spongs// bsam mi khyab pa'i ljags mtshan
260b8(rgyud): 'di// smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes// chos rnams med par ston mdzad pa// ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin// sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gsung sgral// de bsams smon lam tshad med 'grub// gang zhig dbyangs/ 
261a1(rgyud): can mngon mchod ngam// yang na slob mas man ngag bzhin// lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa// bkur sti mchog rnams thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ye shes mchog sgrub pa'ang // rtse gcig/ 
261a2(rgyud): sems kyis chos 'di gzung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing // nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs// gang zhig nor sgrub nor ldan dang // khyed dang grags pa'ang de bzhin 'grub// 'byung bar 'dod pa'ang
261a3(rgyud): rnams grol bar// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// yon tan mang po tshad med dang // bsam pa bzhin du kun 'grub pas// 'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// 
261a4(rgyud): dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te// dkyil 'khor ci ran byas pa der// dum pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag ste// dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod// ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldi bri// phye ma byug pas rgyan par brgyan// 
261a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod// lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur// dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du// zhag bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de// gal te lha de ma mthong na// bsam pa
261a6(rgyud): brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas// de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na// gzhan du shis pa'i gnas btsal te// tshul bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la// mchod cing bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcod// bdag dang gzhan don tshad
261a7(rgyud): med la// nyin mtshan rgyun tu brtson bskyed de// de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs// des ni bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de ste'ang bsam pa ma grub na// zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/ yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na// 
261a8(rgyud): mngon shes drug la sogs pa'ang thob// de nas bram ze ke'u di n+yas 'di skad ces bshad pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang / rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras// lha dang mi la sogs
261b1(rgyud): pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ sems ma g.yeng bar bdag la nyon cig dang / bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te// dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o// 
261b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la// 'jig rten khams 'dir dbang brnyes par// sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas// de phyir bdag gis khyed la bstod// dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang // thos 'dzin mdzes ldan
261b3(rgyud): grags ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin// rtag tu dpal la brtson chen spyod// g.yul gyi gnas la rtag tu rgyal// snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed// gshin rje'i sring mos lung ston cing // rtag
261b4(rgyud): tu dang gos sngon po banabs// mdzes dang mi mdzes kun ston cing // spyan rig sus mthong dngang pa bskyed// spyod pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// sbyang su su 'ongs rjes su 'dzin// bar dga' ri dang / 
261b5(rgyud): brag la gnas// bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram / yang na sngon sdong nags rnams// gnas de dag ni lha mo'i rten// ltar ri brag mi rnams kyis// rma bya'i mdongs las gdugs byas shing / 
261b6(rgyud): rtag tu lha mo de mchod na// thams cad dus su 'jig rten skyob// stag dang seng ges 'khor byas shing // bya dang phyugs dang de la brten// dri chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas// bin d+ha'i ri la grags par gyur// phyag
261b7(rgyud): na tri shUl thor tshugs dbu// yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams// zla ba mar ngo'i bcu cig gam// dgu yi dus su mchod par bya// g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs brtse bas// 'jig rten kun la gzigs pa'i
261b8(rgyud): phyir// lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas// lha mo'i mchog de dpe med pa'o// phyugs rdzi rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing // lha dag 'thab pa'ang rtag tu rgyal// yun ring 'jig rten bde bar byas// bar dga' bros
262a1(rgyud): /  shing bar 'gal ni/ bram zer sgra zhing chos bani ngag / rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la ma khas/ drang srong ste yi dbang brnyes pas//  chen 'di dang sa bon byed// lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang / 
262a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho lung bzhin nges par 'du// gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyis// kun gyi gtso byad 'dul bar nus// mo rnams kun gyi tshangs spyod mchog 'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la dgongs// rgyal po'i gnas na'ang
262a3(rgyud): pad+mo bzhin// chu bo la yang gru dang gzings// zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas// mang du thos ldan brten yang byed// ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags// bsam pas gling dang rab kyang ston// lha min la sogs lha
262a4(rgyud): rnams kyis// kun gyis yon tan bstod cing bsngags// spyan stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang // gus pa'i sems kyis zhal du blta// sems can gang dag ci 'dod pa// de kun bsam pa myur du nong
262a5(rgyud): blo myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang // sa chen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams dag tu// rtag tu sgron chen snang byed bzhin// bya dang gcan zan ri dgas kyi'ang // 
262a6(rgyud): kun gyis bsam pa yongasu skong // bud med kyi mchog ri ba bzhin// drang srong 'jig rten ring gnas bzhin// lha mo gzhon gzhin 'dod dang bral// mi mjed bdag bzhin bden par smra// 'jig rten 'thun par
262a7(rgyud): gzugs ston cing // 'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang // khyod ni lha mo'i gtso yin pas// de las mchog pa'i sems can med// gal te g.yul dang 'jigs pa'i gnas// me yi dong du lhung gyur tam// 
262a8(rgyud): chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las// 'jigs pa de las sgrol par mdzad// rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang // yang na dgra yis bsad par yang // rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos pa// sdug bsngal dag las
262b1(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur/ dge dang mi dge kun las stsog/ byams dang snying rje mdun du gnas// de phyir bdag ni sems btud de// phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o// de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u ri nus
262b2(rgyud): lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis// lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// dung med
262b3(rgyud): dam pa lha mo mchog gis rab gang yin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag rgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod
262b4(rgyud): nams 'bar// dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par rgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir/ mchog rab dag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa
262b5(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang // yang dag bsngag/ sa pa yon tan byed pa dang // dri meng mchog dang pad ma 'bar ba dang // mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang // dge ba'i gnas
262b6(rgyud): dang dge ba mthong ba dang // yon tan bsam mi khyab pas rgyan pa dang // zla ba dang 'dra dri ma med 'ong dang // ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang // lag pa
262b7(rgyud): brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyad pa dang // mda' gzhu mdung dang ral gri dgra sta dang // be tshon lcags kyu 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal// yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs
262b8(rgyud): snyan dang // shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang // lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang / 
263a1(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir// swA sA bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag la
263a2(rgyud): dngos grub gsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu bsrungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad
263a3(rgyud): rnyed// dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze ko'u ngi n+ya la legaso zhes bka' stsal te// khyod kyis sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir lha mo
263a4(rgyud): dbyangs can la bstod pa dang / dngos grub dam pa slong bras bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de nas slob dpon lung stong pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags
263a5(rgyud): kyi tshig gis/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la gso/ la nas/ yang 'khor de dag la smras pa/ skyes bu khyod kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang / de'i thugs rjes skyab
263a6(rgyud): cing / tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing / tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal
263a7(rgyud): zhing thogs pa med pa grub par 'dod pas/ bsam pa de nges shing gus pa'i sems kyis/ lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// 
263a8(rgyud): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad
263b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par bden pa'i gsung gnas pa/ so so'i dbang po dang 'thun par bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar gsung ba nganas pa bye ba cha/ 
263b2(rgyud): med par yang dag par bden pa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing / gsung ba de dag la rje su yi rang ngo // bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste/ 'dzam+bu'i gling dang / rgyal chen bzhi dang / stong
263b3(rgyud): gcig dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba
263b4(rgyud): thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshalo// ljags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang / bdag spobs pa tshad med pa dang ldan par gyur
263b5(rgyud): cig phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog khyang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog/ 'phags pa rang rgyal dbyangs can mchog zung bzhi la brgyad dbyangs can mchog/ bden pa bani
263b6(rgyud): gsung dbyangs can mchog/ yang dag gzigs dang dbyangs can mchog/ drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo dbu ma dbyangs can mchog/ skyem byed lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ gzi can klu yang/ 
263b7(rgyud): dbyangs can mchog/ mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog/ bde nas lha sras dbyangs can mchog/ rdo rje gsang bdag dbyangs can mchog/ khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs/ 
263b8(rgyud): can mchog/ lha mo be mo dbyangs can mchog/ tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog ti ri tshig 'chang dbyangs can mchog/ 
264a1(rgyud): / ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog/ 'phrog ma mo yang dbyangs can mchog/ gnod sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog/ bdag la las
264a2(rgyud): mchog kun gyis stongs// mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod// spu med pa la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par grol la phyag 'tshalo// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshalo// bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshalo// 
264a3(rgyud): rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshalo// 'od snang mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tsha'o// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tsha'o// don dam gnas la phyag 'tsha'o// 'khor mang gtsa la phyag
264a4(rgyud): 'tsha'o// dbyangs can lha la phyag 'tsha'o// bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod// bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa// thams cad myur du grub par mdzod// nad med rtag tu bde ba dang // tshe ring ba yang
264a5(rgyud): thob par shog/ rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang / byang chub lam la brtson pa dang / skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod// re ba thams cad myur du skongs// bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang / 
264a6(rgyud): bdag gis mi slu tshig smras pa// dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni// bdag gi don de grub par mdzod// lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol// bdag gi tshig la thogs med mdzod// lus dang ngag
264a7(rgyud): dang myur zhugs shing // ying myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag gis lce yi dbang po la// bde gshegs spongs pa ldan par mdzod// tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni// sems can thams cad 'dul bar
264a8(rgyud): mdzod// bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa// don de thams cad grub par shog/ tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing // byed pa thams cad chung ma gson// nam zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa// don de grub par ma
264b1(rgyud): gyur na// lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur/ mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa// sangs rgyas bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang // byas pa bzo ba'i tshig
264b2(rgyud): rnams dang // shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dag la dang // bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste// de la sogs pa'i bden tshig kyang // thams cad bdag la grub par shog// sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dang // dag gis der/ 
264b3(rgyud): 'dir spyan drang gis/ bdag gi re ba bskang pa'i phyir// thams cad myur du gshegs par mdzod// yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol pa// thams cad slu ba med par shog/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang // gtsang ma'i
264b4(rgyud): gnas ni thams cad dang // tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang // stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang // mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang // de dang de
264b5(rgyud): yi 'khor rnams dang / de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing // rtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzad/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang // gzhan yang
264b6(rgyud): 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang // byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas// dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams dang // 'thab bral gyi ni lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang // 
264b7(rgyud): gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha dag dang // ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang // chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang // de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang // zur phud lnga can nor rgyas dang // nyi zla gza' dang
264b8(rgyud): rgyu skar dang // de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang // 'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas// de la sogs pa'i lha thams cad du/ sdig pa'i las la ma mos dang // sangs rgyas la gus 'byung ba'i ma// bu rab gzhon la/ 
265a1(rgyud): byams pa dang // sgra dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// dri za dang ni lha ma yin// gzhan yang mi 'am ci dag dang // lto 'phye che la sogs pa rnams// kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni/ 
265a2(rgyud): bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes brtse ba'i dgongs pa yis// bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyed// lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyi// gzhan gyi sems rigs mkhyen pa rnams// kun gyi
265a3(rgyud): mthu yis byin rlabs shing // bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ ji snyed namapa' mtha' gtugs shing // chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can de dag thams cad kyis// bdag
265a4(rgyud): la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ de nas dbyangs ches \u0f7fmo la// bram ze ko'u di n+yas de skad ces gsol pa dang // lha mos skyes bu chen po de la dge'o zhes smras te/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
265a5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ tshigasu bcad pas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'ang zhing 'dzin pa dang // dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu
265a6(rgyud): srong ste/ sems 'dun pas rjesu dmigs shing // ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhin du sgrubs nas/ chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gser 'od dam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing zab
265a7(rgyud): pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas pa ni ma gtog so// de skad smras pa dang / bram ze ko'u ri n+ya rab tu
265a8(rgyud): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rjesu 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongasu
265b1(rgyud): drung zhing yongasu rgyas par bya ba dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang / bsod nams dang / rlobs pa tshad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems bskyed
265b2(rgyud): ba rnams kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa leg so// leg so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga
265b3(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang / chos smra ba'i dge slong de
265b4(rgyud): po byang thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang // brel phongs pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems nyas pa thab par 'gyur rang / sems rtas pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems
265b5(rgyud): de ba gdugs mtshan ngas par 'gyur ba dang / gal 'od dam pa mad sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang yi ke rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtogs
265b6(rgyud): der 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyis slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
265b7(rgyud): 'dzim+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba
265b8(rgyud): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ 
266a1(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus nabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
266a2(rgyud): rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ gos dang zas dang / mal
266a3(rgyud): cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gso sman dang / sman zong dang / yo byad dang / 'tshog chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
266a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des da ltar/ 
266a5(rgyud): phyogs gang dang / gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma
266a6(rgyud): dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / 
266a7(rgyud): dngul dang / sa la sbrum dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyu'o// lha mo chen mo dpal gyis mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod
266a8(rgyud): bar bya / smos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la ro sna tshogs kyang byin na de'i 'bru'i
266b1(rgyud): phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa'i bcud dag rnam par 'phel// lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon shing rnams
266b2(rgyud): lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnam kyang bskyed// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la// lha mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur// de dag la dpal chen mor/ 
266b3(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ leg so leg so// lha mo khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjesu dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
266b4(rgyud): mchod pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnam sa la phan pa dang / bde bas phan 'dogs shing mdo sde 'di yang yongasu rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang / ldan
266b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyas po las/ lha mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas lha mo dpal chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ang ma
266b6(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas byang phyog su mi ring ba zhig na/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na bskyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces
266b7(rgyud): bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang bzang pad+ma dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na/ bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la zhig 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des/ rang gi khyim phyag dar
266b8(rgyud): legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos rab tu dri zhim par bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
267a1(rgyud): / chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing / mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod lha mo chen mo dpal gyis
267a2(rgyud): lag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos kyang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod
267a3(rgyud): bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing // me tog dang bdug pa yang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ de'i tshe
267a4(rgyud): lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po yang 'phel bar 'gyuraro// lha mo chen mo dpal dgug par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 
267a5(rgyud): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de
267a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba'i rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin
267a7(rgyud): gshegs pa 'dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od snang ba'i
267a8(rgyud): snying po la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag/ 
267b1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshalo// shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal/ 
267b2(rgyud): lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tsha'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med la phyag 'tsha'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag 'tsha'o// 
267b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
267b4(rgyud): dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu du la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa'
267b5(rgyud): rab gnas la phyag 'tsha'o// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig pa 'di bdag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor bar gyur cig/ s+yad ya the dan/ pra ti pud+d+hA tsa ra~M/ sa man+ta dad ne/ ma hA
267b6(rgyud): hA ra ga ti/ sa man+ta bi ma na ga ta/ ma hA kar+ya/ pra ti pra ma ne satwa ar+yA sa man+ta nu pra pu ne/ a yA na d+harma tA/ ma hA b+ho ge ne/ ma hA mai tri/ su pa saM hi te/ ma hA kle she/ su saM gr-i hi te/ sa mar thA nu pA la ni rA hA/ 
267b7(rgyud): 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi chog gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub par sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar ma la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba
267b8(rgyud): kha na tho ba med par dag gis/ lo bdun du 'don cing / 'dzin pa dag la yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la bsnyen te/ bdag dang sems can kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su rdzogs par
268a1(rgyud): / bya ba'i phyir snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang / spos rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ 
268a2(rgyud): gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang bar byas la/ lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya// stan gtsang ma yang gting bar bya'o// sa la me
268a3(rgyud): tog gi sil ma bkram ste bsdad par bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la/ dpal lha mo 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyuro// de phyin chad khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang
268a4(rgyud): ngamang dgon pa'i gnasu nam yang brel cing phongs pa med par 'gyuraro// 'gron bu dang gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byang thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyar ba
268a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag tham sa cad las lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ de nas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ 
268a6(rgyud): 'phangs par mi 'gyur de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis nor yong su spel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste
268a7(rgyud): bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ da ltar dang / 
268a8(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman sdong ngam/ pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 
268b1(rgyud): ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od
268b2(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang dang gang na/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri shom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du chos
268b3(rgyud): smra ba stan la mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de
268b4(rgyud): dang / de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og log su mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas rten par bgyi'o// bdag kyang chos mnyan
268b5(rgyud): pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gror bgyi/ yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o// dag tshim par gyur/ rim gro bgyis par gyur nas/ rab
268b6(rgyud): tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgya nga po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du/ sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ 
268b7(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du yang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ sari bcud kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam
268b8(rgyud): bu'i gling 'dir rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal sna tshogs rnams gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'khrud par 'gyur/ kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / shing ljon pa thams cad dang / 
269a1(rgyud): / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa thams cad dang / rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi/ dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snum dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ro zhim por
269a2(rgyud): gyur/ blta na rab tu sdug pa dang / rab tu che bar 'gyuraro// sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang / bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa de dag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang stobs dang / kha dog dang / dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel
269a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// gzi byin dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan par gyur na chags la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag du ma dag bgyid par 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 
269a4(rgyud): 'bang par 'gyur/ stong su bgyi ba'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des 'dza m+bu'i gling thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / lo legs pa dang / rgyas pa dang / nyams dga' bar
269a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ dga'/ ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi byin dang / 
269a6(rgyud): stobs dang kha dog dang / gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du/ dge slong ngam// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i
269a7(rgyud): dbang po 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi bri stan la mchis glan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
269a8(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de dag la gsol ba 'dengs par 'gyur// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i/ 
269b1(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang / 
269b2(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi byin dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang 'jug par 'gyuro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma
269b3(rgyud): bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur/ gzi byin dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / shugs chen po thob par gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam+bu'i gling
269b4(rgyud): 'di sa'i bcud chen pos rnam par 'phel bar/ 'gyu ro// sa chen po gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag
269b5(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur ra/ chen por yang 'gyu ro// sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang yongasu spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod
269b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bde ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyuraro// de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / mal cha dang stan dang / gnas dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med
269b7(rgyud): khang dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pas las 'byung gas la brten pa 'di
269b8(rgyud): la spyod par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des na sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa ba'o bar bgyi'o// gdon mi 'tshal ba gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
270a1(rgyud): sti stang du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos sgra
270a2(rgyud): ba de'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/ rigs tha dad pa dang khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'ong ngam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang
270a3(rgyud): khyim dang / grong dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis/ de ring chos mnyan bzab mo thos so// de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams
270a4(rgyud): kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yong su bzung ngo // bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so// deng bdag cag gis chos
270a5(rgyud): mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yod/ su thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongasu thar to// deng bdag cag gis chos
270a6(rgyud): mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs ma 'das pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i skye ba yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// zhes gtam zer bar 'gyu ro// khyim tha dad pa gnas par 'gyur ba de dag
270a7(rgyud): sems can gzhan dag la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig tsam brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon
270a8(rgyud): byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la
270b1(rgyud): thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha
270b2(rgyud): dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu/ 'di dag gcig la gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam brgyud brjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das phyogs
270b3(rgyud): de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / shin tu snum par 'gyuraro// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de drag thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcung rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad
270b4(rgyud): thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyuraro// rnam par/ 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur/ sems can de ngag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyuraro// nor che ba dang / longs spyod
270b5(rgyud): che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
270b6(rgyud): sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshigs gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
270b7(rgyud): lha'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyuraro// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la ngag/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir gnas de dag
270b8(rgyud): legs par rgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yog nagasa'i lha mo rtag tu rgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de dag tu lta'i
271a1(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyis gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ 
271a2(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyuraro// lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang
271a3(rgyud): myong bar 'gyu ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nges na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba
271a4(rgyud): chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe chos kyi snyan rgya 'og logs kyis phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i
271a5(rgyud): sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams
271a6(rgyud): kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / me 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar
271a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sen
271a8(rgyud): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chang bar 'gyur bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa yan
271b1(rgyud): lag gi dam pa mgo bos brten par bgyi'o// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po zhig mchis pa 'di lha dang / mi thams cad la phan pa dang brtse/ 
271b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis/ bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa dang / nor dang nor bu rin po che dang / dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa dang / 
271b3(rgyud): sman bzang pos tshe ring zhing nad med par 'dod pa dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jil bar 'dod na/ gnas dben par dkyil 'khor byas te/ khrus byas gos sar pa bgos te/ 
271b4(rgyud): bting ba'i ste du 'dug nas/ sku gzugs ring bsrel can gyis mdun nam/ mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / zhal bas sna tshogs kyis mchod de skar ma rgyal dang sbyar ba'i
271b5(rgyud): ches brgyan la sems rtse gcig gis gzugs sdug/ sa 'di dazlas pas spya drangs par 'gyur te/ sngags la// d+yA thA/ kyi ma tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ ku ru ku ru/ kuTu gu ru/ T+Ta ta mub ta ba ha/ 
271b6(rgyud): sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis bdag spyan drang ba'i phyir/ sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ bdag de'i gan du mchi bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang
271b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dang mjal cing smra bar 'tshal na/ cho ga snga ma'i tshul du bshams te/ sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ an tsa na kya li k+Sha ni/ shi shi d+ha ri hwA ha/ hi hI/ ku
271b8(rgyud): ru ba re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sngags snga ma bzlas pa byas na/ de'i mdun du lus bstan te/ nges par bsam pa rdzogs par bgyi'o// gang sngags 'di zlos par
272a1(rgyud): 'dod pas sngar dus srung ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di brjod do// dra rmAn sha ri/ b+ha shaka ke ti shud ti b+hU ta g+hu k+Sheri b+h+ya ma Ti Ti ba Ti u ku rbi// btsal sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
272a2(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe/ tshan srung sna lnga la sngags lan re gdab cing // mdud pa re re bcing ngo // de 'dra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/ dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ 'jigs pa
272a3(rgyud): thams cad bsal te/ lus bsrungs par 'gyur ro// sems mi g.yeng bar sngags 'di bzlas nas/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// bdag gi tshig 'di mi slu bar/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / 
272a4(rgyud): chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchogarnams bdag la mngon du gzigs shing dgongs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la leg so// zhes
272a5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// gang khyod kyis bden pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'dis mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang / chos smra ba de la srung bar byas pa de ni leg so leg so// de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang bsod
272a6(rgyud): nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o// 
272a7(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu dgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha
272a8(rgyud): ngas la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 
272b1(rgyud): / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'iri sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ 
272b2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ngam/ grong rdal lam/ 
272b3(rgyud): ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar bgyi ste/ dge slong chos smra ba de la srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongs su
272b4(rgyud): bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad gang su dag
272b5(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa cig nyan pa dang / tha na tshig cig gam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
272b6(rgyud): nga'i rgyal zang mi byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan cig tsam thos par gyur te/ zung ba dang tha na gsor 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
272b7(rgyud): ming thos par 'gyur te/ bzung ba de thams cad kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rigs de dag dang / 
272b8(rgyud): khyim de dag dang / grong de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / grong rdal de dag dang / dgon pa de dag dang / pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / 
273a1(rgyud): yong su bsrung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag
273a2(rgyud): shes zhes ming du chags par gyur zhe na/ 'di ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to// chos thams cad yongs su
273a3(rgyud): 'tshal to// chos thams cad khong du chud do// chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad gnas pa gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang / chos
273a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs gang dag lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag la mngon sumo// / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes
273a5(rgyud): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi gas la ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khya'o// ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
273a6(rgyud): chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes kyi yul 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag chos thams cad yang dag par 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par yongasu brtags pa
273a7(rgyud): dang / yang dag par yongasu 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par rnam par blta ba dang / yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu des na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes
273a8(rgyud): zhes ming du chag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig rgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas dge slong chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal
273b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi slang du sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don
273b2(rgyud): kyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
273b3(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur
273b4(rgyud): ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par
273b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gror
