273b6(rgyud): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ de'i spu'i bu ga rnamasu gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o// de'i lus la mthu dang stobs dang
273b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o// de'i dran pa khong du chud par bya'o// de cher spro bar bgyi'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
273b8(rgyud): po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs sngags zhig mchis pa 'di/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
274a1(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o// sngags la/ na mo bud+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na mo bras+t+ra ya/ na mo in+d+ra ya/ na maHtsaturma hA rA dz+nyA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ 
274a2(rgyud): hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ gau ri ma hA go ri/ gan+ta ri/ ma hA gan+d+ha ri/ dri mi ri/ ma hA dri mi Di/ N+Da khu khun+te ha ha ha ha n+te hi hi hi hi hi hu hu hu hu hu/ ha lo d+ha me/ gu d+ha me/ tsa tsa tsa tsa/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu tsu/ tsaSh+Ti shwa ra/ 
274a3(rgyud): kha ra shi kha ra/ utiSh+Tha he b+ha ga bAn/ sa~M bid dz+nyA ya swA hA// gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bdag gis de la 'tshe ba'i yo byad bsod snyoms dang / gos dang me tog dang / 'bras
274a4(rgyud): bu dang / nor dang / rin po che la sogs pa thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig bu pho mo smos pa dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan la sogs
274a5(rgyud): pa'i yo byad 'dod na yang / bdag gis de la yid bzhin du so sor stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'di'i mthu/ dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gang gsang sngags 'di
274a6(rgyud): zlos pa'i tshe/ bdag myur du de'i gan du mchis to ci yang thogs pa med par 'grub par bgyi'o// gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ thog mar gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po yang dag shes kyis
274a7(rgyud): gzugs/ srid chags bzhi pa 'am lnga pa/ lag na dgra sta thogs pa bris pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa'i grwa bzhir/ sbrang rtsi 'am bu ram chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi zhog la/ byug pa dang
274a8(rgyud): bye ma dang / bdug pa sreg cing / me tog gi phreng bas kyang mchod par bgyi'o// yang dkyil 'khor de'i mdun du/ sbyin sreg gi thab khung brkos pa la/ dud pa med pa'i nang du mar dang yungs dkar bsres la/ 
274b1(rgyud): sngags lan re bzlas shing / thab de'i nang du sbyin bsreg bya'o// de ltar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pa dang / bdag de la lus mngon par ston te/ khyod ci 'dod ces dri bar bya'o// de nas sngags grub pa des
274b2(rgyud): kyang ci 'dod pa de la smos shig dang / ci 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do// gang gser dngul 'dod pa dang / gnyer tshol bar 'dod pa dang / lha'i drang srong 'dod pa yang 'gru ste/ rnamapar
274b3(rgyud): la 'gro'o// gzhan yang lha'i mig dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang thob par byed do// sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du dbang sgyur zhing / 
274b4(rgyud): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rgyun bcad de/ rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ 
274b5(rgyud): leg so leg so// gang khyod kyis sems can tham sa cad la phan zhing bde ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'di yongasu srung ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di smras pas/ bsod nams dpag
274b6(rgyud): tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur// gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// de nas sa'i lha
274b7(rgyud): mo bstan ma zhes bya ba de/ 'khor mang po de'i nang na 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
274b8(rgyud): ldan 'das gang yul 'khor na/ mi'i rgyal po byed pas yang dag pa'i chos mi spyod na/ yul gyi srid 'dzin cing sems can mang po la bde ba dang / rang gi lus rgyal thabs 'thon po'i sa na/ yun ring
275a1(rgyud): por gnas par mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dang ldan pas rgyal po'i bstan bcos yang dag pas yul gyi srid ji ltar 'dzin pa bshad par gsol/ de
275a2(rgyud): thos pas mi'i rgyal po rnams chos de lta bus 'jig rten skyong zhing // rgyal thabs dam pa la yun ring du gnas pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang // yul 'khor gyi skye bo de dag thams cad kyang yongasu bde
275a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i tshogs kyi nang na/ sa'i lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon cig sngon byung ba 'das
275a4(rgyud): pa'i dus na/ rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya ba la/ bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba de'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ yab mchog gi rgyal po'i
275a5(rgyud): tog las blangs pa/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig des/ lo nyi khri'i bar du rgyal
275a6(rgyud): po nyid byas par gyur te/ tha na sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam gyis chod kyang sngon chos ma yin pas/ phyogs 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma shes so// bu rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i
275a7(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya de gang zhe na/ de nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya bas/ bu rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog la/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam
275a8(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis// rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// sems can kun la phan byed pa// the tshom thams cad gcod pa po// nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed pa// rgyal
275b1(rgyud): po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya/ rgyal po thams cad so so nas// dga' ba'i semasu 'gyur byos la// lha yi dbang po'i dam tshig kun// thal mo sbyar te nyan par byos// rdo rje'i 'byung gnas ri dbang 'dir/ 
275b2(rgyud): lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na// tshangs dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang langs// khyod ni lha gtso tshangs pa ste// khyod ni lha rnams dbang phyug lags// khyod ni bdag cag the tshom
275b3(rgyud): gcod// bdag cag dogs pa bcad du gsol// mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la// ji lta bur ni lha zhes bgyi// gang gi rgyus ni rgyal po la// lha sras zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur// gal te lha ni ji lta bur// 
275b4(rgyud): mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skyes zhing / mi bdag gyur te mi rnams la// rgyal po nyid ni bgyid par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la// de skad yongasu dris pa dang // lha yi gtso bo tshangs
275b5(rgyud): ba des// 'jig rten skyong sa 'di skad smras// de ltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis// de ltar bdag la dris pa na// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan bcos dam pa kho bos bstan/ 
275b6(rgyud): mi yi gan su skyes pa ni// rgyal po rnams kyi skye ba dang // rgyu gang gis na yul rnamasu// rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad par bya// lha dang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyi// ma ya~M rum du 'jug gyur te// lha yis sngar ni byin/ 
275b7(rgyud): rlangs nas// phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni/ mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin// lha las skyes par gyur pas na// de ni lha yi sras zhes bya// khyod ni lha kun du yin zhes// sum cu
275b8(rgyud): gsum lha dbang gis// rgyal po'i skal pa byin nas ni/ mi rnams la ni dbang por sprul/ nyes par byas pa rnams 'gog pa// chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang // sems can logs byed dgod pa dang // lha yi
276a1(rgyud): gan su dgye ba'i phyir/ mi yi dbang po mi shas dang ka/ lha yi shas dang dri za'i shas// gdol ba'i shas dang srin shas kyis// nyes par byed pa dazlog par byed/ legs par bya ba byed rnams la/ 
276a2(rgyud): mi yi dbang po pa ma'i shas// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlangs// tshe 'di legs par byas pa dang // nyes pa byas pa'i las rnams kyi// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// rtswa
276a3(rgyud): yis rgyal por byin gyis brlabs// yul na nye byas gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing // sdig pa can gyi skye bo la// 'thun pa'i chad pas mi gcod cing // nyes par byed pa yal bor ba// de tshe chos man
276a4(rgyud): shin tu 'phel// 'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang // yul 'khor der ni phyi phyir 'byung // sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na// lha yi dbang po 'khrugs par 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal
276a5(rgyud): ngos yal bor ba// de tshe g.yo ni mi bzad nga// drag po rnams kyis yul 'joms 'gyur// pha rol dmag tshogs lhags namu// yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ longs spyod rnams dang rigs
276a6(rgyud): kyang 'jig/ gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang // g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis// phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid// bya ba de ni mi byed na// glang chen dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin// nga gi
276a7(rgyud): yul 'khor rnam par 'jig/ ma rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing // ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur// rgyal pos yal bar bor na der// sa bon lo tog me
276a8(rgyud): tog 'bras// legs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing // mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag// gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor na// de tshe lha rnams khang pa na// yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// 
276b1(rgyud): lha rgyal dbang po de dag kun/ rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan dete// chos min phyogs la gnas pa'o zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar 'gyur// rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par// lha rnams 'brug par byed par 'gyur/ 
276b2(rgyud): lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pas na// de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du chos min 'byung gyur nong // mtshan chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur// g.yo rnams dang ni 'thab mo dang // nad kyang kun tu
276b3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// lha dbang rnams ni rab 'khros shing // lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor// yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed// spun nam yang na bu yang rung // sdug pa
276b4(rgyud): rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'bral// yang na du mo 'chi bar 'gyur// skar ma dag kyang ltung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba byung // pha rol gyi ni dmag tshogs dang / 
276b5(rgyud): mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de yis glang po phangs pa dang // blon po phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi 'og tu/ rnga mo ni// phangs pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// khyim dang longs spyod
276b6(rgyud): nor rnams kyang / phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis// phan tshun du ni 'debs par 'gyur// 'thab mo dag dang rtsod dang g.yo// yul rnamasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yul
276b7(rgyud): 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing // mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung // de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang // chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// de yi 'khor dang blon po yang // chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// chos
276b8(rgyud): dang mi ldan skye bo la// de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i sems can la// rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur// chos ldan chad pas bcad pas na// der
277a1(rgyud): / ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung // rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur// chos min skye bo bzung bas na// dam chos ro yi snying po mngangs// sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud// dngos po rnam
277a2(rgyud): gsum par 'jig/ skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing // skye bo dam pa rmad pas na// 'chi dang lce 'bang mu ge dang // rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ro dang ma dang sa// de yi 'og tu med par
277a3(rgyud): 'gyur// sems can nad pa mang po dag/ yul rnam su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag/ yul rnams na ni yod pa yang // khab dang ni tsha ba dang // chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur// rtse dang dgod
277a4(rgyud): dang dga' ba dang // sngan chad dga' ba'i dngos po dag / dga' ba nyams shing mi dga' 'gyur// nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs// me tog rnams dang 'bras bu yi// snum dngos khu ba
277a5(rgyud): zad pas na// lus dang khams dang dbang po la// de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ra ro// sems can rnams ni mdog ngan cing // mthu nung shin tu ring bar 'gyur// kha zas mang po zos kyang ni/ tshim par
277a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba ma yin no// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang // de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa dag/ yul rnam su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi// 
277a7(rgyud): sems can nang mang 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i// gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos min phyogs la rab gnas te// rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas// 'jig rten gsum
277a8(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor na// khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// gang tshe rgyal po phyogs gnas te// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag/ yul rnam su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 
277b1(rgyud): dang rnams kyis dgongs gang phyir// rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yis// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed cing // nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni// legs par byas pas sen can rnams// lha yi gnasu ltar yang skye/ 
277b2(rgyud): nyes par byas pas yi dgas dang // sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror ste/ gang tshe rgyal ba'i yul rnams na// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas nas/ nyes par byas
277b3(rgyud): ngas ltung bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na// de ni du yang ma yin la// lha yi rgyal po pa rnams kyis// gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur// g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas// gang tshe yul 'khor
277b4(rgyud): 'jig 'gyur ba// de phyir lha yi dbang rnams kyis// mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// nyes par byas bzhi bya'i phyir// legs par byed la mdzud pa ste// tshe 'di la ni sems can la// 
277b5(rgyud): yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir// rnam smin skyed pa rgyal po yin// le/ byas dang ni nyes byas kyi// las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras// rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin
277b6(rgyud): rgyal por brjod// bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang // yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/ lha tshogs rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs// lha rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang // yul 'khor dag na skye bo na/ 
277b7(rgyud): sdig can g.yon can 'dul ba dang // yul gyi don gyi chos kyi phyir// srog dang rgyal sring rnams kyang btang // chos ma yin pa bzod byed cing // shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni// yul na 'jigs pa
277b8(rgyud): mi bzang ba// de 'dra gzhan ni yod ma yin/ ji ltar g.yo rnams 'byung ba la// g.yo byed chad par ma bcad na// yul du shin tu mi zad pa// g.yo rnams phyir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// blang chen rnams kyis/ 
278a1(rgyud): / rdzing chen bzhin// yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ lha dbang rnams kyang 'phro bar 'gyur// lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig / yul du dngos po thams cad ni// jus pa
278a2(rgyud): yang 'gyur bas na// de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams// nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar bya// chos kyi yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos ma yin pa spyad ma bya// srog kyang yongasu btang bya zhing // nyes
278a3(rgyud): mgon bya bar mi bya'o// skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan// yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la// rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya zhing // phyog su ltung bar gyur ta re// rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yi// grags
278a4(rgyud): pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams na// b+ha yi dbang po dgar gyur te// 'dzan+d+ra'i gling na nged kyi bu// 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin// chos kyi yul 'khor
278a5(rgyud): der bstan nas// legs par 'byung la skye bo bkod// rgyal po de ni legs byed pas// skye bo dag ni 'dir dgyid de// lha dang lha yaM bu rnams kyis// lha gnas gang bar byed snya mo// 
278a6(rgyud): chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan pas// rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'// lha dang rab tu dang 'gyur bas// mi yi rgyal po de la srung // nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du// rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ 
278a7(rgyud): rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing // char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur// lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du// yul 'khor rnam su lo legs byed// lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha yi gnas rnams
278a8(rgyud): gang bar byed// de lta bas na rgyal po yis// bdag gi rangs pa'i srog btang gas// gang gis 'jig rten bde 'gyur la// dkon mchog chos ni mi btang ste// yon tan rnams kyis gang rgyan pa// 
278b1(rgyud): chos dang ldan pa bsnyen par bya// rang gi skye bos rtag dga' ba// rtag par sdig pa rnam par spongs// chos kyi yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par byed la sems
278b2(rgyud): can dgod// nyes byed las ni dazlog par bya// gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin gdul bar byed pa'i tshe// yul 'khor du ni mo legs shing // rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po
278b3(rgyud): grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing // skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar spyong// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po las rgyal po'i bstan bcos// lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// 
278b4(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams dang // gling bzhir
278b5(rgyud): rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang // sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phulo// chos kyi sku de yongasu btsal ba'i phyir// gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa yi// dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med
278b6(rgyud): bskal pa du mar phangs pa'i srog kyang btang // ji ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsam yas na// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i// bstan
278b7(rgyud): la legs byung zhes bya'i rgyal po byung // de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur// rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston// rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na// de tshe rgyal po dam pa
278b8(rgyud): gnyid kyis log / rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos// chos sgra rin chen sogs pa gnyid dkyil na// rnam par lhung nge mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di// rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur// rgyal
279a1(rgyud): po de ni gnyid kyis log las sad// de yi lus kun dga' bras khyab par gyur// mgu nas rgyal po khab nas sngon byung ste// nyan thos dge 'dun mchog gi gnasu song // rgyal
279a2(rgyud): ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di na sin sogs// yon tan ldan pa'i dge slong gang yod ces// chos sgra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// de yi tshe na ran
279a3(rgyud): chen sogs pa ni// phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur te// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la// kha ton byed cing bde bab tu 'dug/ dge slong chos sgra rin chen sogs pa de// phun sum
279a4(rgyud): gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing // phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur pa// de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan// 'di ni chos smra rin chen sogs pa 'dir// rgyal po'i spyod
279a5(rgyud): yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste// gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston// rin chen sogs pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal po legs
279a6(rgyud): par byung bas 'di skad smras// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol// rgyal po legs par byung ba de nyid la// rin chen sogs pas khas ni
279a7(rgyud): blangs pas na// stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad du// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur// de tshe mi yi dbang po sa phyogs ni// gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der// 
279a8(rgyud): rin chen chu dang spos chus chag chag btang// me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas// rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // der yug stong phrag du mas legs par rgyan/ rgyal pos/ 
279b1(rgyud): khri der tsan dan dmu kha dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor// rtswa dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// gnod sbyin dbang dang gnod sbyin lto 'phye ches// lha yi me tog man dar de'i char
279b2(rgyud): khri de la ni mngon par rab tu phab// chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig stong // bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lhags gyur pa// rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na// sa la me tog dag gos
279b3(rgyud): mngon par 'thor// chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang // shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos dgos te/ khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni// thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang
279b4(rgyud): 'tshal// lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams// bar snang 'dus nas me tog man da ra'i// char pa 'bebs shing sil snyan brgya stong phrag/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sgrogs// rin chen
279b5(rgyud): sogs pa dge slong chos smra des// phyogs bcu ngag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas nas// de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dug par
279b6(rgyud): gyur// sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni// snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas te// rgyal po legs par byung ba de la ni// de yi tshe na mdo sde 'di bstan te// rgyal po thal mo
279b7(rgyud): sbyar byas 'dug na su// tshig gcig gis ni rje su yi rang ste// chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma byung // de yi lus la dga' bas khyab par gyur// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// de tshe
279b8(rgyud): rgyal po legs par byung ba yis// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs// sems can rnams phyir smon lam btab pa ni// rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang // gang yang 'dzam+bu'i gling
280a1(rgyud): 'dir sems can rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor bu rin po che'i// char pa de ring 'dzam+bu'i gling du phob// de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang // dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog
280a2(rgyud): de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang // gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'ba' bar gyur// rgyal po legs par byung bas 'dzam gling du// rin chen char pa 'bab pa de mthong nas// gling bzhi rin chen
280a3(rgyud): gang bar bcas pa ni// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga// rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur// gling bzhi dag na rin chen gang bcas kyi// 
280a4(rgyud): sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongasu btang // gang gis rgyal po legs par byung de la// de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa// rin chen sogs pa chos smra dge slong de// de bzhin gshegs pa mi
280a5(rgyud): 'khrugs der gyur to// ngas gang de tshe mdo sde 'dri thos shing // tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste// ngas ni dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang // chos mnyan pa dang rje su yi rang
280a6(rgyud): bsad gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mdzes dang // lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa// skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob// bskal ba dag
280a7(rgyud): ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los bsgyur rgyal gyur// bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang // ngas ni khams kyi rgyal po myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya
280a8(rgyud): byon gyur/ tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de yin no// gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i// stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni mnyes par byas/ ngas gang mdo thos rje su yi rang ba/ bsod nams
280b1(rgyud): phung po da ltar tshad med mang // bsam pa ji bzhin ngas ni byang chub thob// chos su dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las legs par byung ba'i le'u
280b2(rgyud): zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// dpal ldan lha mo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
280b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shing rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
280b4(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo yongasu shes par 'dod pa des/ gtsug lag khang ngam// dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste// gang na gser
280b5(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sa phyogs der/ des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna
280b6(rgyud): blags te/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad
280b7(rgyud): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la// bsam yos mchod pa byed 'dod cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba// zang mo rab tu shes 'dod pa// gtsus
280b8(rgyud): lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam// gang na gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i ngam 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya// mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha'
281a1(rgyud): yas pas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las// sems can thams cad thar bar byed// mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang // dbus dang de bzhin mtha' ma mthong // mdo sde dbang po rab
281a2(rgyud): zang ste// 'di la dpe ni yod ma yin// gang ga dang ni sa rnams dang // rgya mtsho dang ni na mkha' la// gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung // dper bya bar ni mi nus so// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// 
281a3(rgyud): de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni// zab mor rab brtan gang yin pa// mchod rten de yi dbus na ni// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong // yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su// mdo sde 'di
281a4(rgyud): ni rab tu ston// grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par// lha dag dang ni mi rnams kyi// bde ba da ga ni rjes myong // gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa// de ltar bdag gi
281a5(rgyud): bsod nams kyis// phung po bsam yas sgrub snyam du// de tshe ngas ni de ltar shes// mes gang 'obs kyis daskor ba yis// dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing // tshor ba drag po bzod byas
281a6(rgyud): nas// mdo sde nyan par gang nus pa// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du// zhug nas de ma thag tu ni// sdig pa rnams ni med pa 'gyur// rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang // gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang / 
281a7(rgyud): byang dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang // zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni/ rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar// der ni pad ma 'dra ba'i khri// de lta bu yang
281a8(rgyud): bshams par bya// khri de la ni 'dug nas su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan// yi ger bris pa bklag par bya// de bzhin yong su chub par bya// bri de la ni babs nas su// yul gzhan song bar gyur na yang / khri de la ni
281b1(rgyud): yod pa yi// cho 'phrul rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur// chos smra ba yi gzugs su yang // de na res 'ga' snang bar gyur// res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugasu ste// res 'ga' byang chub sems dpa' yang // res
281b2(rgyud): 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang // de bzhin 'jam dngapal gzugasu te// res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugasu yang // khri la ni snang bar 'gyur// res 'ga' 'od ni 'ba' zhig snang // res 'ga' lha rnams snang
281b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas// de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur// thams cad du yang grub par byed// dpal yon bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ 
281b4(rgyud): mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul pa yin// rgyal dang dang la dang grags par byed// phyir rgol ba yang bzlog par byed// pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms// g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed/ 
281b5(rgyud): rmi ngan thams cad zhi bar byed// sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig/ sdig pa thams cad rab zhi byed// g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir thams cad du// grags
281b6(rgyud): ngas rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni// shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur// rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// g.yul ro'i rnam par gdong las
281b7(rgyud): rgyal// dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'// tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dag shes// klu yi rgyal po
281b8(rgyud): ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam pa' lding dbang po// de dag las ni sogs pa dang // lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // chos kyi mchod rten bsam y+ra la/ 
282a1(rgyud): rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can rnams// mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag/ thams cad 'di snyam sems par
282a2(rgyud): 'gyur// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // phan tshun du ni sna byed pa// bsong nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag/ bsags pa de dag kun la bltos// gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di// nyan pa'i don du 'dir lhags pa// 
282a3(rgyud): mi de dag ni rab sbyangs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir lhag so// dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// chos kyi mchod rten gus dang bcas// de dag 'jig rten snying rjer ldan// de dag sems can phan byed pas// de dag
282a4(rgyud): zab mo'i chos rnams kyi// dam pa'i chos kyi ro yi snod/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yi/ de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin// gang dag gser 'od dam pa'i mdo// dge ba dam pa 'di
282a5(rgyud): nyan pas// de dag sngon chad sangs rgyas ni// brgya stong rnams la mchod pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yis ni// mdo 'di nyan pa de dag le// lha dngang rgyal po kun dang ni// dbyangs can dang ni de bzhin du// dpal
282a6(rgyud): ldan rnam thos bu dang ni// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya drag stong po dag/ stongs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// phyogs ba ni dag ni kun nas kyang // srung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur// 
282a7(rgyud): dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang // rlung dang chu lha nyid dang ni// skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang // bsreg bya ba dang skye dgu dang // stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// 'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang // nyin ma chen
282a8(rgyud): g.yeng ba med par ni// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// stongs chen gnod sbyin dang gnyis dang / sred meng bu dang dbang phyug che// yang dag shes la sogs pa dag/ gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gnod sbyin
282b1(rgyud): brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // gnod sbyin dag ni lnga brgya dang / 
282b2(rgyud): chung sems dpa' thams cad kyang // de dag la ni srung bar byed// gnod sbyin dbang po nor bu bzang // de bzhin gang ba bzang po dang // ji 'jigs dang ni 'brog gnas dang // dmar ser dang ni ser skya dang / 
282b3(rgyud): gnang sbyin dbang po re re yang // gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pas// de dag rnams la srung byed 'gyur// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal ba'i rgya'o// 
282b4(rgyud): bu'i 'gul dang nges 'grin dang // de bzhin char pa'i bdag po dang / kham po che dang rag po dang // de bzhin gser 'dra'i sgra dang ni// lnga rkyen dang nir rkang dang // de bzhin bskal pa chen po dang // yur
282b5(rgyud): can dang chos skyong dang // spre'u dang ni de bzhin khri byed dang // khab kyi spu dang gnyen bshes dang // de bzhin rin chen skra dang ni// yur chen can dang khyim med dang // 'dod
282b6(rgyud): pa'i mchog dang tsan dan dang // mthu bo che dang gang sa can dang // bde ba'i ri nyid de bzhin te// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // gang dag mdo sde 'di
282b7(rgyud): dga' ba// de dag la ni srung bar byed// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // e la'i 'dab dang btang bzung dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyi ga dang // klu ni brgya phrag stong po dag/ 
282b8(rgyud): stongs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las// de dag la ni srung bar byed// stobs chen sgra gcan mi gtong dang // thag bzangs ris dang bden chog dang / rab sim byed
283a1(rgyud): / dang phrag chub dang // de bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang // lha min brgya drag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs skrag byung bar gyur ba las// 
283a2(rgyud): ngag la ni srung bar 'gyur// 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma ni// lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang // 'dug dang nyal dang ra ro'i tshe// de dag la ni srung bar byed// gdol pa mo dang gtum mo dang // de
283a3(rgyud): bzhin gnod sbyin gtum mo dang / dung can dang ni so brtsegs dang // sems can kun gyi gzi 'bro ma// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // phyogs bzhi dag ni kun
283a4(rgyud): nas su// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dpal la sogs pa de bzhin du// lha mo dag ni thams cad dang / 
283a5(rgyud): sa yi lha mo nyid dang ni// me tog 'bras bu nags/ lha dang // kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la// gnas pa dgadang rlung lha dang // lha rnams de dag thams cad 'dir// rab tu
283a6(rgyud): dga' ba'i sems kyis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// tshe dang mdog dang stobs rnams la// sems can rnams ni sbyor bar byed// dpal dang bsod nams gzi
283a7(rgyud): brjid kyi// phun sum tshogs pas rtag tu rgyan// gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// rlung dang sdig dang rmi ngan pa// de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// zab cing stobs chen
283a8(rgyud): ldan pa yis// sa yi lha mo nyid kyang ni// gser gyi 'od kyi dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ro yis tshim// dpag tshang dag ni brgya yi phrag/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa brkyad nas// rdo rje'i gdan la thug par du/ 
283b1(rgyud): pa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel// dpag tshad brgyar ni tshang ba yi// 'og tu sa yi bcung song ste// de ni phyir yang log nas ni// sa yi steng dag snum par byed// mdo 'di mnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni// lha ma
283b2(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang // gser gyi 'od ni dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ros tshim 'gyur// gzi byin ldan par rab 'gyur zhing // de bzhin rab tu stobs ldan 'gyur// bde bar 'gyur zhing rim par
283b3(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di thams cad na// 'bras bu lo tog nags lha rnams// sna tshogs ro yi tshim 'gyur zhing // shin tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// mdo 'di'i ro yis tshim gyur nas// 'bras bu rnam
283b4(rgyud): dang me tog dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu shing ljon sna tshogs kyang // kun nas rab tu skye bar byed/ 'bras bu shing ljon thams cad kyang // kun dga' dag dang nags
283b5(rgyud): tshal rnams// me tog rab tu chags byed cing // sna tshogs dri ni rab tu 'byen// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa yi// rtsa dang nags tshal thams cad dang // 
283b6(rgyud): sa yi steng na skye bar byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di thams cad na// klu yi bu mo bsam mi khyab// rab tu dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// rdzing bu'i drung du nyer song ste// rdzing bu rnams ni thams cad du// ku mu
283b7(rgyud): dang pad+ma dang // ut+pa la dang de bzhin du// pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs bskyed// na mkha' la ni du ba dang // sprin gyi dra ba med cing dag mun pa dang ni rdul med cing // phyogs rnams rab tu 'od gsalo// nyi ma
283b8(rgyud): 'od zer stong ldan yang // 'od zer drangs 'od kyang 'gyed// snang ba dag ni zab mo yis// rab tu dga' ba 'char bar 'gyur// dbang po nyi ma lha yi bu// 'dzan+d+ra'i gling gi gser gyi ni// gzhal med khang na
284a1(rgyud): / 'dug pa yang // mdo sde 'dis ni rab tu tshim// dbang po'i ma rang dga' nas// 2nga cu'i gling du 'char byed cing // 'od zer mtha' yas dra ba yis// kun nas rab tu sdang bar byed/ 
284a2(rgyud): de ni shar pa tsam gyis kyang // 'od zer dra ba rab gtong zhing // rdzing bu sna tshogs khengs pa yi// pad+ma dag ni kha yang 'byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni thams cad du// lo tog 'bras bu sman sna tshogs// yang ngag yongasu smin
284a3(rgyud): byed cing // sa rnams thams cad tshim par byed// zla ba dang ni nyi ma yang // de tshe khyad 'phags snang bar 'gyur// rgyu skar yang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing // rlung yang de bzhin ldang bar 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni thad du// 
284a4(rgyud): kun tu lo yang legs 'gyur te// gang na mdo sde 'di yod pa// yul 'khor de ni khyad par 'phags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// gnod sbyin gyi gnas shes bya ba kun tu srung
284a5(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par sdud pas// 'di
284a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ lha'i bu khri po dag rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa
284a7(rgyud): ci 'dra ba dang / gang bgyis shing bsags pas// skyes bu dam pa gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob nas/ da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan
284a8(rgyud): pa'i slad du mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog skyes bu dam pa 'dim 'ongs pa'i dus na/ ngargal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig 'dum phrag du ma
284b1(rgyud): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya bar// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
284b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
284b3(rgyud): 'das gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
284b4(rgyud): rgyas gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub ste// de'i bstan pa yod ye thams cad du nung par gyur pa mkhye'u
284b5(rgyud): dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing // / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de nyid// de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
284b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung // ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
284b7(rgyud): gser 'dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i bstan pa yod ye thams cad nub pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi 'od 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
284b8(rgyud): mtshams sbyor zhing // 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang dral ba'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
285a1(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zha su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul pa'i kha lo sbyar ba/ 
285a2(rgyud): bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser brgya'i 'od zer du snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byunga'o// zhes de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis
285a3(rgyud): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
285a4(rgyud): ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sor pa lha'i bu khri po de dag ni de tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod brlabs po cher yang ma gyur// sngon pha rol tu phyin
285a5(rgyud): pa drug po dag la spyad skad kyang mi ganga'// rkang pa 'ang / mig ngang / lag pa dang / yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang bu dang / rung ma dang / bu mo phangs pa dag sngon yongasu pa
285a6(rgyud): skad kyang mi gda'// nor dang 'bru dang mgron bu dang / gser dang mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / rin po che rnams sngon yongasu btang skad
285a7(rgyud): kyang mi gda'/ gza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal tshe dang / rta dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dag sngon yongasu
285a8(rgyud): btang skad kyang mi gda'// glang po che dang / ba lang dang / rta pho rgod dang / bran pho dang / bran mo sna tshogs sngon yongasu btang skad kyang mi gda'/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
285b1(rgyud): 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du/ sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
285b2(rgyud): phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma nas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs mi mchis pa du ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyad pa
285b3(rgyud): dum dag dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par bgyis/ yongasu gtong bar bgyi ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang yongasu btang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / 
285b4(rgyud): bu dang / chung ma dang / bu mo phangs pa yongasu gtong bar bgyi ba/ rnams kyang yongasu gtong // nor dang / 'bru dang / mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang
285b5(rgyud): man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram rnams yongasu btang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongasu gtong // bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha
285b6(rgyud): dang / stan dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / rta pho rgod dang / bran pho dang / bran mo yongasu
285b7(rgyud): btang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongasu gtong zhing / rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyid// rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rdzogs par bgyis nas/ 
285b8(rgyud): bde ba 'bum phrag mang po yang 'byer par 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba zhig gis/ 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid
286a1(rgyud): kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri bo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis pa/ 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 
286a2(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa du ma na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa la'i dbang po'i mthon po rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid du rigs dang / rus gcig pa
286a3(rgyud): dang / ming gcig tu rims kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ rab tu dang ba'i zhal ut+pa la'i dri brtsegs pa
286a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba sangs rgyas khri 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ reg pa dang zhang su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang
286a5(rgyud): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad su 'gyuraro// zhes nga ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
286a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i du khri bo 'di dag
286a7(rgyud): gang byas shing / bsags pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas/ 'dir lhags pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yod// de'i rgyu yod/ de'i byed rgyu yod de/ rigs kyi lha mo skyes bu
286a8(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsum gyis byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/ shin tu ri mor byed cing dga' ba dang / dang ba thob par gyur to// 
286b1(rgyud): de tsam du bai DUrar+ya dri ma med pa ltar yong su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// dri ma ched pa shin tu rgya che zhing rgyas pa'i na mkha' ltar zab pa'i sems rab tu dang ba dang ldan par gyur to// bsod nams
286b2(rgyud): kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu bzung ba dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri bo 'di dag de tsam du gser 'od dam pa
286b3(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ lhag par ri mor byed pa dang / rab tu dang ba thob par gyur to// de tsam du bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa ltar yongasu dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i phyir
286b4(rgyud): lung bstan pas rjesu ston to// rigs kyi lha mo ches mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / sngon gyi smon 'am gyi spobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
286b5(rgyud): sogs pa lnga'i bu khri po 'di dag/ da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lnga'i bu
286b6(rgyud): stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / rigs kyi lha mo sngon gyi smon lam de dag gang zhe na/ rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
286b7(rgyud): bgrangs med pa'i ches grangs med pa rgyas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
286b8(rgyud): dang zhang su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhe
287a1(rgyud): bya ba 'jig rten du byu'o// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri chen gtsug tor car de/ 
287a2(rgyud): yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/ dam pa'i chos ltar bcos par gyur pa na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po// chos kyis rgyal srod skyong
287a3(rgyud): gi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha mar gyur pa lta bu zhig byung // rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du chong
287a4(rgyud): dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba sman pa gso bar byed pa khams la mchog tu mangs pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to// kye rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i
287a5(rgyud): dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba de'i tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'debs zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba mdze sa pa lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang ngo po// rgyas par chog dang ldan pa
287a6(rgyud): bstan bcos sna tshogs la mkhas pa/ bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis rnams shin tu bslangs par gyur pa zhig byung // rigs kyi lha mo
287a7(rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od de'i yul de na sems can 'bum phrag du ma nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing / rang sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir te/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ 
287a8(rgyud): rtsub pa/ drag po yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams rkyong bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus mchong dpon gyi ru chu 'debs de sen nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba 'bum phrag du ma de dag gi don
287b1(rgyud): gyi phyir/ snying rje chen po sems skyes par gyur to// sems can 'bum phrag du ma de dag ni nang sna tshogs kyis btab cing / nad sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir te/ de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzang ba/ rngub pa/ 
287b2(rgyud): drag po yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong la/ bdag gi 'tshong dngon ral pa 'dzin sman pa gso bar byed pa khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa 'di ni
287b3(rgyud): rgas 'khogs gtugs/ lam du zhugs na chod rjesu thob/ khar ba la rten cing 'dar te/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnamasu 'gro mi
287b4(rgyud): nus na/ semra sa nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa rang sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid bdag gi pa ral pa 'dzin gyi
287b5(rgyud): nang du song la/ nad kyi phyir khams la mkhas pa ra bya ba yongasu dris te/ khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa de sa/ bdag grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang
287b6(rgyud): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnam su 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang son nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ga/ 'bum drag du ma dag nang sna tshogs las
287b7(rgyud): yongasu thar par bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus mchong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs/ rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas rang gi pa ral pa 'dzin gyi rkang pa la
287b8(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / tshong dpon gyi du chu 'bebs kyis rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin la/ tshig su bcad ba 'di
288a1(rgyud): dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa/ ji ltar dbang po 'jig 'gyur zhing // khams rnam kyang ni yongasu 'gyur// gang gi dus na lus can la// nad kyi rnams ni 'byung
288a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// dus dang dus min zas zos pa// ji lta bur ni bde bar 'gyur// gang gis lus kyi nang du ni// lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'gyur// rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang // 'dus las gyur dang bang
288a3(rgyud): kan gyur// nad rnams zhi bar dgyi slad du// ji lta bur ni gso bar bgyi// gang gis mi la gnod gyur pas// rlung ni gang gi dus na g.yo// gang gi dus na 'khris pa g.yo// bad kan gang gi dus na g.yo/ 
288a4(rgyud): de nas tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyis// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la tshig su bcad pa 'di dkri khams la mkhas par bya ba rnam par bstan to// zla gsum dbyar te zla gsum ston du shes// 
288a5(rgyud): gsum ni dgun te gsum ni dpyid yin no// de lta ra zla ba'i go rims 'di ste dus ni drug/ lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod// gsum gsum du ni tshigs rnams bsdus par
288a6(rgyud): shes/ zla ba gnyis gnyis shing na dus su bstan/ zas dang skom ni de ltar 'jug par 'gyur// sman pa dang ni khams dang dus kyang bstan// dbang po dang ni khams rnams de dag kyang // lo
288a7(rgyud): gcig nang gi tshigs tshigs yongasu 'gyur// dbang po dag yongasu 'gyur ba na// lus can rnams la sna tshogs nad kyang 'byung // de nyid la ni sman pas zla gsum bzhi// tshigs kyi bar dang dus
288a8(rgyud): drug rnams dang ni// khams drug mkhas par bya ba shes par bya// zas skom sman rnams go rims ji bzhin te// rlung gi shas che'i nad ni dbyar na ldang // ston du gyur pa na ni 'khris pa g.yo// dgun
288b1(rgyud): gyi rus su de bzhin 'dus pa ste// bad kan shas che'i nang ni dpyid ldang ngo // dbyar ni snum dro lan tsha sbyar ba'i ro// sngon ni mngar dang snum dang bsil bag go// dgun ni mngar dang sbyar dang snum pa ste// dpying
288b2(rgyud): kyi dus na nub ro tsha ba'o// da kan che ba zos ma thag tu ldang // mkhris pa che ba 'ju ba'i dus na ldang // rlung shas che ba zhu ma thag tu ldang // khams gsum g.yo ba de ni de lta'o// rlung gi bdag nyid la
288b3(rgyud): ni bcud kyis gso// bkrus sman gyis ni mkhris pa gsal bar bya// 'dus pa la ni gsum dang 'thun ldan pa// bad kan tshig su bab na skyugs sman btang // rlung shas che dang mkhris dang 'das
288b4(rgyud): pa dang // bad kan shas che'i tshigs rnams shes par bya// dus gang khams gang dus ni gang yin pa// de yi sman dang bza' btung bsten par bya// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis
288b5(rgyud): khams la mangs par bya ba 'di lta bu/ de tsam zhig yongasu dris pa des/ tshe'i rig byed kyi yan lag brgyad po thams cang khong du chud par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus
288b6(rgyud): tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du song nas/ seM
288b7(rgyud): nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag la kho bo ni sman pa'o// kho bo na sman pa'o// zhes bdag nyid kyis khas 'che ste// kho bos khyed rnams nad sna tshog
288b8(rgyud): las yongasu thar bar bya'o// zhes dbugs phyung // rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis 'di lta bu'i tshig brjod pa de thos ma thag tu srog chags 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad
289a1(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur to// dbugs phyin pa rnyed nas kyang dga' ba dang bde ba dang / yid dade ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe der
289a2(rgyud): dus na sems can nang sna tshogs kyis btang ba/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ga/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar te/ nad med par gyur to// nad med par gyur nas kyang snga
289a3(rgyud): mdo bzhin du mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus drang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba// 'bum phrag du ma de dag
289a4(rgyud): gi nang nas/ gang su dag nang drag pos btab pa de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang // sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna
289a5(rgyud): tshogs kyis gzar ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de da ga la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sman dpyad gang ci bstan pa des/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad
289a6(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bya'o// nad med pa dang / nang nyung bar gyur nas kyang snga ma kho bzhin du mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po
289a7(rgyud): lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na/ seMn nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tsho
289a8(rgyud): kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar par byas par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po lnga/ 
289b1(rgyud): nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang // rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'badra
289b2(rgyud): seMn thams cad nad med par byas nas nyung zhing snga mkho bzhin du sngo ba dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur to// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing
289b3(rgyud): rtse la dga' dgur spyod de/ sbyin pa bdag kyang sbyin par byed/ bsod nams ngag kyang byed de/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la yang // tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bengs rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar
289b4(rgyud): gyur cig/ sman pa'i rgyal po sen thams cad kyi nad gso ba/ mngon sum du byang chub sems dpa' nges pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par
289b5(rgyud): 'du byed do// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs de la chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod pa rigs kyi lha mo chu'i bad+ma'i snying po ngal khye'u ga
289b6(rgyud): yod de/ gcig gi mang ni chu'i gos zhes bye/ gcig gi ring ni chu'i snying po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dngon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khye'u 'di gnyis dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis grong
289b7(rgyud): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho drang 'khor rnam su 'gro'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs 'drog khong khong zhig
289b8(rgyud): tu phyir to// de nas 'brog khong khong der sha za ba'i khyi dang / sbyang ki dang / wa dang / khwa dang / bya dag 'drog khong khong na rdzing zhig yod pa ga la ba der rgyug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
290a1(rgyud): ci'i phyir sha za ba'i khyi dang / spyang ki nas/ bya'i bar 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug sa mo// de nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag khyi dang / sbyang ki dang / wa dang khwa dang
290a2(rgyud): bya rnams phyogs gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar bya'o snyamo// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song nas/ 'brog khong khong na rdzing zhig ga la
290a3(rgyud): yod pa der phyin to// rdzing chen po de na nya khri zhig gnas te/ des der nya brgya phrag mang po zhag chu dang bral bar mthong nas// des de la snying rje ba'i sems skyes pa dang / de na lha mo zhig shing las lus byed
290a4(rgyud): tsam phyung ba zhig mthong ste/ lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// gang gi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ba khyod kyis nya 'di rnams la chu
290a5(rgyud): byin cig/ rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhe sa bya ste/ gang chu 'bengs pa dang gang chu sbyin pa'o// de bas na rang gi ming dang 'thun par bya ba byos shig/ chu 'bebs kyis
290a6(rgyud): slar smras pa// lha mo nya 'di dag la ji snyed cig mchi sa/ lha mos smras pa nya khri tham pa'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs cher mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems skye so// rigs
290a7(rgyud): kyi lha mo de'i tshe 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing bu chen po de ni/ chu'i lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus te/ de na nya khri 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs shing chu dang bral ba de dag rgyug cing rnam par
290a8(rgyud): rgyu go/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir rgyugs pa dang / nya khri pobo de dag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de log su chu 'bedra/ 
290b1(rgyud): la snying rje rje ltar blta'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs te/ chu btsal kyang der chu ma snyed/ phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / des ha cang yang
290b2(rgyud): thag mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa chen po mang po zhig mthong nas/ shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te/ shing gi yal ga rnams bcang nas/ shing gi yal ba de dag khyer te/ rdzing chen po ga la
290b3(rgyud): ba der song ste phyin pa dang / shing gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri po de dag la shin tu bsol ba'i grib mar bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rdzing der chu 'bab pa
290b4(rgyud): tshol te/ gang nas chu 'dab ces de phyogs bzhir nga rgyugs pa dang / chu ma rnyed nas der myur ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi srol du song ste/ rigs kyi lha mo 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing
290b5(rgyud): deng chu 'dab pa zhes bya ba'i chu klung chen po de las/ der chu 'bab pa'i klung de yang de'i tshe sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gis/ nya khri po de dag gi phyir/ ci nas kyang nyad
290b6(rgyud): dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyogs kyi grog po chen por krung de phab bo// des de mthong nas kyang bsams pa klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis kyang / srol de nyid du dbab par mi nus na/ 
290b7(rgyud): bdag gis lnga dbab par ga la nus sam de phyir log go// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bengs rings pa rings par rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
290b8(rgyud): rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi rkang pa la mgo bos mchod de// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de dag rgyus kyis smras te/ bdag gis lha'i chag 'og tu/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal thad du/ seMn
291a1(rgyud): rnams kyi nad kyi rgyun ni bkum na// gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi ba zhig na/ 'brog khong khong na yod ces bgyi ba'i rdzing zhig mchis pa de na/ nya khri zhig gnas pa chang dang bral nas/ 
291a2(rgyud): gdugs kyis gdungs shing mchis te/ ji ltar mi rnams la stsal pa ltar ci nas dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa/ de dag la yang srog rtsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas glang po che nyi shu zhig dag la stsal du gsol
291a3(rgyud): rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis sman pa'i rgyal po la/ glang po che nyi shu zhig byin cig ces blon po rnams la bsgo'o// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can chen po glang po che'i lhas ga la ba der
291a4(rgyud): song la glang po che nyi shu khrid de/ sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / bde ba gyis shig/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rang gi bu chu'i gos dang / chu'i snying po
291a5(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu/ glang po che nyi shu khrid nas/ glang po che'i rdzi bo las ba lang gi rgyal po brgya blangs te slar log nas/ chu 'bab ces bya ba'i chu klung chen po gang du bab pa der song
291a6(rgyud): ste/ rkyal pa de dag chus bkang nas/ glang po che'i rgyab tu chu bkal te/ myur dmyur bar 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / chu de glang po che'i steng nas phab ste/ phyogs
291a7(rgyud): bzhi nas rdzing bu chus bkang nas/ phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang / tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de log su nya khri po de dag rgyu go/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu
291a8(rgyud): 'bebs 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir nya khri po 'di dag bdag ga la ba de log su rgyug snya mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ nya khri po 'di dag ni bkres pa'i mes yongasu nyen nas/ bdag pa
291b1(rgyud): zang sdong du nges kyis/ bdag gi kha zas sbyin par bya'o snyamo// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ rang gi bu chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smra'o// bu glang po che thams cad
291b2(rgyud): kyi nang nas mgyogs pa'i mchog la zhon te bdag cag gi khyim du myur bu myur bar song ste/ mes po tshong dpon la/ kye mes po chu 'bebs kyi mchi nas/ khyim 'di na pa ma dang / spun dang / sring
291b3(rgyud): mo dang / bran po dang / dran mo dang / las bgyid pa rnams kyi kha zas sbyar ba/ gang ci mchis pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ chu'i gos glang po che la zhon pa'i lag tu myur bar rdzongs pashig ces
291b4(rgyud): mchi'o// zhes de skad gyis shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang po che de la zhor nas myur du myur bar rgyug cing rab tu rgyug ste/ rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / de dag rgyus kyis
291b5(rgyud): zhig tu smras te/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos kyis sngar smos pa'i kha zas sbyar ba de thams cad phung po che'i rgyab du bkal nas glang po che de la zhon te/ 'breg khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing ga la
291b6(rgyud): ba der dong ba dang / chu 'bebs kyis rang gi bu chu'i gos mthong nas/ dga' mag ste bu las zan blangs nas/ phul te rdzing der gtor nas/ nya khri po de dag tshal par byas nas 'di snyam du bdag gis dus
291b7(rgyud): gzhan zhig na/ dgon pa'i gnas gzhan zhig na dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa las thos na su mchi ba'i dus kyis tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan thos pa de/ bde 'gro mtho
291b8(rgyud): ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o// zhes thos kyis bdag gis 'a de dag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos zang mo yang bshad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
292a1(rgyud): rin chen gtsug tor can de'i mtshan kyang bsgrags par bya'o sa'o// de'i tshe na 'dza cu'i gling 'di na sems can rnams kyi lta ba gnyisu gyur te/ kha cig ni theg pa chen po la mngon
292a2(rgyud): bar dad do// kha cig ni slang do// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ de'i tshe rdzing bu der rkang pa gnyis ka'i dbus mo nub tsam du 'bogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
292a3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tsha'o// zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
292a4(rgyud): spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag mchi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig/ 
292a5(rgyud): ces smon lam de skad bta'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'beblas kyis dud 'gro'i skye gan su gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di skyes
292a6(rgyud): pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched
292a7(rgyud): drug skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi
292a8(rgyud): dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung
292b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas// 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di yang 'gag par 'gyuraro// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 
292b2(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa de dag la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas/ rang gi bu chu'i gos dang chu'i snying po dang ldan
292b3(rgyud): cig tu rang gi khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs dus ston chen po zos nas chang gis ra ro te ma la na nyal ba dang / de'i tshe de'i dus na lhas chen po byung bar
292b4(rgyud): gyur te/ mtshan mo de 'das pa dang / nya khri bo de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skyeso// skyes ma thag tu de dag 'di lta bu'i tshul
292b5(rgyud): gyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skye sa sa mo// de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te dag
292b6(rgyud): cag 'dzam+bu'i gling de na nya khrir gyur te/ bdag cag dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa las/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ chu rang po dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te/ bdag cag la
292b7(rgyud): rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan kyang bsgrags pas dge ba'i
292b8(rgyud): chos kyi rgyu de dang / rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyis/ bdag cag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de la mchod pa bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i
293a1(rgyud): bu khri bo de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas/ mi snang bar gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs
293a2(rgyud): mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la lha'i bu de dag gis mu tig gi se mo do khri ni mgo'i thang kar bzhag mu tig gi sen mo do khri ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag mu tig gi sen mo ngo bi ni g.yas
293a3(rgyud): log su bzhag mu tig gi se mo do dri ni g.yon log su bzhag ste/ dbus mo nub tsam du me tog man ra ba'i char chen po yang bag lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang bkrol nas des 'dzam+bu'i gling bathang
293a4(rgyud): kyang sad / tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyang sang ngo // de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag na mkha' la dong ste/ lha'i bu de dag rgya la po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi gnas dang / gnas gzhan
293a5(rgyud): ngag tu yang me tog man da ra ba'i char 'bebs shi gnags khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas/ de dag gis rdzing chen po dar me tog man nga ra ba'i char chen
293a6(rgyud): po mngon par phab ste/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas/ slar yang lha'i gan su dong ste/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis dga' zhing rtse ste/ dga' dgur spyod cing dpal dang skal ba bzang
293a7(rgyud): po chen po dag kyang myong ngo // 'dzam+bu'i gling du nam langs pa dang / de nArgyal chem po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir mdang sum ltas 'di dag
293a8(rgyud): byung / de dag gis smras pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bengs kyi khyim du/ mu tig gi se mo do bzhi dri'i char bab cing / me tog man da ra ba'i char yang phang po zhes byas pa dang / 
293b1(rgyud): khyed dong la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bengs la snyan pa'i tshig gis bos shig/ de nas rga mkhan dang / blon po chen po rnams chu 'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu ru 'bengs
293b2(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smra so// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od khyod la 'bod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'debs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la bder
293b3(rgyud): song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ chu 'bebs mngang gsum de 'dra ba'i lhas byung ba 'di ci'i ltas shes sam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la 'di skad
293b4(rgyud): ces smra'o// lha bdag gis 'tshal te/ khri bo de dag bum par gyur du ngo'o// rgyal ngos smras pa ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/ lha chu gos rdzing der nya khri bo de dag gum mam mgu
293b5(rgyud): ltar stsal to// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'dengs kyis khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smra'o// 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing gi nya khri ba de
293b6(rgyud): dag shi 'am ma shi ltos shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar rdzing 'drog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba deng song ba dang / nya khri po de dag shi nga'i dus byas par gyur cing
293b7(rgyud): tog man ngar ba'i char chen po bab pa'ang mthong nas/ slar log te pa la smras pa nya gum par gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos la tshig de thos pa dang / rgyal po lnga'i
293b8(rgyud): dbang phyug 'od ga la der song nas/ de dag rgyus nas zhib tu smras te/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ nya khri po de dag thad ni gum par gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de dag
294a1(rgyud): bdag gis mthus mngang sum de lta bu'i dge ba'i lhas de dag byung ste/ bangag gi khyim du yang mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri dang / me tog man da ra ba'i char yang phab po// de nas
294a2(rgyud): rgyal po de dga' zhing mag zhang mgu ste/ yi rangs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i
294a3(rgyud): dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya lag na be con can de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i
294a4(rgyud): dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de
294a5(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus mtshong dpon gyi bu chu 'dengs zhes bya
294a6(rgyud): bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du byed sems na/ nga de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de
294a7(rgyud): tshe de'i dus na/ chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon
294a8(rgyud): kyi bu chu 'bebs kyi chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// sgra gcan zin ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chu'i gos zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo na de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u chu'i snying
294b1(rgyud): po zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nya khri bor gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems ma/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzing rdzing
294b2(rgyud): kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri bo 'di dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nya khrir gyur to// gang dag ngas chu dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas shing / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i/ zang mo'i
294b3(rgyud): chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa ste/ dge ba'i las kyi rgyu nges nga'i gan du 'dir lhag
294b4(rgyud): te/ des na da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub tu lung bstan to// rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus par chos mnyan pas thams cad lung
294b5(rgyud): bstan pa thob par bya ba'i ming thob par gyur to// rig+sa kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyar
294b6(rgyud): zhe na/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ shing gi lha mor gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo rnam grangs 'dis na/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ ngas ji ltar sen mang po byang chub tu yongasu smon par byas te/ 
294b7(rgyud): de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las chu 'bebs kyis gdul
294b8(rgyud): bya'i nya'i sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir/ lus kyang yong su gto // de ji lta zhe na dri ma ma
295a1(rgyud): shin tu rgyas pa'i ston rnam pa sna tshogs brgya'i 'od zer snang ba dang / lha yul du rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / stobs kyis pha rol gnon
295a2(rgyud): pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong srong gis yongasu bskor te/ yul lnga len gyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas/ nags sna tshogs zhig du byon pa dang / der des sngo zhing 'jam la/ mthing kar 'dug
295a3(rgyud): pa'i spang gi ngos la me tog dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i sa phyogs zhig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang bac+doMs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dag
295a4(rgyud): bo sa phyogs 'di ni mdzes pa ste/ 'di na gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyis/  de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan thing shig/ de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du
295a5(rgyud): gtan bti // gdan bting nas kyang bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdan bting lags na bcom ldan gtso bo mchog mi la mchog stsol dam pa srid bcings dkrol// 
295a6(rgyud): bzhugs te mi la sman srad mthar bgyid kyi// bka' mtshad dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gso'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong
295a7(rgyud): ngag khyed bya dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa rnams blta bar 'dod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong
295a8(rgyud): dam pa se ni mchog gi snying po pa// bzod dang brtson 'grus che la zhi dang rdul dka' zhing // blo gros dran dga' ston dpag med gnas gyur gyi// rus pa bdag cag ngalta ba'i dus lags de legs shod// 
295b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhangs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang / me tog ka ma la gsar du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis/ sa ri ngos la brdabs te/ bsnun ma thag tu
295b2(rgyud): sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ nor bu dang / gser dang // dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de nas byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
295b3(rgyud): ngo mchod rten 'di phye shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ mchod rten de phye ba dang / des der gser gyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi nor bu dang / mu tog gis
295b4(rgyud): khengs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za ma tog gcig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser gyi za ma tog dag cig
295b5(rgyud): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thaMd phye shig/ de bzhin du thaMd kha phye ba dang / des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang / me tog ku
295b6(rgyud): mud 'dra ba dag gcig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag gcig gda'o// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo skyes
295b7(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer te shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams
295b8(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi 'dun du bsnams te/ phyag bzhes nas bka' stsal pa/ rus pa 'di dag ltor mchog rab tshogs ldan blo gros mchog/ dul dang bsam gtan bzod pa spro ba grags mchog dam pa ste/ rdo
296a1(rgyud): gros ldan rnams phyir zhing rtag tu byang chub 'di la ni// sgo brtan mos dang blo gros mchog tu sbyin la dga' bar byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
296a2(rgyud): dka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyis yongasu bsgos pa/ mchog tu mthong bar dga' ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag
296a3(rgyud): tshol cig/ de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kur dga' ngos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
296a4(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ seMn thams cad kyi phyag dgyis pa lags na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
296a5(rgyud): nying rus pa 'di dag pa phyag bzhes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gis pa 'di skar
296a6(rgyud): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba gzhon pa/ stobs du ma
296a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa// thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu lha gnon dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de/ sgra chen po dang / lha chen po dang / snying spongs chen po'o// de nas rgyal po che
296a8(rgyud): po rtse ba'i phyir/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhonu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i ston la chags shing / me tog 'dod pas phan tshur rgyu te/ nags khrod chen po bcu gnyi su zhug so// de nas rgyal
296b1(rgyud): bo'i bu dag dong ba dang / gzhonu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrang nas phan tshun du dong ste/ kun tu bsrungs pa'i bskyed mos tshal chen po'i nags khrod bcu ga'i su zhugaso// de ras sma chen
296b2(rgyud): pos nu bo gnyis la smras pa/ kho bo'i snying la 'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan zan gyis bsad du 'ong gis tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis ra/ skye
296b3(rgyud): bo sdug po dang bral ba snyam du bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to// snying stongs chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir/ bdag ni mi bajigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi// shin tu
296b4(rgyud): rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste// bdag gi snyi nga 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon de dag nags khrod bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na// stag mo bu byung nas
296b5(rgyud): zhag drug gam zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ bu lngas bskor te bkres shing skom pas nyams smad nas/ lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // 
296b6(rgyud): mthong nas kyang sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas/ zhag drug/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ da ltar zas ma rnyed pas/ yang ra ni rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur/ yang na
296b7(rgyud): ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyuraro// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'dir gang sha sar pa dang / khrag dron mo yod na/ de ni stag
296b8(rgyud): dang / dom dang dred dang / seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no// zhes zer ro// lha chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bdakres pa dang / skom pa dang ldan pa'i lusu gyur pas srog gi lhag ma
297a1(rgyud): cung zad gcig lus te/ rab tu nyam chung bas 'dis gnas 'dir zas sbom tshel ni mi nus na/ 'di'i srog yong su srung ba'i phyir/ su zhig rang gi lus yongasu
297a2(rgyud): gtong bar byed par 'gyur zhig gu/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye rang gi lus yongasu btang ba ni bya dka' ba'o// snying stongs chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa/ 
297a3(rgyud): dro chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'ang bya dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongasu gtong rab zhugs pa/ gzhan la ngan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni bya dka' ba ma lag so// yang snying brtse ba'i
297a4(rgyud): snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i seMn dag/ lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste// gzhan gyi srog phyir 'thun pa'i dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis
297a5(rgyud): brkye/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon de shin tu mi dga' ste/ stag mo de la tshig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo // de nas snying stobs chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag gis
297a6(rgyud): lus 'di yong su btang ba'i dus la bab bo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'byed mthar ngan pa// rnag can lus 'di zas dang nom dang mal cha dang / bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring
297a7(rgyud): bsrungs kyang / sngar med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med// yang na thams cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na// de'i 'tsho ba med kyis da bdag gis de las bzang po'i las la sbyar bar bya'o// de'i phyir bdag
297a8(rgyud): skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho la rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyuraro/ yang snying po med rus dbub 'dral srin bu dargyas gang byas pa chung gson pa/ 'dras dang 'dra ba'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas bang ba 'di
297b1(rgyud): btang ste mya ngan med cing 'gyur med dung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs ston gyis// kun tu gang ba'i chos sku ston brgyas gang rdul dang bral bar thob par bya// de snying rje chen po mchog dang ldan
297b2(rgyud): pa'i snying du gyur pa/ de ltar btul nas khyed gnyis gshegasu gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi srad du/ nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis 'jug zhes de gnyis bsku 'o// de nas rgyal bu gzhon snying
297b3(rgyud): stongs chen po nags mang ba de nas slar log ste/ stag gnasu song nas nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/ gzhan gyis btang ba
297b4(rgyud): bka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub ring med rgyal sras rnams kyi gnyer ba thob par shog/ bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las
297b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po bsgral bar bya// zhes smon lamabata'o// de nas snying stobs chen pos stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba nga nga// de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la stag rdzo
297b6(rgyud): ci yang ma bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kye ma'o// 'di ni nyam chung bas ma nuso// snyam nas langs te/ snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na/ gang nas kyang mtshon cha ma rnyed nas// de nas 'od
