297b7(rgyud): ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gi mgul pa bcang nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu/ chu'i dbu su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du
297b8(rgyud): sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo so// nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du/ 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do// lha'i spos dang / bye ma dang / 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang khab po// de nas lha zhig gis
298a1(rgyud): mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes seMn rnams khyab ste/ mi'i dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'di
298a2(rgyud): btang bas na/ skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi pa'i gnas kyi mchog zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshigs med ring por mi thogs brnyes// de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag
298a3(rgyud): gis sbag pa la bltas nas/ yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par bya'o// de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas/ lha chen po la 'di skad ces smra so// ji ltar phyogs
298a4(rgyud): bcur rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yis 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la// me tog char pa 'bab cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na// da bzod bdag gi nu ngos
298a5(rgyud): rang gi lus ni btang yang dag/ lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras pa/ bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa// shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang // za bar chas
298a6(rgyud): la lta bas bdag kyang ngogs/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste// lam de nyid la slar log nas/ stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos thad ni 'od ma'i yal ga
298a7(rgyud): ngag la gzar/ rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral// khrag ni rdzab du gyur/ skra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su 'thor ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du
298a8(rgyud): shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa sgreng ste/ nyams thag pa'i sgra phyung // kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang // de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma// pad+ma 'dra ba'i mig ring khyod kyis gar bzhag cu
298b1(rgyud): ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chungs 'dri bar 'gyur/ kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du// shi na legs kyis gson pa de lta ma yin no// snying stobs chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag
298b2(rgyud): 2/ pha ma ngag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon de gnyis snying rje rje'i skad du rnam pa mang por ngus nas dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu gzho nu'i ri gro ba rnam kyang gzhonu tshol zhing phyogs
298b3(rgyud): dang phyogs mtshar su rgyug pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong nas gzhon ga re/ gzhonu ga re zhes 'dri'o// de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ sdug pa dang bral bar rmis pa la 'di lta ste/ nu ma
298b4(rgyud): gnyis bcad pa dang / so phyung ba dang / thi ba'i phrug gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer bar rmi so// de nas btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying sngangs te/ mod la sang nas sems pa la
298b5(rgyud): zhugs te/ 'byung ngo'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu/ nyi ma'i 'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur ba ston// nga yi lus ni zhum
298b6(rgyud): zhing rig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcang rmis pa// nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram kye/ de nas de sam du bsams pa dang / bran mo yang snyid myos te 'ongs nas/ btsun
298b7(rgyud): mo la smras pa/ jo mo gzho nu'i rim gro ba dag gzhonu tshol zhing mchis na// jo bo skor ces ganga'o// de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mag dang mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i
298b8(rgyud): gan du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos// rgyal po yang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smraso// de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung
299a1(rgyud): ba'i phyir/  gzhonu btsal ba la nan tan tu byed kyis bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig/ der gzhon tshol ba la zhugs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs dag rong rong por gyur to// de nas ring
299a2(rgyud): po ma lon par rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gzhonu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hung bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug
299a3(rgyud): bsngal ba'o// ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba/ mi rnams bu rnyed pa nga ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no// 'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba 'am/ mi rnams gang dag bu gson da
299a4(rgyud): ngag bde ba yin nam ci/ de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas/ rnga mo gnang du bsnun pa bzhin du/ shin tu mi zang pa'i sgra byu // de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs
299a5(rgyud): bcas te/ me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dge tha chungs 'ongs par ma gyur na// bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chungs de ga re/ de nas de
299a6(rgyud): gnyis lhags pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chungs ga re zhes gzho nu gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyams thag cing mig 'anyis gang ste/ rkan dang mchu dang / kha dang so bskams
299a7(rgyud): nas cang mi zeraro// btsun mos smras pa/ kho mo'i bu sdug tha chungs de ga re/ kho bo'i snying 'di gsal thug gyur cing // lus ni mi bzang rab tu gzir gyur te// kho mo'i dran pa nyams gyur myur du smros/ de nas
299a8(rgyud): gzhonu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhig tu smras so// de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo myos par gyur te/ myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje'i skad du/ ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo // de nas rgyal po dang / 
299b1(rgyud): btsun mos rus pa de dag/ sha dang khrag dang / rgyus pa med cing // skra phyogs rang phyogs mtsham su 'thor ba mthong nas/ shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de nas mdun na 'don pa dang / blon po
299b2(rgyud): ngag gis de ltar gyur ba de dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas chu dang rim la ya'i tsan dan gyi 'de gus/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i lus sim par bya'o// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed nas/ 
299b3(rgyud): rgyal po langs te snying rje rje'i srang du 'bod pa/ kyi chung bu sdug yang 'ong mthong dga' ba// 'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir myur du song // 'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs// nga la sdug bsngal 'di
299b4(rgyud): las gzhan mi 'byung // btsun mo yang myos pa las sangs nas/ skra gzhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang la brdungs te/ nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng du 'dre ldog cing ma he be'u stor
299b5(rgyud): ba dang rnga mo rde'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje'i skad du du'o// kyi hud sdug cing gces pa'i du ni pad+ma 'di// su yis sa steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor// yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i
299b6(rgyud): bzhin can bdag gi bu// bdag gi dgra bo gang gi de ring sa 'dir bcom// kyo rgud sa 'dir bu mchog bas mthong ba// lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur// sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang mags pa/ 
299b7(rgyud): bdag gi snying 'di lcags ni yin yang dag de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi ru ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad// so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rungs gyur/ bdag gis thi
299b8(rgyud): ba'i phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin// bdag ni bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer// kyai hung sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de'i 'bras bu
300a1(rgyud): grub pa ni 'di yin no// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mo snying rje rje'i skad du/ rnam pa mang po sde zhing // rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lhan cig tu
300a2(rgyud): bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzho nu'i rus pa rnams sa phyogs 'dir bzhago// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon snying stongs chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
300a3(rgyud): snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon snying stobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang zhe sdang rang gti mug
300a4(rgyud): las yongasu ma grol ba de'i tshe yang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags na skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par
300a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa da ltar lha smos kyang cing gos// de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnam su bskal pa ra gnas par spro zhing / skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par grol lo// 
300a6(rgyud): sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la pan btag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'jig ka' stsal to// byang chub
300a7(rgyud): mchog 'di yongasu tshol ba na/ bskal ba mang po ngas ni lus btang ste/ ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur// da ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongasu btang // sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams ni rjes dran te// shing \u0f7f
300a8(rgyud): chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po byung // de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa// sing stobs che zhes bya ba dam pa yod// de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod de// ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po// spun tshogs de dag
300b1(rgyud): nags tsha khrod du do // de dag srag mo bkres pas gting ba mthong // de la sems can mchog de snying rje skyes// sgrag mo 'di ni bkres sgom gathir bas ma/  dag bu de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis// 
300b2(rgyud): ltar bdag lus da ni btang bar bya// shing rta che yi bu ni snying spobs che// stag mo bkres mthong stag drug rnams// thar par bya phyir snying rje yis// ri ngos gzar ba mchongs pa dang // sa ni ri dang bcasu
300b3(rgyud): g.yos// bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par 'thor// ri dgas tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di // mun pas things por gnas par gyur// de yi bu ngo sgra chen dang // de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis// nags
300b4(rgyud): tshogs chen po der bltas nas// snying stobs chen po ma rnyed nas// shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying // dran med nags kyi nang ra rgyu// nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing // gdong la mchi zag
300b5(rgyud): nags drod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lnga chen po// rgyal bu gzhon nu re dag gnyis/ stag mo nyams chung gar nyal ba// der ni nye bar song ba dang // skrag mo dang ni sdug phrug gi/ stag gi
300b6(rgyud): mtshul khrag chags mthong // skra dang rus pa cung zad cigs la rnam par mthor ba mthong // de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni/ nyung zhibs la yod par gyur// rgyal po'i du ni de gnyis kyis// drag
300b7(rgyud): chags pa yis de mthong // rab tu brgyal te sa 'di la// 'gyes nas yid ni nyams par gyur// lus rnams la ni rdul gyi gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag gi ni 'khor rnams
300b8(rgyud): kyang / snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non// de dag chus ni rab mthor zhing // lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing gnas// de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang // btsun mo gces mchog bskyed pa'i ma// bud med ngag ni lnga brgya
301a1(rgyud): dang // pho brang nang na der 'dug pa// nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// 'o ma khrag du 'byung zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dang yan lag kun// khab kyis btsags pa bzhin du tsha// 
301a2(rgyud): snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang // bu bral mya ngan drag 'das phog/ rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste// mya ngan rab gdungs yid mi dga'// snying rje'i sgra yis rab du zhing // rgyal po shing rta che la smras// mi dbang
301a3(rgyud): rgyal po bdag la gson// bdag lus mya ngan me yis tshig/ bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas// 'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung // bdag lus khab kyis btsags bzhin tsha// bdag gi sing yang gas la thug/ 
301a4(rgyud): dzaM ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni// phyin chad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rje mdzod de bdag srog gsol/ de ring bdag gi rmi lam na// thi ba drug gu gsum rnyed na/ 
301a5(rgyud): bdag gi thi ba'i phrug gu ni// sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa// der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni// thi ba drug gu de dras 'tshal// bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra yi mya ngan snying 'dir
301a6(rgyud): rab tu zhugs// sems ni mya ngan rang gdungs pas// bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rjes ldan pa bdag srog rtsol// de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog/ 
301a7(rgyud): ngargyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i dbang po rnam par nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa med/ btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang // snying rje skad kyis rab tu ngu// btsun mo
301a8(rgyud): nga rgyal gyur te/ sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni// de ma thag tu rgyal dbang te// du dang bral ba'i mya ngan non// blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang // gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dong // grong khyer kun
301b1(rgyud): gyi skye bo dag/ tha dang khyim nas byung zhing 'khod// ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag lam kar snying stobs che de 'dri// gson nam 'on tam shi 'am ci// snying stobs chen po de gar song // dag
301b2(rgyud): cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sen mthong re dga'// de ring mi snyan thos gyur cing // yun ring mya ngan mi bzang rlung // sgra mi phyin cing rgyu mtha' yas// drag po'i sgra bcas ldang zhig gam/ 
301b3(rgyud): rgyal po shing rta che langs te// mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyid chu'i rgyun kyang mthor// ji srid dran rnyed ldan gyur pa// de srid du ni chu yis gtor// bdag bu gu
301b4(rgyud): mam gson zhig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed// rgyal po shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo'i mchog la 'di skad smras// blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang // gzhon rnams ni
301b5(rgyud): tshol byir dong // khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing // gtu mya ngan snying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yis// btsu na mo dam pa spro bsrings te// rgyal po pho brang nang nas byung // mya
301b6(rgyud): ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te// yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan// srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang // ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams
301b7(rgyud): ni btsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung // rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni// rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang // rgyal po shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'i
301b8(rgyud): bu ni lta ba'i phyir// rgod pa'i mig gis phyogasu bltas// mgo brags yan lag khrag spags shing // lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la// gdong la mchi zag du bzhin du// 'ong ba'i mi zhig
302a1(rgyud): mthong nas ni// shing rta chen po'i snying la yang // rab tu ma bzang mi bzang mya ngan gnas// ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zad// lag pa sbreng ste ngu zhing 'dug de nas
302a2(rgyud): rnon po gzhan zhig ni// rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ongs// 'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni/ shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig khyod sras yid du 'ong bar mchis/ 
302a3(rgyud): ring po mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni// sras mchog yid 'ong 'chi ba khyod kyis gzigs// rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang // de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs// rdul chags dri ma
302a4(rgyud): can gyi gos gyon cing // mchi ma'i gdong gyis rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni// mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas// rgyal po khyod kyi sras
302a5(rgyud): mchog gcig mi gda'// snying stobs chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zi na// stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon pa// rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong // de dag la ni gzhonu seMni ches
302a6(rgyud): snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas// byang chub ngu ni smon lam che btab pa// seMn thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya// byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la// ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis reg par bya/ 
302a7(rgyud): seMn chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs// stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te// yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas// rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus// ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas// rgyal
302a8(rgyud): bo shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur// mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzang 'bar// 'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni//  zhing mya ngan non pa'i de dag kyang // 
302b1(rgyud): chus mthor lag pa sgreng ste rab tu ngu// blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni// bdag gis di ring gzhonu gnyis po dang // nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor
302b2(rgyud): mthong nas// dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni// bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhi dag nas kun nas 'bar ba mthong // yung tsam 'greng nas slar yang sa la 'gye// snying
302b3(rgyud): rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa sgreng ste gnas nas ni// nu bo de yi sngags pa rab tu brjod// rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing // bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang
302b4(rgyud): 'khrugs// mya ngan rab tu 'don zhing smre sngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongasu sems// bdag bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig po ni// sen chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// bdag gi bu
302b5(rgyud): ni gnyis po de dag kyang // mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gi/ 'di ltar bdag nyid myur du deng song la// mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar bya// bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal
302b6(rgyud): ngo'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya// de dag rnams ni skyed pa'i ma yi stong // mya ngan me yis gang bar 'gyur du 'ongs// bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob gyur te// srog dang bral bar 'gyur
302b7(rgyud): ba ma yin no// rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen zhon te bu rnams blta phyir song // bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing // nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong // 
302b8(rgyud): rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su// rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas ni// de yi skyen dar la gor myur du yang // btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga // sngon gyi
303a1(rgyud): rgyal po shing rta chen po yis// bu de snying stobs chen po mchog gyur cing / gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin// rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ri/ shing
303a2(rgyud): che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa rgyu 'phrul gyur// sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin// rgyal po lha chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag
303a3(rgyud): mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che// stag drug dag ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang // btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas// rgyan thams cad dkrol te// skye
303a4(rgyud): bo'i tshogs chen po dang // lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ snying stobs chen po de'i rus pa 'di dag phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste// rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten 'di byas so// 
303a5(rgyud): snying stongs chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongasu btang ba 'dis// phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnam su yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
303a6(rgyud): mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon lam de skad btab bo// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med pa dpag tu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 
303a7(rgyud): mchod rten 'dir bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no// rkyen ni 'di yin no// mchod ton de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang na zhug so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las
303a8(rgyud): stag mo la lus yongasu btang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas
303b1(rgyud): gdugs brtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu
303b2(rgyud): 'khong do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong drag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de la tshog su
303b3(rgyud): bcang pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i sku mdog gtso ma'i gser 'dra ste// sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'// gser gyi ri dbang lta bur gser gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar po'i gser
303b4(rgyud): mdog can// bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus rgyan// dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs sku lus spras// gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra// tshangs
303b5(rgyud): ba'i nu dang sgra sman tshangs pa'i dbyangs/  de'i sgra dang 'brug sma sngags pa'i dbyangs// yan lag drug cu'i bsgrags pa'i dri med sgra/ rgyal dbyangs rma byakal ring ka'i sgra/ shi tu
303b6(rgyud): med dri bral gzi 'ong mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyis rgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri dral mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra// sems can rnams la phar par thugs brje'i
303b7(rgyud): mchog 'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags// 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba gsol ba ste// rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos
303b8(rgyud): ni rab tu ston// 'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thar par mdzad// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol// zhi ba'i
304a1(rgyud): lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud// skye dgu rnams la bde bkur stsol ba// khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'dren pa'i ye shes yon tan mtsho// srog chags kun
304a2(rgyud): la khyod kyi thugs rje dang // byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang // khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang // yon tan thigs pa gcog
304a3(rgyud): tsam rab bstan par// lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigags blangs te// de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad// bdag gis bsod nams
304a4(rgyud): gang bsags de yis ni// sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i
304a5(rgyud): le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las lang sa te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas
304a6(rgyud): ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// thub dbang khyod ni bsod
304a7(rgyud): nams rgya yi mtshan/ dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston// nyi ma thong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar bas 'od kyis khyab kha dog
304a8(rgyud): sna tshogs gang bas rin chen 'dra/ sngon po dkar po ser po de bArA/ zangs dang skya reng shel gyi 'od lta bus/ rdo rje'i dbang ri rab thas mdzad cing // ring rnams bye ba du mar snang mdzad do// sdug
304b1(rgyud): bsngal mi bzang drag po zhi bar mdzad/ bde ba'i mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad// mdog dang dbang po gsal ba bltan mdzes// gzugs lhas mi ngoms skye bos bstan dag / rma bya'i 'dog
304b2(rgyud): 'dra'i dbu spa rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rjes rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags// dpe byang bzang dang
304b3(rgyud): dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzir byang chub yan lag yon tan rgyan// khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad pan pa mdzad// bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung // yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis
304b4(rgyud): rgyan// zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste// me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// ji ltar na mkha'i nyid kyil rdzogs pa bzhin// ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par// 'jig rten khams
304b5(rgyud): rnams kun tu rab tu gda'// ba zho ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing / kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i// tshems kyi phreng bas khyod kyi zhal mdzes pa// ngang pa'i rgyal pos par snang
304b6(rgyud): ji bzhin no// khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshar gnas zla ba 'dra// g.ya su 'khyil cing khong chung 'dra ba lags// bai DUR+Ya 'dra'i spu 'od dkar rnams kyis// na mkha'i dkyil ra nyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam
304b7(rgyud): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag pas/ de'i tshe tshig
304b8(rgyud): su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' nga// las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing // srid dang srid min mkhyen pa'i
305a1(rgyud): rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshalo// kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas se// kye ma'o kye ma'i rgya mtsho dang ri ri rab 'dra// kye ma'o
305a2(rgyud): kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te// u dum bA rI me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon// sems can dag ri thams cad rjesu bzung slad du// gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rangab gsungs pa// mi dbang
305a3(rgyud): nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i rigs kyi tog/ kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje lngar// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi// zhi ba dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs// ting 'dzin
305a4(rgyud): zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni// rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs// de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste// rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags/ 
305a5(rgyud): chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lag sa na// sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to// rtag par khong zug du ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid// rgyal ba thong bar
305a6(rgyud): yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyi slad du// rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu dog sar dbus mo btsugs na su// rgyal ba'i
305a7(rgyud): gzugs kyis skom pas rab tu mya ngan sems// 'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis du bar bgyid// bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong bar rab tu skom// mya ngan me yis kun tu 'bar bar gyur// mthong
305a8(rgyud): ba'i chubasil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol// bdag nyid khyod kyi gzugs la ngalta bas rab tu som// thugs rje'i chab kyis bdag la rab tu tshim par mdzod/ 'dren pa khyod ring ngag la thugs rjer mdzad du
305b1(rgyud): gsol// zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol// khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i skyod pa ste// 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags// sems can thams cad dag ri
305b2(rgyud): rmi lasa'ang bzhin ternam par 'dra zhing rnam pa'i nga bo nyid kyang lags// sgyum smig rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra/ 'dren pa byed kyi ston pa che dang ldan pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gangan las
305b3(rgyud): bzhengs te/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod legaso leg so// khyod yang leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang
305b4(rgyud): dag par bsdus pa dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad dang / lha mo chen mo dpal la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rnam thos kyi bu
305b5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
305b6(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las 'jug bsdus kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// 
305b7(rgyud): 'phags pa gser 'od dam par ngo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mngon po dzi ni mai tra dang / shI la in+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi ma
305b8(rgyud): ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// @#/ rgya gar skang du/ Ar+ya su pa pra b+hA sod+ham sU ny+dza ra dza nA ma ma hA yA na sA tra/ 
306a1(rgyud): bong skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ma po dang ngo // 'das pa dang mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
306a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// de drug gis thos pa dus gcig ma bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings// zab mo langs
306a3(rgyud): rgyas spyod yul na// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams med pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la// mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po ste// mnyan na shin tu zad pa dang // yongasu
306a4(rgyud): brtags na zab pa nyid// gser 'ong dam pa 'di 'chang ngo // phyogs bani ra sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs kyis byin rlangs ga/ mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyog su// rin chen chog
306a5(rgyud): gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med kyis nung phyogasu// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyog su// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa dkra shis pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zang
306a6(rgyud): byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni legs par rgyan// byin gyis brlangs te brjod par bya// sems
306a7(rgyud): can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // dram ze la sogs gtses pa
306a8(rgyud): dang // phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin dang // nor bsgribs pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan mngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa rang ni longs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu nar byang stem dang // mi bzang gdon gyis
306b1(rgyud): nyen pa dang // mya ngan mngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams
306b2(rgyud): kyis rab rgyan te// zang mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// nado 'di nyan par byed na ni// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ srog chags kun gyi gnod pa ste// shin tu zang 'di 'dra ba/ de dag rtag tu zhi bar
306b3(rgyud): 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // rnon po tshogs kyis dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // ne rany+dza ra gnas pa dang / 
306b4(rgyud): 'byung po ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa yi lha mo btan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni/ mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin na mkha'
306b5(rgyud): lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dang der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar// nged ga la ni srung bar byed// zang mo sangs rgyas spyod yul
306b6(rgyud): // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag na do 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang // gang gu rje su yi rang dang / 
306b7(rgyud): gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod spyir du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur/ srog chags bsong rams byed pa rnams// 
306b8(rgyud): de dag bsod nams drang po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yis// byang chub sems
307a1(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzung bar 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas/ 
307a2(rgyud): g.yel ba med pas mchong bar bya// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dgar ngo 'di nyar pa ni// de dag mi
307a3(rgyud): nang legs par 'ongs// mi yi srid pa legs par thob// 'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang // bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas
307a4(rgyud): mang pos rab tu bsngags// / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe de'i dus ra/ rgyal
307a5(rgyud): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// sangs
307a6(rgyud): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyer gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig
307a7(rgyud): thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod
307a8(rgyud): pa spangs pa dang // kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pan/ 
307b1(rgyud): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs par gyur// zas cang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongasu btang ste// tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang / 
307b2(rgyud): rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyamo// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'i tshul
307b3(rgyud): gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khang pa yangs shing rgya che la/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba/ lha'i las 'das
307b4(rgyud): nga'i spos kyis khyad par gyur to// khyim de yi bye gas bzhi nas/ lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs rnams
307b5(rgyud): bting ba dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas
307b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ri ni tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs
307b7(rgyud): pa tshe dpag med byung // byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng+ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
307b8(rgyud): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rter gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
308a1(rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog ngag gi char yang 'angang / lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
308a2(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dadus long dag ni mig
308a3(rgyud): gis gzugs rnams mthong // sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems cad smyos pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems g.yeng ba dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo
308a4(rgyud): rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'drangs par gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom pa dang bral bar gyur// sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni rang dang
308a5(rgyud): bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub
308a6(rgyud): sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rings shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yi bde bskyes nas/ 
308a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams rje su dran la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjesu dran zhing / 
308a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshang la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu 'di ci zhig snyam du ngasam
308b1(rgyud): ba de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka'
308b2(rgyud): stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
308b3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / 
308b4(rgyud): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i chu'i bar du yang rtogs pa ra nus
308b5(rgyud): bded kyis su yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang sa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 
308b6(rgyud): lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub
308b7(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyil der lhag so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
308b8(rgyud): 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshig su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyis// thigs padag ni bgrang bar nus/ 
309a1(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nuso// ri rang rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rang rdul du bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang
309a2(rgyud): bar mi nus so// sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu pra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad li nus// gal te la las na mkha' la// sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag
309a3(rgyud): 'dod kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nu so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces// grangs ni rnyed par
309a4(rgyud): mi rung ngo // gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni// rkyen yang rnam pa gnyis yin te// sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste// de phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i// sku tshe'i grangs ni mi
309a5(rgyud): rnyed de// bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce'am// grangs ma dnga'ang de bzhin te// de bas the tshom med par 'gyur// the tshom cung zad ma tha cig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha la ni// grangs ni gang
309a6(rgyud): du'ang ma dmig so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu
309a7(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams
309a8(rgyud): cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang bar mdzad pa/ shes rab dang
309b1(rgyud): ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa cig stsal du gso/ bcom ldan 'das kyang
309b2(rgyud): mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyi mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa ko'u
309b3(rgyud): ngi n+ya la 'di skad ces smra'o// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cog gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod la dam pa cig sbyin no// bram zes smras pa/ li tsa byi gzhonu bdag ni bcom
309b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / ring bsrel gyi phye ma brgo bya ga bye du gyu sa 'ad// ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de mngon par mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ngang/ 
309b5(rgyud): po 'ba' shig 'thob ces grag so//  ma byi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mngonyan thos dang ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dga' ba/ khong du chung
309b6(rgyud): par dka' ga/ de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang / yon tan dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gis nyon cig/ kye li tsa byaM gzhonu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di ni de ltar shes
309b7(rgyud): par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na/ kho bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang bcangs pa na/ sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par 'gyur
309b8(rgyud): ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung // kye li tsa byi gzho nu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel
310a1(rgyud): za ma tog du bcug te bcangs pas/ sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byi gzho nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas
310a2(rgyud): li tsa byi gzhonu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya la tshig su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ ram zhig gang+gA'i chu rgyur la// me tog rnams ni skye ba
310a3(rgyud): dang // bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang // bu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang // 'bru gor a sma'i dog pa chags// de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsrel du ni gas
310a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// nam zhig ru sbal spu rnams las// go su legs par bta gas gyur te// dgun gyi grang ba sel byed la// de tshe ring bsrel yod ngar 'gyur// nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las/ 
310a5(rgyud): yang thog legs par byas gyur te// brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba// de che ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin du pad+ma kun// so ni dkar bar skyes gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring
310a6(rgyud): dasrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir/ nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te// byi bas
310a7(rgyud): zla ba bza' ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de ro ring
310a8(rgyud): bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu dnge 'gyur la// mchu dmar rim par 'drar gyur cing // glu gar rnams la mangs gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// 
310b1(rgyud): dben par dong nas rtse ba dang // ngam tshun 'thun par gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nga la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'dang skyang su rar gyur pa// 
310b2(rgyud): tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ nar zhig rgya mtsho gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro nga na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis// ri ngo spos
310b3(rgyud): kyi ngang ldan pa// mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slong dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas// li tsa byi gzho 'jig rten thams cad
310b4(rgyud): kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigasu bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ leg so legaso gzhonu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni ngar pa thob/ 
310b5(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po skyod pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab gor rims bzhin// gzho nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyal yul ri bsam
310b6(rgyud): mi khyad// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cang rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thang yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos
310b7(rgyud): nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma no ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te/ rdo rje lta dur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba
310b8(rgyud): med// sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gash+ye
311a1(rgyud): pa chos kyi dbyings/ chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni// ngadag gis dam pa gsol ba byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyi
311a2(rgyud): gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
311a3(rgyud): ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog pa rab tu nas// sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi ganga'// chos kyang rub par mi
311a4(rgyud): 'gyur te// sems can yongasu smin mdzad phyir// yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pasam mi khyad// de bzhin gsher pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan pa'i
311a5(rgyud): phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs stong// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku
311a6(rgyud): tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad
311a7(rgyud): bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs med rangag tu med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gser
311a8(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog
311b1(rgyud): gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ dri ma'i dkyil 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dngag tu med pa
311b2(rgyud): ngag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i
311b3(rgyud): gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de brdung pa mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i chagasu bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sang ma thag tu/ bstan pa'i tshig su
311b4(rgyud): bcad pa de dag rjesu dran no// rje su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khang kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung te/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i rigs ba
311b5(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'ang sa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs
311b6(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btung nas rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra
311b7(rgyud): las bstan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// // nub cig g.yel ba
311b8(rgyud): med par yang // bdag gi rmi lar gyur pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lha ste// phyogs bcu rnam su snang bar gyur/ 
312a1(rgyud): kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai DUR+Wa dag gi khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // 
312a2(rgyud): bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu rdung ba mthong // de yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung // gser 'od dam pa'i rnga cher sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'dzag
312a3(rgyud): rten 'jig rten gsum 'ang na// ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog/ rnga ngo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams
312a4(rgyud): cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar// sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang dral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags
312a5(rgyud): pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar/ skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi yon tan ldan zhing yod tan rgya mtshor gyur/ rnga bo che mos sgra mad 'od yis ni/ sems
312a6(rgyud): can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur// sangs rgyas dam pa byang chub mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 
312a7(rgyud): la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te/ rus pa'i lus
312a8(rgyud): la me lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyis skye ba brgya dag dang // skye ba stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog thub
312b1(rgyud): pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag gis ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bocos sgra skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong
312b2(rgyud): bar shog bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon pa gang yin pa// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi don kun
312b3(rgyud): rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa// me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ 
312b4(rgyud): sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rten na/ sems can sdug bsngal myi bzang drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kur zhi shog/ rten
312b5(rgyud): med dpung gnyen red pa dang // sbubs med par yang gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ 
312b6(rgyud): thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag gas sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/ stobs
312b7(rgyud): bcu spyan sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnamasu mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang dgyis
312b8(rgyud): pa// phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang // gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsams nyes par smras
313a1(rgyud): pa dang // nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigasum ltas pas/ bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i zla yis 'jug pa dang / mi shes
313a2(rgyud): mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang // rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nang dbang dang // nor gyis mi chog nyes
313a3(rgyud): pa yis da/  bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis nyes pa gang bgyis
313a4(rgyud): pa// phongs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur pa yi si// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang / 
313a5(rgyud): 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang ngag dang // bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba
313a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag rang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyad pa rnams gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul ni gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// sangs
313a7(rgyud): rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams
313a8(rgyud): la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang // chos la'ang gus pa ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad
313b1(rgyud): bdag 'chag so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pa dza chos ni spangs pa dang // pa ma rnams la ma gus dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti ru gdang / 
313b2(rgyud): nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod pa bgyi// bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams/ 
313b3(rgyud): sdug bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi// sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya
313b4(rgyud): mtsholas// de kun thar bgyi nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bya bar spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di/ 
313b5(rgyud): sems can de dag bstan par bgyi// gang gis ba skal pa stong rnam su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan ci ga rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang
313b6(rgyud): gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zang 'gyur rang // gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas
313b7(rgyud): par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bskal bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo dang // sangs rgyas yon 'ang mtha' yas kyi// thams cad
313b8(rgyud): mkhyen pa rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gi/ stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i
314a1(rgyud): thugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigasu gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu bzung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgya
314a2(rgyud): rnam su / sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dben par gyur// gang
314a3(rgyud): ngag gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas// nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag
314a4(rgyud): las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag la ni// snying rje chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa
314a5(rgyud): thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngan chad bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // 
314a6(rgyud): yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// lus kyi bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dang / de dag thams cad
314a7(rgyud): bdag 'chag so// mi dge las bcu spangs nasu// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis te// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang dag/ 
314a8(rgyud): mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams
314b1(rgyud): dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi// 
314b2(rgyud): srid 'gro nyams ngar byin pa'i zla yis ni// shin tu mi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stongs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid
314b3(rgyud): pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chag so// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // 
314b4(rgyud): sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyam pa 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam pa dang // ngal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams sgrub pa nyam
314b5(rgyud): nga dag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi nyan mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mchog ri snang ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho
314b6(rgyud): 'dra la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyangasu mchi// rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mdog/ dri med rnam dag bai DUR+Ya'i yan
314b7(rgyud): lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gi mun pa mun nag gsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma
314b8(rgyud): yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yar
315a1(rgyud): lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi
315a2(rgyud): ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// rgya reng dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag ngamar// 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thub chen khyod ni
315a3(rgyud): nyi ma bzhin du de yis ni// mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi chu rga ba'i dba' rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen pongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde
315a4(rgyud): gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyi sems// / yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis
315a5(rgyud): yan lag rnam sbas pa/ sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tsha'o// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // dza ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar namakha'i mtha'
315a6(rgyud): ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nuso// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nuso// chu ni
315a7(rgyud): skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pa mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang
315a8(rgyud): grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa'i sku lus dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 
315b1(rgyud): 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyid chos kyang bstan par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar bar bgyi// stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi
315b2(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi// bskal ba ngasam gyis mi byad gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs paltar// pha rol phyin drug pa
315b3(rgyud): med rdzogs par bgyi// nyon mongs gzhom phyir sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi// 
315b4(rgyud): thung ba'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de yi gsung ni rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi/ 
315b5(rgyud): sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal
315b6(rgyud): kun zhi gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// de kun de'u re dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyams chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/ 
315b7(rgyud): de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgya'o chom kun spre'u bsdigs bsang thug pa dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa/ 
315b8(rgyud): sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kum/ 'jigs mchog mi bzang rgyad po de las thar gyur cig// gang dag brdegs shing bcing ngas bcings gzir ba// phongs pa sna tshogs dag ni gnas
316a1(rgyud): gyur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed // de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cing // brdeg pa dag ni
316a2(rgyud): brdeg las thar bar shog/ bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can gang dag bkres sreng skom gyis gzir// de dag zas
316a3(rgyud): nom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnam sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'or pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems can dbul
316a4(rgyud): pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod la gyur// sems can
316a5(rgyud): thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyi zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams
316a6(rgyud): ngag khasams ma thag tu de dag grung gyur cing // rdza rnga cang te'u pi wang sgra snyan dang // chu mig mtshe'u rdzing bu lteng ka dang // gser gyi pad+ma ud pa la pad+ma can// zas skom gos nor mu tig
316a7(rgyud): nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya/ de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma
316a8(rgyud): gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog/ mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dang bsam par skye bar de dag gyur// bsam pa thams cad
316b1(rgyud): bsams ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bus yong du rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dang // ljon shing ngag las dus gsum 'ab
316b2(rgyud): par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i
316b3(rgyud): chos la yang // phyogs bcu rnamasu mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dman pa thams cad sdong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ ngal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ 
316b4(rgyud): rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigs skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ sman dang grags dang gzugs dang
316b5(rgyud): dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par rgyan pa ra shog/ dung med thams cad rtag tu por gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul bod mangs shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub
316b6(rgyud): phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog phyogs bcu dag na rin cher shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai DUR+Ya'i// khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig
316b7(rgyud): chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnaras bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chang gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad
316b8(rgyud): lus ni zad gyur cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings par bkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal
317a1(rgyud): rnams las thar gyur myur gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'jamu gling 'di dang / gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na/ bsod nams sna tshogs zang mo rnam byed pa/ 
317a2(rgyud): de dag kun la rje su yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yis// bdag gis rje su yi rang bsong nams de// bdag ni smon grub 'bras bu thob par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med
317a3(rgyud): thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongasu bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cur ngan song spang bar 'gyur// tshig su bcad
317a4(rgyud): pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las/ thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag
317a5(rgyud): rgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnam sa dang ldan// mi dngang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags
317a6(rgyud): pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gis gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la ma ni// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi
317a7(rgyud): gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// // bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcu
317a8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des
317b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bskod// 
317b2(rgyud): rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhes pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi
317b3(rgyud): zhing rab zhi rnam par dag sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rang tu gda'// dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung // bung ba rma
317b4(rgyud): bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu// mthong mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra// kha ba dung lhar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/ rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gdal/ spyan ni ring
317b5(rgyud): zhing mthon mthing dri ma med// ut+pal po rab tu rgya sa pa 'dra// ljags ni che zhing legs la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu pad+ma dung dang 'dra/ bai m+bu'i
317b6(rgyud): mdog 'dra g.ya su 'khyil// thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zla bzang pa 'dra// sku yi lte ba rung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal mtho shangs ni rtag tu lha ge ste// 'jam zhing sa l-I gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par
317b7(rgyud): rgyun tu rgyal ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags// spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa ga su 'khyil ba ste// mthor mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can
317b8(rgyud): rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes// bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar dgyes// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun
318a1(rgyud): gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems can dmyal 'gro dung 'gro'i 'gro ba dang // yi dgas lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnam su// sems can de dag thams cad bde bas
318a2(rgyud): tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'ong // btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med 'al// 'dzum
318a3(rgyud): zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal// gzhonu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste// sA la'i lcug ma
318a4(rgyud): rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'ong 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag ge'o// thub pa'i dbang po sku mdog dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad
318a5(rgyud): rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam paraHdnge bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas ngargya srong rnam su yang / mtshan byang zla ba nyil rang po dag/ de dag thams cad 'od ni med
318a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rter sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' las stong phrag brgya dag na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i sems can
318a7(rgyud): mthong // bsod nams stong drag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu rgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag/ phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes drin med/ sa mi
318a8(rgyud): steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul rnyed 'byung ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi// rgyal de dag la ni rab dang pal/ 
318b1(rgyud): ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang // dga' ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tsha'o// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa/ snying po mchog
318b2(rgyud): rab sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon brjod par mi nuso// rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus/ bdag
318b3(rgyud): gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jog rten thams cad mtshor gyur te// srid pa'i rtse ro mar chad chus gang ba// skra'i rtse mos dpag
318b4(rgyud): par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la mid// lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod
318b5(rgyud): nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa
318b6(rgyud): mtha' yas rnamasu yang // gang dang gang du bdag ri skye ba na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga blta zhing // der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi// rgyal stod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// skye ba de dang
318b7(rgyud): der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba/ de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi// nyir gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi/ 
318b8(rgyud): sems can sdug bsngal 'tsho las thar bar bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyi nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi// bdag gi zhing ni lhong pa med gyural cig/ rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras/ 
319a1(rgyud): bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstong pa'i rgyus/ shAkya thub dang nga mngon du blta bar bgyi// der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang ga
319a2(rgyud): gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ri bu po de dag gnyi ga dang // byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gnas med rten med cing // sbyangs dang bral nas
319a3(rgyud): phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na// skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ 
319a4(rgyud): sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa yini bshags pa yis// bdag/ gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog/ bdag gi
319a5(rgyud): las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gi bsong nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye
319a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho rnam dag cing // yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog/ byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs gyur cing // gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang
319a7(rgyud): bar shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gis lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams dam pa lhag ger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum
319a8(rgyud): na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stongs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal bar byang chub spyod par bgyi/ 
319b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum na sngon par ji seng gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyis// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing // ra 'ongs
319b2(rgyud): dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
319b3(rgyud): bstod pa me tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas gyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// sam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu/ 
319b4(rgyud): stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mtsho ga dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya// / sems can po rlung rna par mi shes pas// chos rba
319b5(rgyud): thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems
319b6(rgyud): can 'byung ba'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mngo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang
319b7(rgyud): rmoklu 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag ngan tshun rnam par mi shego/ mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna yi dbang po
319b8(rgyud): sna tshogs dri rnams 'drog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu rol rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag nga rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'ang dag phan tshun du// ring rang yul
320a1(rgyud): la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bu g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam spyod de// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom kun dag
320a2(rgyud): dang gnas pa bzhin/ ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te/ dbang po'i spyod yul
320a3(rgyud): dag kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por bzhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo
320a4(rgyud): bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa me // snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// 
320a5(rgyud): yang dag ma yin yongasu rtogs las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs
320a6(rgyud): dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdugs gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro
320a7(rgyud): gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis
320a8(rgyud): 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang rlu'i sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi na mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu
320b1(rgyud): gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye/ bangad kan rlung dang mkhris bzang gyur nas// lus shi gcin dang ngar skyugs rnams
320b2(rgyud): kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/ dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod
320b3(rgyud): chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ri 'byung ba
320b4(rgyud): mi 'byung ba/ de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas nga ni
320b5(rgyud): rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang
320b6(rgyud): rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag ma byung ba las byung ba mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin
320b7(rgyud): sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa bcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo grol// phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan
320b8(rgyud): rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstar// da ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug// ngas ni bdud rtsi khu bas bdag tshim
321a1(rgyud): byas// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa ngan pa pag// nga ni
321a2(rgyud): nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas na chas kyi rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa sgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngar song gsum gyi las rnams
321a3(rgyud): bkag/ se ni nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung nyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyor mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir
321a4(rgyud): ngan la pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mad pa byas// chos kyi sku nga yongasu tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan ngas byang chub phyir spyad de// 'ag pa dang ni mig dang
321a5(rgyud): rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ldor thams cad dang / rtswa dang rtsa rnams thang
321a6(rgyud): dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrud ba thams cad bcad btu bas te// de dag thams cad phyir blags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phye
321a7(rgyud): ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyad pa// sems can kur gyi shes pa gang
321a8(rgyud): de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab sngar mi rnams kyi// thams cad dgrang bar nus
321b1(rgyud): srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nuso// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nuso// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
321b2(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang // rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
321b3(rgyud): po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ gos drag pa gcig tu dgos nas/ dngus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba
321b4(rgyud): btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ 
321b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongasu bzung ba/ lha'i
321b6(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis
321b7(rgyud): mchod cing bsngags pa brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dung
321b8(rgyud): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu sems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi ngarag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa// ru
322a1(rgyud): ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid ba/ gza' thams cad sel ba mchog tu zhi bar bgyid ga/ mya ngan dang 'o
322a2(rgyud): mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam par ngo
322a3(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad na chos nyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po dadung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'di gzi cher
322a4(rgyud): pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang mthu yang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sur tshogs pa yang bdag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur/ 
322a5(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra nga chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun ba bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lnga
322a6(rgyud): dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rgyal por gyi 'o// 'byung ngo'i tshogs mi bzang ba snying rje ma mchis
