322a7(rgyud): pa// gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin ngargya
322a8(rgyud): stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pra/ 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar gyi ste/ btsur pa bcom
322b1(rgyud): ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzan+d+ra'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dpag tshogs kyis yul
322b2(rgyud): 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'am/ rad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa brgya phrag stong dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba dang / btsun
322b3(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsur pa bcom ldan
322b4(rgyud): 'das rnam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba ra/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'ong
322b5(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag / par ston par gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi
322b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du rango sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'ong dam pa ma
322b7(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po yang bsnyed par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po
322b8(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid // yongasu bskyab pa dang / yong su 'dzin pa dang / yongasu sbyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
323a1(rgyud): cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po'i ngo'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu srung bar dgyi/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / 
323a2(rgyud): yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i
323a3(rgyud): dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar dgying ra/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i
323a4(rgyud): sems can rnams la bde ba'i yod byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong
323a5(rgyud): ma 'am dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la ste stang bgyid// bla mar bgyid// rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
323a6(rgyud): cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas ches sti stang du bgyi ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu
323a7(rgyud): bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po ngag leg so leg so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang leg so leg so// 'di lta ste/ khyod
323a8(rgyud): ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po/ 
323b1(rgyud): chos kyi lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyod ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems cad thams
323b2(rgyud): cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa tha ma cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed
323b3(rgyud): bzhis mi'i rgyal po gser 'ong dar pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gror byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung
323b4(rgyud): ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar gyis shig/ des na rgyal po chen po dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyir 'bum drag du ma dang
323b5(rgyud): bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu srung bar 'gyuraro// yongasu bskyab pa dang
323b6(rgyud): yongasu bzung ba yang 'gyuraro// de na/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur/ 
323b7(rgyud): lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
323b8(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyed ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzir ba de dag la kun tu srung bgyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su
324a1(rgyud): 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / 
324a2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
324a3(rgyud): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
324a4(rgyud): 'ang grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor tam/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par
324a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po dgyid cing / 
324a6(rgyud): rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo
324a7(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos
324a8(rgyud): nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dadung dang / g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po/ 
324b1(rgyud): rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rna
324b2(rgyud): ngar 'phel bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang / lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ 
324b3(rgyud): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dus na grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram po brang 'khor gang na/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
324b4(rgyud): spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgying ba dang / mchod pa
324b5(rgyud): bgyid pa de dag la kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur
324b6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / 
324b7(rgyud): chad pa spang ba dang / zhi nga dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag
324b8(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla
325a1(rgyud): 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dang nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / 
325a2(rgyud): lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhog snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi
325a3(rgyud): mthus/ dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur// rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur// rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul
325a4(rgyud): du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de bdag rang gi yul du phyin na/ 
325a5(rgyud): gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dang nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i ngamag bsogs te/ 
325a6(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogasu mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dadung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo
325a7(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po ngani dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya
325a8(rgyud): stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi ganga' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de yul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag
325b1(rgyud): kyang nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rje mchi bar yang mi nus na// yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
325b2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legaso leg so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
325b3(rgyud): bsnyungs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa
325b4(rgyud): de dag la kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab ba dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ 
325b5(rgyud): rgyal po'i jo brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de sa sa das sus de dag kyang yongasu bsrungs shig/ yongasu daskyang pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad bsnga
325b6(rgyud): pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba bgyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnam
325b7(rgyud): kyang dazlog shig/ 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang / 'tshang mi 'bru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po
325b8(rgyud): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal
326a1(rgyud): srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji
326a2(rgyud): ltar sngon gyi was bsags pas/ rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod
326a3(rgyud): pa dang / nam 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong ngag phan tshun du byams pa'i ser su 'gyur/ byangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ 'arang
326a4(rgyud): mi 'bru/ mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di rgyal bar 'gyur/ lo legs par
326a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang / mis gang bar 'gyuras yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud kor thams cad yang dag pa'i
326a6(rgyud): dus dang ldan par 'gyur// gza' dang rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang // nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus du su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzan+du'i gling thams cad na gnas
326a7(rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba/ ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lan dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher
326a8(rgyud): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser
326b1(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ rim gror byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la
326b2(rgyud): yang sti stang byed/ dra mar byed/ rim gror byed/ chong par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa// gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par
326b3(rgyud): rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung chu'i bdung rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyuraro// khyod kyi lha'i lus 'di
326b4(rgyud): ngag gi gzi chen po yang rnam par 'phelo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do// khyod kyi gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phur sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phe'o/ 
326b5(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par
326b6(rgyud): 'gyu ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma la yang / yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa
326b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas ni'i rgyal po de la srung ba chen po byas par 'gyuraro// des na mi'i rgyal po la kun tu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yod
326b8(rgyud): su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyuro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho drang 'kho
327a1(rgyud): thams cad kyang srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur// yongasu bskyad pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba
327a2(rgyud): byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho drang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang // bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
327a3(rgyud): dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur/ yongasu bskyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dpag
327a4(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul
327a5(rgyud): 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang de dag 'di skad ces pa sol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig
327a6(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i
327a7(rgyud): bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs la yang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis
327a8(rgyud): mi khyad pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgying 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel ba mgying 'tshal 'phrus
327b1(rgyud): be nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongasu 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kun tu srung 'tshal bar 'gyur/ 
327b2(rgyud): yongasu bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi ngarag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang // 'khrug pa ma
327b3(rgyud): mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'ong
327b4(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ste stang du bgyid de mnyam par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyam pa'i slad du/ ri'i rgyal po
327b5(rgyud): des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad du 'phags par na rmi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdang cing / me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs
327b6(rgyud): bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang rgyal
327b7(rgyud): mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu gda' ba gos gsar ba mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis
327b8(rgyud): brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// 
328a1(rgyud): rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos
328a2(rgyud): smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs
328a3(rgyud): rnams la sdug pa dang / phan par blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang
328a4(rgyud): tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyam pa'i mchongs sna tshogs sbyar du rtsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde
328a5(rgyud): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam bar bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab
328a6(rgyud): dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i dus na/ mi'i rgyal
328a7(rgyud): bo des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// sdud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdugs dku re yang brdung bar bya'o// rgyal po rathu chen po bzhi dang
328a8(rgyud): rgyal po bkod pa chen po bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba ngasu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor bde
328b1(rgyud): snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur// de snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba
328b2(rgyud): de snyed du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med
328b3(rgyud): khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug cher po thob par 'gyur
328b4(rgyud): tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ slob sa pa dang ldan par 'gyur// tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur// grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar
328b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ sngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi dade ba rgya che zhing rgya re ba thob par 'gyur/ stongs che
328b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing // gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams
328b7(rgyud): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang drad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dngag tu med pa yong su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po ngag yon tan 'di
328b8(rgyud): lta bu 'di dag mthong nas mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu par bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 
329a1(rgyud): 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyuraro// deng de
329a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshes gsol bar 'gyuro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
329a3(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthur pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na red pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
329a4(rgyud): chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang // nga ltar byung
329a5(rgyud): nga'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mtsho da pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyad pa/ yangs shing rgya cher bya sa par 'gyuro// deng bdag gis seMn dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
329a6(rgyud): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyuro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob
329a7(rgyud): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyuro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyuraro// deng
329a8(rgyud): bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// deng ngargal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar
329b1(rgyud): 'khor ba las yongasu thar bar byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa/ bla reng ba yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung bar 'gyu ro// deng 'dag
329b2(rgyud): gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ra rog tu khyad
329b3(rgyud): bar du 'phags pa bla na med par byas par 'gyur/ deng bdag gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu srung bar 'gyuraro// yongasu bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / ngagra med pa dang / pha rol gyi
329b4(rgyud): dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyu'o snyam du sem sa bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngar/ dge slong
329b5(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam parado sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta dus sti stang byed zla
329b6(rgyud): mar byed rim gror byed/ mchod pa byed cing rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shas kyi nga pa byin na/ mi'i
329b7(rgyud): rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis li khyab des rnam par 'phel bar
329b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyuro// dpal dang phur sum tshogs pa dang // gzi brjid kyis kyang rgyan par 'gyu ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / 
330a1(rgyud): dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis
330a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig ni'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta dus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan pa la/ dge slong
330a3(rgyud): ngam dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyid// bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid cing rgyal po
330a4(rgyud): chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ rgyal po'i pho drang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chang sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'dengs la/ bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan
330a5(rgyud): cig thur mongs du chos mnyan pa de mnyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sha sa cung zad sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
330a6(rgyud): dge slong tshe smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa
330a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas gdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi
330a8(rgyud): 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag cag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna
330b1(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing // snang ba des bdag
330b2(rgyud): gi khang pa rnams kyang snang bar bgyis par 'gyu ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig yud tsam de la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 
330b3(rgyud): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha me chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad
330b4(rgyud): dang lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dngon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang lngar
330b5(rgyud): ba dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing
330b6(rgyud): gdugs rnam su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba nges gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis
330b7(rgyud): ngar 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng
330b8(rgyud): gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnam su gnas par ma za'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
331a1(rgyud): / rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu/ lag na spos snod cig thogs pa de las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'bri shing rnams 'byung
331a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba brag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba drag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba drag
331a3(rgyud): brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i
331a4(rgyud): ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba drag brgya dang // stong gsum gyi
331a5(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsagasum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang / klu dang // gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / namakha'
331a6(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos
331a7(rgyud): dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnam su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyuro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di
331a8(rgyud): ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas pa de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa
331b1(rgyud): / mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
331b2(rgyud): po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma
331b3(rgyud): pad+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba drag khrig brgya drag stong rnam su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drag du ma la/ gang+gA'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang
331b4(rgyud): la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnam su gnas par 'gyur// de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par
331b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhing snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+ka'i klung bye ma snyed dag snang bar byas
331b6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po dag chos phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu nga bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de dag la dgongs par
331b7(rgyud): 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa leg so legaso// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bur zang mor snang ba 'di lta bu'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
331b8(rgyud): ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang ngar 'dod pa khyed leg so legaso zhes bya ba byin par 'gyuro/ su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang nyan pa'i sems can
332a1(rgyud): de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang mi ldan gang dag 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par ra
332a2(rgyud): tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na skyes bu dam pa gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang pa'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med
332a3(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// // bam po gsum pa// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
332a4(rgyud): phrag du ma gang+ga'i bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshig gcig dang / ngag
332a5(rgyud): gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma byang chub kyi snying po
332a6(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa/ si ni tha~Mng las
332a7(rgyud): rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ngag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi
332a8(rgyud): snying po legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yong du skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dud ste
332b1(rgyud): bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mi sdug pastod pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur skyes bu ngam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po
332b2(rgyud): mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med pa/ rab tu zhi ga rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i
332b3(rgyud): gdan snying po brtad pa la 'dug ste chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa yang dag pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa
332b4(rgyud): khyod kyis rnga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng par 'gyur/ 
332b5(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i
332b6(rgyud): dgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jig su rung ba 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu
332b7(rgyud): dam pa khyod se ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ngag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongasu thar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ngag mnyes par
332b8(rgyud): byed par 'gyu ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bac+doMs mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dang
333a1(rgyud): po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong gsangs rgyas stong phrag brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod rnams kyi phu
333a2(rgyud): po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongasu 'dzin pa mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag
333a3(rgyud): du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa ngag spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de khang pa brtsegs pa
333a4(rgyud): phyag dar ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos
333a5(rgyud): nyan pa'i mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo dbya ngas can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang
333a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang // gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpor chen po lag na rdo rje dang / 
333a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dngon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ngag lus
333a8(rgyud): mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi bri 'thon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la
333b1(rgyud): bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyuro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa// gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag
333b2(rgyud): du ma de dag thang 'thun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la chos kyi bdung rtsi'i bu ba 'das tshim
333b3(rgyud): par gyur ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar dgyi'o// rgyal po'i
333b4(rgyud): pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de dang / kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar
333b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar bgyi'o// yul de yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'brug pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar bgyi'o// tsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang
333b6(rgyud): la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po dge slong ngam dge slong ma
333b7(rgyud): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyedan ma gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la sti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid na/ 
333b8(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang // gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma chos nyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'ang
334a1(rgyud): ngag gi gzi'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stongs kyang mi daskyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dang la dang pun su
334a2(rgyud): tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyido// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / gnod spyir bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma
334a3(rgyud): ngag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal dang bor na/ yul ra gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'ad
334a4(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar/ 
334a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thaMd kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / 'tshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang / 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / bza' dang
334a6(rgyud): nang rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'byung // gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung
334a7(rgyud): 'char ba de'ang / nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyurazla ba'i gza' dang ri ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba rnamakha' la gnas pa yang chag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnang ba dang ldan par/ 
334a8(rgyud): 'gyur dus dus namakha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bur 'khyil bar 'gyur// sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin par grags par 'gyur// yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ 
334b1(rgyud): char drag po 'dab par 'gyur// yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/  rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ so ni de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang
334b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dadung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang // gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang yul
334b3(rgyud): na gnas pa'i lha yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs slong 'byung bar 'gyuro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ 
334b4(rgyud): de dag nyid la kun tu srung ba chen po dgying 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myo nga 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstangs pa'i sems kyi
334b5(rgyud): rgyal po nyid dgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur// yul na gnas pa'i seni thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rol gyi dpag tshogs thad 'angam par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur
334b6(rgyud): yul thams cad yun ring du yongasu skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thad
334b7(rgyud): las yongasu thar bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nges gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong
334b8(rgyud): dmang dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyi/ bla mar dgyi/ rim gror bgyi mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dadung dang
335a1(rgyud): g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi// bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gis
335a2(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nges gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyar pa
335a3(rgyud): bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs/ ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po'i brgya byin gyis
335a4(rgyud): dastan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji sed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis so ni ngag gi don gyis du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig chen las 'das
335a5(rgyud): nga'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snye bstan pa dag las ches mchog/ ches khyad par du'angags pa/ gser 'ong dam pa 'do sde'i dngang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa
335a6(rgyud): bac+doMs tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong de dag nga/ brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya drag stong thams cad pas ches
335a7(rgyud): mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas ser rnams kyi don gyi sladu rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lag so// ji ltar na 'dzam+bu'i gling thaMd na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal
335a8(rgyud): pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sen bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongasu bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thaMd na gnod pa dang / 
335b1(rgyud): dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams ngam ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de dag na nang 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par
335b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ni'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnam su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar
335b3(rgyud): bgyis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim tha~Mng lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog
335b4(rgyud): tu bcas pa dang // gnod sbyin brgya stong drag dum dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgying par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag
335b5(rgyud): gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'gru sa dang / stobs dang mthu cher po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
335b6(rgyud): bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gleng thang lo legs shing nyams dga' la skye bo dang mis gang bar 'gyur ba
335b7(rgyud): dang / ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i son tha bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sen thams cad brgal dbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dra
335b8(rgyud): du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che 'ang rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag
336a1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
336a2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye
336a3(rgyud): ba khrag khrig stong gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig
336a4(rgyud): brgya stong du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis seM naM thams cad
336a5(rgyud): kyi don gyi sla du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rab nga pe'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bsha // mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang / rgyal
336a6(rgyud): po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i dgyi ba gang dag 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'ad
336a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nye bar bstan/ yong su brjod yang dag par rab tu bsha // btsun pa
336a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod
336b1(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas gdon
336b2(rgyud): mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu srung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen
336b3(rgyud): po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug shig dang / de dag lha dang mi
336b4(rgyud): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
336b5(rgyud): 'chang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ji nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsen dang / dge bsnyen ma srung ba dang / gnod pa med
336b6(rgyud): ba dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
336b7(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur
336b8(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang // rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang bstan las langs te/ bla gos
337a1(rgyud): phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang
337a2(rgyud): 'thun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'ong/ rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog
337a3(rgyud): ngang rtsa rdul meng tsher sa// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal nga rgya mtsho ye shes ru yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhangs
337a4(rgyud): ni 'khor lor bris pa te// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // bya ga dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta du rab tu gang la/ rgyal ba dri med
337a5(rgyud): gser gyi ri dbang po// yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste// sang sa rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zla banya ba 'dra// namakha' dang yang ratshungs shing 'dra
337a6(rgyud): ba ste/ sgyu ma smig sgyu lta bu chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma re da la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa// stobs bcu dag gi gser 'od dang
337a7(rgyud): pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rang mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan ngas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde'i dkon mchog zang mo 'di// sems can
337a8(rgyud): la bde ba sbyin byed nga// se ni rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang / 
337b1(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// gang dag 'dzam+bu'i gling ni 'di na yang // 'dzam+bu'i gling gnas rgyal po thams cad kyi/ rab tu dga' ba chen
337b2(rgyud): po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing // 'dzam+bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na
337b3(rgyud): yang // seMn thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di ni mi'i dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor la dga' ba des// ra ro sde'i dbang po
337b4(rgyud): 'di ni mnyan par bya// kha rol dgra ni yang dag zang byed pa// pha rol dgra tshogs bzlog pa dge byed pa// mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel byed pa// mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i
337b5(rgyud): dang po 'di/ ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mang sde'i dngang po mchog
337b6(rgyud): de ltar blta// ji ltar chu grang sgom pa sel byed pa// tshangs nyan thag tshe ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhi'o// mdo sde rin chen thams car
337b7(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi yi dbang ngo tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhino// 'di ni lha yi ngogs kyis mngon mchod pa mdo sde'i
337b8(rgyud): dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phral chen po pa// bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu
338a1(rgyud): dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu
338a2(rgyud): yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi
338a3(rgyud): khyad pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi
338a4(rgyud): brjid chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa
338a5(rgyud): dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis/ yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchi ma phyis te// de dag lus 'bar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / 
338a6(rgyud): bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur na/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man nga ra ba bdag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to// gtor mngon par gter nas
338a7(rgyud): kyang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa cig tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
338a8(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po chen po re re yang gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang chos smra ba de srung ba dang / yongasu brkyang ba'i sladu
338b1(rgyud): rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// // gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// // 
338b2(rgyud): de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom lngar
338b3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong tshe smra ba de'i tshig brgyad pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar sgrub par dgyi/ 
338b4(rgyud): gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gi brjod pa kun tu bzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bdagyi'o// gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'idi las
338b5(rgyud): tshig gaM yi ge gang yang rung ba dag gis yongasu nyams par gyur tam/ basbyang na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang yi ge de dag thams cad
338b6(rgyud): sgrub par bgyi'o// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de ngag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
338b7(rgyud): rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling na ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang // sems can du ma dag gis gser 'ong ngam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam
338b8(rgyud): gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la ngan gdags pa dang / 
339a1(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur
339a2(rgyud): ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / seM na
339a3(rgyud): chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi sladu sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste// gza' dang rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug
339a4(rgyud): glong dang / khrag 'khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / bya dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du rtsal ba'i sla
339a5(rgyud): dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi wang 'bu sug dang / sha myang sha mi shi ri sha/ dbang po'i lag dang skal pa che/ dz+nyA ma shi da tsa a ga ru// shi ri be sta sra rtsi dang / gu gul
339a6(rgyud): shal la ki/ rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang / tsan dan dang ni ldong ros dang // gi wang bcas dang ru rta dang // gur gum gla skang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug smel na lang / na ga ge sar u shir
339a7(rgyud): 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'ang // lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri te/ ka ma la nI la/ dza na ka ra te/ aM ka ra / 
339a8(rgyud): in+ta dza l-i shaM ka ra dri/ pA sha dre/ a brta ka si ke na ku/ ku Ta ku/ ka bi la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san d+ha d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/ shi ri sha ri/ sa t+ya s+thi te swA hA// lci ngas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma
339b1(rgyud): par bgyis gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du// mngar ba'i khu ba bzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig der yang bzhag par bgyi// rab tu rgyan pa'i bu mo ba ni// bum pa thogs par
339b2(rgyud): bzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi// sil sAn sna lnga bgyid du brtsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba ngan bgyi// lha mo de ni legs par rgyan// bar bar dag tu me long bzhag/ mnga' dang
339b3(rgyud): mdung rtse rna sdang bzhag// de nas mtshams kyang bcad par bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams bcad pa yang rtsam par bgyi// sbrang the ngan/ a te/ na ya me/ yi me
339b4(rgyud): gi le/ khi khi le swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su khrus dgyis nas// sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na// khrus kyi zhi bar sbyor ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ga De bi ga De/ bi ga ta Ni swAH/ 
339b5(rgyud): phyogs pa ni ngag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag ni tshe bsrungs shig/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung ba'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyid
339b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me/ bi sha me sA hA// sa ga De bi ga De swA hA// swa ga ra saM dud+hA ya swA hA// swan+d+ha mA tA ye swAhA/ nI la kaN+Da ya swA hA// a pa ra dzi ta bi d+yA ya swA hA/ hi ma baM d+ha
339b7(rgyud): bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ in mi la bAk+Sha ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma ga Ne na maHsa ra swa t+yai de byaM sid+d+ha nu man+t+ra dA dA/ ta ra tu bi tsi taM brad+d+hA nu ma n+ya tu swA hA// dge slong chos smra ba de srung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag/ 
339b8(rgyud): dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi sra du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar dgyi'o// lce'i tshogs thams cad dang / lhan cig tu grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang / 
340a1(rgyud): der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de ngag gi srog la phan gdags
340a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
340a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar/ gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rlog pa dang bcas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang / log
340a4(rgyud): 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang ro langs thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis lha mo dbyangs can la// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod
340a5(rgyud): skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod kyis sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni/ leg so leg so zhes bya ba byi'o// ma
340a6(rgyud): dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas lha mo dbyangs tsan de bku go/ lha mo chen mo
340a7(rgyud): dbyangs can mchog 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog byin yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dAr ba rtsa yi gos bskus pa/ dur b+ha rtsa'i gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas
340a8(rgyud): lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol cig/ s+yAd ya the dan/ mu ri tsi ra/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba li he gu le mi gu le/ bi ga la/ 
340b1(rgyud): mi gu she mA ri tsI sa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ A gri ma gri ta ra/ tsa ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi tsi ri shi rI mi ri/ mA ri ts+yai/ pra Na pri ye/ lo ka dz+yeSh+Te lo ka sheSh+Te/ lo ka pri ye/ sid d+ha pra te/ b+hi ma mu khe shu/ tsi tsa ri/ 
340b2(rgyud): a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti/ sata bud+d+hi na mu tsa~M/ ma hA na mu tsi ma hA de bigi/ pra ti gri hU/ na ma ska ran/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang / tshig su bcang ba'i rgyud dang sde
340b3(rgyud): snod dang / snyan ngag la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha dA hi li hi li/ mi li mi 'o/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag
340b4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ ka ra re ke yU re/ ke yu/ ra ma ti/ hi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ hi mi hi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i
340b5(rgyud): bden pa dang chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo/ dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de ngag gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo
340b6(rgyud): dgug par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyu bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la
340b7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas slong dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u ri n+yas / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bskong ngo // 
340b8(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad ngal nyan par gyis// lha dang dri ba lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin// lha mo ngam pa mchog tu mdzes
341a1(rgyud): pa'i zhal la bstod// ston rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag rgyar// dbyangs can zhes bya spyar ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar ba dang / dri med ye shes yon
341a2(rgyud): taran sna tshogs rnam par rgya na// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bu blta ba'i phyir/ mchog rang ngag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang / yang dag sngags
341a3(rgyud): dang yon tan byed pa dang // dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang // mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang // dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang // yon tan bsam du med par rgyan
341a4(rgyud): pa dang / zla ba 'dra ba dri ma med 'od dang // ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng+ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang // lag pa brgyan rnams kyis ni rgyan pa dang / 
341a5(rgyud): zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba dang // yi du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang // shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // bgos mchog sgrub byed san dam pa dang // lnga dang lha min
341a6(rgyud): dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyis gnas rtag mchod ba'i phyir/ swA hA/ bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la
341a7(rgyud): yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig/ dgongs pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub rtsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu bsrungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni/ nang par langs nas
341a8(rgyud): gtsang mar rab brjod par// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru tha~Md rnyed// dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ dbyangs can gyi le'u
341b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis kyang // 
341b2(rgyud): ji nas chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang // brel phongs ma mchis par thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems rtag par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar
341b3(rgyud): gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang / gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di las tshig dang yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang // rnam par rtogs par
341b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur/ ba dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba sbun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi sla du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
341b5(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par ma 'gyur ba dang / son rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde
341b6(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo
341b7(rgyud): legs par 'gyur ba dang / seM ni rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi
341b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur ba gang 'di gos dang zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang 'chog chas gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong tshe smra
342a1(rgyud): de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi kha dog
342a2(rgyud): bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des de ltar phyogs gang dang gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba
342a3(rgyud): dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der/ sen bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang skom dang nor dang 'bru
342a4(rgyud): dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang mal shel dang / byi ru dang // dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par
342a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ sen de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyuraro// lha mo ched mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya// spos dang me tog bdug pa yang dngul
342a6(rgyud): bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la/ ro dro ba sna tshogs kyang byin ma/ do'i 'bru'i phung po rnam par 'phel
342a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa'i bcud dag rnam par 'phel/ lha rnams rtag par rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon lha rnams// lo tog shin tu sna tshog
342a8(rgyud): rnams kyang bskyed// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sen de dag la lha mo chen mo dpal sems par 'gyur// de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur/ lha
342b1(rgyud): mo chen mo dpal ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na bskyed mos tshal dam pa/ bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan
342b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba na gnas te mi gang la la 'dru'i phung ngo spel bar 'dod pa des rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya/ drus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// gos dri rab tu zhi
342b3(rgyud): pa bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi kha dog gser du snang ba'i dpal de la
342b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod lha mo chen mo dpal gyi laganas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang / spos kyang 'bul 'odro bcwa
342b5(rgyud): tshogs kyang 'bul gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod// lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing / me tog
342b6(rgyud): dang dadug pa yang 'bul ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'dul na/ gser 'od ngam pan do sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur// de'i 'bru'i
342b7(rgyud): phung po chen po yang 'phel bar 'gyuraro// lha mo chen mo dpal 'gug par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
342b8(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// de dag la phyag
343a1(rgyud): 'tshal nas/ rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cig/ s+yAd the dan/ pra ti pU ra Na ba re/ sa man+ta daR+sha na/ ma hA mi tA ra ga ti/ sa man+ta bi da na gte
343a2(rgyud): ma hA ra kAr+yaM pra ti/ dra ma Ne/ satwa aR+tha sa maM tA nu pra pU re/ A yAn/ d+harma tA ma tI b+ho gi mi ma hA me dz+nyo pa sang hi ti/ hi te'i sang gri hI ke/ sa nan+t+ra nu pA lA ni/ 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid
343a3(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyi tshigs gcig tu de kho na yang dag par drub par sbyin pa/ mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig te/ se naM bar ma la sbyor ba rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis lo bdun du 'don cing
343a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa dag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la snyan te/ ngadag dang sems can kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas
343a5(rgyud): thams cad la me tog dang spos rnams kyis mchod na/ des bdag gis bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig / myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas
343a6(rgyud): kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang mar byas la/ lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa yang 'bul bar bya'o// stan gtsang ma yang gding bar bya'o// sa la me tog sil ma bkram nas bsdad par
343a7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dpal 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyu ro// de'i phyin chad khyim mam/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnasu nam yang brel cing
343a8(rgyud): phongs pa med par bye'o// 'gron bu dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang 'bru dang / yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de
343b1(rgyud): ngag thams cad las/ lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ des na de srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ 'phang bar mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzog
343b2(rgyud): par 'gyuro// gsor 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can phyag 'tshal
343b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa 'bar ba/ rin chen gser gyi 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam+bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la
343b4(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la/ phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs
343b5(rgyud): pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
343b6(rgyud): sgron ma chen mo la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa zhes bya ba dang / 
343b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba dang / shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa ni
343b8(rgyud): 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba dang / nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dngag med ces bya ba dang / byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs parda skra
344a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste/ su gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di dag 'dzin tam/ 
344a2(rgyud): klog gam/ khong du chud par byed na/ de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyuro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo bstan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo
344a3(rgyud): sngo'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'a da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljong saM/ dgon pa'i sa phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho drang 'khor gang du gnas
344a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal laM// ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma
344a5(rgyud): bdag 'chi bar dgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher ya nga dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang
344a6(rgyud): dang gang na dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos khri shom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du chos smra ba stan la mchis nas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
344a7(rgyud): ston par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar chos khri'i 'og log su mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa ma gos
344a8(rgyud): dge slong tshe smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas brten par bgyi'o// bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yang dag par mchod pa bgyi'o// bdag tshim pa
344b1(rgyud): gyur/ rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du sa'i bcud kyis rnam par
344b2(rgyud): 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du yang rgya mtsho'i sa la thug pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ sa'i bcud kyi snum gyis rlan par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di rab
344b3(rgyud): tu mdangs dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam+bu gling 'dir rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal sna tshogs rnams mdangs dang rab tu ldan par 'khrungs par 'gyur/ kun dga'i ra ba
344b4(rgyud): dang / nags tshal dang / shing ljon pa thams cad dang / lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad rab tu mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ dri dang
344b5(rgyud): rab tu ldan pa dang / snum dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ro zhim por 'gyur/ lha na rab tu sdug pa dang / rab tu che bar 'gyu ro// se ni de dag kyang datung ba dang / bza' ba rnam pa sna
344b6(rgyud): tshogs de dag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang stobs dang kha dog dang / dbang po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang stobs dang / kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur nas kyang sa la mchis
344b7(rgyud): pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong du ma dag bgyid par 'gyuraro// brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobasu bgyid pa'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyuro// btsun pa bcom
344b8(rgyud): ldan 'das rgyu nges 'dzum+bu'i gling thams cad zhi ba dang / lo legs pa dang / rgyas pa dang / nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ mi'i skye bo mang ngos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sen bde bar 'gyur/ 
345a1(rgyud): dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi brjid dang stebs dang / kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par 'gyuro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
345a2(rgyud): 'di'i slad du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyed ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi stan la mchis pa'i gan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang seras rab tu dang bas/ 
345a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de la gsol
345a4(rgyud): 'debs par 'gyuro// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bsha/ nga na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas / 
345a5(rgyud): rab tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bdag cag gi lus la stongs dang brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang
345a6(rgyud): dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma ngag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par 'gyur// gzi brjid dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus
345a7(rgyud): dang mthu dang shugs chen po thob par 'gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcung chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ sa chen po mdangs dang rab tu ldan par
345a8(rgyud): 'gyuro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i seMn 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyuraro// sa la gnas pa'i seMn de dag chen por gyur kyang / longs spyod dang yongasu spyod
345b1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba yang myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang mal cha dang / gnas dang / khang pa dang gzhal
345b2(rgyud): med khang dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang mtsho dang lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sa las byung gsal rten pa
345b3(rgyud): 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa bzo bar bgyi'o// gdor mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
345b4(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di sti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag tshe smra ba de'i
345b5(rgyud): gan du mchis pa'i slad du rigs tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa ngag nas byung ste/ mchis nas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos
345b6(rgyud): nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang / khyim dang grong dang grong rdal tha da da pa dag tu zhugs nas rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshu na du 'di skad ces bdag gis de ring chos mnyan pa
345b7(rgyud): zang mo thos so// de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung // bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du
345b8(rgyud): ma dag mnyes par byaso// deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sen dmyal ba las yongasu thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongs
346a1(rgyud): su thar to// deng bdag cag chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mir skye ba yongasu gzung bar 'gyur zhes gtan zer bar
346a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ khyim tha dad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag sems can gzhan dag la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe cig brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo
346a3(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon byung kha cig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi
346a4(rgyud): nga'i tshogasu bcad pa gcig ma/ tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan
346a5(rgyud): gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sen rnam pa tha dad pa de dag sa phyogs rnam pa tha dad ba de dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna
346a6(rgyud): tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam brgyud brjod ma btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang / 
346a7(rgyud): snum par 'gyuraro// sa phyogs de dang de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par
346a8(rgyud): 'gyur/ sems can de dag thaMd kyang bde bar 'gyuraro// nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
346b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo dartan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo se naM gang la la ngag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyar na
346b2(rgyud): de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyuraro// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser
346b3(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ gnas de dag legs par rgyan par byed dam tha na gdugs gcig gam/ kha dan gcig gam/ ras gtses bu gcig gis
346b4(rgyud): g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo rtag tu rgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa lha'i ris bdun po dag tu/ lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par
346b5(rgyud): brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyuro// gang gi tshe se ni de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdur gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i
346b6(rgyud): lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang myong bar 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal
346b7(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi skan la mchis pa
346b8(rgyud): de'i chos kyi stan gyi 'og logasu sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don
