370a6(rgyud): nags 'dab de nas slar log ste/ stag gi gnas song nas/ nags kyi yal ga la gos bzar te/ bdag gi 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/ gzhan
370a7(rgyud): gyis btang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub rin med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog/ bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtshorab
370a8(rgyud): tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum po bsgral bar bya zhes smon lam btab po// de nas son chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang / de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
370b1(rgyud): la stag mos ci yang ma bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kye ma ho 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nuso snyam nas langs te/ snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha bcal na gang nas kyang mtshon ma rnyed nas/ 
370b2(rgyud): des 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gi mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu chu'i dbus su son pa'i gru rlung gis
370b3(rgyud): bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo so// nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do// lha'i spos dang phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang phab po// 
370b4(rgyud): de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes seMni rnams khyab ste/ mi'i dbang po
370b5(rgyud): rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'dir btang bas na// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi pa gnas kyi mchog zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshogs med ring por mi thogs brnyas/ 
370b6(rgyud): de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis spags pa la bltas nas/ yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par bya'o// de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams
370b7(rgyud): nas lha chen po la 'di skad ces smra'o// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgyal tsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yis// sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la// me tog char pa 'bab cing kho bor
370b8(rgyud): yid kyang 'khrugs pas ni// da bzong bdag gi nu ngos rang gi lus ni btang yang thag/ lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras la/ bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gces pa/ 
371a1(rgyud): shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang // za bar chas la lta ngas bdag kyang ngogs// de nas rgyal bu gno ru de nying rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas/ mchims mig gang ste lam de nyid nas slar
371a2(rgyud): log nas/ stag mo'i drung du byin pa dang / gos thad ni 'od ma'i yal ga la gzar/ rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral khrag ni rdzang du gyur/ sgra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su 'thor ba mthong ngo // ratheng ras
371a3(rgyud): brgyal te/ rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas/ ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de langs ras lag pa sgreng ste/ nyam thag pa'i sgra byungango // kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang / de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung
371a4(rgyud): ba'i ma// pad+ma 'dra ba mig ring khyod kyis gar bzhag ces// ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chung 'dri bar 'gyur// kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid// shi na legs kyis gson na de lta ma
371a5(rgyud): yin no// sen chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la// pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon de gnyis kyis/ snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por ngus nas dong ngo // 
371a6(rgyud): de nas rgyal bu gzhonu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang ga'o ru tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su rgyug pa dang / cig gis cig mthong nas/ gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o// de'i tshe btsun mo mal mnyal ba'i rmi lam ra// 
371a7(rgyud): sdug pa dang bral ba rmis pa 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang / so phyung ba dang thi ba'i phru gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer ba mthong ngo // de nas btsun ros sa g.yos pas snying sngangs te/ 
371a8(rgyud): mang la sang nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun chagaya ci zhig gu/ nyi ma 'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur bar sbyor// nga yi lus ni zhum
371b1(rgyud): zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi ru ma bcang rmis pa// nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram ge/ de nas de snyam bsams pa dang / dran mo yang snying myos te 'ongs ras btsun
371b2(rgyud): mo la smras pa jo mo gzho ru'i rim gro pa dag gzho nu tshol zhing mchis na/ jo co stor ces ganga'o// de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing / mig dang gdong mchims gang ste rgyal po'i gan du song nas
371b3(rgyud): smras pa/ lnga bdag gi bu sdug pa sngor ces thos so// rgyal po yang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi cung bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba ta zhes smraso// de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir
371b4(rgyud): ngag no ru btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyis bzang mo mya ngar ma byed cig/ der gzhon tshol ba la zhugs pa ma skye bo'i tshogs dag rod rong por gyur to// de nas ring por ma long par
371b5(rgyud): rgyal pos rgyal bu gzho nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang smras pa/ ga'o du de dag ni 'od na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hung bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni
371b6(rgyud): sdug bsngal ba'o// ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba'i rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no// 'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba 'am// mi rnams gang dag pu gsor
371b7(rgyud): ngag bde ba yin nam ci// de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas// rnga mo gan du bsnum pa bzhin du shin tu mi bzang ba'i sgra byu // de lta bu dag gsum ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te// me tog
371b8(rgyud): rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dge tha chungs 'ongs par ma gyur na// bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chungs de ga re de nas de gnyis lhags pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris
372a1(rgyud): pa khye'u tha chungs ga re zhes ga'o ru gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste/ rkan dang mchu dang kha dang so skam nas cang mi zer ro// 
372a2(rgyud): btsun mos smras pa/ kho mos bu sdug tha chungs de ga re/ kho mo'i snying 'digs la thug gyur cing / lus ni mi bzad rab tu bzir gyur te/ kho mo'i dran pa nyams 'gyur myur du smos// de ras gzhor
372a3(rgyud): de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de bzhin du smra so// de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang btsul myos par gyur te/ myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ste/ de nas rgyal po dang btsun
372a4(rgyud): mos rus pa de dag sha dang khrag dang rgyus pa med cing / skra phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su 'thor ba mthong nas/ shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de nas nye phar dang blon po
372a5(rgyud): ngag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ chu dang ri ma la ya'i tsan+dan gyi 'de gus/ rgyal po dang btsun mo'i lus tha sil bar bya'o// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed
372a6(rgyud): de rgyal po langs te/ snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa/ kye ma bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba// 'chi bdag dbang du ci'i phyir myur du song // 'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs// nga la sdug
372a7(rgyud): bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung // btsun mo yang myos pa las sangs nas// sgra zhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs te/ nya thang la phyung ba bzhin sa'i steng na 'gre ldog cing / ma he be'u
372a8(rgyud): stor ba dang / rnga mo rnge'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje skad du du'o// kye ma sdug cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di// su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor// yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i
372b1(rgyud): / bzhin can bdag gi bu// bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de rings 'dir bcom// kye ma sa 'dir bu mchog bsang mthong na// lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur// sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma
372b2(rgyud): gas pas// bdag gi snying 'di lcags ni yin yang dag/ de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad// so yang byung bas de ring bdag gi du sdug de ni myur du ma rung gyur/ 
372b3(rgyud): bdag gis thi ba phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin/ bdag gi bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer/ kyem sdig pa can gyi rmi
372b4(rgyud): de'i 'bras bu grub pa 'di yin no// de nas rgyal po btsun mo snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por sme zhing rgyun thams cad bkrol nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig du
372b5(rgyud): bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzha'o// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzho ru seMn chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
372b6(rgyud): zhig yin snyam khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gno nu sen chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang
372b7(rgyud): gti mug las yongasu ma grol ba de'i tshe yang // seMn dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las ngas 'gro ba thams cad la phan btags na/ skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs
372b8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas/ da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sen dmyal ba rnam su bskal par gnas par spro zhing / skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par bsgra'o// senaM gyi snying pos
373a1(rgyud): shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la pan btag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// byang chub
373a2(rgyud): mchog 'di yongasu tshol ba na// bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste// ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur// de ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongasu btang // sngon gyi skye ba rnams ni rjes dran ste// shing
373a3(rgyud): rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal por byung // de la du ni gtong ba che ldan pa// seMn chen po zhes bya dam pa yod// de la ngu po dag ni gnyis yod de// ring ri sgra chen po dang lha chen po// dadung tshogs de dag
373a4(rgyud): nags tshal lcag por dong // de dag stag mo dkres pa sa gzir ba mthong // de la seMn mchog 'di snying rje skyes// stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gzir bas ma// stag phrug de dag za bar 'gyur
373a5(rgyud): 'ong gis/ de ltar bdag lus dag ni btang bar bya 'o// shing rta che bu seMnaM ches// stag mo skyes mthong stag phrug rnams// thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis// ri ngos gzar nas mchod
373a6(rgyud): pa dang // sa ni ri dang bca su g.yos// bya tshogs rnams mang rnam par 'thor// ri dgas tshogs bsgrag 'jig rten 'ang // run pas 'thibs par gnas par 'gyur// de yi bu bo sgra chen dang // de
373a7(rgyud): bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis// nags mchog chen po der ltas na// seMn chen po ma rnyed nas// shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying // dran med nags kyi nang na rgyug/ nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing // gdong la
373a8(rgyud): mchi zag nags khrod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po// rgyal bu gzhonu de dag gnyis// stag mo nyam chung gar nyal ba// der ni nye bar song ba dang // stag mo dang ni stag drug gi/ stag gi maru
373b1(rgyud): la khrag chags mthong // skra dang rus pa cung zad cigs la rnam par 'thor ba mthong // de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni// nyung zhing sa la yod par gyur// rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis// khrag chags
373b2(rgyud): pa yis de mthong ka/ rab tu ngargyal de sa de la// 'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur// lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag gi ni 'khor rnams
373b3(rgyud): kyang // snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non// de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing // lag pa sbreng ste ngu zhing gnas// de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang // btsun mo gces mchog skyed pa'i ma// bud med dag ni
373b4(rgyud): lnga brgya dang // pho brang rang ra bde 'jug pa// nu ser gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// 'o ma khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dang yan lag kun/ khab kyis btsags pa bzhin du tsha// snying ni
373b5(rgyud): rab tu mya ngan gang // bu bral mya ngan drag rangs pog/ rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste/ mya ngan rab gdung yid mi dga'// / snying rjer sgra yis rab ngu zhing // rgyal po shing rta me la smras/ 
373b6(rgyud): mi dngang rgyal po bdag la gson// bdag lus mya ngar me yis tshig/ bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas// 'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung // bdag lus khab kyis btsags bzhin tshe// bdag gi snying yang
373b7(rgyud): gas la thug/ ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni// phyir chang ri mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rjes mdzod de bdag srog rtsol// de ring bdag gi rmi lam ra// thi ba phrag
373b8(rgyud): gu gsum rnyed na// bdag gi thi ba phru gu ni// sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa// der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni// thi ba phru gu de khras 'tshal// bdag gi rmi lam re 'dra yi/ mya ngan snying 'dir rab
374a1(rgyud): tu zhugs/ sangs ni mya ngan rab gdung bar// bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/ zugs rje ldan pa bdag srog rtsol// de skad smras nas tsur mo mchog
374a2(rgyud): brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i dbang po rnam par nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa med// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang // snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu ngu// btsur lo dam pa
374a3(rgyud): brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas mi/ de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de/ bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non// blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang / gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dong // grong khyer kun gyi se bo dag/ 
374a4(rgyud): tha dad khyim na byung zhing 'khong / ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag/ lam kar snying stobs che de 'dri// bsod nams 'on te shi 'am / sor chen po de gar song // bdag cag pa rang mthong
374a5(rgyud): zhig gam// ring 'ongs sems can mthong re dga'// de ring mi snad thos gyur cing // yul 'dir mya ngan mi bzang rlung // sgra ma phyin cing sgyu mtha' yas drag po'i sgra bcas ldan zhig gam// 
374a6(rgyud): rgyal po shing rta che langs te/ mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// btsun mo ngam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyid chu yis rgyun kyang 'thor// ji srad dran rnyed ldan 'gyur ba/ de srid du ni chu yis gtor// bdag
374a7(rgyud): bu gum 'am gson shig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed// rgyal po shing rnga chen po yis// btsun mo mchog la'i nang smras// blon po'i tshogs la dang smras// blon po dag dang 'khor rnams
374a8(rgyud): kyang // gzhon rnams ni tshol phyir dong // khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing // rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yis// btsur mo dam pa spro bsrangs te// rgyal ngo pho brang nas phyung nas/ 
374b1(rgyud): ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te// yid rab zhum zhing lus kyang zhar// srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang // ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i
374b2(rgyud): phyir// grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung // rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni// rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang // rgyal po shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i
374b3(rgyud): phyir// rgod pa'i mig gis phyog su bltas// mgo bregs yan lag khrag spags shing // lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la// gdong la mchi zag du bzhin du// 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta
374b4(rgyud): chen po'i snying la yang // rab tu mi bzang mya ngar gnas// ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zags// lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug/ de nas blon po gzhan zhig gis// rgyang ring myur du rings
374b5(rgyud): par 'ong // 'ongs nas mi dngang rgyal po ni/ shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ khyod sras yid du 'ong ba mchis// ring por mi thogs khyod kyi
374b6(rgyud): gan 'dir ni// sras mchog yid 'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs// rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang // de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs// rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos sngon
374b7(rgyud): cing mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sras gnyis ni// mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog cig mi gda'// seMn
374b8(rgyud): chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon pa// rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong // de dag la ni gzhon sems can ches// snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed ras/ 
375a1(rgyud): byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa// sems can thams cad bdag gis grol bar bya// byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la// me 'ongs dus na bdag gis reg par
375a2(rgyud): bya/ sems can chen po ri ngos gzas nas mchongs// stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te// yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas// rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus// ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de
375a3(rgyud): thos nas// rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur// mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzang 'bar// 'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni// ngu zhing mya ngan non
375a4(rgyud): bzhin de dag kyang // chu 'thor lag pa gleng ste rab tu du/ blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni// bdag gis de ring gzhonu gnyis po dag/ nags chen de na rab tu ngargyal gyur cing / 
375a5(rgyud): sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas// dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni// bdag cag rnams kyi chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas 'bar ba mthong // 
375a6(rgyud): yud tsam 'greng ste slar yang sa la 'gyel// snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa sgreng ste gnas nas ni// nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu brjod// rgyal po de ni rab tu sems
375a7(rgyud): zhum zhing // bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs// mya ngan rab tu gdung zhing smre bsngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongasu sems// bdag pu sdug cing yid 'od gcig pu ni/ 
375a8(rgyud): sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zir// bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang // mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ongs gis// 'di ltar bdag ni myur du deng song la// mthong na dga' ba'i bu
375b1(rgyud): ngag brta bar byas// gzhon pa na gyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i ba tu myur du dkri bar bya// de dag rnams ni basbed pa'i ma yi snying mya ngan me yis gas par 'gyur du 'ong ju gnyi
375b2(rgyud): mthong nas zhi ba 'thob 'gyur te// srog dang bral bar gyur pa ma yin no// rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen zhon te bu rnams blta phyir song // ngu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis
375b3(rgyud): rang ngu zhing // nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ongs pa mthong // rgyal po'i bu de gnyis ni khrid nasu/ rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas ni// de yis skyen par la gor myur du yang // btsun mo la ni rang
375b4(rgyud): gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga // sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po yi// du ste sems can cher po mchog gyur cing // gang gi stag ma bde bar byas
375b5(rgyud): nga yin// rgyal po'i dbang po'i dam pa zas gtsang ni// shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun mo 'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu bar gyur// sgra chen po ni byams par gyur
375b6(rgyud): pa yin// rgyal bu lha chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa yin// stag mor gyur pa skya dgu'i bdag mo che// lhag drug rnams ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de nas rgyal po
375b7(rgyud): shing rta chen po dang / btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po btor nas// rgyan thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas// seMn
375b8(rgyud): chen po'i rus pa 'di dag sa phyogs 'di nyid bzhag ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'di byaso// son chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongasu btang nas// lus yongasu btang ba 'das/ 
376a1(rgyud): phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa dgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnam su yang ser rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o// zhes smon lam de skad btab po// bstan pa
376a2(rgyud): 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i ser grangs med dngag tu med pa dag bla na red par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// mchod rten 'di 'dir bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no// / 
376a3(rgyud): rkyen ni 'di yin no// mchod rten de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de nyid kyi nang du bzhug so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sAg mo la lus yongasu btang ba'i le'u zhes
376a4(rgyud): bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas byang chub se mas dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs rtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
376a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gse ra dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig
376a6(rgyud): tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser rang rin po che'i 'byung gnas bdugs brtsegs de la tshig su bcad pa 'di
376a7(rgyud): ngag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i sku mdog gtso ma'i gser 'dra ste// sku lus gser gyi mdog du rnam par gda'// gser gyi ri dbang lta bu gser gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar po gser
376a8(rgyud): mdog can// bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus rgyan// dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos sku lus spras// gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri meng zhi ba ri dang 'dra// tshangs
376b1(rgyud): pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs// seng+ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs// yan lag drug cu bsgrags sgra dri med sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la bing ka'i sgra// shin tu dri med dri bral
376b2(rgyud): gzi 'ongad mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis rgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra// sems can rnams la phar par thugs brtse mchog
376b3(rgyud): 'jig rten dag ni bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags// 'chi ba med pa'i bde bstsol ba ste// rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos
376b4(rgyud): ni rab tu ston// 'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar bar mdzod// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las
376b5(rgyud): skye dgu sgrol// zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud// skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba// khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'drer ba'i yon tan ye shes mtsho// 
376b6(rgyud): srogs chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang // byams pa'i skabs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang // khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang // yon
376b7(rgyud): tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par// lhar bcas 'gro ba'i rang ra nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te// de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad ba
376b8(rgyud): bdag gi bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni// sen de dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byas brtang
377a1(rgyud): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i me tog stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo
377a2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// thub dbang khyod
377a3(rgyud): ni bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston// nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar
377a4(rgyud): bas 'od kyis khyab// kha dog sna tshogs dang bas rin chen 'dra// sngon po dkar po gser dang bai rAR+Ya// zangs dang rgya reng shel gyi 'od lta bus// rdo rje'iri dbang ri rab thal
377a5(rgyud): mdzad cing // zhing rnams bye ba du mar snang mdzad de// sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po zhi bar mdzad// bde ba mchog gis seMn tshim par mdzad// mdog dang dbang po gsal bag bltan mdzes
377a6(rgyud): gzugs bltas mi ngoms skye bo blta na dga'// rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis rgyar// ting 'dzin
377a7(rgyud): byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags// dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan rgyan// khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad// bde mdzad bde ba kun
377a8(rgyud): gyi 'byung gnas 'byung // yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis rgyan// zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang ste// me yi 'od dang 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// ji ltar na mkhar nyid kyil rdzogs pa bzhin// 
377b1(rgyud): ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'// ba zho ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing // kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po zangs 'dra ba'i// tshems kyi phreng bas khyed kyi zhal
377b2(rgyud): mdzes pa// ngang pa'i rgyal pos par snang ji bzhin mo khyod kyi zhi zhal 'tshams gnas zla ba 'dra// g.ya su 'khyil cing khong chud 'dra ba lags// bai DUR+Ya 'ang sku 'ong dkar rnams kyis// nam pa'i dkyil
377b3(rgyud): nanyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas rigs kyi lha mo
377b4(rgyud): byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba// las ngan lam dang bral ba'i
377b5(rgyud): bdag nyid dro mnga' zhing // srid dang sring min mkhyen pa rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshalo// kye ma'o kye ma'o// sangs rgyas gzi brjid
377b6(rgyud): mtha' yas te// kye ma'o kye ma'o// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra// kye ma'o kye ma'o// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te// u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon// son dag ni thams cad rjesu
377b7(rgyud): gzung slad du// gang gis mdo sde ngadam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa// mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po rigs kyi chog/ kye ma'o kye ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje lngar// de bzhin gshegs pa shA
377b8(rgyud): thub pa dbang po zhi// zhi ba'i dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs// ting 'dzin zab cing rdul dang bral ba ni// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dpyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs// de ltar nyan thos rnams kyis lus
378a1(rgyud): de steng ba ste/ rang gnas dam nga rnams kyis gnas pa'ang stong pa lags// chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhan stong lags pa/ sems can rnams ni sa pa'i bdag pa dam
378a2(rgyud): 'tshal to// rtag par khor zug du raM rgyal ba dran par bgyid/ rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyi slad du// rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu
378a3(rgyud): 'debs par bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu dogs sar dbus mo btsugs masu// rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pa'i mya ngan sems// 'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis ngu bar bgyid// bdag ni bde bar gshe
378a4(rgyud): pa mthong ba rab tu skom// mya ngar me yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur// mthong ba'i chu bsil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol// bdag ni khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas rab
378a5(rgyud): tu sgom// thugs rje'i char gyis bdag la rab tu sim par mdzod// / 'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugs rje mdzad du gsol// zhi ba'i gzugs mthong nga ni bdag la stsal du gsol// 
378a6(rgyud): khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba skyong pa ste// 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags// seM na thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te// namakha' 'dra zhing rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang lags/ 
378a7(rgyud): sgyu ma mig sgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra// 'dren pa khyod ni stong pa tshe dang ldan pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi
378a8(rgyud): lha mo legs khyod yang leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang // lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa lha mo
378b1(rgyud): de dag thams cad dang / lha mo dpal la sogs pa/ lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs lha'i dbang po de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang
378b2(rgyud): mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la bstod ngo // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las bsdus pa'i le'u
378b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / 
378b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du ma hA sa ha sra pra mdza ra sU t+ya/ bod/ skad du/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sangs dpa' thams cad la phyag
378b5(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khang na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri'i lto phyogs kyi ngos sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul shing ljon pa
378b6(rgyud): rab tu snang ba'i nags tshogs na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan nga mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
378b7(rgyud): 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa cang shes ko'u di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu
378b8(rgyud): chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa bkul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rnangs pa dang / tshe nga ldan pa gsum po che dang / tshe dang ldar pa dag dbang dang / tshe dang ldan pa mthus dang / tshe dang ldan parab 'byor
379a1(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa lag bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang tshe dang ldan pa nam grungs tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i bar de la
379a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lus
379a3(rgyud): 'phags mo'i bu yul ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras na bza' dang / bshos dang gzir sa ma dang / bdun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ sti sdang du byas/ 
379a4(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// yang de'i tshe sa yang cher g.yos par gyur// sprin 'dus pa chen po yang byung // dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser ba chen po dang / sprin chen po las char pa chen po
379a5(rgyud): yang 'dab par gyur/ 'drug kyang daM ri ri zer/ glog kyang byung // phyogs bcu yang 'brugs par gyur to// mur pa ru ra nag ched ro yang byung ste/ skar ra rnams kyang ni sdang nyin dang zla
379a6(rgyud): ba rnams kyang 'od dang mi ldan par gyur te/ ldan der ma yin lgang der ma yin zhing 'od mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas ya ba can gyi grong khyer chen por 'jigs pa de dag byung ba dang / yangs pa car rgya
379a7(rgyud): li tsa byi kha cig gi grong gzhan dang / grong khyer gang yin pa de dag gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur/ grong gi gzho ru rnams dang / rtsis mkhar rnams dang / blon po dang blon po chen po dang / 'khor
379a8(rgyud): na gnas pa dang / dran po dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / mngag pa dang / g.yog kha cig kyang gdon 'byung pos btang par gyur/ yul yangs pa can gyi ljongs kun gyi dge slong dang / dge
379b1(rgyud): slong ma dang / dge bsnyed dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang 'jigs smag dngangs te/ spyi brang zhes byed nas kha gnam du bltas te ngu 'bod cing // sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal/ bram ze
379b2(rgyud): khyim bdag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag kha cig ni tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni brgya byin la/ kha cig ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams
379b3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / 'phrog ma dang / nyi ma dang zla ba dang // gza' dang skar ma dang / ri dang nags tshogs dang / sman dang shing
379b4(rgyud): ljon pa dang / klung dang / lteng ka dang / mche'u dang rdzing bu dang // rdzing dang / mchod rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la phyag 'tshal zhing / bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i gnod pas/ 'jigs pa'i
379b5(rgyud): gnas ras ji ltar thar bar 'gyur snyar du sems shing 'khod pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mi las 'phags pa'i spyan rnam par dag pas gzig so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
379b6(rgyud): kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur nas lha dang / ri dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
379b7(rgyud): 'jig rten dang par gyur te/ 'dus par gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'drul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/  bor bar 'du mdzad de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 
379b8(rgyud): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / sub cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gdong sran gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang
380a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin chen po stobs po che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog pa bu dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag rub mo 'das pa dang / dag pa la bu'i
380a2(rgyud): bya rgod phung po'i ri la bdag gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
380a3(rgyud): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshig gcig dbyangs gcig/ ngag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ shin tu 'bar ba'i gser dang 'dra// zla ba
380a4(rgyud): ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// dpal ldan rnam thos bu bzhin pa rtan// rin chen rnams kyis 'byung gnas lags// seng ge glang che na 'dra ba'i 'gros// glang chen myos pa bzhir du gnor// sre
380a5(rgyud): gyi ri bo dang yang mtshungs// 'dzam+bu gling gi gser rgyar 'dra// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// na mkha'i zla ba dri med bzhin/ nyan thos dge 'dun rnams kyis
380a6(rgyud): dbus mtshan rnams kyis ni rgyan par gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// thub pa la ni skyabasu mchi// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// srung ba dus su nye bar gnas// sangs rgyas snga mas
380a7(rgyud): bshad pa yi// stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde 'di// kho ra khor yug ri mtha'i bar// mtshams gcod pa'i dam pa lags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod
380a8(rgyud): // chos kyi rgyal po thub chen la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam cig cang mi gsung bar dgongs nas// rgyal po chen po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
380b1(rgyud): ngo chen po dag gang byed kyi 'khor ba'i 'khor la 'tshe bar sems pa de ni tshul ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dang / chos legs par gsungs pa dang
380b2(rgyud): dge 'dun legs pa sgrub pa de la sa bon 'di btab na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / 2nga thos rnams 'jig rjer du 'byung
380b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las lha'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur rgyal po dag kyang dmag rnar bzhi dang ldan pa
380b4(rgyud): nas gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'a gyu ro// rgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te/ de dag la yang bu dpa' nga / 
380b5(rgyud): rtul pong pa/ yang lag ma rog gi gzugs dang ldan pa tsha po che'i stobs kyi shugs bdog pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa ri pa che sna bdun dang ldan pa stong
380b6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'jig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur bar khyed snying las chung ngus gnas pas gnas par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnar thos kyi bu
380b7(rgyud): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus po g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal ro sbyar ba btu de/ bcom lngar 'das
380b8(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol ros bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la grong dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang rang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / bsil khang dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang
381a1(rgyud): skar khung dang // dar gyi lda ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / dril bu rang mu tig gi drangs yongasu bskor ba dang / pog por nas bdun pa du/ 
381a2(rgyud): ba dang me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang / gnas dang khang pa ched po dag mchis te/ der bdag cag bud med brgya phrag stong dag gis yongasu bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga tshangs par
381a3(rgyud): spyod pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rab tu myos pas ngag ma mchis par gnas pas gcas pa ma 'khor zas dang skom tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu 'byer
381a4(rgyud): zhing skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo dang btsas ma thag pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gan su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ 'tshe bar bgyid/ bgegs
381a5(rgyud): bgyid/ 'gum par bgyid/ gsod par bgyid/ srog dang bral bar bgyi de btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du bdag cag gi 'khor
381a6(rgyud): gyi tshul gyi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o// gang gi 'khor gyi gdor byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyis te/ nang pas rgyal po chen po de'i ming nas
381a7(rgyud): dbyung zhing dri sna tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdug par bgyi'o// dog sa la me tog bsil ma bkram ste/ zhugs mar bus la mchod rten de la mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi
381a8(rgyud): 'khor gdod sbyin gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ phyi phyir chod cing 'jigs par 'gyur// smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur// de ni gnyid kyang log par 'gyur// yang na
381b1(rgyud): shin tun par 'gyur/ rtag tu gyen du blta bar 'gyur// skar ma dag la rnyed par bgyid// nub mo shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// rtag tu 'angar zhing sgra 'byin te// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten
381b2(rgyud): mgon po bdag la gson// s+yad ya the dan/ sin+te/ su sid+d+he/ sa twe a re/ a re Ne/ ba le/ na hA ba le/ dzan+te/ dzi Ti le/ a kha ne/ ma kha ne/ kha kha ni/ kha raT+Te/ ha ri bi ga le/ ti mi gA li ni/ maM ga le swAhA/ bdag
381b3(rgyud): gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i ming dang / stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor
381b4(rgyud): srung stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
381b5(rgyud): sad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor dri za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ glu lem cing ni bro rdung ste/ rgyan rnams la yang
381b6(rgyud): dga' bar bgyid// brnam pa ma mchis mang bar smra// rgong par brgyad cing khro bar 'gyur/ sgom par 'gyur la mig dmar te// rtag tu richis kyis 'debs par bgyid/ tshig kyang 'byed bar mi
381b7(rgyud): bgyid de// rgyub kyis phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// sAd ya the dan/ a khe na khe/ bin khe/ ban+d+he ba rA NI/ tsa ba le/ 
381b8(rgyud): khe ba kha ne/ ba kha ne/ a khi le/ na khi ne/ da hA le b+ha ge / b+ha gan+da le/ bshe ba sha brti ni swAhA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gi ming dang / stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gdon
382a1(rgyud): thams cad las thar bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skye bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs

382a3(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ shin tu skom pas 'debs par 'gyur/ g.yeng bas btab cing blta bar 'gyur// bzhin yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur// bskums nas sa la nyal
382a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem/ skra dang se mo ring ba ste/ dri ma can la dri mi bda'// brdzun dang kyal pa smra bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po
382a5(rgyud): bdag la gson// / smad the dan/ kha kha kha me/ khal ne/ kha lo ma/ kha ra li/ kha ra le/ ka ra khe/ ka shi ne/ ka ra ste/ ka le ka nA ni/ ba ba le/ bi d+he ya sha ba ti sha mi/ sha mi na~M
382a6(rgyud): swA hA/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'i ming dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gi gdon dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po nig mi bzang

382a8(rgyud): zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor klu mdab bzangs kyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ skyigs bus 'debs shing dbugs
382b1(rgyud): kyang 'byin// de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur// rdul zhing dbu ba kha chu 'byung // phyi phyir gnyid kyang log par 'gyur/ kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste// de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par 'gyur// 
382b2(rgyud): se mo dag kyang ston par 'gyid// dog sar mchis shing du bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// s+yAd ya the dan/ kra ka ye kra ga shi/ kra ga
382b3(rgyud): se/ kru sha me/ kruk+She/ krug kha me/ kru ge/ a ga le nA ga le/ sa ma ga le/ ku mu me ku me/ a la ke/ ka la ke/ i ri mi re/ d+hi re/ a ru ga ba ti swAhA/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gi ming dang / sto
382b4(rgyud): dang dbyin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags gang ni stobs bcu dang ldan 'ang / 
382b5(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa ste/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge sgra khyu mchog lta bu rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrag so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro// sde dang
382b6(rgyud): mthu dang bzhon bcas pa'i// dadud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul// sems can thams cad srung ba'i phyir// rigs sngags thams cad pa la nyon// s+yAng ya the ngan/ a sang ge/ khaR+sha ba te/ 
382b7(rgyud): bal ni N+Do She/ shU re/ shU ra d+ha re bedz+ra ga ne badz+ra d+ha re/ s+yAn+te dze b+he dr-i D+ha sA re/ bi ra dze bi g+ha se/ bi rA gra prad+he/ a ra Ne d+harma yuk+She/ daM sha~M bi g+hA l+le swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / stong
382b8(rgyud): dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas// 'jigs dang skrag dang sngangs gyur te/ 
383a1(rgyud): tha mo sbyar nas 'khor par gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni lhags pa rnams// sngangs 'khrugs rong rong por gyur nas// phyogs bcur rab tu 'byer byed cing // sgra bo che yang sgrog par
383a2(rgyud): byed// rgyal po chen pos de shes nas// gsang ba gsum ni yang dag smra// kye ma rigs sngags rigs sngags che// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de// thos nas 'byung po skrag
383a3(rgyud): gyur te// dper na rab tu 'bar me dang // til mar ngar btags ral gri bzhir// go'u nas ni rab bshad pa'i// rigs sngags spu gri'i so dang 'dra// drang srong tshig ni legs bshad pa// de la gang zhig
383a4(rgyud): ma dang na// de yi bu yi thu bo ni// tshangs pa'i zhag pas med par 'gyur// me ni rab tu 'bar byas la// bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhir yang // sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor te// 
383a5(rgyud): nas dang nyung kar blangs nas su// mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas// me yi nang du thugs par bya// legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas// gal te myur du mi gtong na/ 
383a6(rgyud): thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni// mar dang nyungs kar ler blugs bzhin// gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su// de dag bde ba mi rnyed de// de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni// 'bras cher nang
383a7(rgyud): kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin nad kyi btab pa na// sha dkra'i nad kyis btang par 'gyur// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// gzhan yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa yi// 
383a8(rgyud): khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te// 'byung po mang po tshogs pa na// stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du// zas skom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur// stong chen rab
383b1(rgyud): 'joms mdo sde la// gnod sbyin gang dag mi phyogs pa// de la rdo rje 'chang khros te// spyi bo dag ni 'gems par 'gyur// spu gri'i so ni nub mo yis// de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur// mtshon cha shi
383b2(rgyud): rnon po yis// de yisna dang rna ba gtsang // 'khor lo snga dro'i so 'dra bas// klang pa rab tu bsheg par byed// tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yos// de yi snying yang 'joms par byed// rnag dang khrag ni
383b3(rgyud): dron mo dag/ de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur// rigs sngags zhags pa'i chang pa yis// rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na// 'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du// de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur// 
383b4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dpal ldan pa// phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas// chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te// bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni// shar phyogs na ni yul
383b5(rgyud): 'khor srung // lha phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyobs ni ni lus ngan po// dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba yin// rgyal po dag ni
383b6(rgyud): phyin pa dang // de tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyer// bar snang gnas la rab tu 'phags// tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal med khang // de ni rdo rje'i gdan la zhugs// de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams// thal
383b7(rgyud): mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tsha'o// dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra// gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs// me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas// sa la'i rgyal ba bzhin du rgyas// nyi ma dang 'dra zla la la/ skar ma rnams
383b8(rgyud): kyis yongs bskor ba'im/ thub sku gser gyi kha dog la// mtshan rnams kyis ni yong su bskor// 'jig rten ches po tshangs pa yis// 'jig rten sgor ma brjod byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyar
384a1(rgyud): sngar ni// 'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras// 'jig rter skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis// rje su bstan pa mthong ste// gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang // rang sangs rgyas dag
384a2(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur zhing // 'di las nyan thos rnams kyang ste// lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur// rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin// bram ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur// drang srong skal pa chen po dang // 
384a3(rgyud): dge slong bram ze 'di las skyes// khyed cag snying lang rlung byed pa// mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni tshig thos nas// 'jig rten skyong gi tshig smras pa// tshangs pa chen po de bzhin no// rngub
384a4(rgyud): pa chen po de bzhin no// bdag gis ri rang bskul byas shing // sa yang rab tu bzlog byas la/ rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams// rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya// zhags pa dam po ma nyams pas// 
384a5(rgyud): nyi ma rdza nga rlung rnams dang // skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang // bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya// gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing // 'jig rten la ni pan mi byed// de dag la ni thams cad du// 
384a6(rgyud): phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de// 'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de// 'byung po mi yi skye dgu la// gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed// gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang / 
384a7(rgyud): rigs sngags las ni 'da' byed pa// 'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni// pha rol gnod pa ston par byed// rigs sngags la ni 'da' ba'i 'khor// kun tu tshang pas bsdigs byas te// 'jig rten mgon
384a8(rgyud): po'i spyan sngar ni// yang dag par yang brjod par dgyid// gang gis 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor du// 'di bshad pa ni mi nyan pa// de dag chad pa bshad par bya// tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde'o// 
384b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// phan tshun du ni bltas byas la// bai DUR+Ya dang gser dang dngul// mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // sdug dang rdo yi snying po dang // rin chen bdun gyis rgyan pa yI/ 
384b2(rgyud): rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i// shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa// bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/ rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas// 'byung po'i dkyil
384b3(rgyud): 'khor nyid du dang // sa ni gser gyi phye ma dang / me tog dag gis bkang byas nas// mgul bar lhung dang skud pa dang // zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la// phyogs kyis ni dzi sad pa'i// 'byung
384b4(rgyud): thams cad khrod shog ces// gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon kun// phyogs bzhi dag tu bgyi ba byas// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi// mdo sde yi ni ngam pa 'di// tshangs pa'i

384b6(rgyud): sbyin gyi ni sde dpon dag/ phyogs bzhi dag tu song na su// gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// dri za las byung gdon gyi rnams// shar phyogs cha ni 'khor pa dag/ 
384b7(rgyud): mang sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yis// 'byung po mang po la tshan// thung ba 'byung ba nyi shu brgyad// hrul bum las byung gdan gyi rigs// sgo phyogs ma 'di

385a4(rgyud): drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa// de yi ming ni gdon po che// 
385a5(rgyud): mi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu dras// de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa// de yi ming ni bum pa'i lnga/

385b8(rgyud): ma dang ni nyi zer dang // nya lcibs dang ni ral gri bu// kun gyi bshes dang grags 'dzin dang // 'brog gnas dang ni yid bzang dang // khang sna dang ni ri sul kha/ lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzang dag/ sde dag

387a2(rgyud): sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang // lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs// rdo rje mdung rtse lag par thogs// rab tu drag pa'i dmag brgal nas// phyogs kun tu ni
387a3(rgyud): skrag par byed// sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi// gsang ba po ni dang kun kyang // mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin// sha khrag don por bcas pa la// rnam par 'khrul cing 'do

389b1(rgyud): / glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang // bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis// de lha'i rab tu dga' ba yis// bde zhing tshim pa'i yid gyur cing // de na bdag ni dgun skyems dang // 'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas// 
389b2(rgyud): bdag gi 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing // phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed// dung med dag dang skyes pa dang // de bzhin khye'u bu mo dang // mngal ni gnas pa'ang 'jigs par bgyid// dud 'gro'o
389b3(rgyud): skye gnas gtogs la'ang 'tshe/ skar ma ngag dang nyi bla dang // gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par dgyid// lo togs don 'bras bu dang // me tog sman dang zas nom dang // mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'drog
389b4(rgyud): cing // mthon po rnams kyang dpa' bar bgyid// 'jig rten ga ra 'ongs pa rnams// nga ma ga dang 'thab mo shar gnyer dang // tshig gam zhig gam bsad phye ba// de kun 'byung po'i rnam
389b5(rgyud): par gyur// sbed cing ston par bgyid pa dang // bzlog par bgyi da cing rgod par bgyid// 'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar brgya da// dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid// sdig pa'i rmi lam
389b6(rgyud): mthong bar bgyid// nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid// sgo nas se gol sgra phyung zhing // mi snyan brjod de za bar bgyid// mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs ngag tu// gda' zhing mchid smra bar bgyid
389b7(rgyud): bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu// 'dod la spyod pa dga' bar bgyid// nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni// zla ba'i gzug su gda' bar bgyid// rlung dang mar mda' lce gzugs// che la gnod par de
389b8(rgyud): dag gda'// skar mda'i tshigs dang 'dra bar dag// 'jigs par bgyid pa la dang khyer/ rnam par sprul nas sngon shing dang // mchod rten dag ni gnas na 'da'// skyes pa gzhonu'i gzugs mdzes pas/ 
390a1(rgyud): 'bar zhing shing ta'i sgra yang 'byin// gnas rnams dang mi shul dag tu/ rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston// grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi// sgo yang gnod sbyin de dag 'byed// 
390a2(rgyud): srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyid cing // lam ngar kun tu bskor bar bgyid// rna ba sna tshogs gzugs dag dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnaras dang // rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyis rnams// lus la na ba
390a3(rgyud): gnas par ston// nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid// ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag/ thams cad log par de dag ston// rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na/ 
390a4(rgyud): de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis// de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu// langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas// zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan madra' ba// gser gyi mchod sdong 'bar ba bzhir// 'jig rten snang
390a5(rgyud): bar mdzad pa po// thub pa chen po me dang 'dra// gnod sbyin gsang sngags mi bzang can// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag/ byang gi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ byang phyogs dag ra
390a6(rgyud): gnod par gyi// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// smad ya the dar/ khang+ge Shang+ga/ khang+ga gar+b+he/ bi tsak+Sha Ne/ tsakra rA dza ne/ tsan+da/ tsa pa le/ b+hI ma ra ba te/ kha rA gre ku Ti la ka rA gre/ 
390a7(rgyud): a kA k+Shi ba ra ga ba ti/ sA raMg pa ti/ tsi tra kAn+ti/ bdag byang phyogasu dge bar gyur cig sAhA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyir sde dpo ni thams cad
390a8(rgyud): dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams
390b1(rgyud): thams cad bcom par gyur bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal// 
390b2(rgyud): chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang // langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas// me tog tshogs ltar rgyas gyur cing // ka la bong ka'i sgra dbyangs can// khru byug dang ni rma bya'i sgra// rnga dang
390b3(rgyud): 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa// thub chen gnod sbyin srin po dang / dri ba stong phrag drug cub ni// shar gyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ shar phyogs pa la gnod par byed// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ 
390b4(rgyud): de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// smad yo the dan// d+hAr ni d+hA ra naM/ pa d+ha na sa ni b+hany+dza ni/ pra b+hany+dza ni bi d+ha ma ni/ ki pu ruSha// sha ka le/ sA ra the/ shU la d+ha re/ shU la d+hA ri Ni/ shung+ga tsar
390b5(rgyud): glo 'ab te shA rA gre/ shAn+te/ bdag shar phyog su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad
390b6(rgyud): dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nang rnams thams cad
390b7(rgyud): bcom par gyur/  dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang // gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa'i khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bumachog kyang la// thal mo sbyar te phyag
390b8(rgyud): 'tsha'o// sa rgyal khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes kyang // thal mo sbyar te de nas langs// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// smra ba thams cad rab 'joms pa// the tsom thar
391a1(rgyud): / gcod mdzad pa// 'jig rten thams cad rnam 'dren pa// grul bum yi dgas sru po dag/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams// lho yi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// de nas byung la gnod
391a2(rgyud): par bgyid// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chang pa bdag gis bshang // smad ya the dan/ shIn+da shA ra da ti/ kAn+ti/ kA ra ba ti/ ka~M ka ra si/ ka~M ka ra ti/ ki ba ti/ d+ha ra Ni/ bar+d+ha ni/ d+hA mi d+hA ra Ni/ ri ma pa ti/ 
391a3(rgyud): dz+yo ti shu ra Ni/ mA lA gri/ bdag lho phyogasu dge bar gyur cig swA hA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig cer skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phro ga ma buM dang bcas pa
391a4(rgyud): yang rabadag gi me tog spos ngag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blangs par bgyi// de dag gis ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jig
391a5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang // gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo// chos
391a6(rgyud): rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal po mig mi bzang ba yang // thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs// sprin chen seng ge chen po pa// che ba che ba rgya mtsho che// gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po// g.yul chen rab tu 'joms
391a7(rgyud): mdzad pa// klu dang mdab bzang gsang ba po// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag/ nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// de nas byung la gnod par dgyid// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyar sngar ni// de dag chad pa
391a8(rgyud): bdag gis bshang // s+yA ya the dan/ d+harmi ba rA gre/ ba la ba ti/ ba li ni/ bi sha me/ bi ba shi / sA ga re/ khA rI/ ka pa li tsaN+Da li/ ki ra Ni/ nI rany+dza ne/ de d+hA ra Ni/ ba wa ma ti/ a tsa la/ bdag nub phyogasu ngaH
391b1(rgyud): bar gyur cig swA hA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos ngag dang // sbyin sreg
391b2(rgyud): 'di ni blangs par bgyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nang rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur
391b3(rgyud): cig sAhA// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tsha'o// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen yang / thal mo sbyar ba byas nas
391b4(rgyud): langs// tshangs pas dkrus pa dag po po// rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin// skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje// 'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa// gnod sbyin srin po gang gi rnams// phyogs
391b5(rgyud): dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa dang // sa yi 'og dang bad+ma steng // namakha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// sAng ya tha dan/ 
391b6(rgyud): pran+de/ bradra klo She/ prah+ma swa re/ badz+re badz+ra g+ho She/ badz+ra d+ha re/ s+thi te sA re/ a tsa le/ a ra Ne/ i Sha ni/ a rA Ni te/ shA re/ ba rA kra prAb+he/ sA ra ba te/ bdag phyogs thams cad du dge bar gyur cig sA hA/ tshangs pa
391b7(rgyud): dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'breg ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar bgyis// de dag gi
391b8(rgyud): ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjing dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thaMd las dge par gyur cig swA hA/ rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur// ba kan lnga
392a1(rgyud): gyur 'dus las gyur// nang rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// dag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal
392a2(rgyud): skyes du mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyal srid gcig gi phyir
392a3(rgyud): 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / grong dang khyim nas sems can gcig gi bar gyi ngor gyi phyir 'jig rten du byung
392a4(rgyud): ba ma yin gyi// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du sangs
392a5(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de ni dper na snun pa mkhas pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/ gso ba la brtson pa/ sman pas shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs
392a6(rgyud): nga rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin/ yul gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin pa ras sems can gcig gi don gyi bar du byung ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe ra phyogs grang na
392a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs de dag tu mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyis/ nga yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la
392a8(rgyud): ba der song ba dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs pal ngo che'i don kyang byas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas par 'gyur ro// snyam du dgongs te/ de nas
392b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang / sham thabs banabs nas lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shong du
392b2(rgyud): gshegs pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bac+doMs la g.yas rol tu ngu'o// dul nas bco ldan 'dral rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par
392b3(rgyud): gyur to// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yor rol nas phu'o// bul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug
392b4(rgyud): par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lnga'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la snam log/ sa nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yang kyis gso
392b5(rgyud): cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga ba
392b6(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pas kyang so so nas lha'i gdugs dag blangs te// nyan thos rnams la phul nas rdul yidab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// de lta bu'i grags pa dang / bkur sti dang / brnyes par
392b7(rgyud): bya ba brnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shong du dngas te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la der gshegs pa dang / yangs pa car
392b8(rgyud): gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhigazugs zhing / dbang po dul ba thugs dul bag/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ 
393a1(rgyud): dbang po dben zhing khugs pa/ glang po chen po lta bu shin tu dul ga mtsho ltar rangs zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku
393a2(rgyud): legs par rgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgya nus shin tu rgyan pa/ shings la'i rgyal po ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par smras pa/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba kun tu 'byed pa mtshan ma
393a3(rgyud): mun pa'i nang na ri bo'i spol me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo chen po dam pa ltar lha me/ lhan ne// lhang de rgyang ring po nas gnas der gshegs pa
393a4(rgyud): mthe bo mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas/ sems dad par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can
393a5(rgyud): gyi grong khyer chen por lam gang nas gshegs pa'i la ma de phyags shing chag chag 'debs/ byi dor byed/ me tog 'a zor / dar gyi lnga ldi dang dril bu dang / bdugs pa
393a6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis rgyan te/ bdug spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
393a7(rgyud): 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can/ me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/ sngon legs par spyad pa'i mtshan gyis rgyan ga/ gzhon
393a8(rgyud): sha chags shing 'jam gnyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ 'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun tu 'phro ga dri ma med pa'i phyogs li tsa byi dag gi mgo la byugs te/ rje su bstan pa
393b1(rgyud): mdza po de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs nas/ nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyes kyi bzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te/ phyag gser
393b2(rgyud): gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos bsil te bka' stsal pa/ phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang su yang rung ba dag de bzhin gshe
393b3(rgyud): pa'i sku dung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa dang / stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de
393b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing ston pa
393b5(rgyud): dang / kun chub par byed pa la yams nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrugs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / kha mchu dang / shAg+sa
393b6(rgyud): dang / tha na bra ma dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs shing / 'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mi
393b7(rgyud): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyid
393b8(rgyud): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya de gang lags/ de skad ces
394a1(rgyud): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la
394a2(rgyud): bsha // btsun pa de bzhin zhes gsol nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sAd ya the dar/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ 
394a3(rgyud): sA ra ma tsa li/ pra kri ti baN+De/ pra kri ti nen+to She/ sa man+ta/ mu khe/ s+thi re/ stA da re bi g+huSh+Ta/ pra ga la ne/ bA rang+ga me/ sA rA su te/ sA radrA ba te/ ba le ma hA ba le/ ma hA nin+d+ha se sAhA/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lu su rtogs pa
394a4(rgyud): dran pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / ting 'dzin gsum dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / dra pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pa dang / ngasam gtar bzhi dang / 
394a5(rgyud): 'phags pa'i bder pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / rje su dran pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / mthar
394a6(rgyud): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang / rnam
394a7(rgyud): pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa rjesu dran pa bcu drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang / tshangs
394a8(rgyud): pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i
394b1(rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ sangs rgyas sgrub pa'o// chos sgrub pa'o// dge 'dun sgrub pa'o// tshangs pa sgrub pa'o// dbang po sgrub pa'o// 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// dbang phyug sgrub
394b2(rgyud): pa'o// bder bsgrub pa'o// lan sgrub pa'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba snad pa'o// zla bsgrub pa'o// nyi ma sgrub pa'o// gza' sgrub pa'o// rgyu gar sgrub pa'o// sAng ya the dam sA leka sa ni/ bi d+ha ra Ni ba rA gra A
394b3(rgyud): re An rA Ni/ oM mo g+ha ba ti/ sa tsi kA li/ na kA li ka shika pa N-i/ b+ha ra Ni d+ha ra ka sha zhes man+ta prad+he/ stam+b+ha me san+tan prad+he/ badz+ra d+ha re swAhA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
394b4(rgyud): bka' stsal to// 'jig rten 'di 'am gang dag 'das pa dang // / mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa lta yi lhar gyur pa// mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa
394b5(rgyud): med/ de ngas 'dir ni rgyun mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ zang pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas// shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye// bdud rtsa
394b6(rgyud): ni ngas 'dus byas ma yin pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med// de ngas 'di ni rin mchog tu gsungs// bded pa de yis 'di ni dge bar shog/ mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rang bskrad pa
394b7(rgyud): ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa// rdo rje lta bu'i mi gnyis lam mthong ba/ ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin// de ngas 'ang ri rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bded pa de yis 'dir
394b8(rgyud): ni dge bar shog// gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing // gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni// drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i
395a1(rgyud): gnas zhes gsungs// de la byin ni 'bras bu cher gyur te// zhing rab bshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin// 'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsung // bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar
395a2(rgyud): shog gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing // go'u ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa// de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste// mun pa gsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa// de bas dge 'dun rir chen
395a3(rgyud): mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'di ni dge bar shog/ lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni// 'jigs tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang // the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag/ cig char
395a4(rgyud): spangs te 'phags pa'i bden mthong ba// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lu sa sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang // sdig pa rnam
395a5(rgyud): gsum nam yang mi byed cing // blo bur byas na'ang 'chab pa mi byed la// de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed// de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'di
395a6(rgyud): ni dge bar shog/ ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa// phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar// 'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yis// gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de
395a7(rgyud): bzhino// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ shes rab zab mos shin tu brtan pa yin// 'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing // lus kyang
395a8(rgyud): sbyin par yid la byas pa ni// de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge shog/ ji ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba// lag tu
395b1(rgyud): blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid// de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba// sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/ des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ 
395b2(rgyud): don gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ son gang dag 'gro dang
395b3(rgyud): mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ zhi chags bral lho mas mchod 'os pa// chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ seMn gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thang 'dir ni
395b4(rgyud): bder gyur cig/ tshogs kyi dam pa lha nis mchod 'os pa// dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ se naM gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur
395b5(rgyud): cig 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te/ sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag/ skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byangs byed shog nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog/ 'din
395b6(rgyud): rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis// shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa// bden pa de yos 'dir ni dge bar shog/ de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig swA hA/ sAd ya the ma d+hi ra d+hi d+hi ri/ 
395b7(rgyud): ba la ni g+ho'i kha la swa re/ sa ra ba te stu ti pra b+hU ta drAp+te/ A ra d+he/ a ra nir+g+ho She/ sA ra ba ti/ ats+tsha te/ ba la ba to/ shU ra prAp+te/ sA rang+ka ma/ sur+ya ba le/ sur+ya ni n+yo She swA hA/ tshangs pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms
395b8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs
396a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnaso// chos kyi gnaso// dge 'dun gyi gnaso// tshangs pa'i gnaso// dbang po'i gnaso// 'jig rten skyong ba'i gnaso// dbang phyug gi gnaso// drang
396a2(rgyud): srong chen po'i gnaso// 'byung ngo'i gan so// mig gi gan so// rgyu'i gan so// phyogs kyi gan so// bstan pa'i gnaso// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// nyan thos rnams kyis
396a3(rgyud): reg pa'o// tshangs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dbang pos rab tu bsngags pa'o// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mchod pa'o// dbang phyug gis phyag byas pa'o// lha thams cad kyis kun tu mchod pa'o// 
396a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor spyod ba rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// mkhas pa rnams mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'o// drang srong rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'o// tshangs pa rnams kyis rab tu rgyan pa'o// lha rnams kyis
396a5(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa'o// khrus byed pa rnams kyis pas nges pa'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyis dga' bar byas pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yu'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi
396a6(rgyud): bskyed mo sa tshalo// drang srong rnams kyi gan so// nyan thos rnams kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis gan so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gan so// 
396a7(rgyud): nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o// ngag la nyal gyi zug du rnams 'byin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam kun tu ston pa'o// thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o// 'jig tshogs la lha ba rnams 'jig par byed pa'o// 
396a8(rgyud): nga rgyal kyi ri rab tu snyil bar byed pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung ba'i seMn tham cad sgrol ba'o// bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa'o// dud kyi 'khor skrag par byed pa'o// 
396b1(rgyud): bdud kyi mchil ma 'dor ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las sgrol ba'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'o// 'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o// s+yAd ya the ngar/ khang+ge khang+ge/ 'dra g+ho She/ u
396b2(rgyud): Sho d+ha ne sA ra thi/ pra b+he de/ bi pu la pra b+he sang kaR+Sha Ni/ bi shA gra ba ti/ shud+d+ha sA d+ha ni/ ba ru Na ba te/ bA sa be/ bi b+hU Sha Ne/ bi sang ga me/ pa shu pa ti/ puSh+pa gar+b+he/ bdag dang sen thams cad 'jigs pa dang / nye bar
396b3(rgyud): 'tshe ba dang // ngal ba thams cad las bde leg su gyur cig swA hA// stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin ga
396b4(rgyud): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'dis ni lha dang / mi dang lha ma yid du bcas pa'i 'jig car
396b5(rgyud): phyag rgyas btang ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bla na med par zhugs// de'i don gyis phyir sngon 'angon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 
396b6(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / pha ma dang / spyir gnas dang / bla ma lta bu rnams la bsnyen bkur to// tshangs par spyod pa spya // tshul khrims bsrung so// sbyin pa byin no// snying rje'i pha rol
396b7(rgyud): tu phyin pa yongasu bskang so// byang chub thob par bsgrub so// bdud phal par bya'o// de nas mi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi ngag gis skad
396b8(rgyud): cig blo gros gcig dang // dbyangs gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa// kye ma rig sngags che// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// sangs rgyas phyag rgya de yis ni// phyogs bzhi'i
397a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad srung// phyag rgya gang gis btar gyur na// byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa/ slong chen rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo// phyag rgya bdag cag sum par bgyi/ mi
397a2(rgyud): gang rab tu sdang ba dang // bskur pa 'di lam dang pa// de dag tshangs pas sprul pa yi// rig sngags chad pas bcad par bgyi// brgya byin gyis ri spyi ngos blangs// 'jig rten skyong ngas rgyas btang po ung
397a3(rgyud): ya the dan ka ling+gi b+ha ra da/ dz+nyA ta gredzA ma ne/ si ha ba de/ sa ra gra prAp+te/ tsa~M sa gA ma ni/ mA li ni hu li si tsu li si hu li si hu le me Na ha ma/ ha ha ma/ sUd ni/ ba rA gra ba ti/ hasti ne/ ne ba ra mi ta/ tsat+tA li/ tsa ra me/ 
397a4(rgyud): reswAhA// sgong chen mo rab tu 'tshams pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad pa'i mastong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos// kun tu g.yos/ 
397a5(rgyud): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ phyogs bzhi'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po sha za ba rnams kyis sgra skad drag po phyung ba/ kyema'o sdug bsngal kye ma'i brlag/ bdag cag 'byung po'i tshogs pung

397a8(rgyud): bzhir me lce'i phung po chen po mngon par sprul pa dang / de dag nam pa' la rgyu'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas na mkha' lcag su mngon par sprus pa dang / de dag shing ta la bdun tsam

397b5(rgyud): bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang / dgra bcom pa yang gsod gang dang // dge 'dun dbyen bgyid 'gro gang dang // rdzogs sang sa rgyas la sdang sems kyis// sku mtshal phyung ba dgyis pa yis// 'gro ba

397b7(rgyud): pa'i mdo// stong chen rab tu 'jongs pa yi// rig sngags rgyal las 'gal bgyis na// bdag cag 'dod bzhir mi 'bru'o// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po yangs pa can na yems kyi nang dang / 'jigs pa dang / 
397b8(rgyud): gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rgyud chad par gyur to// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rang rang gi spyod yul las 'ang so// ngang pa dang / ne tso dang / ri

398b1(rgyud): zas ngan pa rnam pa lnga spangs pa li'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongasu gzung ba/ seM na thams cad la sems snyoms gshin tu rgyan pa/ gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa deb grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /

399a1(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi'o// ga sngags kyang klag par bgyi'o// mi ger bris sam mdud pa bdud de mthon pa'i khar bachags la mchod par bgyi'o// nang pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs ram/

400a1(rgyud): sbyin stobs chen dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang // de dag na thu dang gzi brjid kyis// ro langs las rnams chang gyur cig/ rdo rjes rin chen phug pa dang // me yis bud shing sreg

400a3(rgyud): nges par bsal// tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ ka kha li/ ka kha li kha ra le/ dzu hwa ni/ dza ba le/ ha ra gre/ ha ri ni sha ba ri/ shAn+ti/ pra shAn+ti/ swAhA/ d+hA ba ni swA hA/ gAn d+ha ra b+he swA hA/ ba lang gi ni swA hA/ sarba kA khor dacu
400a4(rgyud): da ni swA hA/ lha thaMd kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis bdag gi byad dang / ro langs dang / sman dang / sngags dang / dug dang / dug sbyar ma rnams bcad // ba shig go// pham par byaso// pha rol pham par byas//
