400a6(rgyud): steng du mchis te/ rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgya sa kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / dgra bcom dag gis mthu dag dang / gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / 
400a7(rgyud): shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang // mo'u dgal bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni// 'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / ko'u di mya'i sngags thob dang // kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang / tshangs pa/ 
400a8(rgyud): yin byams pa dang // brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po stobs dag dang // sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang // 
400b1(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis// bdag gis dug ni dug me dang shog/ dug med dug rnams 'jig byed pa/ gsang sngags tshig rnams de lag so// s+yAd ya the dar/ ha ri ke shi ni ke le/ e he re/ a ma re/ aN+De ra/ paN+Da re/ 
400b2(rgyud): ka Ta ke/ ke yu re/ ha se ha se ha se/ kha se kha sa~M kha saM/ kha ra ge ma ru ga ha ni swA hA/ mu mu k+Sha swA hA/ hi le swA hA/ mi le swA hA/ 'bras dang rma dang shu ba dang // g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang // ldog pa dang ni g.ya' ba
400b3(rgyud): ni// bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// brtson sangs rgyas dug ni mnga'// sangs rgyas gzi yis dug bco mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti rug
400b4(rgyud): rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum te// bsngon chos ni dug mi mnga'// chos kyi gzi yis dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// brjon
400b5(rgyud): dge 'dun dug mi mnga'// dge 'dun gzi yis dug bco mo// sa ni dug gi ma yin te// sa ni dug gi pha yang yin// bden pa'i bden tshig de ngag gis// bdag gi dug ni dug med shog/ dug ni sa yi nang du song / 
400b6(rgyud): gang ba'i snod du dug song shig swA hA// de nas khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / ngagra rnams las rgyal bar 'tshal byas thog mar mchod rten chen po la
400b7(rgyud): mchod pa bgyi'o// stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyis ni bdud pa ma mdzad// chos ma yin ni chos kyiso// dge 'dun gyis ni mu stegs pam// 
400b8(rgyud): dbang ngos lha min dam par gyur// lha min rnams kyis zla ba pham// namakha' lding gi rgya mtsho'o// me yis shing rnams pham par gyur// chus ni me yang pham par gyur// rlung gis sprin rnams rab tu pham// rdo rje yis
401a1(rgyud): ni rin chen phug/ lha rnams bden par rab tu gsungs// sa yang bden par gnas pa lags// sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang bden// bden pa rgyal gyur rdzun ma lags// skad ya the dan/ a
401a2(rgyud): mri te/ a gra puSh+pe/ ba hu pa le/ ni bA ra Ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ a ba rA dze te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra ni/ gu d+hA bar te/ gau ta me/ gu b+ha ma ti/ dzam+b+ha ni swAhA/ pra dzam+b+ha ni sA hA/ ba la pra b+hany+dza ni sA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ dza ya bi dza ya
401a3(rgyud): swA hA// phyir rgol ba ni kun las rgyal// sdig pa thaMd rab tu pham swA hA/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs// mi 'khrugs pa dang snang mdzad spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rin
401a4(rgyud): chen 'od 'phro ri rab mu khrung 'od dpag med// rdo rje rnams kyi mtshan rnams rtag tu gzung na ni// 'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin non par mi 'gyuraro// gang gis mthu stobs chen po brgyad po 'di dag gi mtshan rnam
401a5(rgyud): rjesu gzung ba'i phyir na rab brjod cing // kun tu bskyab pa byas na de yi lus ni// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyuraro// gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas// gshed mas
401a6(rgyud): mtshon rnams kyis ni gdab par gzas pa las// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rje su dran na ni// mtshon cha de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing 'brul// gal te mtshon cha rnams ni thogs par gyur na yang // lag
401a7(rgyud): pa chag nas sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// de yi lus la cung zad 'bab par mi 'gyuro// sngan chad byas pa gang yin pa ni ma gtog so// lha rnams kyis 'thun par tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs
401a8(rgyud): rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// bden pa rab ston thub pa khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// deng ni bden pa rnams la gnas nas mchi bar bgyi// bdag gi las rnams thams cad 'bras bur bcas
401b1(rgyud): gyur cig/ de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen gyis/ langs te thal mo sbyar btung nas// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed de// legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di/ byis pa rnams la ngan bgyid pa// rig sngags
401b2(rgyud): bdag gis brjod par bgyi// gang gis dang por 'dzam gling du// rig sngags rab tu ston mdzad pa// chos kyi rgyal po snang mdzad pa// sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshalo// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos
401b3(rgyud): rnams dang // tshogs kyi dam pa dge 'dun dang // sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsol to// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos dang / 
401b4(rgyud): drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong // lha rnams ji snyed mchis pa dag/ de kun mi yi 'jig rten na// 'di las skyes pa sha stago/ thub chen mnga' la 'tshal ba yi// gnod sbyin srin po 'di na mchis// 
401b5(rgyud): rgyal po rnams kyis mthong mi nus// bstan par yang ni mi nuso// gang la bu ni mi 'chags dang // gang gi mngal ni mi gnas dang // skyes babu da med 'du ba na// dbang po rnams ni myos par
401b6(rgyud): bgyid/ mer mer po dang nur nur po// bu yi sa bon ma rung bgyid// gang yang mngal ni thur du gyur// sha ma mi 'byung gnod bgyid pa// de rnams kyi ni ming brjod kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// ja
401b7(rgyud): pa po dang ri dgas rgyal// skem byed brjed byed khu tshur can// ma mo dang ni dza mi ka 'dod pa can dang nam gru dang // srul po dang ni ma dga' byed// bya dang gnya' ba'i lag can dang // bzhin rgyan dang ni mig
401b8(rgyud): 'phyang ba de dag tham+ba nad sa la rgyu// gdon rnams bco lnga de dag ni// byis pa rnams la 'jigs par bgyid// ji ltar byis pa 'dzin pa yis// mtshan dang gzugs kyang brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa pos ni
402a1(rgyud): zin gyur na// mig ni rab tu 'gyur bar bgyid// ri dgas rgyal gyis zin gyur na// skyugs pa mi bzang skyug par 'gyur// skyen byed kyis ni zin gyur na/ chem byed ngas ni byis pa 'gul// brjed byed kyis
402a2(rgyud): ni zir gyur na// 'gre zhing de ltar sgra yang 'byin// dbu ba dang ni kha chu 'dzag khu tshur can gyis rab zin na// khu tshur 'chang zhing 'byed par 'gyid// ma mo yis ni zin gyur na// rgod cing de bzhin sgra yang 'byin// dza mi kas ni rab
402a3(rgyud): zin ma nu zho nu bar mngon mi dga'// 'dod pa can gyis rab zin na// ma lan gnyid log ngu bar 'gyur// nam grus rab tu zin gyur na// lce la sos ni 'cha' bar bgyid// srul pos rab tu zin gyur na// ku co 'don cing sgra yang
402a4(rgyud): 'byim ma dga' byed pas zin gyur na// rnam pa sna tshogs gzug/ su 'gyur// bya yis rab tu zin gyur na// mnam pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// / gnya' lag can gyis zin gyur na// mgul pa rab tu 'gag par 'gyur// 
402a5(rgyud): bzhin rgyan gyis ni zin gyur na// rims kyis btab cing 'khru bar 'gyur// mig 'phyang bas ni zir gyur na// skyugs bu dang ni sngam pa 'byung // byis pa ji ltar skrag bgyid pa// de yi gzu
402a6(rgyud): ni brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs// ri dgas rgyal po ri dgas 'dra// skem byed pa ni gzhon ra'i gzugs// brjed byed pa ni wa 'dra'o// khu tshur can ni bya rog gzugs// ma mo de
402a7(rgyud): ni ma yi gzugs// dza mi ka ni rta yi gzugs// 'dod pa can ni rdo rje'i gzugs// nam gru khyi yi gzugs kyis te// srul po phag gi gzugs kyi so// ma dga' byed pa byi la'i gzugs// bya ni mdab chags
402a8(rgyud): gzugs kyi'o// gnya' lag can ni bya gag gzugs// bzhin rgyan 'ug pa'i gzugs te// mig 'phyang ba ni pha bang gzugs// 'di dag byis pa rlag par bgyid// ring rig bu 'phrog ma rungs pa// byis pa rnam
402b1(rgyud): la 'jigs bgyid pa// mdo sde'i zhags pas drangs nas ni// 'di dag shin tu dgug par bgyid// gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po ni// dri za tsan+dan zhes bgyi ba// yi ge phyag rgya de stsal de// song la gdor ni drag po pa/ 
402b2(rgyud): bco lnga de dag khug shig ces// pho nyar yang ni btang bar bgyid// de dag rnams ni skad cig gis// bcing ba lnga yi bcing bzhin bkug/ de nas 'jig rten mgon po la// tshangs chen thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// srog chag
402b3(rgyud): sa bon 'jig dgyid pa// 'byung po 'di dag rnams lhags te// mgon po yi ni spyan snga ru// 'di dag chad pas bshad par bgyid// bud med gang dag bu mi 'tshal// gang zhig btsas pa 'dzor 'tshal bas// tshes brgyaru
402b4(rgyud): dang ni bcu bzhi la// bslab gzung dam chos skyabs mchis la// mchod rten legs par mchod par bgyi// khrus bgyis shin tu rgyar nas ni// sa bzhir yungs kar gtor nas su// me tog spos kyis rgyan par bgyi// 
402b5(rgyud): sna lnga'i tshon gyi skud pas ni// khor yug du ni bskor bar/ bgyi// nam byed bar du mchis nas ni// spyi bor yungs kar ban gnas su// tshangs pas rab tu byas pa de tshangs pas sbrul ces brjod
402b6(rgyud): par bgyi// lo grangs bcu gnyis bar du ni// gzhor nu rnams la phan dgyid pa// tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde yi// rig sngags 'di la gang 'da' ba// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// mgo bo tshal pa bdun
402b7(rgyud): du 'gas// sA da ya the dan/ aM ge/ baM gai/ b+ha ge/ d+ha ba te/ i ran+de/ sU la ri/ gi ri ga ba ri/ sha ba ru/ ga ru Ni sha ru Ni/ gi ri/ ga ba re/ lo tsa ni/ lo sa me/ ro tsa ni/ a la d+he/ aM ga ne/ a la b+he/ ta la b+he pra kaR+Sha
402b8(rgyud): Ni swA hA/ mang la na bde bar gnas gyur cig/ dbang po yang dag 'phel bar shog/ mngal na 'dug par bder gyur cig/ btsas pa 'jig par mi gyur cig/ mngal na bde bar garas gyur cig
403a1(rgyud): dus bzhin du ni 'byung bar shog/ tshor srung sna tshogs rnams dang ni// yungs kar 'bru ni ma grugs pa// de dag srung bar gsungs
403a2(rgyud): nga ste// byis pa ring du 'tsho bar shog/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis// rig pa'i sngags ni 'di dag gsungs// mngal na 'dug pa srung bar shog/ byis pa rnams ni bder
403a3(rgyud): gyur cig/ sAd ya the dan/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+ha/ b+ho d+ha a nu ma tai/ pa lai ni/ kha hA pa le/ shi k+Sha shi k+Sha/ sA ra ba te/ sa ra ba te/ sA ga le du rA sa pe/ du rA ga me/ shU prap+te/ shA ra ba te/ b+ha ge/ b+ha gA b+ha ge/ 
403a4(rgyud): b+hA ge ni ni pA ra Ni swAhA/ de nas gdon ni bco lnga po// rtag tu khrag la 'thungs rnams kyis// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// grong ngam
403a5(rgyud): khyim bam grong khyer ram// gang na legs par gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'ang ni bzhugs pa der// byis pa rnams ni 'chi mi 'gyur// thub chen khyod na ji bzhin du// rje su 'thun par 'jug
403a6(rgyud): par bgyi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tsha mo// gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig/ grub par gyur cig/ rig sngags kyis sgrol bar gyur cig/ tshangs
403a7(rgyud): ngas bsam par gyur cig swA hA// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol
403a8(rgyud): to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gang la la stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i tsha sde 'di 'dzir tam/ 'chang ngam/ nyon tam/ klog gam// kun chub par bgyid pa des rang du thas
403b1(rgyud): pal 'arngon par brgya'o// mchod rten mchod pa la brtson par bgyi'o// sa brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga'i dus su mchod rten la 'chang ba rgya chen po 'gyis nas rig sngags klag pa
403b2(rgyud): la// sa brgyad kyi chen rgyam chen pa bzhi'i gyis bu dag rtsachen po rnams kyi mdun na de la sems par bgyid/ ring nas kyang 'don par gying ngo // ches bcu bzhi'i tshen
403b3(rgyud): na' bdag nyi 'du nga// myong na kyang 'dzin pa sa ma rgya tshan rgyam mche ba dag nyid sems par babyed cing ring ma
403b4(rgyud): gangan par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / stor pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
403b5(rgyud): par bgyid pa/ de ni srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par bgyid lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang ngal
403b6(rgyud): gos dang / zas dang mal cha dang lhan dang ra ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis mi 'brel bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyang sti stang bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / rlo
403b7(rgyud): po dag gis kyang bla mar bgyid dang / ring gro gyi ba dang / mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan du stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu
403b8(rgyud): dang / mdza' ba dang / mi 'dza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa des gtsang mar bgyis te/ lus gtsang ba dang / 
404a1(rgyud): gos dang / rgyan dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / yo byad khyad par can gtsang mar bgyi/ yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyid/ yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang bsten
404a2(rgyud): bar mi bgyi/ yul ngan pa na gnas par bsngags par mi bgyi'o// gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde dran par gyur na/ de la rgyal po
404a3(rgyud): chen po bzhi po dag nyid srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ste/ gang
404a4(rgyud): gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam/ nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par bsams na/ de la lo gcig gi bar du mi lags pas klags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// 
404a5(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'o su 'gyur/ ba lag so// gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de 'tshal na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi
404a6(rgyud): yang bzhin ston par 'gyur na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / phal ba gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tsha la/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can rnams la sman pa'i slad 'jig rten la gang
404a7(rgyud): su dag rig sngags phyin pa/ de dag pas gsang sngags kyis tshig 'di dag rab mchog/ gtso bo khyad par du 'phags pa/ dam pa/ zab pa/ rgya che ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ 'jug par dka' ba/ thun mong
404a8(rgyud): ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya las so// de nas dbang po mig stong po// lha yi rgyal po bde sogs khyod// thal mo sbyar phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jig rten mgon la 'di
404b1(rgyud): 'di skad gsol// 'jig rten kun la phan bgyid pa// rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs// gsang sngags sman dang ldan pa yi// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi/ shing sha me tog
404b2(rgyud): a ba man dang / ka ta yi 'bras bu a ga ru// rdo dreg dang ni sed btsod rnams dang // sU ka ri dang dzA ya marga ti// ba ri pe la sa ra bi ra dang // sa ma ka dang bu sa rgya spos dang // tsen+dan a
404b3(rgyud): brta ka ru rta dang / sder mo lo ma ka ta ma ba ra dang // pri yang ku dang 'bru gsug smig bcud dang // yungs kar dag dang ldong ros rnams dang ni// shing tsaM shu dag gur gum shing kun dang // lo mdag
404b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i brna ka/ de dag sbyar te reng bur bgyid pa ni// gdon rnams kun las grol bar bgyid pa ste// 'byung po dag ni kun gyi 'gyur ba la// mig la de yis bskus pa bgyid na ni/ de nas
404b5(rgyud): 'byung po rdo rje dang // gnam lcags mnga' yis zin las thar// lho shing chen dang de bzhin du// mchod rten che la bskus bgyid na// gang gis gnas de mthong ba de// 
404b6(rgyud): 'byung po la ni 'jigs ma mchis/ der ni 'byung po mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lagaso// rnga chen dung dang rdza rnga dang // rnga bran dag la'ang bskus na ni// de dag sgra
404b7(rgyud): ni gar grags par// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor skrag par 'gyur// grong du rgyu ba'i bya rnams kyi// mdab ma dag la bskus na ni// yul dang phyogs ni gzhan dag tu// bya de gang du mchis pa
404b8(rgyud): der 'byung po rnams ni mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lag so// chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka 'am// gang dang gang du bor yang rung // der ni dpag chad khur yug tu// bde ba dang ni zhi
405a1(rgyud): // bar 'gyur// pha rol dmag tshegs rang mchis te// mtshon ma dag ni 'bab pa ni// gnas rnams kun tu byug bgyis na// bde blag du ni rang bar 'gyur// lba ba dang ni gzhang
405a2(rgyud): nang dang / mi dpal dang ni 'bras byung dang // gdug pas zin dang dug 'thungs pas// 'thungs sam byugs na thar bar 'gyur// lus la de yis byugs na ni// byang stems thaMng gcod par bgyi// 
405a3(rgyud): rtsod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i gyod las thar bar 'gyur// ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur// dbul po las ni phyug por 'gyur// bu ma mchis pa bu rnyed 'gyur// ner ma mchis pa
405a4(rgyud): no rnyed 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gnas par du yang // 'dis ni gsang sngags grub par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa dang // ljon shing rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rig
405a5(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba thob la yang // 'di ni zhi ba'i las dang/ byed// 'di la gsang sngags tshig mchis te/ dper na dbang po'i tshig bzhi no// s+yad ya the dan/ a kra me/ bi kra me/ 
405a6(rgyud): b+hu ta g+ho tre b+hu taM/ ga me/ da ha ni d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ da d+hi ni/ ni kha me/ kha kha me/ kha kha kha kha/ sA raM ga me/ tsin+d+ra/ tsa pa le/ ha li me/ ha le/ hA rA Ni swA hA// phyogs thaMd nas/ bdag gi sdig pa bdaM zhi bar gyur
405a7(rgyud): cig swA hA// de nas tshangs pa dbang po dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas// sgra
405a8(rgyud): skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol// nyi ma stong ltar gsal ba po// zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// khyod dang 'dra ba yong ma mchis// legs bsams legs
405b1(rgyud): par sbyar na ni// gnod sbyin srin po rnams 'joms pa// rgyal srid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba// rig sngags rgyal srid rab sbyor ba// stong chen gyi ni 'jig chen na// srung ba'i mdo sde dam pa lags// phyag 'a
405b2(rgyud): skyes bu dpa' khod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog byed la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// de nyid du ni mi snang gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub kha'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog
405b3(rgyud): las bzhengs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde long shig/ rmongs shig/ lcogs shig/ ston cig/ kun chub par
405b4(rgyud): byis shig/ de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la yun ring po'i don dang // phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag nga'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stong
405b5(rgyud): chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'dis shing skam po la skud pas bcings na de la lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas
405b6(rgyud): pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtog so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces
405b7(rgyud): gsol te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga gsungs pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa dang / rma ba chen po dang / bsil ba'i ral mer me
405b8(rgyud): dang so so 'brang ba chen mo dang / gsang sngags kyi rje su 'brang ba chen mo lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zas rna bo pa lnga yongasu spong la 'ongs shig ces
406a1(rgyud): / kyang bka' stsal la/ zas bsod snyobs la brter te rab tu byung zhig ces kyang gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das zas rnam pa lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i bsod snyo mas ri lung // 'di ltar
406a2(rgyud): zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa de ni mang lags na/ btsur pa bcom lngan 'das de la bdag cag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
406a3(rgyud): de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir su steng chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mde sde 'dang ba des/ rma med pa'i nor bu'i gzungs zhes bya ba de bdag nyid
406a4(rgyud): bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir rengs shig/ nges bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe zas la mi mthun pa med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// zas rnams pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsed snyoms
406a5(rgyud): la yang zas rnam pa lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya/ 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes
406a6(rgyud): dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// zas rnam pa lnga po dag ka la yod/ zas rnam pa lnga pa su'i yin/ su zhig zas rnam po lnga po za/ sems can dmi
406a7(rgyud): su med do// de la zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres na ches brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la bdag srung ba byas te/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo legs par bkrus pa/ shin tu rgyan pa/ nyin zhag
406a8(rgyud): gcig zas bcad pa bslab pa'i gnas lnga bzung ba/ skud pa dmar po bzhi sgril du 'gal du bcug la/ gsang 'dzin pas rig bsngags dran par byas te/ skud pa de 'dud pa la 'dud
406b1(rgyud): la skud pa de mtsheran gsar pa mod de bsregs la rin po che'i snod dam/ lcags kyi snod kyang rung chus khang ste me tog gis khyab par khrom la/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis gdugs te/ snod kyi nang nas
406b2(rgyud): skud pa de slar 'byor te ma byung bar du rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// de yang lag pa la bcings la tshig 'di skad brjod do// bram ze rnams kyis bslus nasu// shAkya seng ge skyob
406b3(rgyud): ba la// dpal sbas kyis ni dug can gyi// bsod snyoms dag ni phul ba dang // de las de ni blangs na su// ston pas dug ni bsad nas gsol// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su// 
406b4(rgyud): zas ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar shog/ rnam par gzigs dang lha gang dang // gtsug tor can dang kun skyob dang // log par dad pa sel ba la// stobs chen lha gang dad pa dang // gser
406b5(rgyud): dang dpal ldan 'od srung dang / shAkya yi ni seng ge la/ rab dang lha yi dbang po dang // tshangs dbang sum cu'i dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / nor bu bzang dang dbang
406b6(rgyud): phyug che// srin mo nag mo chen mo dang // de bzhin gdol ma gtum mo dag/ me tog dang ni bdug pa dang // bdag gi sbyin sreg 'di bzhes shig/ de dag tshim zhing mchod gyur nas/ bdag gi kha
406b7(rgyud): zas byang bar mdzod// zas lnga dag dang 'dres pa yang // bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol// kha zas lnga dang madres pa yang // zas de kun ni bza' bar bgyi// sa bon dag gis tshogs
406b8(rgyud): kun la// sa yis bcud ni bzhugs pa yi// kha zas 'dres pa thams cad kyang // bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol// ji ltar skud pa bcang bsregs pa// de lta bu yang slar
407a1(rgyud): 'byor pa// de ltar zas rnams 'das pa yang // ma 'dres par yang bdag la mdzod// s+yAd ya the dan/ kha kha ma/ kha kha kha kha/ kha kha me/ shi me shi me/ shi hu me/ shi me/ 
407a2(rgyud): shi me swa sti swa sti swa sI ma ma shAn+ti/ sha rA gri/ kha zas lnga dang 'dris pa yang // ji ltar ma 'dres zas bzhin du// gang gis ji ltar skud bsregs pa// de 'dra'i bden pa mdzad du gsol// 
407a3(rgyud): s+yAng ya the dan/ ka la ke/ ka la le/ ba la ni/ ka ru ta/ a la ye/ ag+ni/ sang kA ma Ni swA hA// sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang gtsug tor can// bde gshegs kun skyob sangs
407a4(rgyud): rgyas log par dang sel dang // gser thub 'od srung shAkya thub pa go'u tam// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba la skyabasu mchi bar bgyi// mi mchog bdun po de dag gi ni sku
407a5(rgyud): rnams la// me tag dag dang spos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi// lus dang ngan dang rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// de dag rnams la skyabasu nye bar ma mi bar bgyi/

407b8(rgyud): rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byeng

409a1(rgyud): lon pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi sro gang bya ba'i phyir shing bshags pa dang / shing rul pa'i ser ge zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas

412a1(rgyud): gu lu gu lu/ hu tsedzi ni tsi dzi ni/ a gu lu/ e lA me lA e lA me lA/ ti li me lA/ i li mid+he/ i li ti li mi d+hi/ du be su dr-i be/ Na su ta su/ go lA be lA/ tse ba la
412a2(rgyud): bi ma lA/ in+ti ri/ rin+ti ri/ na me bud+d+hA nan/ tsi li ki si/ gaM do hi kA/ na me ar+tha tAn/ hA la hA la/ lhas phyogs bcur kun tu char po ba shig/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tsha lo swA hA/ de
412a3(rgyud): dus gzhan zhig na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba ma byas par 'dod pa rnams la zhen cing chags te rgyags pas myos nas rab tu rmongs
412a4(rgyud): shing brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas rab tu zhen te/ nags kyi rma bya gzhon nu mang po dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba nas/ kun dga' ra bar/ skyes mos tshal nas skyes
412a5(rgyud): mos tshal du/ ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu zhing song song ba las de bag med par gyur nas/ ri'i ser ga zhig tu chud nas/ de der rigs ngan
412a6(rgyud): gzhon nu yun ring du phyir rgol ba dgrar gyur pa/ 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya snyis bzung ste/ de mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang dran pa slar rnyed
412a7(rgyud): nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di nyid yid la byaso// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tsha lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya
412a8(rgyud): chen mo la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya bA/ hu hu hu hu/ nA ga le le le/ duM ba le le le/ nA ga le le le/ hu ya hu ya/ bi dza bi dzaM/ thu su bru su/ gu lu gu lu/ hu tsa dzi ni/ tse dzi na/ a ga ru/ e lA me lA/ 
412b1(rgyud): i la mi lA/ ti'i mi la/ i ma mit+ta/ i mi \u0f7f mi lid+d+hi/ du he/ su dra n+te/ to su to su/ ko lA/ 93/ tsa ba lA/ bi ma lA/ ma ma mA tsA ri/ na mo tsat+panan/ 
412b2(rgyud): ki si/ kad tsi kA/ na mo ar+tha tran/ hA la phAl/ lhas phyogs kun tu sa shig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo swA hA// de nas de sdug bsngal de las thar te dge ba dang / bde ba
412b3(rgyud): bdag gi yul du phyin nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bzlas// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tsha lo// ma bya'i rgyal po
412b4(rgyud): gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshalo// rig sngags kyi rgyal rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ si d+hi/ su sid+d+hi/ mo ni/ mak+Sha Ni/ mu n+te/ bi muk+te/ a ma le/ bi ma la/ 
412b5(rgyud): niR+Ya le/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ maM ga le/ maM ka l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra d+h+ye gar+b+he rat+ne/ rat+na gar+b+he d+hadre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ shI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA dA ni/ ba ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba an
412b6(rgyud): pra sha ma ni/ sar+b+ba maM ga la sA d+ha ni/ sarba a maM ga la sA d+ha ni/ ya sho bi ta/ ma na si/ ma na si/ ma hA ma na si/ ad b+hu de/ a tad+ya b+hu de/ muk+te/ bi muk+ti/ mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha ni/ 
412b7(rgyud): a ts+tshi te/ a ra dze/ li ra dze/ bi ma le/ a mr-i ta/ a ma re/ a ma ri Ni/ brah+ma/ brah+ma swa raM/ pUr+Ne/ pUr+Na ma no ra the/ a mr-i ta sany+dzi \u0f7fni/ shI d+ha dr-i// tsan+tha/ 
412b8(rgyud): prad+he/ sUr+ya/ sUr+ya kAn+te/ d+h+ri ta b+ha ye/ su baN+De/ drah+ma g+ho She/ tha hA dzuSh+Ta/ sarba tra/ a pra ti ha te swA hA/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal// bdag la dge ba dang srung
413a1(rgyud): / pa mang dugasal/ lo rgya 'jobar gyur cig sun gyi mthong ba shos shig/ NathA/ hu Ti gu ts+yai g+hu tsi/ mu Ni swA hA/ kun dga' bo da'i che de'i dus nagru bya'i rgyal lo gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gyu
413a2(rgyud): bde gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi bltar//  cir phyir she makun dga' bo nyid de'i tshe ngu'i dus mtha bya'i rgyal po gse du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' po cig sngags kyi rgyal
413a3(rgyud): mo rma bya chen po'i snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ i li mi t+te/ ti li mit+ti/ ti li mi li mi tI/ ti li mi li mit+ti/ ti li mi li/ mi li ti li/ ti li mit+ti/ bi li mi li maut+ti/ bi li mi li
413a4(rgyud): mir+t+ti/ bi li mi li mi la ti li mi li/ su du bA/ duM bA/ su ba tsa/ ts+yai ri ki si yA/ b+hi na na me De/ na mo bud+d+hA nan/ tsi li ki si/ pran+ta mU le/ i ti hA re/ lo hi ta mU le/ dr-i bA/ su du ShA/ kun+di/ ku nan+ti/ ti la ku
413a5(rgyud): no ljang lo can du lhas zla ba dgu 'am/ zla rbuchar pob shig/ i li mi li/ ki li khri mi ki li mi li/ ke tu mU la~M du du be/ su dul+le med 'a me/ san+du ban+de/ chus brtse/ 'u sa ra/ pra sa ra/ r+than
413a6(rgyud): bsta ra ke/ nan li mi/ kha li ma g+ho Sha/ ra khi li/ i tisata dza le/ duM ge su dr-i be/ an+te/ nan+te/ pra naT+Te/ a na NaT+Te/ a na mA le/ lhas kun nas chus sar pa'i char lob shis nA rA ya nI/ bA rA ya
413a7(rgyud): ni ha ri ti la/ kun+da li/ i li mi sti/ ki kha ti li mi sti/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag grub par gyur cig swA hA// kun dga' bo 'di ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying
413a8(rgyud): bo yino// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di grong na 'dug pa na yang yid la bya'o// dgon pa na 'dug gam/ lam na 'dug gam/ lam gol ba na 'dug gam/ rgyal po'i
413b1(rgyud): pho brang 'khor na 'dug gam/ chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ me'i nang na 'dug gam/ chu'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'khor gyi nang na 'dug
413b2(rgyud): macod pa'i nang na 'dug gam/ sbrul gyis zin tam dug 'thungs sam/ 'jigs pa thams cad 'dug pa na yang yid la bya'o// rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan
413b3(rgyud): las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las myur pa dang / nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las nad gang yang rung bas btab par gyur pa dang / longs par gyur pa na yang shin tu yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun
413b4(rgyud): dga' bo gsad pa'i rin pa ni chad pas bral bar 'a gyur// chad pas bcang pa'i rig pa ni bzhu bcog gi so// bzhu ba pa'i rig pa ni skyo bas// skye ba'i rig pa ni dam bcas paso// 
413b5(rgyud): dam bcas pa'i rig pa ni spu zing zhes bya ba so// spu zing zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni de bzhin du thar bar 'gyur te/ de'i nad thod kyang ldog par 'gyu ro// kun dga' bo rig sngags dang / gsang sngags
413b6(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di yang yid la bya'o// tad+ya thA/ Ni li mi li/ ki li mi li/ ke dA mu le/ pra sa bats+tshe/ pra sa ri ni/ ke beT+Te/ ko bats+tshe ka mA le/ oM ti sha ba re/ dr-i ga dru ge pri yaM ka re/ A ban+d+he ba ri ban+de/ lhas kun tu
413b7(rgyud): chu sar pa'i char lob shig/ na ma~M b+ha ba ti/ in+d+ran+da yaM/ in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/ A sha ne/ bA sha ne/ pA ba ni kuru le/ ka ba~M li min+di/ i li min+d+ri/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsha'o// 
413b8(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung bar gyis shig/ yongasu bsku
414a1(rgyud): pa dang / yong su bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon ma spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtsham
414a2(rgyud): bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' ba rig sngags kyi rgyal me rma bya chen me 'dis/ srung ba byas shing sba ba dang / 
414a3(rgyud): yong su bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhi la ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / 
414a4(rgyud): mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas pa la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir 'ong ga lha 'am/ lha mo 'am/ lha'i bu pho 'am/ lha'i bu ma 'am/ lha rgan pa 'am/ lha rgan me 'am/ lha'i 'a
414a5(rgyud): pho 'am/ lha'i 'khor ma 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor lo 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/

414a7(rgyud): 'am lha ma yin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ rlung lha 'am/ rlung lha mo 'am/ rlung lha'i bu pho 'am/ rlung lha'i bu mo 'am/ rlung lha rgan po 'am/ rlung lha rgan mo 'am/ rlung lha'i 'khor po
414a8(rgyud): lag rlung lha'i 'khor mo 'am/ na mkha' lding ngam/ na mkha' lding mo 'am/ na mkha' lding gi bu po 'am/ na mkha' lding gi bu mo 'am/ na mkha' lding rgan po dang / na mkha' lding rgan

416a1(rgyud): ni gnon po 'du ba'i gnasu mi yin/ gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo cha bya chen mo las 'gal bar byed na de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog ma bzhin du tshal

416b2(rgyud): lA i li me lA/ ti li mA/ ti ha dug ha/ ti li mA/ ti mA/ du mA/ d+hi mA/ d+hu mA/ g+hu su kuM d+ha kum+b+ha su kum+b+ha sr-i bA/ t+ye bA/ sa ma tuM wA/ A De na De/ ti la/ kuny+dze tA De/ ny+dza tu de ga i maM ki si/ nga seMn
416b3(rgyud): dzad la byams pas lhas zla ba dgu 'am/ zla ba bcu kun tu char thob shig/ bu 'a ze sha ba ri Ni/ Ta dA ri ni/ ke ban+d+he/ ke ban+de/ ka mU le/ oM ti sha ba re/ tum+be tum+ba pri ya ka re/ A bin+te/ pa'i bar+b+he/ 
416b4(rgyud): lhas kun nas chu sar pa'i char pag shig na mo ga ga ba te/ in+da kaM me/ li kA ya/ in+da n+da ya/ na da~M tsi kA yaSh+T+rI ya/ a le ta She/ kun le/ ah+ye nar+the/ kuned+he A sa naM/ bA na/ 
416b5(rgyud): ba ni ku le/ pra ti kA le/ sangs rgyas gser thub u b.ra'i drung // lang srung n+ya rbe d+ha yi drung na gnas/ thub mchog khyad par gnas drang du/ byin nas byang chub
416b6(rgyud): ke'u ta ma// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de ngan la/ mngon pa dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dang / lha rnams de dag yi dga' mgu gyur nas/ rtag tu dge dang zhi bar 'gyur bar byas/ tad+ya rmA/ 
416b7(rgyud): ma mi mi chi/ ka ma~M mo la~M/ ki li tsi li/ ki li tsa li/ u du rA/ su du ru/ su du mu de/ rba sa ra pra sar/ hu du ka rany+dzi/ ka rany+dza/ mU la~M/ i ti sa maH/ kun+da li/ kun+d+ha li nA rA ya na~M/ bA ra ya na~M/ 
416b8(rgyud): pa sh+ya ni/ ba bya ba sh+ya ni/ ki ba li lA sa/ 'gro lding ba'i sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo sman chen po 'di dag ni mi brjed kyi bdag pa tshangs pa dang / lha rnams
417a1(rgyud): / kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste/ kun dga' bo gang sman chen po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la
417a2(rgyud): zhig rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'ong na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'ag so// tad+ya thA/ kirti mA le/ e raN+De mU le/ sa man+ta mU le na Da na De/ a De/ na De/ ku sha nA De/ it+ti mi
417a3(rgyud): bA ru/ a ra Na ka ma ra Da ka i li ku shi/ go do hi ka/ ud d+h+ye d+hu ma/ b+hin na/ me DA/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ 
417a4(rgyud): lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde leg/ nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / khyed cag kun tu bde legs
417a5(rgyud): shog/ de dag sdig par ma gyur cig nyi ma bde dge ba yin// / rgyu skar zad bzang po yin// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu' phrul che// dgra bcom pa zag pa med// bden pa
417a6(rgyud): tshig 'dis kun tu bde legasu gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang

433a8(rgyud): bdag bde leg su gyur cig/ shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang 'brum bu phra mo dang / phol mig dang // g.yan pa dang / me dpal dang / lhog pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legasu
433b1(rgyud): gyur cig mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde leT nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal byang chub

438b7(rgyud): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / lo len ba dang / lo nyes pa dag kyang sten pa rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ gza' nyi ma dang / gza' zla ba dang / gzal phur bu dang / gza' ba
438b8(rgyud): sangs dang / gza' spen pa dang / gza' mig dmar dang / gza' lhag pa dang / gza' lha min dbang po sgra gtsar dang / gza' du ba 'jug ring so// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ de lta
439a1(rgyud): // phyogs na bdun bduno// skar ma bza' bdun de bzhin te/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / sum cu rtsa bdun tshang ba dag/ 'char ba dang ri nub pa dang / 'khor
439a2(rgyud): lo mtshon cha bden du rgyu// 'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed// gzi che rdzu 'phrul chen po dag/ rab tu dang ba'i sems kyiso// rig sngags rje su yi rang byas// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi
439a3(rgyud): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo drang srong rnying la brtul zhugs grub pa/ rig snga Ta
439a4(rgyud): grub pa/ grags pa 'bar ba dang / klung dang ri la ga nas pa/ dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/ dka' thub drag pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan ga/ na mkha' la
439a5(rgyud): 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyed kyis zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyon ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po

439a7(rgyud): chen po gnas 'jog ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po srog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'dro ba skyong gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'dro ba skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang /

439b1(rgyud): 'jigs cam zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ska ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mdun du 'dar zhes bya ba dang / drang sreng chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang / drang
439b2(rgyud): sreng chen po gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sde bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen

439b7(rgyud): sreng chen po pa ba sangs zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gza' lhag
439b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po dug sel ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen poru gcig pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rA zhes bya ba dang // drang srong chen po

440a3(rgyud): chen po mis byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ri bo zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po srin bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying po 'di dag ni rig byed rnams byed pa/ gsang sngags

441b1(rgyud): ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rmabya chen ma 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rje su yi rang ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par

441b8(rgyud): shing rje su yi rang ba'o// nod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras shing rje su yi rang ba'o// dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / grul bram gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brkyang dag pa
442a1(rgyud): // klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang smras shing

443a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thad kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rung bar 'gyuraro// sems ma rungs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i gang zag rdzas

443b1(rgyud): dug gis mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis kyang ma yi no// bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyuraro// bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyuraro// phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / 
443b2(rgyud): dgra tshoms par 'gyur/ smras pa med par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thaMd las thar bar 'gyuraro// bde bar yun ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma
443b3(rgyud): gtog so// kun dga' ba rig sngags kyi rgyal me rma bya chen mo 'di ni ha cang char che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe bklan par bya'o// des ni klu thang spro bar 'gyur te/ char chen po ni gcod par byed/ 
443b4(rgyud): char dkon pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma~M de'i bsam pa ji srid par char 'bebs par 'gyuraro// kun dga' tshar ga sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa
443b5(rgyud): dang / dgra thang zhi bar 'gyur na sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba 'am/ bde leg su 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi rig snga
443b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zung shig/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rin sngags kyi rgyal
443b7(rgyud): me rma bya chen mo dgra thad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'di kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhog shig/ tad+ya thA/ yA ba ti/ drA ba ti/ d+hA ra ki/ hu lu tu lu me swA hA/ 'dod chags zhe
443b8(rgyud): sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa// sangs rgyas bden pas dug bco me// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// 
444a1(rgyud): / de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa// chos kyi bden pas dug bco mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'a
444a2(rgyud): rten dug gsum de// / bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa// dge 'dun bden pas dug bco mo// sangs rgyas kun gyis stobs gang dang / dgra bcom rnams kyi grags
444a3(rgyud): gang dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis// ngas ni bde legs 'gyur ba byas// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bco mo// dge slong
444a4(rgyud): sa ri bde legasu gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legaso zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das
444a5(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ la na gsum bskor ba byas nas dge slong sa rig la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo
444a6(rgyud): 'dis dge slong sa ri kha chad pa spang ba byas te/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / khade leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon
444a7(rgyud): cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mchis bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos srung ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba byas tshe dang ldan pa
444a8(rgyud): dge slong sa ri de las/ sos so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham
444b1(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
444b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' na khyud kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen me 'di'i mthu mthong ngam// kun dga' bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gsung ba
444b3(rgyud): de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen pa
444b4(rgyud): bzhi ni skam yang srid/ sa ni na mkha' la 'pha gas kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la ltung yang srid/ klung ni rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'
444b5(rgyud): ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na rig sngags kyi rgyal me rma bya chen me
444b6(rgyud): 'di la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mes par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes bya ba
444b7(rgyud): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la
444b8(rgyud): mos par byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / 
445a1(rgyud): na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thad yi ra
445a2(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi
445a3(rgyud): dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad sar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma yA ri
445a4(rgyud): bid+yA gar+b+he nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas la phyag
445a5(rgyud): 'che'o// chos la phyag 'tshal// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// dgra yis 'jigs pa 'am/ 'bab rtsod kyis jigs pa 'am/ bgegs kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dus ma yin
445a6(rgyud): bar 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ me'i 'jigs pa 'am/ chu'i 'jigs pa 'am/ rlung gi 'jigs
445a7(rgyud): ba 'am/ 'jigs pa zad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa 'am/ 
445a8(rgyud): gdon gyi zin tam/ rims kyi btab pa 'am/ dug 'thungs sam/ nang zad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// na mo b+ha ga Sha ti/ in+d+ra ya/ in+da ko mi si kA ya/ A sha ne bA sha na/ 
445b1(rgyud): pa ba ni kU le/ ka pi la mit+ti/ i li mit+te swA hA/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ nA rA ya ni/ bA rA ya Ni/ ha ri ta/ tA li/ kun+d+ha li/ i li mi sti/ ki li ti li mi sti swA hA/ riH
445b2(rgyud): sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ ha ha hi hi hu hu/ kha rA/ ma rA/ kha hi kha ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bdag la bsrungs shig bsrungs shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong
445b3(rgyud): bar shog shig/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod de/ gtor ma ri chen po la btang bar bya'o// des thams cad zhi zhing phyir bzlog par 'gyur// rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzog so// / 
445b4(rgyud): !// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pra ti sa ra bi dA rA dzI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tshal
445b5(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis zas pa dus gcig na/ chom ldan 'das rdo rje'i ldan pa chen po'i zam na// khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen pa ting 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje chen bar dpon
445b6(rgyud): bsam gyi shing ldan pas legs par rgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang / pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas la/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma gdal ga rdo rje chen por byin gyis
445b7(rgyud): brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng+ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / 
445b8(rgyud): 'phrul can sangs rgyas zad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyi brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa pad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba ni byang chub
446a1(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldon pa/ mthun
446a2(rgyud): be thob pa rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la son
446a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjesu 'jug pa'i chos ston pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab cing yangs pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar
446a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mtsho da pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang gzungs dang / ting 'dzin dang / dbang dang mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dris pa dang / byang
446a5(rgyud): chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang byams ba dang / snying rje dang / dka' ba dang btang snyoms dang / 
446a6(rgyud): byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang / yong su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i lus
446a7(rgyud): dang rdo rje'i blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sem
446a8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thad kyang
446b1(rgyud): / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi
446b2(rgyud): khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/ kun nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis sa bon nges par bsregs pa
446b3(rgyud): sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
446b4(rgyud): bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa bskul byed dang / tshe dang ldan ba dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung
446b5(rgyud): dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang podang lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i chos kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa'i
446b6(rgyud): yang brjod du med pa dag dang / mi brjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi ris kyis lha'i bu dang bcas
446b7(rgyud): ba dang / yongasu dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phral dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha lu tha~Md kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris dang / stobs can
446b8(rgyud): can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med/ grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / 
447a1(rgyud): 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams
447a2(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po g.yog tu ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po
447a3(rgyud): don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du can dang / na mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig na mkha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal ba
447a4(rgyud): rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'jig rten
447a5(rgyud): khyi ma bdun dang / srin mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / barbazad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / 
447a6(rgyud): phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs kyis dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po
447a7(rgyud): rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / 
447a8(rgyud): me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin/ 
447b1(rgyud): pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / zla ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin tal la dang / log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang / shing
447b2(rgyud): gse kyi lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gi 'gro rdo rje'i ris kyi 'khor
447b3(rgyud): du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
447b4(rgyud): ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / skye byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa dang / gnon pa tshad med
447b5(rgyud): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / nub ka'i lha dang / nang par gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha tha~Md dang / sa'i lha thang dang thabs gcig tu
447b6(rgyud): bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongasu mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongasu
447b7(rgyud): rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongasu bzung / byang chub chen ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa das ni brnyes/ skyes bu cher po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan pa'i sku ni
447b8(rgyud): rab tu 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag zad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras/ dbu'i gtsug ni se na thams cad kyis ltar mi mthong // bdud kyi las thaMng la ni
448a1(rgyud): mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
448a2(rgyud): dan ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang sgra dang / tshig su bcas pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchon
448a3(rgyud): dang seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / 
448a4(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya dga' ba'i spyod pa las ni phyir ma lag/ 
448a5(rgyud): sku ni skye bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/ dang dpe byas bzang po brgyad cus rgyan te/ rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin bo che'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri chen po rdo rjen
448a6(rgyud): po che dag mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin tu bstan par gnas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas rgyu
448a7(rgyud): ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bris pa'i phang bshams pa/ rin po che du ma pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa/ rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil chen po dang / dun las
448a8(rgyud): kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te/ kun nas mdzes pa/ gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par rgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrin 'bum phrag du mas/ 
448b1(rgyud): rnam par rgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gas
448b2(rgyud): byi mi ba'i rgyal ba ltar dpal ni rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhan pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par rgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thaMd la sdun par ni sna
448b3(rgyud): dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge la/ don 'azang
448b4(rgyud): go tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs ga yong su dag pa/ yongasu byung ga yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi
448b5(rgyud): mdzod pu nas/ 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
448b6(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med kha
448b7(rgyud): na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge snyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
448b8(rgyud): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thaMd dang thabs gcig tu chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag zad kyang sna/ 
449a1(rgyud): / ba des khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun// rab 'joms
449a2(rgyud): so sor 'brang ba yi// gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin// nad cog las grol bar byed// sems can
449a3(rgyud): kun la snying brtse bas// lus can ngan 'grer 'gro ba dang // de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir// 'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs// 'di yi srung ba byas na ni// lha ma yin gyi gan su 'jug// de
449a4(rgyud): bzhin ljang lo can dang ni// srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang / 'byung po klu dang sha za rnams// mi bzang 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyis par// 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams pad dang / dgra tsa
449a5(rgyud): gis mi tshug so// ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang // skem byed brjed byed skye byed dang // mkha'agro ma dang sha za dang // gad na rnams rab tu brlag par 'gyur// sor 'brang ba
449a6(rgyud): gzi brjid kyis// gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang // mi yi skye dgu rnams 'tshe ba// de dag thad rengs byed 'gyur// byang stems mi bzang gang yin dang // pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed// rdza
449a7(rgyud): kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyuraro// rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol// dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs// mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te// dus kyi rlung
449a8(rgyud): gis gnod mi 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzi brjid kyis// dgra kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur// de yi don rnams thaMd 'grug// rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis rtag tu mgul
449b1(rgyud): / pa 'am/ lag par rig pa btags na ni// de yi dgos pa yod cog/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang / de bzhin klu yi
449b2(rgyud): rgyal ba dang // lha dpung rnams ni rtag tu srung // sa sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la// nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha me rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// 
449b3(rgyud): log na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang // de lnga nyin dang mtshan rnamasu// srung bar byed de the tsom med// brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang / 
449b4(rgyud): dka' ba'i dbang po nag po che// smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang // ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang // drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dpa
449b5(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang // de kun so sor 'brang ba yi// gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed// sangs rgyas bdag nyid ni rnams dang // rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang // 
449b6(rgyud): bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang // lha ma sgrol ma ljags kyu dang // rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang dkar// de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang // nag mo che dang pho nya dang // de bzhin rdo rje pho nya dang // zhags pa bzang
449b7(rgyud): dang rdo rje zhags// lag na rdo rje stobs pa che// rig pa lha mo rdo rje phreng // bdud rtsi thab sbyor byed pa dang // gzhan gyi mi thub lha mo che// rna ba nag mo stobs chen mo// dpal yon ldan pa skal
449b8(rgyud): chen dang // rna cha gdub kor pad+ma 'dra// me tog so can nor bu bcug sgra mdog mdzes dang khyab pa mo// lha mo gzi brjid chen mo dang // dpal yon ldan pa glog phreng can// srin po ral ma
450a1(rgyud): // gcig pa dang // sangs rgyas bsrungs zhes bya ba dang // skal pa chen po mi thod can// lang ka'i bdag po dpal yon can// gzhan yang lha mo mang po rnams// sems can rjesu 'dzin byed
450a2(rgyud): dag rig pa gang gis lag na gnas// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// 'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang // dung can dang ni so brtsegs ma// dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang // de yi rjes 'gro can tu
450a3(rgyud): srung / so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di// bu med gang zhig rtag 'chang na// de yi thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rtag par mngal na bu pho chags// mngal rnams na yang bde bar skye// sbrum pa dag
450a4(rgyud): kyang bde bar 'gyur// nang dang sdig pa thams cad kyang / 'jig par 'gyur te the tsom med// bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan// nor dang 'bru yang rtag tu 'phel// tshig
450a5(rgyud): kyang gzung du 'os pa dang // mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyur ba yin// bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // gcing ma gang zhig/ 'chang srel na// de ni sen thams cad dag/ thar
450a6(rgyud): bya phyir brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin// nado cog kyang rnam par spangs// slad kyang lte ba mang bcas pa'i// rgyal ba'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur// phun sum tshogs
450a7(rgyud): brtag tu 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// de yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ de ni kun tu
450a8(rgyud): dam tshig shes/ rmi lam ngan pa rmi mi 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du// dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed// gza' kun rnam par gzhig
450b1(rgyud): ba'i phyir// ye shes dbang phyur chen pos gsungs// 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed// de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya// 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon// da ni rab tu 'di brjod do// de bzhin gshegs
450b2(rgyud): ba thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// oM bi bu la kar+b+he/ Shi phu la bi ma le/ bi ma
450b3(rgyud): la gar+b+he/ bi ma le/ dza ya gar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa la gar+b+he/ ga ti ga ha ni/ ga ga na bi sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ a~M ku na ba ti/ ga ga na/ bi rA ri Ni ga ga ri Ni gi ri ki ri/ gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/ ka ma ri ga ma ri/

450b6(rgyud): ldan 'das ma sems can 'drem pa/ kun nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams cad 'joms par mdzad ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nang 'anabazad dang / nang thams

451a6(rgyud): da aM ku she/ oM pad+ma bi shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mang+ga la bi shud+d+hi/ pa bi tra mu khe/ khan+ti ni khaD+ga na/ kha ra kha ra/ dz+wa li ta shi kha re/ sa man+ta a ba
451a7(rgyud): lo ki ta pra b+he su pra b+ha bi shud+d+he/ sa man+ta pra sA ra ti a ba b+ha si ta shud+d+he/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba de ba ga Na/ gra ha na k+Sha tra/ sa ma a kaR+Sha ni/ sa t+ya pra te/ ai hri tra ta ra ta ra/ glang po che'i sta stangs kyis
451a8(rgyud): gzigs ma/ bdag sbrul du gas ma/ kha phul du/ hu lu hu lu/ hu du hu du/ tu ru tu ru kin ka ni/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ hu Ni huNi/ sar+b+ba gra haHkAM ni/ bi ga le bi na le/ mu tsu mu nr-i/ su mu su mu/ su mi
451b1(rgyud): tsaM ge ta ra ta ra/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i sgra stangs kyis gzigs ma thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i rab dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa'i bcings pas bdag
451b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol/ badz+ra dz+wa lA bi shud+d+he/ b+hu ri b+hu ri/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ti ri ti/ tu ru tu ru/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gar+b+ha bi shud+d+he/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ni/ kuk+Shi samU ra Ni dza la dz+wa la/ tsa la tsa la
451b3(rgyud): dz+wa li Ni/ lha'i chus kun tu char dbab tu gso// a mri ta b.rA Ni de ba ta/ a ba tA ba ra Ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsungs rab bdud rtsi mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ 
451b4(rgyud): 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang // rtsod pa dang / 'gying pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdig ba thams cad rnam par sbyong ba gnod sbyin dang / srid

451b7(rgyud): rin pa chen mo 'di grub par mdzadadu gsol// dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub tu gsol/ gsang sngag rtswa grub tu gsol/ bgegs rnams gzhom du gsol// dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ sid+d+hi

452a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhug su gsol/ bzhug su gsol/ dam tshig bskyang du gsol// 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdas
452a2(rgyud): la gzig su gsol/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sar+b+ba A ba ra na bi sho d+ha ni/ sa man+ta a kA ra maN+Da la bi shud+d+he/ bi ga te/ bi ga ta ma le/ sar+b+ba ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ kli ni k+Shi ni/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi shud+d+ha/ 
452a3(rgyud): ma la bi ga te/ te dze te dzo ba ti/ badz+ra badz+ra ba ti swA hA/ 'jig rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ byang chub

452a8(rgyud): mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba la swA hA/ chu'i lha la swA hA/ rlung lha la swA hA/ rlung lha chen po la swA hA/ me lha kha swA hA/ klus rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/ lha'i tsha rnams la sA hA/ kU'i/ 
452b1(rgyud): sa rnams pa sa wAnd sbyin gyi tshigs rnams la swA3/ sbyin ma mtshanas rnams la AhA/ dri ba'i tshigs rnams la swAH/ lA ma yin gyi tshanas rnams la swAn+da/ rnamakha' ljin
452b2(rgyud): tshogs rnams la sA tre/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la sAhA/ s+ho 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams le swAhA/ mi rnams la swA hA/ ma~M ma yin pa rnams la swA hA/ gdon rnams la swA hA/ 'byung
452b3(rgyud): thams cad la swA hA/ yi dgas la swA hA/ sha ba la swA hA/ brjed byed la swA hA/ gnon po la swA hA/ grul bum la swA hA/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru sA hA/ tu ru tu ru swA hA/ mu ru mu ru sA hA/ ha na ha na/ sar+b+ba sha

452b8(rgyud): la swA hA/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ oM sAhA/ swaHsA hA b+huHswA hA/ b+hu baHswAhA/ b+hum+bu ga sA hA/ tsi r-i tsa~M Ti sAH/ thiTi bo swA hA/ d+ha ra Ni sAH/ d+hA ra Ni sAhA/ ag+ni sAH/ he dzo ba yu swAhA/ 
453a1(rgyud): / li tsi li swA hA/ mi li mi khi sA hA/ si li si khi sA hA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha sA hA/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha sAhA/ maN+Da la ban+d+he swA hA/ sI mA ban+d+he sA hA/ d+ha ra Ni ban+d+he sAhA/ sar+b+ba sha truM b+hany+dza ya swA hA/ dzaM b+hA ya
453a2(rgyud): swAhA/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya swA hA/ tshin+da tshin+da sA hA/ bin+da bin+da swA hA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza swA hA/ ban+da banA sA hA/ me ha ya mo ha ya swA hA/ ba Ni bi shud+d+he swA hA/ sUN+ye swA hA/ sU N+ye bi shud+d+he swAhA/ sho d+ha ni thi sho d+ha ni

453a7(rgyud): oM mu ne mu ne mu ne ba re/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyal btab pa thaMd kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol// sar+b+ba ta thA ga Nahring
453a8(rgyud): ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na/ a d+hiSh+Ti te badz+re sAhA/ bram ze chen ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen po// kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / 
453b1(rgyud): snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mes thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyuro// bram ze chen po rig pa 'di gang gi snying la
453b2(rgyud): gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o// de'i lus la mes mi tshug so// ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na/ gzhonu sgra gcan zin bzang ba mngal du
453b3(rgyud): zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu me sa 'tshom bdag nyid me'i nang du 'chongs pa dang / der pad+ma dag byung ste/ de'i tshe gzho nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la
