484a3(rgyud): shing ma chad par// shin tu tshang par 'chang bgyid na// de la gnod sbyin yi dgas dang // 'byung po grul bum srin po dang // skyo byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang // de lta bu dag 'tshe mi bgyid// de la
484a4(rgyud): mi ma lags dang gdon// myur du gu du mchi bar 'gyur// de la cis kyang mi tshugs te// de la 'tshe bar yongs mi nus// rgyal bo chen po bzhi po yis// bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhing
484a5(rgyud): brjod de// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas//  nyid du ni mi snang gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo mtshan mo 'das te nam langs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun
484a6(rgyud): gyi gung la bzhugs te dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma dang gsum rgyal po chen po bzhi bu dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ mngag bzhugs
484a7(rgyud): ba dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nam sros nas lhags nas gros 'thun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du 'ongs
484a8(rgyud): te/ rang ni 'od kyi snang bar byas nas lus ngan dang / yul 'khor srung dang / mig mi bzang dang / 'phags skyes po rnams ka la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ nga'i rkang pa la
484b1(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod// phyog gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo // khyod kyis de legs
484b2(rgyud): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad// btsun pa de ltar 'tsha lo zhes gsol te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba mnyan nas/ bcom ldan
484b3(rgyud): 'das kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyas par bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
484b4(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa/ dge bsnyen ma de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'di'i cho ga ni zas dkar gsum
484b5(rgyud): za ba dang / legs par khrus byas pa dang / sbyang ba byas pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs ldong ros
484b6(rgyud): sam gcig gis bris la/ spos pad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du brjed par bya'o// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po rdzogaso// 
484b7(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA man+ta a nu d+ha ri sU tra/ bod skad du// gsang sngags chen po rjesu 'dzin pa'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos
484b8(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos dang bcas pa/ yang dag par song ba/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal// 
485a1(rgyud): // de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig sngags 'di ni don du sgrub// rig sngags 'di dag grub gyur cig/ gang phyir don du bsgrubs pa yi// don de yang ni grub par shog/ 'di skad bdag gis
485a2(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal gyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris
485a3(rgyud): kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang
485a4(rgyud): bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa bcang dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lha/ 
485a5(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag/ 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas
485a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni steng gi 'jig rten gyi
485a7(rgyud): kham su rnam su dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'tshal na/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam su srung ba dang yongasu
485a8(rgyud): skyob par bgyid/ yongasu bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyid lag so// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das ni smad
485b1(rgyud): / gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
485b2(rgyud): rnamasu srung ba dang / yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar mdzad pa lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong
485b3(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam su srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom
485b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo // de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung
485b5(rgyud): bas gnang bar rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma dang gsum
485b6(rgyud): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po
485b7(rgyud): chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas g.yog 'khor
485b8(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams ngag la ba der lhags te 'ongs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nga la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
486a1(rgyud): bdag ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshal na stong gi 'jig
486a2(rgyud): rten gyi khams rnamasu srung bar bgyid/ yongasu skyob par bgyid/ yongasu bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyid lag so// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa chos
486a3(rgyud): kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang
486a4(rgyud): bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar mdzad
486a5(rgyud): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam su srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba
486a6(rgyud): dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol to// dge slong dag ngas kyang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bas gnango // 
486a7(rgyud): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ngas cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dge slong dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang
486a8(rgyud): sngags chen mo rjesu 'dzin pa 'di ni/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsung so// ma 'ongs pa'i
486b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs par 'gyuraro// da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid
486b2(rgyud): pa phan par bya ba'i phyir/ da ltar nga nyid kyis bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig
486b3(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags chen po rje su 'dzin pa 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ shod cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal
486b4(rgyud): mo gsang sngags chen mo rje su 'dzin pa 'di ni 'aHra bzhi po rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar gnas par 'gyuraro// tad+ya thA/ u bud+d+ha/ 
486b5(rgyud): nI bud+d+he/ bi bud+d+he/ sa ma bud+d+he/ bi shoSh+Ta bud+d+he/ i ha bud+d+ha/ tat+tA bud+d+he/ ni yaM ga me/ tsha bi la/ a phu la/ ta phu la/ tA le mA le/ maM ga ga maM ga ma nAn/ i ma/ 
486b6(rgyud): bi d+yA hu du me/ hu hu me/ pU ba pra ha re/ kun dga' bo yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs
486b7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
486b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs par 'gyuraro// da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar nga nyid kyis
487a1(rgyud): bshad do// ngas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rje su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la srung bar bya'o// mtshams bcad// shar phyogasu rgyang
487a2(rgyud): grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcadado// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcadado// dad+ya thA/ sa mu tsaM bi mu
487a3(rgyud): pha la mu tsa/ dzaM ga d+ha ra/ ma dasma da la/ na la ka ma ga/ su mu shrA ba ti/ bi muk+ti/ yo ga hi na sa ma ma/ a ra da mu la ba haM ga mi/ i di tsi ri/ bi ta lA kha yo/ ma kha yo/ la ka b+hi d+ha ra ni/ 
487a4(rgyud): pra ti pra yo ge/ a tse prap+ti/ sa ma sra ba ti/ i la ya/ mi la ya/ ba hu sad+ya/ a na ta ma/ ar+tha ba ti ka ra ba ti/ ti kha ni ti gi a ka na ti/ sa ka ti/ sa mi di ma/ ba su baTe/ 
487a5(rgyud): a Te/ a Ta/ tan+dza/ kha ru smin/ kha ru smin la ha taM/ la hu taM/ saM b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra/ saM bi ti ra na taM/ ni ru taM/ i la ta i la/ sa ra pha la/ ba hu pha la/ sa ta ma ta/ 
487a6(rgyud): de Sh+Ti ma ta/ kun dga' bo yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
487a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungaso// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyuraro// / 
487a8(rgyud): da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ kyang bshad// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bshadado// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bshadado// gnod sbyin
487b1(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis kyang bshad do// 'phrog ma ru dang bcas g.yos 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bshad// kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ 
487b2(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal me gsang sngags rje su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas ji ltar bstan pa dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa de bzhin du shes sam/ 
487b3(rgyud): mthong ngam la su byed pa de la ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang yongasu bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo 'das
487b4(rgyud): ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjesu 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di
487b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongasu bskyab ba dang / yongasu bzung bar bya'o// yongasu zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar bya'o// mtshams bca do// shar phyog su rgyang
487b6(rgyud): grags gcig tshun cad mtsham bcad// de bzhin du nub phyogasu rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad// lha phyog su rgyang grags gcig tshun mad mtshams bca // byang phyugs
487b7(rgyud): rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcado// kun dga' bo rgyal po chen po bzhi'i la
487b8(rgyud): dang lam ma yin pa na gnas pa bzhi yod de/ de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan dang / kun bshes dang / gang po dang / dga' ba'i dpal rnams te/ gang de dag gi ming shes pa
488a1(rgyud): dang / rus shes pa de la ni rgyal po chen po'i ming 'jigs pa mi 'byung // chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mi'i 'jigs pa dang
488a2(rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung // kun dga' bo lag na rdo rje'i phu bo lag myur zhes bya ba grong khyer khor yuka zhes bya ba na gnas pa yod de/ gang de'i ming shes
488a3(rgyud): pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni des srung bar byed/ yongasu bskyob par byed/ yong su 'dzin par byed/ chad pa bzlog par byed/ zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar byeda'o// ming 'di zhes
488a4(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje'i phu bo lag myur la gsol lo// gsol ba 'deb so// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
488a5(rgyud): rnams kyi bkas gang ming 'di zhes bya ba la skabs tshol ba dang / glags lta ba'i gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum 'am/ srul po
488a6(rgyud): rnams kyis bdag la glags rnyed par ma gyur cig/ bdag la klan ka rnyed par ma gyur cig/ kun dga' bo srin mo chen mo bcu bzhi yod/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhum
488a7(rgyud): na bzhugs pa na yang srung srung / bltams pa'i tshe na yang srung srung / bltams zin pa'i 'og tu yang srung srung / sku 'khrungs pa na yang srung srung ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste ston
488a8(rgyud): ldan dang / dri med dang / sgra chen dang / rab mnyen dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / 'dze m+bu'i mgrin dang / mchog len dang / bla ma dang grags ma dang / rmad grags dang / 'bab dka' dang / rtsed me/ 
488b1(rgyud): // dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'thab 'jug rnams te/ gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni de dag gi srung bar byed/ yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu 'azin par byed/ zhi ba dang bde leg su
488b2(rgyud): 'gyur bar byed// kun dga' bo srin mo brgyad yod/ de dag ni skyes pa dang / bud med gnyid log kyang rung / ma log kyang rung ste/ gzi byin 'phrog par byedado// de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rwa dang / thub med
488b3(rgyud): dang / ngan slob dang / phra ma can dang / bran mo dmar po dang / rab chen dang / mig bzang dang / brkyang ba ste 'jigs bye'o// gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni de dag gi srung
488b4(rgyud): bar byed// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa bzlog par byed do// kun dga' bo srin mo bdun yod de/ de dag ni khrag gi dri tsher na dpag
488b5(rgyud): tshad brgyar yang rgyug go// de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gzi brjid mchog dang / dga' brtsegs dang / sna tshogs sbyin slong dang / bran mo dkar mo bzang dang / 'jug 'dod dpa
488b6(rgyud): grong khyer khur yug dang / bdun pa ste ri srung / gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni de dag gis srung bar byed do// yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / 
488b7(rgyud): zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa bzlog par byed// kun dga' bo srin mo nag mo chen mo zhes bya ba bu steng yod pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa mtshan gcig gis dpag
488b8(rgyud): tshad brgyad khrir phyin pa zhig yod/ gang de'i ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni des srung bar byed/ yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur
489a1(rgyud): / ba dang chad pa bzlog par bye'o// kun dga' bo sran pa srin mo lnga gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig tu 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams srung zhing skyob par byed/ de
489a2(rgyud): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rtag phyos da su las/ stobs kyis rgyags dang / 'od ma'i sbubs dang / lnga pa ste 'byor ldan no// gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni de dag ni
489a3(rgyud): srung bar byed/ yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chang pa bzlog par byedado// de bas na bdag gis ming 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir srin mo lnga gnod sbyin
489a4(rgyud): 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang bcas pa de dag la gsolo// gsol ba 'deb so// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa/ dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 
489a5(rgyud): kyi bkas ming 'di zhes bya ba la srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yang su bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chang pa bzlog
489a6(rgyud): bar gyis shig tad+ya thA/ bi mu de/ rI ti de/ bI tsa ri de/ bi ga ri dai/ ka ra Di/ ka ra bi ra/ sA ri/ ma d+hu ra g+hoSh+pe/ sha ta ha ni ha/ b+ha Shi ti b+he ak+ke/ nak+te/ bi ka Di tA/ bi ku Di ti/ bi ra dze/ bi g+haSh+Ta bA de/ kun dga' ba rig
489a7(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjesu 'dzin pa 'dis gang la srung ba byas pa dang / sba ba byas pa dang / yongasu bskyab pa byas pa dang / yongasu bzung ba byas pa dang zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba/ 
489a8(rgyud): dang chad pa bzlog par byas pa de la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i spyi dgu dang / lha dang / mir
489b1(rgyud): bcas pa dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ dri za'am klu 'am/ na mkha' lding ngam/ 
489b2(rgyud): gsang ba 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ ro langs sam/ khyang stems sam/ gshed byed dam/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ smyo byed dang / brjed byed glags lta ba dang / klan ka chol
489b3(rgyud): ba rnams kyis glags rnyed pa'i sems can gang yang ngas yang dag par ma mthong ste de ni gnas medo// las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtog so// de bas na ngas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
489b4(rgyud): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjesu 'dzin pa 'dis mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin mo 'am/ sha
489b5(rgyud): za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ dri za 'am/ klu 'am/ nam lA lding ngam/ gsang ba ba 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ langs ma/ khyad snyems sam/ gshed byed dam/ srul po 'a
489b6(rgyud): lus srul po 'am/ smyo byed dam/ brjed byed rnams las ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / sba ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / 
489b7(rgyud): chad pa bzlog par bya'o// dug med par bya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjesu 'dzin pa 'dis sdang bar sems pa bde dang / gnod par sems pa zad dang / mi phan par
489b8(rgyud): sems pa thams cad dang / rab tu sdang bar sems pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / gseb lam thad dang / la can srung ba thams cad dang / sho gaM gyi gnas srung ba de dag thaMd myos
490a1(rgyud): par bya'o// rnam par myos par bya'o// rengs pa dang / rmugs pa dang / lag pa bzung ba dang / rkang pa bzung ba dang / sems bzung ba dang / lde bzung bar bya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal megs
490a2(rgyud): sngags chen po rjesu 'dzin pa 'dis ni gang dang gang du yang thar bar 'gyuraro// kye ma bram ze mya ngan 'das/ 'jig rten dag na srid las rgal// khan dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa// ring po zhig nas
490a3(rgyud): bzed mthong ngo // bzod pa dka' thub mchog ste bzod pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsungs rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa ni// gzhan la 'tshe ba dge sbyong ma yino// ya
490a4(rgyud): dang mig dang ldan pa dag/ mthu rtsal dag kyang yod pa bzhin// mkhas pas 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten 'dir// sdig pa dag ni yongasu spang da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang // 
490a5(rgyud): ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin pa// thams cad la yang bdag phyag 'tshal// de dag kun la skyabasu mchi// 'jig rten dgra bcom bde gshegs la// zla ba skyab su mchi lags kyis/ 
490a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse rnams// zla ba thar mdzod sgra gcan las// sgra gcan zla ba mun sel la// nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing // lha mer 'dug pa dkar ba dang // rnam par dag pa'i
490a7(rgyud): 'od ldan pa// bar sna dag la ma bzung bar// skye dgu'i sgron de myur du mthong // de nas rings shig sgra gcan de// lus kyang rdul cing skrag gyur la// nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis// zla ba rnam par
490a8(rgyud): gtong bar byed// ci yi phyir na sgra gcan khyod// lus kyang rdul zhing skrag gyur la// nang pa bzhin du brtang pa yis// ring bar zla ba gtong bar byed/ sangs rgyas tshig bcad 'di brjod pas// gal
490b1(rgyud): zla ba ma btang na// bdag gi mgo bo raM la bdun 'gas// gsor yang bde bar mi 'gyuraro// kye ma bder par gzigs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'byung ba rmad// de dag gis ni tshig su bcad// brjod na sgra gca
490b2(rgyud): zla ba gtong // bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis// 'jig rten du sems cad brjed ngas pa med pa'i chos can byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni dusu yang dag
490b3(rgyud): par smra bas smra ba yin no zhes bya ba dang / kun dga' bo gzhan yang tshangs par spyod pa la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshig su bcad pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag dang / kun
490b4(rgyud): dga' bo gzhan yang tshig de dag gis bya ba gang byed pa'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba yang 'dis byed par 'gyur te/ s+yad ya the dan/ sra sti ma ti/ bi lu ma ti/ pra ha ra ti/ ka shu mats+tshe/ nan+da/ ma ti/ 
490b5(rgyud): bi ha gra ye/ bi du ma ti/ e da kri ta/ ar+tha su dri sha bud+d+hi/ ba d+hi ma ti su hu du me/ a la bu me/ a la mi te/ hi ga ra sha ra/ a shu ha/ pra ga shi ni/ kun dga'a'o sa zan gyi rtsa ba bcung
490b6(rgyud): sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig bcu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yod// kun dga' bo tshig de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsung bar 'gyur ba dang / ston par 'gyur ba yang yod// de dag bstan
490b7(rgyud): pa 'di la zhugs pa'i mi rnams kyi khar brjod na/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyang bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyuraro// bder pa dang bden pa'i tshigs phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i tshig bden pa rnas
490b8(rgyud): la 'jig rten gyi tshig gi mcheg dang / dge sbyong rnams kyi nang na dge sbyong skyed pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshi Da ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzor pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba bag cha
491a1(rgyud): / mi mnga' ba ste/ mi skrag mi 'bros la 'jigs pa med cing 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa spang ba spyi bung zhes byed pa med pa'o// zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni dusu yang / 
491a2(rgyud): dag par skabs smra ba yin te/ bde ba dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legasu gyur cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis tshul khrims dang brtul un dka' thub dang tshangs par spyad pa la/ 
491a3(rgyud): gnas pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na ni 'phags pa dgos pa'i tshul khrims mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legasu gyur cig/ gnas brtan rgyal po'i
491a4(rgyud): bu thu bo dang 'dra bar rab tu byung nas ring du lon pa tshangs par ngaspyod pa mngon par spyod pa rnams kyi mchog 'di lta ste/ dge slong kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / 'dod pa nyung ba dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan
491a5(rgyud): la gnas pa dang / chog shes pa rnams kyi mchog 'od srung chen po dang / shes rab che ba dang spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog shA radwa ti'i bus/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / mthu che
491a6(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ma 'gags pa dang / mang du thogs pa rnams kyi mchog kun dga' bo dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams
491a7(rgyud): kyi mchog nye bar 'khor dang / cho smra ba rnams kyi mchog byams ma'i bu gang po dang / bslab pa la gus pa rnams kyi mchog sgra gcan zil dang / mal cha dang stan bsgo ba rnams kyi mchog
491a8(rgyud): byang bu nor dang / seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi mchog b+ha ra d+ha dza bsod snyoms len dang / khyim pa dad pa bskyed pa rnams kyi mchog nag po 'char ka dang / lha dang mis mchod pa rnams kyi
491b1(rgyud): mchog legs mthong gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa bzlog pa ra
491b2(rgyud): bya'o// rgyal po 'am/ chom rkun nam/ me 'am/ chu 'am/ dgra 'am/ mi mdza' ba 'am/ lam du 'gro ba 'am/ lam gol bar 'gro ba 'am/ gnyid log pa dang / ra re ba 'am/ bag med pa las
491b3(rgyud): bsrung bar bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can rkang pa med pa 'am/ rkang gnyis pa 'am/ rkang bzhi pa 'am/ rkang mangs sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du
491b4(rgyud): shes ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi seMn ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ces bya ste bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes
491b5(rgyud): bya ba bsrung bar bya'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chang ba bzlog par bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma/ 
491b6(rgyud): byas kyi chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chaT dang bral ba mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yong su bzung ba dang / 
491b7(rgyud): zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa bzlog par bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis tshegs sam/ 'dus pa 'am/ mang mo 'am/ 'khor ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gsher 'i
491b8(rgyud): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des rgyal khams/ yul 'khor ram/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer/ khyim 'am/ gnas sam/ zhing ngam/ nad pa 'di las
